{Su, Sū., 1}
athāto vedotpattimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 2.1]
atha khalu bhagavantam amaravaram ṛṣigaṇaparivṛtam āśramasthaṃ kāśirājaṃ divodāsaṃ dhanvantarim aupadhenavavaitaraṇaurabhrapauṣkalāvatakaravīryagopurarakṣitasuśrutaprabhṛtaya ūcuḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 3.1]
bhagavan śārīramānasāgantuvyādhibhir vividhavedanābhighātopadrutān sanāthān apy anāthavad viceṣṭamānān vikrośataś ca mānavānabhisamīkṣya manasi naḥ pīḍā bhavati teṣāṃ sukhaiṣiṇāṃ rogopaśamārthamātmanaś ca prāṇayātrārthaṃ prajāhitahetor āyurvedaṃ śrotum icchāma ihopadiśyamānam atrāyattam aihikam āmuṣmikaṃ ca śreyaḥ tadbhagavantam upapannāḥ smaḥ śiṣyatveneti | [Su, Sū., 1 4.1]
tān uvāca bhagavān svāgataṃ vaḥ sarva evāmīmāṃsyā adhyāpyāś ca bhavanto vatsāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 5.1]
iha khalv āyurvedo nāmopāṅgam atharvavedasyānutpādya iva prajāḥ ślokaśatasahasram adhyāyasahasraṃ ca kṛtavān svayambhūḥ tato 'lpāyuṣṭvam alpamedhastvaṃ cālokya narāṇāṃ bhūyo 'ṣṭadhā praṇītavān | [Su, Sū., 1 6.1]
tadyathā śalyaṃ śālākyaṃ kāyacikitsā bhūtavidyā kaumārabhṛtyam agadatantraṃ rasāyanatantraṃ vājīkaraṇatantram iti | [Su, Sū., 1 7.1]
athāsya pratyaṅgalakṣaṇasamāsaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 8.1]
tatra śalyaṃ nāma vividhatṛṇakāṣṭhapāṣāṇapāṃśulohaloṣṭāsthivālanakhapūyāsrāvaduṣṭavraṇāntargarbhaśalyoddharaṇārthaṃ yantraśastrakṣārāgnipraṇidhānavraṇaviniścayārthaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 1 8.2]
śālākyaṃ nāmordhvajatrugatānāṃ śravaṇanayanavadanaghrāṇādisaṃśritānāṃ vyādhīnām upaśamanārtham | [Su, Sū., 1 8.3]
kāyacikitsā nāma sarvāṅgasaṃśritānāṃ vyādhīnāṃ jvararaktapittaśoṣonmādāpasmārakuṣṭhamehātisārādīnām upaśamanārtham | [Su, Sū., 1 8.4]
bhūtavidyā nāma devāsuragandharvayakṣarakṣaḥpitṛpiśācanāgagrahādyupasṛṣṭacetasāṃ śāntikarmabaliharaṇādigrahopaśamanārtham | [Su, Sū., 1 8.5]
kaumārabhṛtyaṃ nāma kumārabharaṇadhātrīkṣīradoṣasaṃśodhanārthaṃ duṣṭastanyagrahasamutthānāṃ ca vyādhīnām upaśamanārtham | [Su, Sū., 1 8.6]
agadatantraṃ nāma sarpakīṭalūtāmūṣakādidaṣṭaviṣavyañjanārthaṃ vividhaviṣasaṃyogopaśamanārthaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 1 8.7]
rasāyanatantraṃ nāma vayaḥsthāpanam āyurmedhābalakaraṃ rogāpaharaṇasamarthaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 1 8.8]
vājīkaraṇatantraṃ nāmālpaduṣṭakṣīṇaviśuṣkaretasām āpyāyanaprasādopacayajanananimittaṃ praharṣajananārthaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 1 8.9]
evam ayam āyurvedo 'ṣṭāṅga upadiśyate atra kasmai kim ucyatām iti | [Su, Sū., 1 9.1]
ta ūcuḥ asmākaṃ sarveṣām eva śalyajñānaṃ mūlaṃ kṛtvopadiśatu bhagavān iti | [Su, Sū., 1 10.1]
sa uvācaivam astv iti | [Su, Sū., 1 11.1]
ta ūcur bhūyo 'pi bhagavantam asmākam ekamatīnāṃ matam abhisamīkṣya suśruto bhagavantaṃ prakṣyati asmai copadiśyamānaṃ vayam apy upadhārayiṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 12.1]
sa hovācaivam astv iti | [Su, Sū., 1 13.1]
vatsa suśruta iha khalv āyurvedaprayojanaṃ vyādhyupasṛṣṭānāṃ vyādhiparimokṣaḥ svasthasya rakṣaṇaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 1 14.1]
āyur asmin vidyate 'nena vāyur vindatīty āyurvedaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 15.1]
tasyāṅgavaramādyaṃ pratyakṣāgamānumānopamānair aviruddham ucyamānam upadhāraya | [Su, Sū., 1 16.1]
etaddhy aṅgaṃ prathamaṃ prāg abhighātavraṇasaṃrohād yajñaśiraḥsaṃdhānāc ca | [Su, Sū., 1 17.1]
śrūyate hi yathā rudreṇa yajñasya śiraśchinnamiti tato devā aśvināv abhigamyocur bhagavantau naḥ śreṣṭhatamau yuvāṃ bhaviṣyathaḥ bhavadbhyāṃ yajñasya śiraḥ saṃdhātavyam iti | [Su, Sū., 1 17.2]
tāv ūcatur evam astv iti | [Su, Sū., 1 17.3]
atha tayor arthe devā indraṃ yajñabhāgena prāsādayan | [Su, Sū., 1 17.4]
tābhyāṃ yajñasya śiraḥ saṃhitam iti | [Su, Sū., 1 17.5]
aṣṭāsv api cāyurvedatantreṣv etad evādhikam abhimatam āśukriyākaraṇādyantraśastrakṣārāgnipraṇidhānāt sarvatantrasāmānyāc ca | [Su, Sū., 1 18.1]
tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ puṇyaṃ svargyaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ vṛttikaraṃ ceti | [Su, Sū., 1 19.1]
brahmā provāca tataḥ prajāpatir adhijage tasmād aśvinau aśvibhyām indraḥ indrād ahaṃ mayā tv iha pradeyam arthibhyaḥ prajāhitahetoḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 20.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 1 21.1]
ahaṃ hi dhanvantarirādidevo jarārujāmṛtyuharo 'marāṇām | [Su, Sū., 1 21.2]
śalyāṅgamaṅgair aparair upetaṃ prāpto 'smi gāṃ bhūya ihopadeṣṭum | [Su, Sū., 1 21.3]
asmin śāstre pañcamahābhūtaśarīrisamavāyaḥ puruṣa ity ucyate | [Su, Sū., 1 22.1]
tasmin kriyā so 'dhiṣṭhānaṃ kasmāt lokasya dvaividhyāt loko hi dvividhaḥ sthāvaro jaṅgamaś ca dvividhātmaka evāgneyaḥ saumyaś ca tadbhūyastvāt pañcātmako vā tatra caturvidho bhūtagrāmaḥ saṃsvedajarāyujāṇḍajodbhijjasaṃjñaḥ tatra puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ tasyopakaraṇamanyat tasmāt puruṣo 'dhiṣṭhānam | [Su, Sū., 1 22.2]
tadduḥkhasaṃyogā vyādhaya ucyante | [Su, Sū., 1 23.1]
te caturvidhāḥ āgantavaḥ śārīrāḥ mānasāḥ svābhāvikāśceti | [Su, Sū., 1 24.1]
teṣāmāgantavo 'bhighātanimittāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 25.1]
śārīrās tv annapānamūlā vātapittakaphaśoṇitasaṃnipātavaiṣamyanimittāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 25.2]
mānasāstu krodhaśokabhayaharṣaviṣāderṣyābhyasūyādainyamātsaryakāmalobhaprabhṛtaya icchādveṣabhedair bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 1 25.3]
svābhāvikāstu kṣutpipāsājarāmṛtyunidrāprakṛtayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 25.4]
ta ete manaḥśarīrādhiṣṭhānāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 26.1]
teṣāṃ saṃśodhanasaṃśamanāhārācārāḥ samyakprayuktā nigrahahetavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 27.1]
prāṇināṃ punarmūlam āhāro balavarṇaujasāṃ ca sa ṣaṭsu raseṣvāyattaḥ rasāḥ punardravyāśrayāḥ dravyāṇi punar oṣadhayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 28.1]
tāstu dvividhāḥ sthāvarā jaṅgamāś ca | [Su, Sū., 1 28.2]
tāsāṃ sthāvarāścaturvidhāḥ vanaspatayo vṛkṣā vīrudha oṣadhaya iti | [Su, Sū., 1 29.1]
tāsu apuṣpāḥ phalavanto vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaphalavanto vṛkṣāḥ pratānavatyaḥ stambinyaś ca vīrudhaḥ phalapākaniṣṭhā oṣadhaya iti | [Su, Sū., 1 29.2]
jaṅgamāḥ khalv api caturvidhāḥ jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 30.1]
tatra paśumanuṣyavyālādayo jarāyujāḥ khagasarpasarīsṛpaprabhṛtayo 'ṇḍajāḥ kṛmikīṭapipīlikāprabhṛtayaḥ svedajāḥ indragopamaṇḍūkaprabhṛtaya udbhijjāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 30.2]
tatra sthāvarebhyas tvakpattrapuṣpaphalamūlakandaniryāsasvarasādayaḥ prayojanavantaḥ jaṅgamebhyaś carmanakharomarudhirādayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 31.1]
pārthivāḥ suvarṇarajatamaṇimuktāmanaḥśilāmṛtkapālādayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 32.1]
kālakṛtāḥ pravātanivātātapachāyājyotsnātamaḥśītoṣṇavarṣāhorātrapakṣamāsartvayanādayaḥ saṃvatsaraviśeṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 33.1]
ta ete svabhāvata eva doṣāṇāṃ saṃcayaprakopapraśamapratīkārahetavaḥ prayojanavantaś ca | [Su, Sū., 1 34.1]
bhavanti cātra ślokāḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 35.1]
śārīrāṇāṃ vikārāṇām eṣa vargaś caturvidhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 35.2]
prakope praśame caiva hetur uktaś cikitsakaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 35.3]
āgantavas tu ye rogās te dvidhā nipatanti hi | [Su, Sū., 1 36.1]
manasyanye śarīre 'nye teṣāṃ tu dvividhā kriyā | [Su, Sū., 1 36.2]
śarīrapatitānāṃ tu śārīravad upakramaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 37.1]
mānasānāṃ tu śabdādiriṣṭo vargaḥ sukhāvahaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 37.2]
evam etat puruṣo vyādhir auṣadhaṃ kriyākāla iti catuṣṭayaṃ samāsena vyākhyātam tatra puruṣagrahaṇāt tatsambhavadravyasamūho bhūtādir uktas tadaṅgapratyaṅgavikalpāś ca tvaṅmāṃsāsthisirāsnāyuprabhṛtayaḥ vyādhigrahaṇād vātapittakaphaśoṇitasaṃnipātavaiṣamyanimittāḥ sarva eva vyādhayo vyākhyātāḥ oṣadhagrahaṇād dravyarasaguṇavīryavipākānām ādeśaḥ kriyāgrahaṇācchedyādīni snehādīni ca karmāṇi vyākhyātāni kālagrahaṇāt sarvakriyākālānām ādeśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 38.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 1 39.1]
bījaṃ cikitsitasyaitatsamāsena prakīrtitam | [Su, Sū., 1 39.2]
saviṃśam adhyāyaśatamasya vyākhyā bhaviṣyati | [Su, Sū., 1 39.3]
tac ca saviṃśam adhyāyaśataṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu sūtranidānaśārīracikitsitakalpeṣv arthavaśāt saṃvibhajya uttare tantre śeṣānarthān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 1 40.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 1 41.1]
svayambhuvā proktamidaṃ sanātanaṃ paṭheddhi yaḥ kāśipatiprakāśitam | [Su, Sū., 1 41.2]
sa puṇyakarmā bhuvi pūjito nṛpair asukṣaye śakrasalokatāṃ vrajet | [Su, Sū., 1 41.3]
{Su, Sū., 2}
athātaḥ śiṣyopanayanīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 2 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 2 2.1]
brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyānām anyatamam anvayavayaḥśīlaśauryaśaucācāravinayaśaktibalamedhādhṛtismṛtimatipratipattiyuktaṃ tanujihvauṣṭhadantāgramṛjuvaktrākṣināsaṃ prasannacittavākceṣṭaṃ kleśasahaṃ ca bhiṣak śiṣyam upanayet ato viparītaguṇaṃ nopanayet | [Su, Sū., 2 3.1]
upanayanīyaṃ tu brāhmaṇaṃ praśasteṣu tithikaraṇamuhūrtanakṣatreṣu praśastāyāṃ diśi śucau same deśe caturhastaṃ caturasraṃ sthaṇḍilam upalipya gomayena darbhaiḥ saṃstīrya puṣpair lājabhaktai ratnaiś ca devatāḥ pūjayitvā viprān bhiṣajaś ca tatrollikhyābhyukṣya ca dakṣiṇato brahmāṇaṃ sthāpayitvāgnim upasamādhāya khadirapalāśadevadārubilvānāṃ samidbhiś caturṇāṃ vā kṣīravṛkṣāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktābhir dārvīhaumikena vidhinā sruveṇājyāhutīr juhuyāt sapraṇavābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ tataḥ pratidaivatam ṛṣīṃś ca svāhākāraṃ kuryāt śiṣyam api kārayet | [Su, Sū., 2 4.1]
brāhmaṇas trayāṇāṃ varṇānām upanayanaṃ kartum arhati rājanyo dvayasya vaiśyo vaiśyasyaiveti śūdram api kulaguṇasampannaṃ mantravarjam anupanītam adhyāpayed ity eke | [Su, Sū., 2 5.1]
tato 'gniṃ triḥ pariṇīyāgnisākṣikaṃ śiṣyaṃ brūyāt kāmakrodhalobhamohamānāhaṃkārerṣyāpāruṣyapaiśunyānṛtālasyāyaśasyāni hitvā nīcanakharomṇā śucinā kaṣāyavāsasā satyavratabrahmacaryābhivādanatatpareṇāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ madanumatasthānagamanaśayanāsanabhojanādhyayanapareṇa bhūtvā matpriyahiteṣu vartitavyam ato 'nyathā te vartamānasyādharmo bhavati aphalā ca vidyā na ca prākāśyaṃ prāpnoti | [Su, Sū., 2 6.1]
ahaṃ vā tvayi samyagvartamāne yadyanyathādarśī syām enobhāg bhaveyam aphalavidyaś ca | [Su, Sū., 2 7.1]
dvijagurudaridramitrapravrajitopanatasādhvanāthābhyupagatānāṃ cātmabāndhavānām iva svabhaiṣajaiḥ pratikartavyam evaṃ sādhu bhavati vyādhaśākunikapatitapāpakāriṇāṃ ca na pratikartavyam evaṃ vidyā prakāśate mitrayaśodharmārthakāmāṃś ca prāpnoti | [Su, Sū., 2 8.1]
bhavataś cātra | [Su, Sū., 2 9.1]
kṛṣṇe 'ṣṭamī tannidhane 'hanī dve śukle tathāpy evam ahar dvisaṃdhyam | [Su, Sū., 2 9.2]
akālavidyutstanayitnughoṣe svatantrarāṣṭrakṣitipavyathāsu | [Su, Sū., 2 9.3]
śmaśānayānādyatanāhaveṣu mahotsavautpātikadarśaneṣu | [Su, Sū., 2 10.1]
nādhyeyamanyeṣu ca yeṣu viprā nādhīyate nāśucinā ca nityam | [Su, Sū., 2 10.2]
{Su, Sū., 3}
athāto 'dhyayanasaṃpradānīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 3 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 3 2.1]
prāgabhihitaṃ saviṃśam adhyāyaśataṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu | [Su, Sū., 3 3.1]
tatra sūtrasthānam adhyāyāḥ ṣaṭcatvāriṃśat ṣoḍaśa nidānāni daśa śārīrāṇi catvāriṃśac cikitsitāni aṣṭau kalpāḥ tad uttaraṃ ṣaṭsaṣṭiḥ | [Su, Sū., 3 3.2]
vedotpattiḥ śiṣyanayas tathādhyayanadānikaḥ | [Su, Sū., 3 4.1]
prabhāṣaṇāgraharaṇāv ṛtucaryātha yāntrikaḥ | [Su, Sū., 3 4.2]
śastrāvacāraṇaṃ yogyā viśikhā kṣārakalpanam | [Su, Sū., 3 5.1]
agnikarmajalaukākhyāv adhyāyau raktavarṇanam | [Su, Sū., 3 5.2]
doṣadhātumalādyānāṃ vijñānādhyāya eva ca | [Su, Sū., 3 6.1]
karṇavyadhāmapakvaiṣāv ālepo vraṇyupāsanam | [Su, Sū., 3 6.2]
hitāhito vraṇapraśno vraṇāsrāvaś ca yaḥ pṛthak | [Su, Sū., 3 7.1]
kṛtyākṛtyavidhirvyādhisamuddeśīya eva ca | [Su, Sū., 3 7.2]
viniścayaḥ śastravidhau pranaṣṭajñānikas tathā | [Su, Sū., 3 8.1]
śalyoddhṛtirvraṇajñānaṃ dūtasvapnanidarśanam | [Su, Sū., 3 8.2]
pañcendriyaṃ tathā chāyā svabhāvādvaikṛtaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 3 9.1]
vāraṇo yuktasenīya āturakramabhūmikau | [Su, Sū., 3 9.2]
miśrakākhyo dravyagaṇaḥ saṃśuddhau śamane ca yaḥ | [Su, Sū., 3 10.1]
dravyādīnāṃ ca vijñānaṃ viśeṣo dravyago 'paraḥ | [Su, Sū., 3 10.2]
vājīkaraṃ ca yat kṣīṇe sarvābādhaśamo 'pi ca | [Su, Sū., 3 22.1]
medhāyuṣkaraṇaṃ cāpi svabhāvavyādhivāraṇam | [Su, Sū., 3 22.2]
nivṛttasaṃtāpakaraṃ kīrtitaṃ ca rasāyanam | [Su, Sū., 3 23.1]
snehopayaugikaḥ svedo vamane ca virecane | [Su, Sū., 3 23.2]
{Su, Sū., 4}
athātaḥ prabhāṣaṇīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 4 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 4 2.1]
adhigatam apy adhyayanam aprabhāṣitam arthataḥ kharasya candanabhāra iva kevalaṃ pariśramakaraṃ bhavati | [Su, Sū., 4 3.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 4 4.1]
yathā kharaścandanabhāravāhī bhārasya vettā na tu candanasya | [Su, Sū., 4 4.2]
evaṃ hi śāstrāṇi bahūny adhītya cārtheṣu mūḍhāḥ kharavad vahanti | [Su, Sū., 4 4.3]
tasmāt saviṃśam adhyāyaśatam anupadapādaślokam anuvarṇayitavyam anuśrotavyaṃ ca kasmāt sūkṣmā hi dravyarasaguṇavīryavipākadoṣadhātumalāśayamarmasirāsnāyusaṃdhyasthigarbhasambhavadravyasamūhavibhāgās tathā pranaṣṭaśalyoddharaṇavraṇaviniścayabhagnavikalpāḥ sādhyayāpyapratyākhyeyatā ca vikārāṇām evamādayaścānye sahasraśo viśeṣā ye vicintyamānā vimalavipulabuddher api buddhim ākulīkuryuḥ kiṃ punar alpabuddheḥ tasmād avaśyamanupadapādaślokam anuvarṇayitavyam anuśrotavyaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 4 5.1]
anyaśāstropapannānāṃ cārthānāmihopanītānām arthavaśāt teṣāṃ tadvidyebhya eva vyākhyānam anuśrotavyaṃ kasmāt na hy ekasmin śāstre śakyaḥ sarvaśāstrāṇām avarodhaḥ kartum | [Su, Sū., 4 6.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 4 7.1]
ekaṃ śāstram adhīyāno na vidyāc chāstraniścayam | [Su, Sū., 4 7.2]
tasmād bahuśrutaḥ śāstraṃ vijānīyāccikitsakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 4 7.3]
śāstraṃ gurumukhodgīrṇam ādāyopāsya cāsakṛt | [Su, Sū., 4 8.1]
yaḥ karma kurute vaidyaḥ sa vaidyo 'nye tu taskarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 4 8.2]
aupadhenavamaurabhraṃ sauśrutaṃ pauṣkalāvatam | [Su, Sū., 4 9.1]
śeṣāṇāṃ śalyatantrāṇāṃ mūlāny etāni nirdiśet | [Su, Sū., 4 9.2]
{Su, Sū., 5}
athāto 'gropaharaṇīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 2.1]
trividhaṃ karma pūrvakarma pradhānakarma paścātkarmeti tadvyādhiṃ prati pratyupadekṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 3.1]
asmin śāstre śastrakarmaprādhānyāc chastrakarma iva tāvat pūrvam upadekṣyāmas tatsambhārāṃś ca | [Su, Sū., 5 4.1]
tac ca śastrakarmāṣṭavidhaṃ tadyathā chedyaṃ bhedyaṃ lekhyaṃ vedhyam eṣyam āhāryaṃ visrāvyaṃ sīvyam iti | [Su, Sū., 5 5.1]
ato 'nyatamaṃ karma cikīrṣatā vaidyena pūrvam evopakalpayitavyāni yantraśastrakṣārāgniśalākāśṛṅgajalaukālābūjāmbavauṣṭhapicuprotasūtrapattrapaṭṭamadhughṛtavasāpayas tailatarpaṇakaṣāyālepanakalkavyajanaśītoṣṇodakakaṭāhādīni parikarmiṇaś ca snigdhāḥ sthirā balavantaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 6.1]
tataḥ praśasteṣu tithikaraṇamuhūrtanakṣatreṣu dadhyakṣatānnapānaratnair agniṃ viprān bhiṣajaś cārcayitvā kṛtabalimaṅgalasvastivācanaṃ laghubhuktavantaṃ prāṅmukham āturam upaveśya yantrayitvā pratyaṅmukho vaidyo marmasirāsnāyusaṃdhyasthidhamanīḥ pariharan anulomaṃ śastraṃ nidadhyād ā pūyadarśanāt sakṛd evāpaharec chastram āśu ca mahatsv api ca pākeṣu dvyaṅgulāntaraṃ tryaṅgulāntaraṃ vā śastrapadamuktam | [Su, Sū., 5 7.1]
tatrāyato viśālaḥ samaḥ suvibhakto nirāśraya iti vraṇaguṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 8.1]
bhavataś cātra | [Su, Sū., 5 9.1]
āyataś ca viśālaś ca suvibhakto nirāśrayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 9.2]
prāptakālakṛtaś cāpi vraṇaḥ karmaṇi śasyate | [Su, Sū., 5 9.3]
śauryamāśukriyā śastrataikṣṇyam asvedavepathu | [Su, Sū., 5 10.1]
asaṃmohaś ca vaidyasya śastrakarmaṇi śasyate | [Su, Sū., 5 10.2]
ekena vā vraṇenāśudhyamāne nāntarā buddhyāvekṣyāparān vraṇān kuryāt | [Su, Sū., 5 11.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 5 12.1]
yato yato gatiṃ vidyād utsaṅgo yatra yatra ca | [Su, Sū., 5 12.2]
tatra tatra vraṇaṃ kuryādyathā doṣo na tiṣṭhati | [Su, Sū., 5 12.3]
tatra bhrūgaṇḍaśaṅkhalalāṭākṣipuṭauṣṭhadantaveṣṭakakṣākukṣivaṅkṣaṇeṣu tiryak cheda uktaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 13.1]
candramaṇḍalavacchedān pāṇipādeṣu kārayet | [Su, Sū., 5 14.1]
ardhacandrākṛtīṃś cāpi gude meḍhre ca buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 5 14.2]
anyathā tu sirāsnāyucchedanam atimātraṃ vedanā cirād vraṇasaṃroho māṃsakandīprādurbhāvaś ceti | [Su, Sū., 5 15.1]
mūḍhagarbhodarārśo'śmarībhagaṃdaramukharogeṣv abhuktavataḥ karma kurvīta | [Su, Sū., 5 16.1]
tataḥ śastram avacārya śītābhir adbhir āturam āśvāsya samantāt paripīḍyāṅgulyā vraṇam abhimṛdya prakṣālya kaṣāyeṇa protenodakamādāya tilakalkamadhusarpiḥpragāḍhām auṣadhayuktāṃ nātisnigdhāṃ nātirūkṣāṃ vartiṃ praṇidadhyāt tataḥ kalkenācchādya ghanāṃ kavalikāṃ dattvā vastrapaṭṭena badhnīyāt vedanārakṣoghnair dhūpair dhūpayet rakṣoghnaiś ca mantrai rakṣāṃ kurvīta | [Su, Sū., 5 17.1]
tato guggulvagurusarjarasavacāgaurasarṣapacūrṇair lavaṇanimbapattravimiśrair ājyayuktair dhūpayet ājyaśeṣeṇa cāsya prāṇān samālabheta | [Su, Sū., 5 18.1]
udakumbhāc cāpo gṛhītvāprokṣayan rakṣākarma kuryāt tad vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 19.1]
kṛtyānāṃ pratighātārthaṃ tathā rakṣobhayasya ca | [Su, Sū., 5 20.1]
rakṣākarma kariṣyāmi brahmā tad anumanyatām | [Su, Sū., 5 20.2]
nāgāḥ piśācā gandharvāḥ pitaro yakṣarākṣasāḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 21.1]
abhidravanti ye ye tvāṃ brahmādyā ghnantu tān sadā | [Su, Sū., 5 21.2]
pṛthivyāmantarīkṣe ca ye caranti niśācarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 22.1]
dikṣu vāstunivāsāś ca pāntu tvāṃ te namaskṛtāḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 22.2]
pāntu tvāṃ munayo brāhmyā divyā rājarṣayastathā | [Su, Sū., 5 23.1]
parvatāścaiva nadyaś ca sarvāḥ sarve ca sāgarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 23.2]
agnī rakṣatu te jihvāṃ prāṇān vāyus tathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 5 24.1]
somo vyānamapānaṃ te parjanyaḥ parirakṣatu | [Su, Sū., 5 24.2]
udānaṃ vidyutaḥ pāntu samānaṃ stanayitnavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 25.1]
balamindro balapatirmanurmanye matiṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 5 25.2]
kāmāṃste pāntu gandharvāḥ sattvamindro 'bhirakṣatu | [Su, Sū., 5 26.1]
prajñāṃ te varuṇo rājā samudro nābhimaṇḍalam | [Su, Sū., 5 26.2]
cakṣuḥ sūryo diśaḥ śrotre candramāḥ pātu te manaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 27.1]
nakṣatrāṇi sadā rūpaṃ chāyāṃ pāntu niśāstava | [Su, Sū., 5 27.2]
retas tv āpyāyayantv āpo romāṇy oṣadhayas tathā | [Su, Sū., 5 28.1]
ākāśaṃ khāni te pātu dehaṃ tava vasuṃdharā | [Su, Sū., 5 28.2]
vaiśvānaraḥ śiraḥ pātu viṣṇustava parākramam | [Su, Sū., 5 29.1]
pauruṣaṃ puruṣaśreṣṭho brahmātmānaṃ dhruvo bhruvau | [Su, Sū., 5 29.2]
etā dehe viśeṣeṇa tava nityā hi devatāḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 30.1]
etāstvāṃ satataṃ pāntu dīrghamāyuravāpnuhi | [Su, Sū., 5 30.2]
svasti te bhagavān brahmā svasti devāś ca kurvatām | [Su, Sū., 5 31.1]
svasti te candrasūryau ca svasti nāradaparvatau | [Su, Sū., 5 31.2]
svastyagniś caiva vāyuś ca svasti devāḥ sahendragāḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 31.3]
pitāmahakṛtā rakṣā svastyāyurvardhatāṃ tava | [Su, Sū., 5 32.1]
ītayaste praśāmyantu sadā bhava gatavyathaḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 32.2]
iti svāhā | [Su, Sū., 5 33.1]
etair vedātmakair mantraiḥ kṛtyāvyādhivināśanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 5 33.2]
mayaivaṃ kṛtarakṣastvaṃ dīrgham āyur avāpnuhi | [Su, Sū., 5 33.3]
tataḥ kṛtarakṣamāturam āgāraṃ praveśya ācārikam ādiśet | [Su, Sū., 5 34.1]
tatas tṛtīye 'hani vimucyaivam eva badhnīyād vastrapaṭṭena na cainaṃ tvaramāṇo 'paredyur mokṣayet | [Su, Sū., 5 35.1]
dvitīyadivasaparimokṣaṇād vigrathito vraṇaś cirād upasaṃrohati tīvrarujaś ca bhavati | [Su, Sū., 5 36.1]
ata ūrdhvaṃ doṣakālabalādīnavekṣya kaṣāyālepanabandhāhārācārān vidadhyāt | [Su, Sū., 5 37.1]
na cainaṃ tvaramāṇaḥ sāntardoṣaṃ ropayet sa hy alpenāpy apacāreṇābhyantaram utsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhūyo 'pi vikaroti | [Su, Sū., 5 38.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 5 39.1]
tasmād antarbahiś caiva suśuddhaṃ ropayed vraṇam | [Su, Sū., 5 39.2]
rūḍhe 'py ajīrṇavyāyāmavyavāyādīn vivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 5 39.3]
harṣaṃ krodhaṃ bhayaṃ cāpi yāvat sthairyopasambhavāt | [Su, Sū., 5 39.4]
hemante śiśire caiva vasante cāpi mokṣayet | [Su, Sū., 5 40.1]
tryahād dvyahāc charadgrīṣmavarṣāsv api ca buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 5 40.2]
atipātiṣu rogeṣu necched vidhim imaṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 5 41.1]

ghṛtena sā śāntim upaiti siktā koṣṇena yaṣṭīmadhukānvitena | [Su, Sū., 5 42.2]
{Su, Sū., 6}
athāta ṛtucaryamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 2.1]
kālo hi nāma bhagavān svayambhur anādimadhyanidhano 'tra rasavyāpatsampattī jīvitamaraṇe ca manuṣyāṇām āyatte | [Su, Sū., 6 3.1]
sa sūkṣmām api kalāṃ na līyata iti kālaḥ saṃkalayati kālayati vā bhūtānīti kālaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 3.2]
tasya saṃvatsarātmano bhagavān ādityo gativiśeṣeṇa nimeṣakāṣṭhākalāmuhūrtāhorātrapakṣamāsartvayanasaṃvatsarayugapravibhāgaṃ karoti | [Su, Sū., 6 4.1]
tatra laghvakṣaroccāraṇamātro 'kṣinimeṣaḥ pañcadaśākṣinimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśatkāṣṭhāḥ kalā viṃśatikalo muhūrtaḥ kalādaśabhāgaś ca triṃśanmuhūrtam ahorātraṃ pañcadaśāhorātrāṇi pakṣaḥ sa ca dvividhaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca tau māsaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 5.1]
tatra māghādayo dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ dvimāsikam ṛtuṃ kṛtvā ṣaḍṛtavo bhavanti te śiśiravasantagrīṣmavarṣāśaraddhemantāḥ teṣāṃ tapastapasyau śiśiraḥ madhumādhavau vasantaḥ śuciśukrau grīṣmaḥ nabhonabhasyau varṣāḥ iṣorjau śarat sahaḥsahasyau hemanta iti | [Su, Sū., 6 6.1]
ta ete śītoṣṇavarṣalakṣaṇāścandrādityayoḥ kālavibhāgakaratvādayane dve bhavato dakṣiṇamuttaraṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 6 7.1]
tayor dakṣiṇaṃ varṣāśaraddhemantāḥ teṣu bhagavān āpyāyate somaḥ amlalavaṇamadhurāś ca rasā balavanto bhavanti uttarottaraṃ ca sarvaprāṇināṃ balam abhivardhate | [Su, Sū., 6 7.2]
uttaraṃ ca śiśiravasantagrīṣmāḥ teṣu bhagavān āpyāyate 'rkaḥ tiktakaṣāyakaṭukāś ca rasā balavanto bhavanti uttarottaraṃ ca sarvaprāṇināṃ balam apahīyate | [Su, Sū., 6 7.3]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 6 8.1]
śītāṃśuḥ kledayatyurvīṃ vivasvān śoṣayaty api | [Su, Sū., 6 8.2]
tāv ubhāv api saṃśritya vāyuḥ pālayati prajāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 8.3]
atha khalvayane dve yugapat saṃvatsaro bhavati te tu pañca yugamiti saṃjñāṃ labhante sa eṣa nimeṣādiryugaparyantaḥ kālaścakravat parivartamānaḥ kālacakram ucyata ity eke | [Su, Sū., 6 9]
iha tu varṣāśaraddhemantavasantagrīṣmaprāvṛṣaḥ ṣaḍṛtavo bhavanti doṣopacayaprakopopaśamanimittaṃ te tu bhādrapadādyena dvimāsikena vyākhyātāḥ tad yathā bhādrapadāśvayujau varṣāḥ kārttikamārgaśīrṣau śarat pauṣamāghau hemantaḥ phālgunacaitrau vasantaḥ vaiśākhajyeṣṭhau grīṣmaḥ āṣāḍhaśrāvaṇau prāvṛḍ iti | [Su, Sū., 6 10]
tatra varṣāsvoṣadhayastaruṇyo 'lpavīryā āpaścāprasannāḥ kṣitimalaprāyāḥ tā upayujyamānā nabhasi meghāvatate jalapraklinnāyāṃ bhūmau klinnadehānāṃ prāṇināṃ śītavātaviṣṭambhitāgnīnāṃ vidahyante vidāhāt pittasaṃcayamāpādayanti sa saṃcayaḥ śaradi praviralameghe viyaty upaśuṣyati paṅke 'rkakiraṇapravilāyitaḥ paittikān vyādhīn janayati | [Su, Sū., 6 11.1]
tā evauṣadhayaḥ kālapariṇāmāt pariṇatavīryā balavatyo hemante bhavantyāpaś ca prasannāḥ snigdhā atyarthaṃ gurvyaś ca tā upayujyamānā mandakiraṇatvādbhānoḥ satuṣārapavanopastambhitadehānāṃ dehināmavidagdhāḥ snehācchaityādgauravād upalepāc ca śleṣmasaṃcayam āpādayanti sa saṃcayo vasante 'rkaraśmipravilāyita īṣatstabdhadehānāṃ dehināṃ ślaiṣmikān vyādhīn janayati | [Su, Sū., 6 11.2]
tā evauṣadhayo nidāghe niḥsārā rūkṣā atimātraṃ laghvyo bhavantyāpaś ca tā upayujyamānāḥ sūryapratāpopaśoṣitadehānāṃ dehināṃ raukṣyāllaghutvādvaiśadyāc ca vāyoḥ saṃcayam āpādayanti sa saṃcayaḥ prāvṛṣi cātyarthaṃ jalopaklinnāyāṃ bhūmau klinnadehānāṃ prāṇināṃ śītavātavarṣerito vātikān vyādhīn janayati | [Su, Sū., 6 11.3]
evameṣa doṣāṇāṃ saṃcayaprakopahetur uktaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 11.4]
tatra varṣāhemantagrīṣmeṣu saṃcitānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ śaradvasantaprāvṛṭsu ca prakupitānāṃ nirharaṇaṃ kartavyam | [Su, Sū., 6 12.1]
tatra paittikānāṃ vyādhīnām upaśamo hemante ślaiṣmikāṇāṃ nidāghe vātikānāṃ śaradi svabhāvata eva ta ete saṃcayaprakopopaśamā vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 13.1]
tatra pūrvāhṇe vasantasya liṅgaṃ madhyāhne grīṣmasya aparāhṇe prāvṛṣaḥ pradoṣe vārṣikaṃ śāradamardharātre pratyuṣasi haimantam upalakṣayet evamahorātram api varṣam iva śītoṣṇavarṣalakṣaṇaṃ doṣopacayaprakopopaśamair jānīyāt | [Su, Sū., 6 14.1]
tatra avyāpanneṣvṛtuṣvavyāpannā oṣadhayo bhavantyāpaś ca tā upayujyamānāḥ prāṇāyurbalavīryaujaskaryo bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 6 15.1]
teṣāṃ punarvyāpado 'dṛṣṭakāritāḥ śītoṣṇavātavarṣāṇi khalu viparītānyoṣadhīrvyāpādayanty apaś ca | [Su, Sū., 6 16.1]
tāsām upayogādvividharogaprādurbhāvo marako vā bhaved iti | [Su, Sū., 6 17.1]
tatra avyāpannānām oṣadhīnām apāṃ copayogaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 18.1]
kadācidavyāpanneṣvapyṛtuṣu kṛtyābhiśāparakṣaḥkrodhādharmair upadhvasyante janapadāḥ viṣauṣadhipuṣpagandhena vāyunopanītenākramyate yo deśastatra doṣaprakṛtyaviśeṣeṇa kāsaśvāsavamathupratiśyāyaśirorugjvarair upatapyante grahanakṣatracaritair vā gṛhadāraśayanāsanayānavāhanamaṇiratnopakaraṇagarhitalakṣaṇanimittaprādurbhāvair vā | [Su, Sū., 6 19.1]
tatra sthānaparityāgaśāntikarmaprāyaścittamaṅgalajapahomopahārejyāñjalinamaskārataponiyamadayādānadīkṣābhyupagamadevatābrāhmaṇaguruparair bhavitavyam evaṃ sādhu bhavati | [Su, Sū., 6 20.1]
ata ūrdhvam avyāpannānāmṛtūnāṃ lakṣaṇānyupadekṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 21.1]
vāyurvātyuttaraḥ śīto rajodhūmākulā diśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 22.1]
channastuṣāraiḥ savitā himānaddhā jalāśayāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 22.2]
darpitā dhvāṅkṣakhaḍgāhvamahiṣorabhrakuñjarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 23.1]
rodhrapriyaṅgupuṃnāgāḥ puṣpitā himasāhvaye | [Su, Sū., 6 23.2]
śiśire śītamadhikaṃ vātavṛṣṭyākulā diśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 24.1]
śeṣaṃ hemantavat sarvaṃ vijñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ budhaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 24.2]

dampatyor mānabhiduro vasante dakṣiṇo 'nilaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 26.2]
diśo vasante vimalāḥ kānanair upaśobhitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 27.1]
kiṃśukāmbhojabakulacūtāśokādipuṣpitaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 27.2]
kokilāṣaṭpadagaṇair upagītā manoharāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 28.1]
dakṣiṇānilasaṃvītāḥ sumukhāḥ pallavojjvalāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 28.2]
grīṣme tīkṣṇāṃśurādityo māruto nairṛto 'sukhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 29.1]
bhūstaptā saritastanvyo diśaḥ prajvalitā iva | [Su, Sū., 6 29.2]
bhrāntacakrāhvayugalāḥ payaḥpānākulā mṛgāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 30.1]
dhvastavīruttṛṇalatā viparṇāṅkitapādapāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 30.2]

ambudair vidyududdyotaprasrutaistumulasvanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 31.2]
komalaśyāmaśaṣpāḍhyā śakragopojjvalā mahī | [Su, Sū., 6 32.1]
kadambanīpakuṭajasarjaketakibhūṣitā | [Su, Sū., 6 32.2]
tatra varṣāsu nadyo 'mbhaśchannotkhātataṭadrumāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 33.1]
vāpyaḥ protphullakumudanīlotpalavirājitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 33.2]

nātigarjatsravanmeghaniruddhārkagrahaṃ nabhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 34.2]
babhruruṣṇaḥ śaradyarkaḥ śvetābhravimalaṃ nabhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 6 35.1]

athāto yantravidhimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 7 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 7 2.1]
yantraśatam ekottaram atra hastam eva pradhānatamaṃ yantrāṇāmavagaccha tadadhīnatvādyantrakarmaṇām | [Su, Sū., 7 3.1]
tatra manaḥśarīrābādhakarāṇi śalyāni teṣāmāharaṇopāyo yantrāṇi | [Su, Sū., 7 4.1]
tāni ṣaṭprakārāṇi tadyathā svastikayantrāṇi saṃdaṃśayantrāṇi tālayantrāṇi nāḍīyantrāṇi śalākāyantrāṇi upayantrāṇi ceti | [Su, Sū., 7 5.1]
tatra caturviṃśatiḥ svastikayantrāṇi dve saṃdaṃśayantre dve eva tālayantre viṃśatirnāḍyaḥ aṣṭāviṃśatiḥ śalākāḥ pañcaviṃśatirupayantrāṇi | [Su, Sū., 7 6.1]
tāni prāyaśo lauhāni bhavanti tatpratirūpakāṇi vā tadalābhe | [Su, Sū., 7 7.1]
tatra nānāprakārāṇāṃ vyālānāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ mukhair mukhāni yantrāṇāṃ prāyaśaḥ sadṛśāni tasmāt tatsārūpyād āgamād upadeśād anyayantradarśanād yuktitaśca kārayet | [Su, Sū., 7 8.1]
samāhitāni yantrāṇi kharaślakṣṇamukhāni ca | [Su, Sū., 7 9.1]
sudṛḍhāni surūpāṇi sugrahāṇi ca kārayet | [Su, Sū., 7 9.2]
tatra svastikayantrāṇi aṣṭādaśāṅgulapramāṇāni siṃhavyāghravṛkatarakṣvṛkṣadvīpimārjāraśṛgālamṛgair ivārukakākakaṅkakuraracāsabhāsaśaśaghātyulūkacilliśyenagṛdhrakrauñcabhṛṅgarājāñjalikarṇāvabhañjananandīmukhamukhāni masūrākṛtibhiḥ kīlair avabaddhāni mūle 'ṅkuśavad āvṛttavāraṅgāṇi asthividaṣṭaśalyoddharaṇārtham upadiśyante | [Su, Sū., 7 10.1]
sanigraho 'nigrahaś ca saṃdaṃśau ṣoḍaśāṅgulau bhavatas tau tvaṅmāṃsasirāsnāyugataśalyoddharaṇārtham upadiśyete | [Su, Sū., 7 11.1]
tālayantre dvādaśāṅgule matsyatālavad ekatāladvitālake karṇanāsānāḍīśalyānām āharaṇārtham | [Su, Sū., 7 12.1]
nāḍīyantrāṇi apyanekaprakārāṇi anekaprayojanāni ekatomukhānyubhayatomukhāni ca tāni srotogataśalyoddharaṇārthaṃ rogadarśanārtham ācūṣaṇārthaṃ kriyāsaukaryārthaṃ ceti tāni srotodvārapariṇāhāni yathāyogadīrghāṇi ca | [Su, Sū., 7 13.1]
tatra bhagaṃdarārśovraṇavastyuttaravastimūtravṛddhidakodaradhūmaniruddhaprakaśasaṃniruddhagudayantrāṇy alābūśṛṅgayantrāṇi copariṣṭādvakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 7 13.2]
śalākāyantrāṇyapi nānāprakārāṇi nānāprayojanāni yathāyogapariṇāhadīrghāṇi ca teṣāṃ gaṇḍūpadasarpaphaṇaśarapuṅkhabaḍiśamukhe dve dve eṣaṇavyūhanacālanāharaṇārtham upadiśyete masūradalamātramukhe dve kiṃcidānatāgre srotogataśalyoddharaṇārthaṃ ṣaṭ kārpāsakṛtoṣṇīṣāṇi pramārjanakriyāsu trīṇi darvyākṛtīni khallamukhāni kṣārauṣadhapraṇidhānārthaṃ trīṇyanyāni jāmbavavadanāni trīṇyaṅkuśavadanāni ṣaḍevāgnikarmasvabhipretāni nāsārbudaharaṇārthamekaṃ kolāsthidalamātramukhaṃ khallatīkṣṇauṣṭham añjanārthamekaṃ kalāyaparimaṇḍalam ubhayato mukulāgraṃ mūtramārgaviśodhanārtham ekaṃ mālatīpuṣpavṛntāgrapramāṇaparimaṇḍalam iti | [Su, Sū., 7 14.1]
upayantrāṇyapi rajjuveṇikāpaṭṭacarmāntavalkalalatāvastrāṣṭhīlāśmamudgarapāṇipādatalāṅgulijihvādantanakhamukhabālāśvakaṭakaśākhāṣṭhīvanapravāhaṇaharṣāyaskāntamayāni kṣārāgnibheṣajāni ceti | [Su, Sū., 7 15.1]
etāni dehe sarvasmin dehasyāvayave tathā | [Su, Sū., 7 16.1]
saṃdhau koṣṭhe dhamanyāṃ ca yathāyogaṃ prayojayet | [Su, Sū., 7 16.2]
yantrakarmāṇi tu nirghātanapūraṇabandhanavyūhanavartanacālanavivartanavivaraṇapīḍanamārgaviśodhanavikarṣaṇāharaṇāñchanonnamanavinamanabhañjanonmathanācūṣaṇaiṣaṇadāraṇarjūkaraṇaprakṣālanapradhamanapramārjanāni caturviṃśatiḥ | [Su, Sū., 7 17.1]
svabuddhyā cāpi vibhajedyantrakarmāṇi buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 7 18.1]
asaṃkhyeyavikalpatvācchalyānāmiti niścayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 7 18.2]
tatra atisthūlam asāram atidīrgham atihrasvam agrāhi viṣamagrāhi vakraṃ śithilam atyunnataṃ mṛdukīlaṃ mṛdumukhaṃ mṛdupāśamiti dvādaśa yantradoṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 7 19.1]
etair doṣair vinirmuktaṃ yantramaṣṭādaśāṅgulam | [Su, Sū., 7 20.1]
praśastaṃ bhiṣajā jñeyaṃ taddhi karmasu yojayet | [Su, Sū., 7 20.2]
dṛśyaṃ siṃhamukhādyaistu gūḍhaṃ kaṅkamukhādibhiḥ | [Su, Sū., 7 21.1]
nirharettu śanaiḥ śalyaṃ śastrayuktivyapekṣayā | [Su, Sū., 7 21.2]
nivartate sādhvavagāhate ca śalyaṃ nigṛhyoddharate ca yasmāt | [Su, Sū., 7 22.1]
yantreṣvataḥ kaṅkamukhaṃ pradhānaṃ sthāneṣu sarveṣvadhikāri caiva | [Su, Sū., 7 22.2]
{Su, Sū., 8}
athātaḥ śastrāvacāraṇīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 8 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 8 2.1]
viṃśatiḥ śastrāṇi tadyathā maṇḍalāgrakarapattravṛddhipattranakhaśastramudrikotpalapattrakārdhadhārasūcīkuśapattrāṭīmukhaśarārimukhāntarmukhatrikūrcakakuṭhārikāvrīhimukhārāvetasapattrakabaḍiśadantaśaṅkveṣaṇya iti | [Su, Sū., 8 3.1]
tatra maṇḍalāgrakarapattre syātāṃ chedane lekhane ca vṛddhipattranakhaśastramudrikotpalapattrakārdhadhārāṇi chedane bhedane ca sūcīkuśapattrāṭīmukhaśarārimukhāntarmukhatrikūrcakāni visrāvaṇe kuṭhārikāvrīhimukhārāvetasapattrakāṇi vyadhane sūcī ca baḍiśaṃ dantaśaṅkuścāharaṇe eṣaṇyeṣaṇe ānulomye ca sūcyaḥ sīvane ityaṣṭavidhe karmaṇyupayogaḥ śastrāṇāṃ vyākhyātaḥ | [Su, Sū., 8 4.1]
teṣāmatha yathāyogaṃ grahaṇasamāsopāyaḥ karmasu vakṣyate tatra vṛddhipattraṃ vṛntaphalasādhāraṇe bhāge gṛhṇīyādbhedanānyevaṃ sarvāṇi vṛddhipattraṃ maṇḍalāgraṃ ca kiṃciduttānena pāṇinā lekhane bahuśo 'vacāryaṃ vṛntāgre visrāvaṇāni viśeṣeṇa tu bālavṛddhasukumārabhīrunārīṇāṃ rājñāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ ca trikūrcakena visrāvayet talapracchāditavṛntam aṅguṣṭhapradeśinībhyāṃ vrīhimukhaṃ kuṭhārikāṃ vāmahastanyastām itarahastamadhyamāṅgulyāṅguṣṭhaviṣṭabdhayābhihanyāt ārākarapattraiṣaṇyo mūle śeṣāṇi tu yathāyogaṃ gṛhṇīyāt | [Su, Sū., 8 5.1]
teṣāṃ nāmabhir evākṛtayaḥ prāyeṇa vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Sū., 8 6.1]
tatra nakhaśastraiṣaṇyāvaṣṭāṅgule sūcyo vakṣyante śeṣāṇi tu ṣaḍaṅgulāni | [Su, Sū., 8 7.1]
tāni sugrahāṇi sulohāni sudhārāṇi surūpāṇi susamāhitamukhāgrāṇi akarālāni ceti śastrasampat | [Su, Sū., 8 8.1]
tatra vakraṃ kuṇṭhaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kharadhāram atisthūlam atituccham atidīrgham atihrasvam ityaṣṭau śastradoṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 8 9.1]
ato viparītaguṇamādadīta anyatra karapattrāt taddhi kharadhāramasthicchedanārtham | [Su, Sū., 8 9.2]
tatra dhārā bhedanānāṃ māsūrī lekhanānām ardhamāsūrī vyadhanānāṃ visrāvaṇānāṃ ca kaiśikī chedanānām ardhakaiśikīti | [Su, Sū., 8 10.1]
baḍiśaṃ dantaśaṅkuścānatāgre | [Su, Sū., 8 11.1]
tīkṣṇakaṇṭakaprathamayavapatramukhyeṣaṇī | [Su, Sū., 8 11.2]
teṣāṃ pāyanā trividhā kṣārodakataileṣu | [Su, Sū., 8 12.1]
tatra kṣārapāyitaṃ śaraśalyāsthicchedaneṣu udakapāyitaṃ māṃsacchedanabhedanapāṭaneṣu tailapāyitaṃ sirāvyadhanasnāyucchedaneṣu | [Su, Sū., 8 12.2]
teṣāṃ niśānārthaṃ ślakṣṇaśilā māṣavarṇā dhārāsaṃsthāpanārthaṃ śālmalīphalakam iti | [Su, Sū., 8 13.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 8 14.1]
yadā suniśitaṃ śastraṃ romacchedi susaṃsthitam | [Su, Sū., 8 14.2]
sugṛhītaṃ pramāṇena tadā karmasu yojayet | [Su, Sū., 8 14.3]
anuśastrāṇi tu tvaksārasphaṭikakācakuruvindajalauko'gnikṣāranakhagojīśephālikāśākapatrakarīrabālāṅgulaya iti | [Su, Sū., 8 15.1]
śiśūnāṃ śastrabhīrūṇāṃ śastrābhāve ca yojayet | [Su, Sū., 8 16.1]
tvaksārādicaturvargaṃ chedye ca buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 8 16.2]
āhāryachedyabhedyeṣu nakhaṃ śakyeṣu yojayet | [Su, Sū., 8 17.1]
vidhiḥ pravakṣyate paścāt kṣāravahnijalaukasām | [Su, Sū., 8 17.2]
ye syurmukhagatā rogā netravartmagatāśca ye | [Su, Sū., 8 18.1]
gojīśephālikāśākapatrair visrāvayettu tān | [Su, Sū., 8 18.2]
eṣyeṣveṣaṇyalābhe tu bālāṅgulyaṅkurā hitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 8 19.1]
śastrāṇyetāni matimān śuddhaśaikyāyasāni tu | [Su, Sū., 8 19.2]
kārayet karaṇaprāptaṃ karmāraṃ karmakovidam | [Su, Sū., 8 19.3]
prayogajñasya vaidyasya siddhirbhavati nityaśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 8 20.1]
tasmāt paricayaṃ kuryācchastrāṇāṃ grahaṇe sadā | [Su, Sū., 8 20.2]
{Su, Sū., 9}
athāto yogyāsūtrīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 9 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 9 2.1]
adhigatasarvaśāstrārtham api śiṣyaṃ yogyāṃ kārayet | [Su, Sū., 9 3.1]
snehādiṣu chedyādiṣu ca karmapatham upadiśet | [Su, Sū., 9 3.2]
subahuśruto 'pyakṛtayogyaḥ karmasvayogyo bhavati | [Su, Sū., 9 3.3]
tatra puṣpaphalālābūkālindakatrapusairvārukakarkārukaprabhṛtiṣu chedyaviśeṣān darśayet utkartanaparikartanāni copadiśet dṛtivastiprasevakaprabhṛtiṣūdakapaṅkapūrṇeṣu bhedyayogyāṃ saromṇi carmaṇyātate lekhyasya mṛtapaśusirāsūtpalanāleṣu ca vedhyasya ghuṇopahatakāṣṭhaveṇunalanāḍīśuṣkālābūmukheṣv eṣyasya panasabimbībilvaphalamajjamṛtapaśudanteṣvāhāryasya madhūcchiṣṭopalipte śālmalīphalake visrāvyasya sūkṣmaghanavastrāntayor mṛducarmāntayoś ca sīvyasya pustamayapuruṣāṅgapratyaṅgaviśeṣeṣu bandhanayogyāṃ mṛducarmamāṃsapeśīṣūtpalanāleṣu ca karṇasaṃdhibandhayogyāṃ mṛduṣu māṃsakhaṇḍeṣv agnikṣārayogyām udakapūrṇaghaṭapārśvasrotasyalābūmukhādiṣu ca netrapraṇidhānavastivraṇavastipīḍanayogyām iti | [Su, Sū., 9 4.1]
bhavataś cātra | [Su, Sū., 9 5.1]
evamādiṣu medhāvī yogyārheṣu yathāvidhi | [Su, Sū., 9 5.2]
dravyeṣu yogyāṃ kurvāṇo na pramuhyati karmasu | [Su, Sū., 9 5.3]
tasmāt kauśalamanvicchan śastrakṣārāgnikarmasu | [Su, Sū., 9 6.1]
yasya yatreha sādharmyaṃ tatra yogyāṃ samācaret | [Su, Sū., 9 6.2]
{Su, Sū., 10}
athāto viśikhānupraveśanīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 10 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 10 2.1]
adhigatatantreṇopāsitatantrārthena dṛṣṭakarmaṇā kṛtayogyena śāstraṃ nigadatā rājānujñātena nīcanakharomṇā śucinā śuklavastraparihitena chattravatā daṇḍahastena sopānatkenānuddhataveśena sumanasā kalyāṇābhivyāhāreṇākuhakena bandhubhūtena bhūtānāṃ susahāyavatā vaidyena viśikhānupraveṣṭavyā | [Su, Sū., 10 3.1]
tato dūtanimittaśakunamaṅgalānulomyenāturagṛhamabhigamya upaviśya āturamabhipaśyet spṛśet pṛcchec ca tribhir etair vijñānopāyai rogāḥ prāyaśo veditavyā ity eke tattu na samyak ṣaḍvidho hi rogāṇāṃ vijñānopāyaḥ tadyathā pañcabhiḥ śrotrādibhiḥ praśnena ceti | [Su, Sū., 10 4.1]
tatra śrotrendriyavijñeyā viśeṣā rogeṣu vraṇāsrāvavijñānīyādiṣu vakṣyante tatra saphenaṃ raktamīrayannanilaḥ saśabdo nirgacchati ity evamādayaḥ sparśanendriyavijñeyāḥ śītoṣṇaślakṣṇakarkaśamṛdukaṭhinatvādayaḥ sparśaviśeṣā jvaraśophādiṣu cakṣurindriyavijñeyāḥ śarīropacayāpacayāyurlakṣaṇabalavarṇavikārādayaḥ rasanendriyavijñeyāḥ pramehādiṣu rasaviśeṣāḥ ghrāṇendriyavijñeyā ariṣṭaliṅgādiṣu vraṇānāmavraṇānāṃ ca gandhaviśeṣāḥ praśnena ca vijānīyāddeśaṃ kālaṃ jātiṃ sātmyamātaṅkasamutpattiṃ vedanāsamucchrāyaṃ balamantaragniṃ vātamūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ pravṛttyapravṛttī kālaprakarṣādīṃś ca viśeṣān | [Su, Sū., 10 5.1]
ātmasadṛśeṣu vijñānābhyupāyeṣu tatsthānīyair jānīyāt | [Su, Sū., 10 5.2]
evam abhisamīkṣya sādhyān sādhayed yāpyān yāpayed asādhyānnaivopakrameta parisaṃvatsarotthitāṃśca vikārān prāyaśo varjayet | [Su, Sū., 10 6]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 10 7.1]
mithyādṛṣṭā vikārā hi durākhyātāstathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 10 7.2]
tathā duṣparimṛṣṭāś ca mohayeyuścikitsakam | [Su, Sū., 10 7.3]
tatra sādhyā api vyādhayaḥ prāyeṇaiṣāṃ duścikitsyatamā bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 10 8.1]
tadyathā śrotriyanṛpatistrībālavṛddhabhīrurājasevakakitavadurbalavaidyavidagdhavyādhigopakadaridrakṛpaṇakrodhanānām anātmavatām anāthānāṃ ca evaṃ nirūpya cikitsāṃ kurvan dharmārthakāmayaśāṃsi prāpnoti | [Su, Sū., 10 8.2]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 10 9.1]
strībhiḥ sahāsyāṃ saṃvāsaṃ parihāsaṃ ca varjayet | [Su, Sū., 10 9.2]
dattaṃ ca tābhyo nādeyam annādanyad bhiṣagvaraiḥ | [Su, Sū., 10 9.3]
{Su, Sū., 11}
athātaḥ kṣārapākavidhim adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 2.1]
śastrānuśastrebhyaḥ kṣāraḥ pradhānatamaḥ chedyabhedyalekhyakaraṇāt tridoṣaghnatvād viśeṣakriyāvacāraṇācca | [Su, Sū., 11 3.1]
tatra kṣaraṇāt kṣaṇanādvā kṣāraḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 4.1]
nānauṣadhisamavāyāttridoṣaghnaḥ śuklatvāt saumyaḥ tasya saumyasyāpi sato dahanapacanadāraṇādiśaktiraviruddhā sa khalvāgneyauṣadhiguṇabhūyiṣṭhatvāt kaṭuka uṣṇastīkṣṇaḥ pācano vilayanaḥ śodhano ropaṇaḥ śoṣaṇaḥ stambhano lekhanaḥ kṛmyāmakaphakuṣṭhaviṣamedasām upahantā puṃstvasya cātisevitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 5.1]
sa dvividhaḥ pratisāraṇīyaḥ pānīyaś ca | [Su, Sū., 11 6.1]
tatra pratisāraṇīyaḥ kuṣṭhakiṭibhadadrumaṇḍalakilāsabhagaṃdarārbudārśoduṣṭavraṇanāḍīcarmakīlatilakālakanyacchavyaṅgamaśakabāhyavidradhikṛmiviṣādiṣūpadiśyate saptasu ca mukharogeṣūpajihvādhijihvopakuśadantavaidarbheṣu tisṛṣu ca rohiṇīṣu eteṣvevānuśastrapraṇidhānam uktam | [Su, Sū., 11 7.1]
pānīyastu garagulmodarāgnisaṅgājīrṇārocakānāhaśarkarāśmaryābhyantaravidradhikṛmiviṣārśaḥsūpayujyate | [Su, Sū., 11 8.1]
ahitastu raktapittajvaritapittaprakṛtibālavṛddhadurbalabhramamadamūrchātimiraparītebhyo 'nyebhyaścaivaṃvidhebhyaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 9.1]
taṃ cetarakṣāravaddagdhvā parisrāvayet tasya vistaro 'nyatra | [Su, Sū., 11 10.1]
athetarastrividho mṛdurmadhyastīkṣṇaś ca | [Su, Sū., 11 11.1]
taṃ cikīrṣuḥ śaradi girisānujaṃ śucirupoṣya praśaste 'hani praśastadeśajātamanupahataṃ madhyamavayasaṃ mahāntam asitamuṣkakam adhivāsyāparedyuḥ pāṭayitvā khaṇḍaśaḥ prakalpyāvapāṭya nirvāte deśe nicitiṃ kṛtvā sudhāśarkarāś ca prakṣipya tilanālair ādīpayet | [Su, Sū., 11 11.2]
athopaśānte 'gnau tadbhasma pṛthaggṛhṇīyādbhasmaśarkarāś ca | [Su, Sū., 11 11.3]
athānenaiva vidhānena kuṭajapalāśāśvakarṇapāribhadrakavibhītakāragvadhatilvakārkasnuhyapāmārgapāṭalānaktamālavṛṣakadalīcitrakapūtīkendravṛkṣāsphotāśvamārakasaptacchadāgnimanthaguñjāścatasraś ca kośātakīḥ samūlaphalapattraśākhā dahet | [Su, Sū., 11 11.4]
tataḥ kṣāradroṇamudakadroṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āloḍya mūtrair vā yathoktair ekaviṃśatikṛtvaḥ parisrāvya mahati kaṭāhe śanair darvyāvaghaṭṭayan vipacet | [Su, Sū., 11 11.5]
sa yadā bhavatyaccho raktastīkṣṇaḥ picchilaś ca tamādāya mahati vastre parisrāvyetaraṃ vibhajya punaragnāvadhiśrayet | [Su, Sū., 11 11.6]
tata eva kṣārodakāt kuḍavamadhyardhaṃ vāpanayet | [Su, Sū., 11 11.7]
tataḥ kaṭaśarkarābhasmaśarkarākṣīrapākaśaṅkhanābhīr agnivarṇāḥ kṛtvāyase pātre tasminneva kṣārodake niṣicya piṣṭvā tenaiva dvidroṇe 'ṣṭapalasaṃmitaṃ śaṅkhanābhyādīnāṃ pramāṇaṃ prativāpya satatam apramattaś cainam avaghaṭṭayan vipacet | [Su, Sū., 11 11.8]
sa yathā nātisāndro nātidravaś ca bhavati tathā prayateta | [Su, Sū., 11 11.9]
athainam āgatapākam avatāryānuguptam āyase kumbhe saṃvṛtamukhe nidadhyādeṣa madhyamaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 11.10]
eṣa evāpratīvāpaḥ pakvaḥ saṃvyūhimo mṛduḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 12.1]
pratīvāpe yathālābhaṃ dantīdravantīcitrakalāṅgalīpūtikapravālatālapattrīviḍasuvarcikākanakakṣīrīhiṅguvacātiviṣāḥ samāḥ ślakṣṇacūrṇāḥ śuktipramāṇāḥ pratīvāpaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 13.1]
sa eva sapratīvāpaḥ pakvaḥ pākyastīkṣṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 13.2]
teṣāṃ yathāvyādhibalam upayogaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 14.1]
kṣīṇabale tu kṣārodakam āvapedbalakaraṇārtham | [Su, Sū., 11 15.1]
bhavataś cātra | [Su, Sū., 11 16.1]
naivātitīkṣṇo na mṛduḥ śuklaḥ ślakṣṇo 'tha picchilaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 16.2]
aviṣyandī śivaḥ śīghraḥ kṣāro hyaṣṭaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 16.3]
atimārdavaśvaityauṣṇyataikṣṇyapaicchilyasarpitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 17.1]
sāndratāpakvatā hīnadravyatā doṣa ucyate | [Su, Sū., 11 17.2]
tatra kṣārasādhyavyādhivyādhitam upaveśya nivātātape deśe 'saṃbādhe 'gropaharaṇīyoktena vidhānenopasaṃbhṛtasambhāraṃ tato 'sya tamavakāśaṃ nirīkṣyāvaghṛṣyāvalikhya pracchayitvā śalākayā kṣāraṃ pratisārayet dattvā vākśatamātramupekṣeta | [Su, Sū., 11 18.1]
tasminnipatite vyādhau kṛṣṇatā dagdhalakṣaṇam | [Su, Sū., 11 19.1]
tatrāmlavargaḥ śamanaḥ sarpirmadhukasaṃyutaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 19.2]
atha cet sthiramūlatvāt kṣāradagdhaṃ na śīryate | [Su, Sū., 11 20.1]
idamālepanaṃ tatra samagramavacārayet | [Su, Sū., 11 20.2]
amlakāñjikabījāni tilān madhukam eva ca | [Su, Sū., 11 21.1]
prapeṣya samabhāgāni tenainamanulepayet | [Su, Sū., 11 21.2]
tilakalkaḥ samadhuko ghṛtākto vraṇaropaṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 22.1]
rasenāmlena tīkṣṇena vīryoṣṇena ca yojitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 22.2]
āgneyenāgninā tulyaḥ kathaṃ kṣāraḥ praśāmyati | [Su, Sū., 11 23.1]
evaṃ cenmanyase vatsa procyamānaṃ nibodha me | [Su, Sū., 11 23.2]
kaṭukastatra bhūyiṣṭho lavaṇo 'nurasastathā | [Su, Sū., 11 24.1]
amlena saha saṃyuktaḥ satīkṣṇalavaṇo rasaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 24.2]
mādhuryaṃ bhajate 'tyarthaṃ tīkṣṇabhāvaṃ vimuñcati | [Su, Sū., 11 25.1]
mādhuryācchamamāpnoti vahnir adbhir ivāplutaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 25.2]
tatra samyagdagdhe vikāropaśamo lāghavam anāsrāvaś ca | [Su, Sū., 11 26.1]
hīnadagdhe todakaṇḍujāḍyāni vyādhivṛddhiś ca | [Su, Sū., 11 26.2]
atidagdhe dāhapākarāgasrāvāṅgamardaklamapipāsāmūrchāḥ syurmaraṇaṃ vā | [Su, Sū., 11 26.3]
kṣāradagdhavraṇaṃ tu yathādoṣaṃ yathāvyādhi copakramet | [Su, Sū., 11 27.1]
atha naite kṣārakṛtyāḥ tadyathā durbalabālasthavirabhīrusarvāṅgaśūnodariraktapittigarbhiṇyṛtumatīpravṛddhajvaripramehirūkṣakṣatakṣīṇatṛṣṇāmūrcchopadrutaklībāpavṛttodvṛttaphalayonayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 28.1]
tathā marmasirāsnāyusaṃdhitaruṇāsthisevanīdhamanīgalanābhinakhāntaḥśephaḥsrotaḥsvalpamāṃseṣu ca pradeśeṣv akṣṇoś ca na dadyādanyatra vartmarogāt | [Su, Sū., 11 29.1]
tatra kṣārasādhyeṣvapi vyādhiṣu śūnagātram asthiśūlinam annadveṣiṇaṃ hṛdayasaṃdhipīḍopadrutaṃ ca kṣāro na sādhayati | [Su, Sū., 11 30.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 11 31.1]
viṣāgniśastrāśanimṛtyukalpaḥ kṣāro bhavatyalpamatiprayuktaḥ | [Su, Sū., 11 31.2]
sa dhīmatā samyaganuprayukto rogānnihanyādacireṇa ghorān | [Su, Sū., 11 31.3]
{Su, Sū., 12}
athāto 'gnikarmavidhim adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 2.1]
kṣārādagnirgarīyān kriyāsu vyākhyātaḥ taddagdhānāṃ rogāṇām apunarbhāvād bheṣajaśastrakṣārair asādhyānāṃ tatsādhyatvācca | [Su, Sū., 12 3.1]
athemāni dahanopakaraṇāni tadyathā pippalyajāśakṛdgodantaśaraśalākājāmbavauṣṭhetaralauhāḥ kṣaudraguḍasnehāś ca | [Su, Sū., 12 4.1]
tatra pippalyajāśakṛdgodantaśaraśalākās tvaggatānāṃ jāmbavauṣṭhetaralauhā māṃsagatānāṃ kṣaudraguḍasnehāḥ sirāsnāyusaṃdhyasthigatānām | [Su, Sū., 12 4.2]
tatrāgnikarma sarvartuṣu kuryādanyatra śaradgrīṣmābhyāṃ tatrāpyātyayike 'gnikarmasādhye vyādhau tatpratyanīkaṃ vidhiṃ kṛtvā | [Su, Sū., 12 5.1]
sarvavyādhiṣvṛtuṣu ca picchilamannaṃ bhuktavataḥ mūḍhagarbhāśmarībhagaṃdarārśomukharogeṣvabhuktavataḥ karma kurvīta | [Su, Sū., 12 6.1]
tatra dvividhamagnikarmāhureke tvagdagdhaṃ māṃsadagdhaṃ ca iha tu sirāsnāyusaṃdhyasthiṣvapi na pratiṣiddho 'gniḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 7.1]
tatra śabdaprādurbhāvo durgandhatā tvaksaṃkocaś ca tvagdagdhe kapotavarṇatālpaśvayathuvedanā śuṣkasaṃkucitavraṇatā ca māṃsadagdhe kṛṣṇonnatavraṇatā srāvasaṃnirodhaś ca sirāsnāyudagdhe rūkṣāruṇatā karkaśasthiravraṇatā ca saṃdhyasthidagdhe | [Su, Sū., 12 8.1]
tatra śirorogādhimanthayor bhrūlalāṭaśaṅkhapradeśeṣu dahet vartmarogeṣvārdrālaktakapraticchannāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ kṛtvā vartmaromakūpān | [Su, Sū., 12 9.1]
tvaṅmāṃsasirāsnāyusaṃdhyasthisthite 'tyugraruji vāyāvucchritakaṭhinasuptamāṃse vraṇe granthyarśo'rbudabhagaṃdarāpacīślīpadacarmakīlatilakālakāntravṛddhisaṃdhisirāchedanādiṣu nāḍīśoṇitātipravṛttiṣu cāgnikarma kuryāt | [Su, Sū., 12 10.1]
tatra valayabinduvilekhāpratisāraṇānīti dahanaviśeṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 11.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 12 12.1]
rogasya saṃsthānamavekṣya samyaṅnarasya marmāṇi balābalaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 12 12.2]
vyādhiṃ tathartuṃ ca samīkṣya samyak tato vyavasyedbhiṣagagnikarma | [Su, Sū., 12 12.3]
tatra samyagdagdhe madhusarpirbhyāmabhyaṅgaḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 13.1]
athemānagninā pariharet pittaprakṛtim antaḥśoṇitaṃ bhinnakoṣṭham anuddhṛtaśalyaṃ durbalaṃ bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ bhīrum anekavraṇapīḍitam asvedyāṃś ceti | [Su, Sū., 12 14.1]
ata ūrdhvamitarathā dagdhalakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 15.1]
tatra snigdhaṃ rūkṣaṃ vāśritya dravyamagnirdahati agnisaṃtapto hi snehaḥ sūkṣmasirānusāritvāt tvagādīn anupraviśyāśu dahati tasmāt snehadagdhe 'dhikā rujo bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 12 15.2]
tatra pluṣṭaṃ durdagdhaṃ samyagdagdham atidagdhaṃ ceti caturvidham agnidagdham | [Su, Sū., 12 16.1]
tatra yadvivarṇaṃ pluṣyate 'timātraṃ tat pluṣṭaṃ yatrottiṣṭhanti sphoṭāstīvrāś coṣadāharāgapākavedanāś cirāccopaśāmyanti taddurdagdhaṃ samyagdagdham anavagāḍhaṃ tālaphalavarṇaṃ susaṃsthitaṃ pūrvalakṣaṇayuktaṃ ca atidagdhe māṃsāvalambanaṃ gātraviśleṣaḥ sirāsnāyusaṃdhyasthivyāpādanam atimātraṃ jvaradāhapipāsāmūrchāś copadravā bhavanti vraṇaścāsya cireṇa rohati rūḍhaś ca vivarṇo bhavati | [Su, Sū., 12 16.2]
tadetaccaturvidham agnidagdhalakṣaṇam ātmakarmaprasādhakaṃ bhavati | [Su, Sū., 12 16.3]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 12 17.1]
agninā kopitaṃ raktaṃ bhṛśaṃ jantoḥ prakupyati | [Su, Sū., 12 17.2]
tatastenaiva vegena pittam asyābhyudīryate | [Su, Sū., 12 17.3]
tulyavīrye ubhe hyete rasato dravyatastathā | [Su, Sū., 12 18.1]
tenāsya vedanāstīvrāḥ prakṛtyā ca vidahyate | [Su, Sū., 12 18.2]
sphoṭāḥ śīghraṃ prajāyante jvarastṛṣṇā ca vardhate | [Su, Sū., 12 19.1]
dagdhasyopaśamārthāya cikitsā sampravakṣyate | [Su, Sū., 12 19.2]
pluṣṭasyāgnipratapanaṃ kāryamuṣṇaṃ tathauṣadham | [Su, Sū., 12 20.1]
śarīre svinnabhūyiṣṭhe svinnaṃ bhavati śoṇitam | [Su, Sū., 12 20.2]
prakṛtyā hyudakaṃ śītaṃ skandayatyati śoṇitam | [Su, Sū., 12 21.1]
tasmāt sukhayati hyuṣṇaṃ natu śītaṃ kathaṃcana | [Su, Sū., 12 21.2]
śītāmuṣṇāṃ ca durdagdhe kriyāṃ kuryādbhiṣak punaḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 22.1]
ghṛtālepanasekāṃstu śītānevāsya kārayet | [Su, Sū., 12 22.2]
samyagdagdhe tugākṣīrīplakṣacandanagairikaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 23.1]
sāmṛtaiḥ sarpiṣā snigdhair ālepaṃ kārayedbhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 12 23.2]
grāmyānūpaudakaiś cainaṃ piṣṭair māṃsaiḥ pralepayet | [Su, Sū., 12 24.1]
pittavidradhivaccainaṃ saṃtatoṣmāṇam ācaret | [Su, Sū., 12 24.2]
atidagdhe viśīrṇāni māṃsānyuddhṛtya śītalām | [Su, Sū., 12 25.1]
kriyāṃ kuryādbhiṣak paścācchālitaṇḍulakaṇḍanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 25.2]
tindukītvakkapālair vā ghṛtamiśraiḥ pralepayet | [Su, Sū., 12 26.1]
vraṇaṃ guḍūcīpattrair vā chādayed athavaudakaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 26.2]
kriyāṃ ca nikhilāṃ kuryād bhiṣak pittavisarpavat | [Su, Sū., 12 27.1]
madhūcchiṣṭaṃ samadhukaṃ rodhraṃ sarjarasaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 12 27.2]
mañjiṣṭhāṃ candanaṃ mūrvāṃ piṣṭvā sarpirvipācayet | [Su, Sū., 12 28.1]
sarveṣām agnidagdhānām etad ropaṇam uttamam | [Su, Sū., 12 28.2]
snehadagdhe kriyāṃ rūkṣāṃ viśeṣeṇāvacārayet | [Su, Sū., 12 29.1]
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi dhūmopahatalakṣaṇam | [Su, Sū., 12 29.2]
śvasiti kṣauti cātyartham atyādhamati kāsate | [Su, Sū., 12 30.1]
cakṣuṣoḥ paridāhaś ca rāgaścaivopajāyate | [Su, Sū., 12 30.2]
sadhūmakaṃ niśvasiti ghreyamanyanna vetti ca | [Su, Sū., 12 31.1]
tathaiva ca rasān sarvān śrutiścāsyopahanyate | [Su, Sū., 12 31.2]
tṛṣṇādāhajvarayutaḥ sīdatyatha ca mūrchati | [Su, Sū., 12 32.1]
dhūmopahata ityevaṃ śṛṇu tasya cikitsitam | [Su, Sū., 12 32.2]
sarpirikṣurasaṃ drākṣāṃ payo vā śarkarāmbu vā | [Su, Sū., 12 33.1]
madhurāmlau rasau vāpi vamanāya pradāpayet | [Su, Sū., 12 33.2]
vamataḥ koṣṭhaśuddhiḥ syād dhūmagandhaś ca naśyati | [Su, Sū., 12 34.1]
vidhinānena śāmyanti sadanakṣavathujvarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 34.2]
dāhamūrchātṛḍādhmānaśvāsakāsāś ca dāruṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 35.1]
madhurair lavaṇāmlaiś ca kaṭukaiḥ kavalagrahaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 35.2]
samyaggṛhṇātīndriyārthān manaścāsya prasīdati | [Su, Sū., 12 36.1]
śirovirecanaṃ cāsmai dadyād yogena śāstravit | [Su, Sū., 12 36.2]
dṛṣṭir viśudhyate cāsya śirogrīvaṃ ca dehinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 12 37.1]
avidāhi laghu snigdhamāhāraṃ cāsya kalpayet | [Su, Sū., 12 37.2]
uṣṇavātātapair dagdhe śītaḥ kāryo vidhiḥ sadā | [Su, Sū., 12 38.1]
śītavarṣānilair dagdhe snigdhamuṣṇaṃ ca śasyate | [Su, Sū., 12 38.2]
tathātitejasā dagdhe siddhirnāsti kathaṃcana | [Su, Sū., 12 39.1]
indravajrāgnidagdhe 'pi jīvati pratikārayet | [Su, Sū., 12 39.2]
snehābhyaṅgaparīṣekaiḥ pradehaiśca tathā bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 12 39.3]
{Su, Sū., 13}
athāto jalaukāvacāraṇīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 2.1]
nṛpāḍhyabālasthavirabhīrudurbalanārīsukumārāṇāmanugrahārthaṃ paramasukumāro 'yaṃ śoṇitāvasecanopāyo 'bhihito jalaukasaḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 3.1]
tatra vātapittakaphaduṣṭaśoṇitaṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śṛṅgajalaukālābubhir avasecayet sarvāṇi sarvair vā | [Su, Sū., 13 4.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 13 5.1]
uṣṇaṃ samadhurasnigdhaṃ gavāṃ śṛṅgaṃ prakīrtitam | [Su, Sū., 13 5.2]
tasmād vātopasṛṣṭe tu hitaṃ tadavasecane | [Su, Sū., 13 5.3]
śītādhivāsā madhurā jalaukā vārisambhavā | [Su, Sū., 13 6.1]
tasmāt pittopasṛṣṭe tu hitā sā tvavasecane | [Su, Sū., 13 6.2]
alābu kaṭukaṃ rūkṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca parikīrtitam | [Su, Sū., 13 7.1]
tasmācchleṣmopasṛṣṭe tu hitaṃ tadavasecane | [Su, Sū., 13 7.2]
tatra pracchite tanuvastipaṭalāvanaddhena śṛṅgeṇa śoṇitam avasecayed ācūṣaṇāt sāntardīpayālābvā | [Su, Sū., 13 8.1]
jalamāsāmāyuriti jalāyukāḥ jalamāsāmoka iti jalaukasaḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 9.1]
tā dvādaśa tāsāṃ saviṣāḥ ṣaṭ tāvatya eva nirviṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 10.1]
tatra saviṣāḥ kṛṣṇā karburā alagardā indrāyudhā sāmudrikā gocandanā ceti | [Su, Sū., 13 11.1]
tāsu añjanacūrṇavarṇā pṛthuśirāḥ kṛṣṇā varmimatsyavadāyatā chinnonnatakukṣiḥ karburā romaśā mahāpārśvā kṛṣṇamukhī alagardā indrāyudhavad ūrdhvarājibhiścitritā indrāyudhā īṣadasitapītikā vicitrapuṣpākṛticitrā sāmudrikā govṛṣaṇavadadhobhāge dvidhābhūtākṛtiraṇumukhī gocandaneti | [Su, Sū., 13 11.2]
tābhir daṣṭe puruṣe daṃśe śvayathuratimātraṃ kaṇḍūrmūrchā jvaro dāhaśchardirmadaḥ sadanamiti liṅgāni bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 13 11.3]
tatra mahāgadaḥ pānālepananasyakarmādiṣūpayojyaḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 11.4]
indrāyudhādaṣṭamasādhyam | [Su, Sū., 13 11.5]
ityetāḥ saviṣāḥ sacikitsitā vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 11.6]
atha nirviṣāḥ kapilā piṅgalā śaṅkumukhī mūṣikā puṇḍarīkamukhī sāvarikā ceti | [Su, Sū., 13 12.1]
tatra manaḥśilārañjitābhyām iva pārśvābhyāṃ pṛṣṭhe snigdhamudgavarṇā kapilā yakṛdvarṇā śīghrapāyinī dīrghatīkṣṇamukhī śaṅkumukhī mūṣikākṛtivarṇāniṣṭagandhā ca mūṣikā mudgavarṇā puṇḍarīkatulyavaktrā puṇḍarīkamukhī snigdhā padmapattravarṇāṣṭādaśāṅgulapramāṇā sāvarikā sā ca paśvarthe ityetā aviṣā vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 12.2]
tāsāṃ yavanapāṇḍyasahyapautanādīni kṣetrāṇi teṣu mahāśarīrā balavatyaḥ śīghrapāyinyo mahāśanā nirviṣāś ca viśeṣeṇa bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 13 13]
tatra saviṣamatsyakīṭadarduramūtrapurīṣakothajātāḥ kaluṣeṣvambhaḥsu ca saviṣāḥ padmotpalanalinakumudasaugandhikakuvalayapuṇḍarīkaśaivalakothajātā vimaleṣvambhaḥsu ca nirviṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 14]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 13 15.1]
kṣetreṣu vicarantyetāḥ salilāḍhyasugandhiṣu | [Su, Sū., 13 15.2]
na ca saṃkīrṇacāriṇyo na ca paṅkeśayāḥ sukhāḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 15.3]
tāsāṃ grahaṇamārdracarmaṇā anyair vā prayogair gṛhṇīyāt | [Su, Sū., 13 16.1]
athaināṃ nave mahati ghaṭe sarastaḍāgodakapaṅkamāvāpya nidadhyāt bhakṣyārthe cāsām upaharecchaivalaṃ vallūramaudakāṃś ca kandāṃścūrṇīkṛtya śayyārthaṃ tṛṇamaudakāni ca pattrāṇi tryahāt tryahāccābhyo 'nyajjalaṃ bhakṣyaṃ ca dadyāt saptarātrāt saptarātrācca ghaṭamanyaṃ saṃkrāmayet | [Su, Sū., 13 17.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 13 18.1]
sthūlamadhyāḥ parikliṣṭāḥ pṛthvyo mandaviceṣṭitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 18.2]
agrāhiṇyo 'lpapāyinyaḥ saviṣāś ca na pūjitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 13 18.3]
atha jalauko'vasekasādhyavyādhitam upaveśya saṃveśya vā virūkṣya cāsya tamavakāśaṃ mṛdgomayacūrṇair yadyarujaḥ syāt | [Su, Sū., 13 19.1]
gṛhītāś ca tāḥ sarṣaparajanīkalkodakapradigdhagātrīḥ salilasarakamadhye muhūrtasthitā vigataklamā jñātvā tābhī rogaṃ grāhayet | [Su, Sū., 13 19.2]
ślakṣṇaśuklārdrapicuprotāvacchannāṃ kṛtvā mukhamapāvṛṇuyāt agṛhṇantyai kṣīrabinduṃ śoṇitabinduṃ vā dadyācchastrapadāni vā kurvīta yadyevam api na gṛhṇīyāttadānyāṃ grāhayet | [Su, Sū., 13 19.3]
yadā ca niviśate 'śvakhuravadānanaṃ kṛtvonnamya ca skandhaṃ tadā jānīyādgṛhṇātīti cārdravastrāvacchannāṃ dhārayet secayecca | [Su, Sū., 13 20.1]
daṃśe todakaṇḍuprādurbhāvair jānīyācchuddhamiyamādatta iti śuddhamādadānāmapanayet atha śoṇitagandhena na muñcenmukhamasyāḥ saindhavacūrṇenāvakiret | [Su, Sū., 13 21.1]
atha patitāṃ taṇḍulakaṇḍanapradigdhagātrīṃ tailalavaṇābhyaktamukhīṃ vāmahastāṅguṣṭhāṅgulībhyāṃ gṛhītapucchāṃ dakṣiṇahastāṅguṣṭhāṅgulibhyāṃ śanaiḥ śanair anulomam anumārjayed ā mukhāt vāmayet tāvadyāvat samyagvāntaliṅgānīti | [Su, Sū., 13 22.1]
samyagvāntā salilasarakanyastā bhoktukāmā satī caret | [Su, Sū., 13 22.2]
yā sīdatī na ceṣṭate sā durvāntā tāṃ punaḥ samyagvāmayet | [Su, Sū., 13 22.3]
durvāntāyā vyādhirasādhya indramado nāma bhavati | [Su, Sū., 13 22.4]
atha suvāntāṃ pūrvavat saṃnidadhyāt | [Su, Sū., 13 22.5]
śoṇitasya ca yogāyogānavekṣya śatadhautaghṛtābhyaṅgas tatpicudhāraṇaṃ vā jalaukovraṇān madhunāvaghaṭṭayet śītābhir adbhiś ca pariṣecayedbadhnīta vā kaṣāyamadhurasnigdhaśītaiś ca pradehaiḥ pradihyāditi | [Su, Sū., 13 23.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 13 24.1]
kṣetrāṇi grahaṇaṃ jātīḥ poṣaṇaṃ sāvacāraṇam | [Su, Sū., 13 24.2]
jalaukasāṃ ca yo vetti tatsādhyān sa jayedgadān | [Su, Sū., 13 24.3]
{Su, Sū., 14}
athātaḥ śoṇitavarṇanīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 2.1]
tatra pāñcabhautikasya caturvidhasya ṣaḍrasasya dvividhavīryasyāṣṭavidhavīryasya vānekaguṇasyopayuktasyāhārasya samyakpariṇatasya yastejobhūtaḥ sāraḥ paramasūkṣmaḥ sa rasa ity ucyate tasya ca hṛdayaṃ sthānaṃ sa hṛdayāc caturviṃśatidhamanīr anupraviśyordhvagā daśa daśa cādhogāminyaś catasraś ca tiryaggāḥ kṛtsnaṃ śarīramaharahastarpayati vardhayati dhārayati yāpayati cādṛṣṭahetukena karmaṇā | [Su, Sū., 14 3.1]
tasya śarīram anusarato 'numānād gatir upalakṣayitavyā kṣayavṛddhivaikṛtaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 3.2]
tasmin sarvaśarīrāvayavadoṣadhātumalāśayānusāriṇi rase jijñāsā kimayaṃ saumyastaijasa iti | [Su, Sū., 14 3.3]
atrocyate sa khalu dravānusārī snehanajīvanatarpaṇadhāraṇādibhir viśeṣaiḥ saumya ityavagamyate | [Su, Sū., 14 3.4]
sa khalvāpyo raso yakṛtplīhānau prāpya rāgam upaiti | [Su, Sū., 14 4.1]
bhavataś cātra | [Su, Sū., 14 5.1]
rañjitās tejasā tv āpaḥ śarīrasthena dehinām | [Su, Sū., 14 5.2]
avyāpannāḥ prasannena raktamityabhidhīyate | [Su, Sū., 14 5.3]
rasādeva striyā raktaṃ rajaḥsaṃjñaṃ pravartate | [Su, Sū., 14 6.1]
tad varṣād dvādaśād ūrdhvaṃ yāti pañcāśataḥ kṣayam | [Su, Sū., 14 6.2]
ārtavaṃ śoṇitaṃ tv āgneyam agnīṣomīyatvād garbhasya | [Su, Sū., 14 7.1]
pāñcabhautikaṃ tv apare jīvaraktamāhurācāryāḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 8.1]
visratā dravatā rāgaḥ spandanaṃ laghutā tathā | [Su, Sū., 14 9.1]
bhūmyādīnāṃ guṇā hy ete dṛśyante cātra śoṇite | [Su, Sū., 14 9.2]
rasādraktaṃ tato māṃsaṃ māṃsānmedaḥ prajāyate | [Su, Sū., 14 10.1]
medaso 'sthi tato majjā majjñaḥ śukraṃ tu jāyate | [Su, Sū., 14 10.2]
tatraiṣāṃ dhātūnām annapānarasaḥ prīṇayitā | [Su, Sū., 14 11.1]
rasajaṃ puruṣaṃ vidyād rasaṃ rakṣetprayatnataḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 12.1]
annāt pānāc ca matimān ācārāccāpyatandritaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 12.2]
tatra rasagatau dhātuḥ aharahar gacchatītyato rasaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 13.1]
sa khalu trīṇi trīṇi kalāsahasrāṇi pañcadaśa ca kalā ekaikasmin dhātāv avatiṣṭhate evaṃ māsena rasaḥ śukrībhavati strīṇāṃ cārtavam | [Su, Sū., 14 14.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 14 15.1]
aṣṭādaśasahasrāṇi saṃkhyā hy asmin samuccaye | [Su, Sū., 14 15.2]
kalānāṃ navatiḥ proktā svatantraparatantrayoḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 15.3]
sa śabdārcirjalasaṃtānavad aṇunā viśeṣeṇānudhāvatyevaṃ śarīraṃ kevalam | [Su, Sū., 14 16.1]
vājīkaraṇyastvoṣadhayaḥ svabalaguṇotkarṣādvirecanavadupayuktāḥ śukraṃ virecayanti | [Su, Sū., 14 17.1]
yathāhi puṣpamukulastho gandho na śakyamihāstīti vaktumatho naiva nāstīti atha cāsti satāṃ bhāvānāmabhivyaktiriti jñātvā kevalaṃ saukṣmyānnābhivyajyate sa eva puṣpe vivṛtapattrakesare kālāntareṇābhivyaktiṃ gacchati evaṃ bālānām api vayaḥpariṇāmācchukraprādurbhāvo bhavati romarājyādayaś ca viśeṣā nārīṇām | [Su, Sū., 14 18.1]
sa evānnaraso vṛddhānāṃ jarāparipakvaśarīratvād aprīṇano bhavati | [Su, Sū., 14 19.1]
ta ete śarīradhāraṇād dhātava ity ucyante | [Su, Sū., 14 20.1]
teṣāṃ kṣayavṛddhī śoṇitanimitte tasmāt tadadhikṛtya vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 21.1]
tatra phenilam aruṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ paruṣaṃ tanu śīghragam askandi ca vātena duṣṭaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ haritaṃ śyāvaṃ visramaniṣṭaṃ pipīlikāmakṣikāṇāmaskandi ca pittaduṣṭaṃ gairikodakapratīkāśaṃ snigdhaṃ śītalaṃ bahalaṃ picchilaṃ cirasrāvi māṃsapeśīprabhaṃ ca śleṣmaduṣṭaṃ sarvalakṣaṇasaṃyuktaṃ kāñjikābhaṃ viśeṣato durgandhi ca saṃnipātaduṣṭaṃ dvidoṣaliṅgaṃ saṃsṛṣṭam | [Su, Sū., 14 21.2]
indragopakapratīkāśamasaṃhatamavivarṇaṃ ca prakṛtisthaṃ jānīyāt | [Su, Sū., 14 22.1]
visrāvyāṇyanyatra vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 23.1]
athāvisrāvyāḥ sarvāṅgaśophaḥ kṣīṇasya cāmlabhojananimittaḥ pāṇḍurogyarśasodariśoṣigarbhiṇīnāṃ ca śvayathavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 24.1]
tatra śastravisrāvaṇaṃ dvividhaṃ pracchānaṃ sirāvyadhanaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 14 25.1]
tatra ṛjvasaṃkīrṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ samam anavagāḍham anuttānamāśu ca śastraṃ pātayenmarmasirāsnāyusaṃdhīnāṃ cānupaghāti | [Su, Sū., 14 26.1]
tatra durdine durviddhe śītavātayor asvinne bhuktamātre skandatvācchoṇitaṃ na sravatyalpaṃ vā sravati | [Su, Sū., 14 27.1]
madamūrchāśramārtānāṃ vātaviṇmūtrasaṃginām | [Su, Sū., 14 28.1]
nidrābhibhūtabhītānāṃ nṛṇāṃ nāsṛk pravartate | [Su, Sū., 14 28.2]
tadduṣṭaṃ śoṇitam anirhriyamāṇaṃ kaṇḍūśopharāgadāhapākavedanā janayet | [Su, Sū., 14 29.1]
atyuṣṇe 'tisvinne 'tividdhe 'jñair visrāvitam atipravartate tad atipravṛttaṃ śiro'bhitāpam āndhyam adhimanthatimiraprādurbhāvaṃ dhātukṣayamākṣepakaṃ pakṣāghātam ekāṅgavikāraṃ tṛṣṇādāhau hikkāṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ pāṇḍurogaṃ maraṇaṃ cāpādayati | [Su, Sū., 14 30.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 14 31.1]
tasmānna śīte nātyuṣṇe nāsvinne nātitāpite | [Su, Sū., 14 31.2]
yavāgūṃ pratipītasya śoṇitaṃ mokṣayedbhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 14 31.3]
samyaggatvā yadā raktaṃ svayamevāvatiṣṭhate | [Su, Sū., 14 32.1]
śuddhaṃ tadā vijānīyāt samyagvisrāvitaṃ ca tat | [Su, Sū., 14 32.2]
lāghavaṃ vedanāśāntirvyādhervegaparikṣayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 33.1]
samyagvisrāvite liṅgaṃ prasādo manasastathā | [Su, Sū., 14 33.2]
tvagdoṣā granthayaḥ śophā rogāḥ śoṇitajāśca ye | [Su, Sū., 14 34.1]
raktamokṣaṇaśīlānāṃ na bhavanti kadācana | [Su, Sū., 14 34.2]
atha khalvapravartamāne rakte elāśītaśivakuṣṭhatagarapāṭhābhadradāruviḍaṅgacitrakatrikaṭukāgāradhūmaharidrārkāṅkuranaktamālaphalair yathālābhaṃ tribhiścaturbhiḥ samastair vā cūrṇīkṛtair lavaṇatailapragāḍhair vraṇamukham avagharṣayed evaṃ samyak pravartate | [Su, Sū., 14 35.1]
athātipravṛtte rodhramadhukapriyaṅgupattaṅgagairikasarjarasarasāñjanaśālmalīpuṣpaśaṅkhaśuktimāṣayavagodhūmacūrṇaiḥ śanaiḥ śanair vraṇamukham avacūrṇyāṅgulyagreṇāvapīḍayet sālasarjārjunārimedameṣaśṛṅgadhavadhanvanatvagbhir vā cūrṇitābhiḥ kṣaumeṇa vā dhmāpitena samudraphenalākṣācūrṇair vā yathoktair vraṇabandhanadravyair gāḍhaṃ badhnīyāt śītācchādanabhojanāgāraiḥ śītaiḥ pariṣekapradehaiścopācaret kṣārenāgninā vā dahedyathoktaṃ vyadhanād anantaraṃ vā tāmevātipravṛttāṃ sirāṃ vidhyet kākolyādikvāthaṃ vā śarkarāmadhumadhuraṃ pāyayet eṇahariṇorabhraśaśamahiṣavarāhāṇāṃ vā rudhiraṃ kṣīrayūṣarasaiḥ susnigdhaiścāśnīyāt upadravāṃś ca yathāsvam upacaret | [Su, Sū., 14 36.1]
dhātukṣayāt srute rakte mandaḥ saṃjāyate 'nalaḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 37.1]
pavanaś ca paraṃ lopaṃ yāti tasmāt prayatnataḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 37.2]
taṃ nātiśītair laghubhiḥ snigdhaiḥ śoṇitavardhanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 38.1]
īṣadamlair anamlair vā bhojanaiḥ samupācaret | [Su, Sū., 14 38.2]
caturvidhaṃ yadetaddhi rudhirasya nivāraṇam | [Su, Sū., 14 39.1]
saṃdhānaṃ skandanaṃ caiva pācanaṃ dahanaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 14 39.2]
vraṇaṃ kaṣāyaḥ saṃdhatte raktaṃ skandayate himam | [Su, Sū., 14 40.1]
tathā saṃpācayedbhasma dāhaḥ saṃkocayet sirāḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 40.2]
askandamāne rudhire saṃdhānāni prayojayet | [Su, Sū., 14 41.1]
saṃdhāne bhraśyamāne tu pācanaiḥ samupācaret | [Su, Sū., 14 41.2]
kalpair etaistribhir vaidyaḥ prayateta yathāvidhi | [Su, Sū., 14 42.1]
asiddhimatsu caiteṣu dāhaḥ parama iṣyate | [Su, Sū., 14 42.2]
śeṣadoṣe yato rakte na vyādhirativartate | [Su, Sū., 14 43.1]
sāvaśeṣe tataḥ stheyaṃ na tu kuryādatikramam | [Su, Sū., 14 43.2]
dehasya rudhiraṃ mūlaṃ rudhireṇaiva dhāryate | [Su, Sū., 14 44.1]
tasmād yatnena saṃrakṣyaṃ raktaṃ jīva iti sthitiḥ | [Su, Sū., 14 44.2]
srutaraktasya sekādyaiḥ śītaiḥ prakupite 'nile | [Su, Sū., 14 45.1]
śophaṃ satodaṃ koṣṇena sarpiṣā pariṣecayet | [Su, Sū., 14 45.2]
{Su, Sū., 15}
athāto doṣadhātumalakṣayavṛddhivijñānīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 2.1]
doṣadhātumalamūlaṃ hi śarīraṃ tasmād eteṣāṃ lakṣaṇamucyamānam upadhāraya | [Su, Sū., 15 3.1]
tatra praspandanodvahanapūraṇavivekadhāraṇalakṣaṇo vāyuḥ pañcadhā pravibhaktaḥ śarīraṃ dhārayati | [Su, Sū., 15 4.1]
rāgapaktyojastejomedhoṣmakṛtpittaṃ pañcadhā pravibhaktamagnikarmaṇānugrahaṃ karoti | [Su, Sū., 15 4.2]
saṃdhisaṃśleṣaṇasnehanaropaṇapūraṇabalasthairyakṛcchleṣmā pañcadhā pravibhakta udakakarmaṇānugrahaṃ karoti | [Su, Sū., 15 4.3]
rasastuṣṭiṃ prīṇanaṃ raktapuṣṭiṃ ca karoti raktaṃ varṇaprasādaṃ māṃsapuṣṭiṃ jīvayati ca māṃsaṃ śarīrapuṣṭiṃ medasaś ca medaḥ snehasvedau dṛḍhatvaṃ puṣṭimasthnāṃ ca asthīni dehadhāraṇaṃ majjñaḥ puṣṭiṃ ca majjā prītiṃ snehaṃ balaṃ śukrapuṣṭiṃ pūraṇamasthnāṃ ca karoti śukraṃ dhairyaṃ cyavanaṃ prītiṃ dehabalaṃ harṣaṃ bījārthaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 15 5.1]
purīṣam upastambhaṃ vāyvagnidhāraṇaṃ ca vastipūraṇavikledakṛnmūtraṃ svedaḥ kledatvaksaukumāryakṛt | [Su, Sū., 15 5.2]
raktalakṣaṇamārtavaṃ garbhakṛcca garbho garbhalakṣaṇaṃ stanyaṃ stanayor āpīnatvajananaṃ jīvanaṃ ceti | [Su, Sū., 15 5.3]
tatra vidhivatparirakṣaṇaṃ kurvīta | [Su, Sū., 15 6.1]
ata ūrdhvam eṣāṃ kṣīṇalakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ tatra vātakṣaye mandaceṣṭatālpavāktvamapraharṣo mūḍhasaṃjñatā ca pittakṣaye mandoṣmāgnitā niṣprabhatā ca śleṣmakṣaye rūkṣatāntardāha āmāśayetaraśleṣmāśayaśūnyatā saṃdhiśaithilyaṃ tṛṣṇā daurbalyaṃ prajāgaraṇaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 15 7.1]
tatra svayonivardhanānyeva pratīkāraḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 8.1]
rasakṣaye hṛtpīḍākampaśūnyatās tṛṣṇā ca śoṇitakṣaye tvakpāruṣyamamlaśītaprārthanā sirāśaithilyaṃ ca māṃsakṣaye sphiggaṇḍauṣṭhopasthoruvakṣaḥkakṣāpiṇḍikodaragrīvāśuṣkatā raukṣyatodau gātrāṇāṃ sadanaṃ dhamanīśaithilyaṃ ca medaḥkṣaye plīhābhivṛddhiḥ saṃdhiśūnyatā raukṣyaṃ meduramāṃsaprārthanā ca asthikṣaye 'sthiśūlaṃ dantanakhabhaṅgo raukṣyaṃ ca majjakṣaye 'lpaśukratā parvabhedo 'sthinistodo 'sthiśūnyatā ca śukrakṣaye meḍhravṛṣaṇavedanāśaktirmaithune cirādvā prasekaḥ praseke cālparaktaśukradarśanam | [Su, Sū., 15 9.1]
tatrāpi svayonivardhanadravyopayogaḥ pratīkāraḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 10.1]
purīṣakṣaye hṛdayapārśvapīḍā saśabdasya ca vāyor ūrdhvagamanaṃ kukṣau saṃcaraṇaṃ ca mūtrakṣaye vastitodo 'lpamūtratā ca atrāpi svayonivardhanadravyāṇi pratīkāraḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 11.1]
svedakṣaye stabdharomakūpatā tvakśoṣaḥ sparśavaiguṇyaṃ svedanāśaś ca tatrābhyaṅgaḥ svedopayogaś ca | [Su, Sū., 15 11.2]
ārtavakṣaye yathocitakālādarśanamalpatā vā yonivedanā ca tatra saṃśodhanamāgneyānāṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ vidhivadupayogaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 12.1]
stanyakṣaye stanayor mlānatā stanyāsaṃbhavo 'lpatā vā tatra śleṣmavardhanadravyopayogaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 12.2]
garbhakṣaye garbhāspandanam anunnatakukṣitā ca tatra prāptavastikālāyāḥ kṣīravastiprayogo medyānnopayogaś ceti | [Su, Sū., 15 12.3]
ata ūrdhvam ativṛddhānāṃ doṣadhātumalānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 13.1]
vṛddhiḥ punareṣāṃ svayonivardhanātyupasevanād bhavati | [Su, Sū., 15 13.2]
tatra vātavṛddhau vākpāruṣyaṃ kārśyaṃ kārṣṇyaṃ gātrasphuraṇam uṣṇakāmitā nidrānāśo 'lpabalatvaṃ gāḍhavarcastvaṃ ca pittavṛddhau pītāvabhāsatā saṃtāpaḥ śītakāmitvam alpanidratā mūrchā balahānirindriyadaurbalyaṃ pītaviṇmūtranetratvaṃ ca śleṣmavṛddhau śauklyaṃ śaityaṃ sthairyaṃ gauravamavasādastandrā nidrā saṃdhyasthiviśleṣaś ca | [Su, Sū., 15 13.3]
raso 'tivṛddho hṛdayotkledaṃ prasekaṃ cāpādayati raktaṃ raktāṅgākṣitāṃ sirāpūrṇatvaṃ ca māṃsaṃ sphiggaṇḍauṣṭhopasthorubāhujaṅghāsu vṛddhiṃ gurugātratāṃ ca medaḥ snigdhāṅgatām udarapārśvavṛddhiṃ kāsaśvāsādīn daurgandhyaṃ ca asthyadhyasthīnyadhidantāṃś ca majjā sarvāṅganetragauravaṃ ca śukraṃ śukrāśmarīm atiprādurbhāvaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 15 14.1]
purīṣamāṭopaṃ kukṣau śūlaṃ ca mūtraṃ mūtravṛddhiṃ muhurmuhuḥ pravṛttiṃ vastitodam ādhmānaṃ ca svedastvaco daurgandhyaṃ kaṇḍūṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 15 15.1]
ārtavamaṅgamardamatipravṛttiṃ daurgandhyaṃ ca stanyaṃ stanayor āpīnatvaṃ muhurmuhuḥ pravṛttiṃ todaṃ ca garbho jaṭharābhivṛddhiṃ svedaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 15 16.1]
teṣāṃ yathāsvaṃ saṃśodhanaṃ kṣapaṇaṃ ca kṣayādaviruddhaiḥ kriyāviśeṣaiḥ prakurvīta | [Su, Sū., 15 17.1]
pūrvaḥ pūrvo 'tivṛddhatvādvardhayeddhi paraṃ param | [Su, Sū., 15 18.1]
tasmād atipravṛddhānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hrāsanaṃ hitam | [Su, Sū., 15 18.2]
balalakṣaṇaṃ balakṣayalakṣaṇaṃ cāta ūrdhvam upadekṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 19.1]
tatra rasādīnāṃ śukrāntānāṃ dhātūnāṃ yatparaṃ tejastat khalvojastadeva balamityucyate svaśāstrasiddhāntāt | [Su, Sū., 15 19.2]
tatra balena sthiropacitamāṃsatā sarvaceṣṭāsvapratighātaḥ svaravarṇaprasādo bāhyānāmābhyantarāṇāṃ ca karaṇānāmātmakāryapratipattirbhavati | [Su, Sū., 15 20.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 15 21.1]
ojaḥ somātmakaṃ snigdhaṃ śuklaṃ śītaṃ sthiraṃ saram | [Su, Sū., 15 21.2]
viviktaṃ mṛdu mṛtsnaṃ ca prāṇāyatanamuttamam | [Su, Sū., 15 21.3]
dehaḥ sāvayavastena vyāpto bhavati dehinām | [Su, Sū., 15 22.1]
tadabhāvāc ca śīryante śarīrāṇi śarīriṇām | [Su, Sū., 15 22.2]
abhighātātkṣayātkopācchokāddhyānācchramātkṣudhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 23.1]
ojaḥ saṃkṣīyate hy ebhyo dhātugrahaṇaniḥsṛtam | [Su, Sū., 15 23.2]
tejaḥ samīritaṃ tasmād visraṃsayati dehinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 23.3]
tasya visraṃso vyāpat kṣaya iti liṅgāni vyāpannasya bhavanti saṃdhiviśleṣo gātrāṇāṃ sadanaṃ doṣacyavanaṃ kriyāsaṃnirodhaś ca visraṃse stabdhagurugātratā vātaśopho varṇabhedo glānistandrā nidrā ca vyāpanne mūrchā māṃsakṣayo mohaḥ pralāpo maraṇamiti ca kṣaye | [Su, Sū., 15 24.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 15 25.1]
trayo doṣā balasyoktā vyāpadvisraṃsanakṣayāḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 25.2]
viśleṣasādau gātrāṇāṃ doṣavisraṃsanaṃ śramaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 25.3]
aprācuryaṃ kriyānāṃ ca balavisraṃsalakṣaṇam | [Su, Sū., 15 26.1]
gurutvaṃ stabdhatāṅgeṣu glānirvarṇasya bhedanam | [Su, Sū., 15 26.2]
tandrā nidrā vātaśopho balavyāpadi lakṣaṇam | [Su, Sū., 15 27.1]
mūrchā māṃsakṣayo mohaḥ pralāpo 'jñānam eva ca | [Su, Sū., 15 27.2]
pūrvoktāni ca liṅgāni maraṇaṃ ca balakṣaye | [Su, Sū., 15 28.1]
tatra visraṃse vyāpanne ca kriyāviśeṣair aviruddhair balamāpyāyayet itaraṃ tu mūḍhasaṃjñaṃ varjayet | [Su, Sū., 15 28.2]
doṣadhātumalakṣīṇo balakṣīṇo 'pi vā naraḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 29.1]
svayonivardhanaṃ yattadannapānaṃ prakāṅkṣati | [Su, Sū., 15 29.2]
yadyadāhārajātaṃ tu kṣīṇaḥ prārthayate naraḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 30.1]
tasya tasya sa lābhe tu taṃ taṃ kṣayamapohati | [Su, Sū., 15 30.2]
yasya dhātukṣayādvāyuḥ saṃjñāṃ karma ca nāśayet | [Su, Sū., 15 31.1]
prakṣīṇaṃ ca balaṃ yasya nāsau śakyaścikitsitum | [Su, Sū., 15 31.2]
rasanimittam eva sthaulyaṃ kārśyaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 15 32.1]
tatra śleṣmalāhārasevino 'dhyaśanaśīlasyāvyāyāmino divāsvapnaratasya cāma evānnaraso madhurataraś ca śarīramanukrāmannatisnehānmedo janayati tadatisthaulyamāpādayati tamatisthūlaṃ kṣudraśvāsapipāsākṣutsvapnasvedagātradaurgandhyakrathanagātrasādagadgadatvāni kṣipramevāviśanti saukumāryānmedasaḥ sarvakriyāsvasamarthaḥ kaphamedoniruddhamārgatvāccālpavyavāyo bhavati āvṛtamārgatvādeva śeṣā dhātavo nāpyāyante 'tyarthamato 'lpaprāṇo bhavati pramehapiḍakājvarabhagaṃdaravidradhivātavikārāṇām anyatamaṃ prāpya pañcatvam upayāti | [Su, Sū., 15 32.2]
sarva eva cāsya rogā balavanto bhavantyāvṛtamārgatvāt srotasām atastasyotpattihetuṃ pariharet | [Su, Sū., 15 32.3]
utpanne tu śilājatuguggulugomūtratriphalāloharajorasāñjanamadhuyavamudgakoradūṣakaśyāmākoddālakādīnāṃ virūkṣaṇacchedanīyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ vidhivadupayogo vyāyāmo lekhanavastyupayogaś ceti | [Su, Sū., 15 32.4]
tatra punarvātalāhārasevino 'tivyāyāmavyavāyādhyayanabhayaśokadhyānarātrijāgaraṇapipāsākṣutkaṣāyālpāśanaprabhṛtibhir upaśoṣito rasadhātuḥ śarīram ananukrāmann alpatvānna prīṇāti tasmād atikārśyaṃ bhavati so 'tikṛśaḥ kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇavātavarṣabhārādāneṣv asahiṣṇur vātarogaprāyo 'lpaprāṇaś ca kriyāsu bhavati śvāsakāsaśoṣaplīhodarāgnisādagulmaraktapittānām anyatamam āsādya maraṇam upayāti sarva eva cāsya rogā balavanto bhavantyalpaprāṇatvāt atastasyotpattihetuṃ pariharet | [Su, Sū., 15 33.1]
utpanne tu payasyāśvagandhāvidārigandhāśatāvarībalātibalānāgabalānāṃ madhurāṇāmanyāsāṃ cauṣadhīnām upayogaḥ kṣīradadhighṛtamāṃsaśāliṣaṣṭikayavagodhūmānāṃ ca divāsvapnabrahmacaryāvyāyāmabṛṃhaṇavastyupayogaś ceti | [Su, Sū., 15 33.2]
yaḥ punarubhayasādhāraṇānyāseveta tasyānnarasaḥ śarīramanukrāman samān dhātūnupacinoti samadhātutvānmadhyaśarīro bhavati sarvakriyāsu samarthaḥ kṣutpipāsāśītoṣṇavarṣātapasaho balavāṃś ca sa satatam anupālayitavya iti | [Su, Sū., 15 34.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 15 35.1]
atyantagarhitāvetau sadā sthūlakṛśau narau | [Su, Sū., 15 35.2]
śreṣṭho madhyaśarīrastu kṛśaḥ sthūlāttu pūjitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 35.3]
doṣaḥ prakupito dhātūn kṣapayatyātmatejasā | [Su, Sū., 15 36.1]
iddhaḥ svatejasā vahnir ukhāgatamivodakam | [Su, Sū., 15 36.2]
vailakṣaṇyāccharīrāṇām asthāyitvāttathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 15 37.1]
doṣadhātumalānāṃ tu parimāṇaṃ na vidyate | [Su, Sū., 15 37.2]
eṣāṃ samatvaṃ yaccāpi bhiṣagbhir avadhāryate | [Su, Sū., 15 38.1]
na tat svāsthyādṛte śakyaṃ vaktum anyena hetunā | [Su, Sū., 15 38.2]
doṣādīnāṃ tvasamatām anumānena lakṣayet | [Su, Sū., 15 39.1]
aprasannendriyaṃ vīkṣya puruṣaṃ kuśalo bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 15 39.2]
svasthasya rakṣaṇaṃ kuryādasvasthasya tu buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 15 40.1]
kṣapayedbṛṃhayeccāpi doṣadhātumalān bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 15 40.2]
tāvadyāvadarogaḥ syādetatsāmyasya lakṣaṇam | [Su, Sū., 15 40.3]
samadoṣaḥ samāgniś ca samadhātumalakriyaḥ | [Su, Sū., 15 41.1]
prasannātmendriyamanāḥ svastha ityabhidhīyate | [Su, Sū., 15 41.2]
{Su, Sū., 16}
athātaḥ karṇavyadhabandhavidhim adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 2.1]
rakṣābhūṣaṇanimittaṃ bālasya karṇau vidhyete | [Su, Sū., 16 3.1]
tau ṣaṣṭhe māsi saptame vā śuklapakṣe praśasteṣu tithikaraṇamuhūrtanakṣatreṣu kṛtamaṅgalasvastivācanaṃ dhātryaṅke kumāradhārāṅke vā kumāram upaveśya bālakrīḍanakaiḥ pralobhyābhisāntvayan bhiṣagvāmahastenākṛṣya karṇaṃ daivakṛte chidra ādityakarāvabhāsite śanaiḥ śanair dakṣiṇahastenarju vidhyet pratanukaṃ sūcyā bahalam ārayā pūrvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ kumārasya vāmaṃ kumāryāḥ tataḥ picuvartiṃ praveśayet | [Su, Sū., 16 3.2]
śoṇitabahutvena vedanayā cānyadeśaviddhamiti jānīyāt nirupadravatayā taddeśaviddham iti | [Su, Sū., 16 4.1]
tatrājñena yadṛcchayā viddhāsu sirāsu kālikāmarmarikālohitikāsūpadravā bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 16 5.1]
tatra kālikāyāṃ jvaro dāhaḥ śvayathurvedanā ca bhavati marmarikāyāṃ vedanā jvaro granthayaś ca lohitikāyāṃ manyāstambhāpatānakaśirograhakarṇaśūlāni bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 16 5.2]
teṣu yathāsvaṃ pratikurvīta | [Su, Sū., 16 5.3]
kliṣṭajihmāpraśastasūcīvyadhād gāḍhataravartitvād doṣasamudāyād apraśastavyadhād vā yatra saṃrambho vedanā vā bhavati tatra vartim upahṛtyāśu madhukairaṇḍamūlamañjiṣṭhāyavatilakalkair madhughṛtapragāḍhair ālepayettāvadyāvat surūḍha iti surūḍhaṃ cainaṃ punarvidhyet vidhānaṃ tu pūrvoktameva | [Su, Sū., 16 6.1]
tatra samyagviddhamāmatailena pariṣecayet tryahāttryahāc ca vartiṃ sthūlatarāṃ dadyāt pariṣekaṃ ca tameva | [Su, Sū., 16 7.1]
atha vyapagatadoṣopadrave karṇe vardhanārthaṃ laghu vardhanakaṃ kuryāt | [Su, Sū., 16 8.1]
evaṃ vivardhitaḥ karṇaśchidyate tu dvidhā nṛṇām | [Su, Sū., 16 9.1]
doṣato vābhighātādvā saṃdhānaṃ tasya me śṛṇu | [Su, Sū., 16 9.2]
tatra samāsena pañcadaśakarṇabandhākṛtayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 10.1]
tadyathā nemisaṃdhānaka utpalabhedyako vallūraka āsaṅgimo gaṇḍakarṇa āhāryo nirvedhimo vyāyojimaḥ kapāṭasaṃdhiko 'rdhakapāṭasaṃdhikaḥ saṃkṣipto hīnakarṇo vallīkarṇo yaṣṭikarṇaḥ kākauṣṭhaka iti | [Su, Sū., 16 10.2]
teṣu pṛthulāyatasamobhayapālir nemisaṃdhānakaḥ vṛttāyatasamobhayapālirutpalabhedyakaḥ hrasvavṛttasamobhayapālir vallūrakaḥ abhyantaradīrghaikapālirāsaṅgimaḥ bāhyadīrghaikapālir gaṇḍakarṇaḥ apālirubhayato 'pyāhāryaḥ pīṭhopamapālirubhayataḥ sthūlāṇusamaviṣamapālir vyāyojimaḥ kṣīṇaputrikāśrito abhyantaradīrghaikapāliritarālpapāliḥ nirvedhimaḥ kapāṭasaṃdhikaḥ bāhyadīrghaikapālir itarālpapālir ardhakapāṭasaṃdhikaḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 10.3]
tatra daśaite karṇabandhavikalpāḥ sādhyāḥ teṣāṃ svanāmabhir evākṛtayaḥ prāyeṇa vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 10.4]
saṃkṣiptādayaḥ pañcāsādhyāḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 10.5]
tatra śuṣkaśaṣkulirutsannapāliritarālpapāliḥ saṃkṣiptaḥ anadhiṣṭhānapāliḥ paryantayoḥ kṣīṇamāṃso hīnakarṇaḥ tanuviṣamālpapālirvallīkarṇaḥ grathitamāṃsastabdhasirāsaṃtatasūkṣmapālir yaṣṭikarṇaḥ nirmāṃsasaṃkṣiptāgrālpaśoṇitapāliḥ kākauṣṭhaka iti | [Su, Sū., 16 10.6]
baddheṣvapi tu śophadāharāgapākapiḍakāsrāvayuktā na siddhim upayānti | [Su, Sū., 16 10.7]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 16 11.1]
yasya pālidvayam api karṇasya na bhavediha | [Su, Sū., 16 11.2]
karṇapīṭhaṃ same madhye tasya viddhvā vivardhayet | [Su, Sū., 16 11.3]
bāhyāyāmiha dīrghāyāṃ saṃdhirābhyantaro bhavet | [Su, Sū., 16 12.1]
ābhyantarāyāṃ dīrghāyāṃ bāhyasaṃdhirudāhṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 12.2]
ekaiva tu bhavet pāliḥ sthūlā pṛthvī sthirā ca yā | [Su, Sū., 16 13.1]
tāṃ dvidhā pāṭayitvā tu chittvā copari saṃdhayet | [Su, Sū., 16 13.2]
gaṇḍādutpāṭya māṃsena sānubandhena jīvatā | [Su, Sū., 16 14.1]
karṇapālīm apālestu kuryānnirlikhya śāstravit | [Su, Sū., 16 14.2]
ato'nyatamaṃ bandhaṃ cikīrṣur agropaharaṇīyoktopasaṃbhṛtasambhāraṃ viśeṣataścātropaharet surāmaṇḍaṃ kṣīramudakaṃ dhānyāmlaṃ kapālacūrṇaṃ ceti | [Su, Sū., 16 15.1]
tato 'ṅganāṃ puruṣaṃ vā grathitakeśāntaṃ laghu bhuktavantamāptaiḥ suparigṛhītaṃ ca kṛtvā bandham upadhārya chedyabhedyalekhyavyadhanair upapannair upapādya karṇaśoṇitamavekṣya duṣṭamaduṣṭaṃ veti tatra vātaduṣṭe dhānyāmloṣṇodakābhyāṃ pittaduṣṭe śītodakapayobhyāṃ śleṣmaduṣṭe surāmaṇḍoṣṇodakābhyāṃ prakṣālya karṇau punaravalikhyānunnatamahīnam aviṣamaṃ ca karṇasaṃdhiṃ saṃniveśya sthitaraktaṃ saṃdadhyāt | [Su, Sū., 16 15.2]
tato madhughṛtenābhyajya picuplotayor anyatareṇāvaguṇṭhya sūtreṇānavagāḍham anatiśithilaṃ ca baddhvā kapālacūrṇenāvakīryācārikam upadiśeddvivraṇīyoktena ca vidhānenopacaret | [Su, Sū., 16 15.3]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 16 16.1]
vighaṭṭanaṃ divāsvapnaṃ vyāyāmamatibhojanam | [Su, Sū., 16 16.2]
vyavāyamagnisaṃtāpaṃ vākśramaṃ ca vivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 16 16.3]
na cāśuddharaktamatipravṛttaraktaṃ kṣīṇaraktaṃ vā saṃdadhyāt | [Su, Sū., 16 17.1]
sa hi vātaduṣṭe rakte rūḍho 'pi paripuṭanavān pittaduṣṭe dāhapākarāgavedanāvān śleṣmaduṣṭe stabdhaḥ kaṇḍūmān atipravṛttarakte śyāvaśophavān kṣīṇo 'lpamāṃso na vṛddhim upaiti | [Su, Sū., 16 17.2]
āmatailena trirātraṃ pariṣecayet trirātrācca picuṃ parivartayet | [Su, Sū., 16 18.1]
sa yadā surūḍho nirupadravaḥ savarṇo bhavati tadainaṃ śanaiḥśanair abhivardhayet | [Su, Sū., 16 18.2]
ato 'nyathā saṃrambhadāhapākarāgavedanāvān punaśchidyate vā | [Su, Sū., 16 18.3]
athāsyāpraduṣṭasyābhivardhanārtham abhyaṅgaḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 19.1]
tadyathā godhāpratudaviṣkirānūpaudakavasāmajjānau payaḥ sarpistailaṃ gaurasarṣapajaṃ ca yathālābhaṃ saṃbhṛtyārkālarkabalātibalānantāpāmārgāśvagandhāvidārigandhākṣīraśuklājalaśūkamadhuravargapayasyāprativāpaṃ tailaṃ vā pācayitvā svanuguptaṃ nidadhyāt | [Su, Sū., 16 19.2]
sveditonmarditaṃ karṇaṃ snehenaitena yojayet | [Su, Sū., 16 20.1]
athānupadravaḥ samyagbalavāṃś ca vivardhate | [Su, Sū., 16 20.2]
yavāśvagandhāyaṣṭyāhvaistilaiścodvartanaṃ hitam | [Su, Sū., 16 21.1]
śatāvaryaśvagandhābhyāṃ payasyairaṇḍajīvanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 21.2]
tailaṃ vipakvaṃ sakṣīramabhyaṅgāt pālivardhanam | [Su, Sū., 16 22.1]
ye tu karṇā na vardhante svedasnehopapāditāḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 22.2]
teṣāmapāṅgadeśe tu kuryāt pracchānam eva tu | [Su, Sū., 16 23.1]
bāhyacchedaṃ na kurvīta vyāpadaḥ syustato dhruvāḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 23.2]
baddhamātraṃ tu yaḥ karṇaṃ sahasaivābhivardhayet | [Su, Sū., 16 24.1]
āmakośī samādhmātaḥ kṣipram eva vimucyate | [Su, Sū., 16 24.2]
jātaromā suvartmā ca śliṣṭasaṃdhiḥ samaḥ sthiraḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 25.1]
surūḍho 'vedano yaś ca taṃ karṇaṃ vardhayecchanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 16 25.2]
amitāḥ karṇabandhāstu vijñeyāḥ kuśalair iha | [Su, Sū., 16 26.1]
yo yathā suviśiṣṭaḥ syāttaṃ tathā viniyojayet | [Su, Sū., 16 26.2]
{Su, Sū., 17}
athāta āmapakvaiṣaṇīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 17 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 17 2.1]
śophasamutthānā granthividradhyalajīprabhṛtayaḥ prāyeṇa vyādhayo 'bhihitā anekākṛtayaḥ tair vilakṣaṇaḥ pṛthurgrathitaḥ samo viṣamo vā tvaṅmāṃsasthāyī doṣasaṃghātaḥ śarīraikadeśotthitaḥ śopha ityucyate | [Su, Sū., 17 3.1]
sa ṣaḍvidho vātapittakaphaśoṇitasannipātāgantunimittaḥ | [Su, Sū., 17 4.1]
tasya doṣarūpavyañjanair lakṣaṇāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 17 4.2]
tatra vātaśopho 'ruṇaḥ kṛṣṇo vā paruṣo mṛduranavasthitāstodādayaś cātra vedanāviśeṣā bhavanti pittaśophaḥ pīto mṛduḥ sarakto vā śīghrānusāryoṣādayaś cātra vedanāviśeṣā bhavanti śleṣmaśophaḥ pāṇḍuḥ śuklo vā kaṭhinaḥ śītaḥ snigdho mandānusārī kaṇḍvādayaś cātra vedanāviśeṣā bhavanti sarvavarṇavedanaḥ sannipātajaḥ pittavacchoṇitajo 'tikṛṣṇaśca pittaraktalakṣaṇa āganturlohitāvabhāsaś ca | [Su, Sū., 17 4.3]
sa yadā bāhyābhyantaraiḥ kriyāviśeṣair na saṃbhāvitaḥ praśamayituṃ kriyāviparyayādbahutvādvā doṣāṇāṃ tadā pākābhimukho bhavati | [Su, Sū., 17 5.1]
tasyāmasya pacyamānasya pakvasya ca lakṣaṇamucyamānam upadhāraya | [Su, Sū., 17 5.2]
tatra mandoṣmatā tvaksavarṇatā śītaśophatā sthairyaṃ mandavedanatālpaśophatā cāmalakṣaṇamuddiṣṭaṃ sūcibhir iva nistudyate daśyata iva pipīlikābhistābhiś ca saṃsarpyata iva chidyata iva śastreṇa bhidyata iva śaktibhistāḍyata iva daṇḍena pīḍyata iva pāṇinā ghaṭyata iva cāṅgulyā dahyate pacyata iva cāgnikṣārābhyām oṣacoṣaparīdāhāś ca bhavanti vṛścikaviddha iva ca sthānāsanaśayaneṣu na śāntim upaiti ādhmātabastirivātataś ca śopho bhavati tvagvaivarṇyaṃ śophābhivṛddhirjvaradāhapipāsā bhaktāruciś ca pacyamānaliṅgaṃ vedanopaśāntiḥ pāṇḍutālpaśophatā valīprādurbhāvastvakparipuṭanaṃ nimnadarśanamaṅgulyāvapīḍite pratyunnamanaṃ bastāvivodakasaṃcaraṇaṃ pūyasya prapīḍayatyekamantamante vāvapīḍite muhurmuhustodaḥ kaṇḍūr unnatatā vyādherupadravaśāntirbhaktābhikāṅkṣā ca pakvaliṅgam | [Su, Sū., 17 5.3]
kaphajeṣu tu rogeṣu gambhīragatitvādabhighātajeṣu vā keṣucidasamastaṃ pakvalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā pakvamapakvamiti manyamāno bhiṣaṅmoham upaiti | [Su, Sū., 17 5.4]
tatra hi tvaksavarṇatā śītaśophatā sthaulyam alparujatāśmavacca ghanatā na tatra mohamupeyād iti | [Su, Sū., 17 5.5]
{Su, Sū., 18}
athāto vraṇālepanabandhavidhimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 2.1]
ālepa ādya upakramaḥ eṣa sarvaśophānāṃ sāmānyaḥ pradhānatamaś ca taṃ ca pratirogaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ tato bandhaḥ pradhānaṃ tena śuddhirvraṇaropaṇamasthisaṃdhisthairyaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 18 3.1]
tatra pratilomamālimpet | [Su, Sū., 18 4.1]
pratilome hi samyagauṣadhamavatiṣṭhate 'nupraviśati romakūpān svedavāhibhiś ca sirāmukhair vīryaṃ prāpnoti | [Su, Sū., 18 4.2]
na ca śuṣyamāṇamupekṣeta anyatra pīḍayitavyāt śuṣko hy apārthako rukkaraś ca | [Su, Sū., 18 5.1]
sa trividhaḥ pralepaḥ pradeha ālepaś ca | [Su, Sū., 18 6.1]
pralepapradehayor antaraṃ tatra pralepaḥ śītastanur aviśoṣī viśoṣī ca pradehastūṣṇaḥ śīto vā bahalo 'bahur aviśoṣī ca madhyamo 'trālepaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 6.2]
tatra raktapittaprasādakṛdālepaḥ pradeho vātaśleṣmapraśamanaḥ saṃdhānaḥ śodhano ropaṇaḥ śophavedanāpahaś ca tasyopayogaḥ kṣatākṣateṣu yastu kṣateṣūpayujyate sa bhūyaḥ kalka iti saṃjñāṃ labhate niruddhālepanasaṃjñaḥ tenāsrāvasaṃnirodho mṛdutā pūtimāṃsāpakarṣaṇam anantardoṣatā vraṇaśuddhiś ca bhavati | [Su, Sū., 18 6.3]
avidagdheṣu śopheṣu hitamālepanaṃ bhavet | [Su, Sū., 18 7.1]
yathāsvaṃ doṣaśamanaṃ dāhakaṇḍūrujāpaham | [Su, Sū., 18 7.2]
tvakprasādanamevāgryaṃ māṃsaraktaprasādanam | [Su, Sū., 18 8.1]
dāhapraśamanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ todakaṇḍūvināśanam | [Su, Sū., 18 8.2]
marmadeśeṣu ye rogā guhyeṣvapi tathā nṝṇām | [Su, Sū., 18 9.1]
saṃśodhanāya teṣāṃ hi kuryādālepanaṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 18 9.2]
ṣaḍbhāgaṃ paittike snehaṃ caturbhāgaṃ tu vātike | [Su, Sū., 18 10.1]
aṣṭabhāgaṃ tu kaphaje snehamātrāṃ pradāpayet | [Su, Sū., 18 10.2]
tasya pramāṇamārdramāhiṣacarmotsedham upadiśanti | [Su, Sū., 18 11.1]
na cālepaṃ rātrau prayuñjīta mā bhūcchaityapihitoṣmaṇas tadanirgamād vikārapravṛttir iti | [Su, Sū., 18 12.1]
pradehasādhye vyādhau tu hitamālepanaṃ divā | [Su, Sū., 18 13.1]
pittaraktābhighātotthe saviṣe ca viśeṣataḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 13.2]
na ca paryuṣitaṃ lepaṃ kadācidavacārayet | [Su, Sū., 18 14.1]
uparyupari lepaṃ tu na kadācit pradāpayet | [Su, Sū., 18 14.2]
ūṣmāṇaṃ vedanāṃ dāhaṃ ghanatvājjanayet sa hi | [Su, Sū., 18 15.1]
na ca tenaiva lepena pradehaṃ dāpayet punaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 15.2]
śuṣkabhāvātsa nirvīryo yukto 'pi syādapārthakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 15.3]
ata ūrdhvaṃ vraṇabandhanadravyāṇyupadekṣyāmaḥ tadyathā kṣaumakārpāsāvikadukūlakauśeyapattrorṇacīnapaṭṭacarmāntarvalkalālābūśakalalatāvidalarajjutūlaphalasaṃtānikālauhānīti teṣāṃ vyādhiṃ kālaṃ cāvekṣyopayogaḥ prakaraṇataścaiṣāmādeśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 16.1]
