tatra kośadāmasvastikānuvellitapratolīmaṇḍalasthagikāyamakakhaṭvācīnavibandhavitānagophaṇāḥ pañcāṅgī ceti caturdaśa bandhaviśeṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 17.1]
teṣāṃ nāmabhir evākṛtayaḥ prāyeṇa vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 17.2]
tatra kośam aṅguṣṭhāṅguliparvasu vidadhyāt dāma saṃbādhe 'ṅge sandhikūrcakabhrūstanāntaratalakarṇeṣu svastikam anuvellitaṃ tu śākhāsu grīvāmeḍhrayoḥ pratolīṃ vṛtte 'ṅge maṇḍalam aṅguṣṭhāṅgulimeḍhrāgreṣu sthagikāṃ yamalavraṇayor yamakaṃ hanuśaṅkhagaṇḍeṣu khaṭvām apāṅgayoścīnaṃ pṛṣṭhodaroraḥsu vibandhaṃ mūrdhani vitānaṃ cibukanāsauṣṭhāṃsabastiṣu gophaṇāṃ jatruṇa ūrdhvaṃ pañcāṅgīmiti yo vā yasmin śarīrapradeśe suniviṣṭo bhavati taṃ tasmin vidadhyāt | [Su, Sū., 18 18.1]
yantraṇam ūrdhvam adhastiryak ca | [Su, Sū., 18 19.1]
tatra ghanāṃ kavalikāṃ dattvā vāmahastaparikṣepam ṛjum anāviddham asaṃkucitaṃ mṛdu paṭṭaṃ niveśya badhnīyāt | [Su, Sū., 18 20.1]
na ca vraṇasyopari kuryādgranthimābādhakaraṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 18 20.2]
na ca vikeśikauṣadhe 'tisnigdhe 'tirūkṣe viṣame vā kurvīta yasmādatisnehāt kledo raukṣyācchedo durnyāsād vraṇavartmāvagharṣaṇam iti | [Su, Sū., 18 21.1]
tatra vraṇāyatanaviśeṣād bandhaviśeṣas trividho bhavati gāḍhaḥ samaḥ śithila iti | [Su, Sū., 18 22.1]
pīḍayannarujo gāḍhaḥ socchvāsaḥ śithilaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 23.1]
naiva gāḍho na śithilaḥ samo bandhaḥ prakīrtitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 23.2]
tatra sphikkukṣikakṣāvaṅkṣaṇoruśiraḥsu gāḍhaḥ śākhāvadanakarṇakaṇṭhameḍhramuṣkapṛṣṭhapārśvodaroraḥsu samaḥ akṣṇoḥ sandhiṣu ca śithila iti | [Su, Sū., 18 24.1]
tatra paittikaṃ gāḍhasthāne samaṃ badhnīyāt samasthāne śithilaṃ śithilasthāne naiva evaṃ śoṇitaduṣṭaṃ ca ślaiṣmikaṃ śithilasthāne samaṃ samasthāne gāḍhaṃ gāḍhasthāne gāḍhataram evaṃ vātaduṣṭaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 18 25.1]
tatra paittikaṃ śaradi grīṣme dvirahno badhnīyāt raktopadrutamapyevaṃ ślaiṣmikaṃ hemantavasantayos tryahāt vātopadrutamapyevam | [Su, Sū., 18 26.1]
evamabhyūhya bandhaviparyayaṃ ca kuryāt | [Su, Sū., 18 26.2]
tatra samaśithilasthāneṣu gāḍhaṃ baddhe vikeśikauṣadhanairarthakyaṃ śophavedanāprādurbhāvaś ca gāḍhasamasthāneṣu śithilaṃ baddhe vikeśikauṣadhapatanaṃ paṭṭasaṃcārād vraṇavartmāvagharṣaṇam iti gāḍhaśithilasthāneṣu samaṃ baddhe ca guṇābhāva iti | [Su, Sū., 18 27.1]
aviparītabandhe vedanopaśāntirasṛkprasādo mārdavaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 18 28.1]
abadhyamāno daṃśamaśakatṛṇakāṣṭhopalapāṃśuśītavātātapaprabhṛtibhir viśeṣair abhihanyate vraṇo vividhavedanopadrutaś ca duṣṭatām upaityālepanādīni cāsya viśoṣam upayānti | [Su, Sū., 18 29.1]
cūrṇitaṃ mathitaṃ bhagnaṃ viśliṣṭamatipātitam | [Su, Sū., 18 30.1]
asthisnāyusirāchinnam āśu bandhena rohati | [Su, Sū., 18 30.2]
sukhamevaṃ vraṇī śete sukhaṃ gacchati tiṣṭhati | [Su, Sū., 18 31.1]
sukhaṃ śayyāsanasthasya kṣipraṃ saṃrohati vraṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 31.2]
abandhyāḥ pittaraktābhighātaviṣanimittā yadā ca śophadāhapākarāgatodavedanābhibhūtāḥ kṣārāgnidagdhāḥ pākāt prakuthitapraśīrṇamāṃsāś ca bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 18 32.1]
kuṣṭhināmagnidagdhānāṃ piḍakā madhumehinām | [Su, Sū., 18 33.1]
karṇikāśconduruviṣe viṣajuṣṭavraṇāś ca ye | [Su, Sū., 18 33.2]
māṃsapāke na badhyante gudapāke ca dāruṇe | [Su, Sū., 18 34.1]
svabuddhyā cāpi vibhajetkṛtyākṛtyāṃś ca buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 18 34.2]
deśaṃ doṣaṃ ca vijñāya vraṇaṃ ca vraṇakovidaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 35.1]
ṛtūṃś ca parisaṃkhyāya tato bandhānniveśayet | [Su, Sū., 18 35.2]
ūrdhvaṃ tiryagadhastācca yantraṇā trividhā smṛtā | [Su, Sū., 18 36.1]
yathā ca badhyate bandhastathā vakṣyāmyaśeṣataḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 36.2]
ghanāṃ kavalikāṃ dattvā mṛdu caivāpi paṭṭakam | [Su, Sū., 18 37.1]
vikeśikāmauṣadhaṃ ca nātisnigdhaṃ samācaret | [Su, Sū., 18 37.2]
prakledayatyatisnigdhā tathā rūkṣā kṣiṇoti ca | [Su, Sū., 18 38.1]
yuktasnehā ropayati durnyastā vartma gharṣati | [Su, Sū., 18 38.2]
viṣamaṃ ca vraṇaṃ kuryāt stambhayet srāvayettathā | [Su, Sū., 18 39.1]
yathāvraṇaṃ viditvā tu yogaṃ vaidyaḥ prayojayet | [Su, Sū., 18 39.2]
pittaje raktaje vāpi sakṛdeva parikṣipet | [Su, Sū., 18 40.1]
asakṛt kaphaje vāpi vātaje ca vicakṣaṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 40.2]
talena pratipīḍyātha srāvayedanulomataḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 41.1]
sarvāṃś ca bandhān gūḍhāntān sandhīṃś ca viniveśayet | [Su, Sū., 18 41.2]
oṣṭhasyāpyeṣa saṃdhāne yathoddiṣṭo vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 42.1]
buddhyotprekṣyābhiyuktena tathā cāsthiṣu jānatā | [Su, Sū., 18 42.2]
uttiṣṭhato niṣaṇṇasya śayanaṃ vādhigacchataḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 43.1]
gacchato vividhair yānair nāsya duṣyati sa vraṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 43.2]
ye ca syurmāṃsasaṃsthā vai tvaggatāś ca tathā vraṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 44.1]
sandhyasthikoṣṭhaprāptāśca sirāsnāyugatāstathā | [Su, Sū., 18 44.2]
tathāvagāḍhagambhīrāḥ sarvato viṣamasthitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 18 45.1]
naite sādhayituṃ śakyā ṛte bandhādbhavanti hi | [Su, Sū., 18 45.2]
{Su, Sū., 19}
athāto vraṇitopāsanīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 2.1]
vraṇitasya prathamamevāgāramanvicchet taccāgāraṃ praśastavāstvādikaṃ kāryam | [Su, Sū., 19 3.1]
praśastavāstuni gṛhe śucāvātapavarjite | [Su, Sū., 19 4.1]
nivāte na ca rogāḥ syuḥ śārīrāgantumānasāḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 4.2]
tasmin śayanamasaṃbādhaṃ svāstīrṇaṃ manojñaṃ prākśiraskaṃ saśastraṃ kurvīta | [Su, Sū., 19 5.1]
sukhaceṣṭāpracāraḥ syāt svāstīrṇe śayane vraṇī | [Su, Sū., 19 6.1]
prācyāṃ diśi sthitā devāstatpūjārthaṃ ca tacchiraḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 6.2]
tasmin suhṛdbhir anukūlaiḥ priyaṃvadair upāsyamāno yatheṣṭamāsīta | [Su, Sū., 19 7.1]
suhṛdo vikṣipantyāśu kathābhir vraṇavedanāḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 8.1]
āśvāsayanto bahuśastvanukūlāḥ priyaṃvadāḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 8.2]
na ca divānidrāvaśagaḥ syāt | [Su, Sū., 19 9.1]
divāsvapnād vraṇe kaṇḍūrgātrāṇāṃ gauravaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 19 10.1]
śvayathurvedanā rāgaḥ srāvaścaiva bhṛśaṃ bhavet | [Su, Sū., 19 10.2]
utthānasaṃveśanaparivartanacaṅkramaṇoccairbhāṣaṇādyāsvātmaceṣṭāsv apramatto vraṇaṃ saṃrakṣet | [Su, Sū., 19 11.1]
sthānāsanaṃ caṅkramaṇaṃ divāsvapnaṃ tathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 19 12.1]
vraṇito na niṣeveta śaktimān api mānavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 12.2]
utthānādyāsanaṃ sthānaṃ śayyā cātiniṣevitā | [Su, Sū., 19 13.1]
prāpnuyānmārutādaṅge rujastasmād vivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 19 13.2]
gamyānāṃ ca strīṇāṃ saṃdarśanasaṃbhāṣaṇasaṃsparśanāni dūrataḥ pariharet | [Su, Sū., 19 14.1]
strīdarśanādibhiḥ śukraṃ kadācic calitaṃ sravet | [Su, Sū., 19 15.1]
grāmyadharmakṛtāndoṣān so 'saṃsarge 'pyavāpnuyāt | [Su, Sū., 19 15.2]
navadhānyamāṣatilakalāyakulatthaniṣpāvaharitakaśākāmlalavaṇakaṭukaguḍapiṣṭavikṛtivallūraśuṣkaśākājāvikānūpaudakamāṃsavasāśītodakakṛśarāpāyasadadhidugdhatakraprabhṛtīn pariharet | [Su, Sū., 19 16.1]
takrānto navadhānyādiryo 'yaṃ varga udāhṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 17.1]
doṣasaṃjanano hyeṣa vijñeyaḥ pūyavardhanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 17.2]
madyapaśca maireyāriṣṭāsavasīdhusurāvikārān pariharet | [Su, Sū., 19 18.1]
madyamamlaṃ tathā rūkṣaṃ tīkṣṇamuṣṇaṃ ca vīryataḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 19.1]
āśukāri ca tat pītaṃ kṣipraṃ vyāpādayed vraṇam | [Su, Sū., 19 19.2]
vātātaparajodhūmāvaśyāyātisevanātibhojanāniṣṭabhojanāśravaṇadarśanerṣyāmarṣabhayakrodhaśokadhyānarātrijāgaraṇaviṣamāśanaśayanopavāsavāgvyāyāmasthānacaṅkramaṇaśītavātaviruddhādhyaśanājīrṇamakṣikādyā bādhāḥ pariharet | [Su, Sū., 19 20.1]
vraṇinaḥ saṃprataptasya kāraṇair evamādibhiḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 21.1]
kṣīṇaśoṇitamāṃsasya bhuktaṃ samyaṅna jīryati | [Su, Sū., 19 21.2]
ajīrṇāt pavanādīnāṃ vibhramo balavān bhavet | [Su, Sū., 19 22.1]
tataḥ śopharujāsrāvadāhapākānavāpnuyāt | [Su, Sū., 19 22.2]
sadā nīcanakharomṇā śucinā śuklavāsasā śāntimaṅgaladevatābrāhmaṇagurupareṇa bhavitavyam iti | [Su, Sū., 19 23.1]
tat kasya hetoḥ hiṃsāvihārāṇi hi mahāvīryāṇi rakṣāṃsi paśupatikuberakumārānucarāṇi māṃsaśoṇitapriyatvāt kṣatajanimittaṃ vraṇinam upasarpanti satkārārthaṃ jighāṃsūni vā kadācit | [Su, Sū., 19 23.2]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 19 24.1]
teṣāṃ satkārakāmānāṃ prayatetāntarātmanā | [Su, Sū., 19 24.2]
dhūpabalyupahārāṃśca bhakṣyāṃścaivopahārayet | [Su, Sū., 19 24.3]
te tu saṃtarpitā ātmavantaṃ na hiṃsyuḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 25.1]
tasmāt satatamatandrito janaparivṛto nityaṃ dīpodakaśastrasragdāmapuṣpalājādyalaṃkṛte veśmani saṃpanmaṅgalamano'nukūlāḥ kathāḥ śṛṇvannāsīta | [Su, Sū., 19 25.2]
saṃpadādyanukūlābhiḥ kathābhiḥ prītamānasaḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 26.1]
āśāvān vyādhimokṣāya kṣipraṃ sukhamavāpnuyāt | [Su, Sū., 19 26.2]
ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvavedābhihitair aparaiścāśīrvidhānair upādhyāyā bhiṣajaśca saṃdhyayo rakṣāṃ kuryuḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 27.1]
sarṣapāriṣṭapatrābhyāṃ sarpiṣā lavaṇena ca | [Su, Sū., 19 28.1]
dvirahnaḥ kārayeddhūpaṃ daśarātramatandritaḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 28.2]
chattrām atichatrāṃ lāṅgūlīṃ jaṭilāṃ brahmacāriṇīṃ lakṣmīṃ guhāmatiguhāṃ vacāmativiṣāṃ śatavīryāṃ sahasravīryāṃ siddhārthakāṃśca śirasā dhārayet | [Su, Sū., 19 29.1]
vyajyeta bālavyajanair vraṇaṃ na ca vighaṭṭayet | [Su, Sū., 19 30.1]
na tudenna ca kaṇḍūyecchayānaḥ paripālayet | [Su, Sū., 19 30.2]
anena vidhinā yuktamādāveva niśācarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 31.1]
vanaṃ keśariṇākrāntaṃ varjayanti mṛgā iva | [Su, Sū., 19 31.2]
jīrṇaśālyodanaṃ snigdhamalpamuṣṇaṃ dravottaram | [Su, Sū., 19 32.1]
bhuñjāno jāṅgalair māṃsaiḥ śīghraṃ vraṇamapohati | [Su, Sū., 19 32.2]
taṇḍulīyakajīvantīsuniṣaṇṇakavāstukaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 33.1]
bālamūlakavārtākapaṭolaiḥ kāravellakaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 33.2]
sadāḍimaiḥ sāmalakair ghṛtabhṛṣṭaiḥ sasaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 34.1]
anyair evaṃguṇair vāpi mudgādīnāṃ rasena vā | [Su, Sū., 19 34.2]
saktūn vilepīṃ kulmāṣaṃ jalaṃ cāpi śṛtaṃ pibet | [Su, Sū., 19 35.1]
divā na nidrāvaśago nivātagṛhagocaraḥ | [Su, Sū., 19 35.2]
vraṇī vaidyavaśe tiṣṭhan śīghraṃ vraṇamapohati | [Su, Sū., 19 35.3]
vraṇe śvayathurāyāsāt sa ca rāgaśca jāgarāt | [Su, Sū., 19 36.1]
tau ca ruk ca divāsvāpāttāśca mṛtyuśca maithunāt | [Su, Sū., 19 36.2]
evaṃvṛttasamācāro vraṇī sampadyate sukhī | [Su, Sū., 19 37.1]
āyuśca dīrghamāpnoti dhanvantarivaco yathā | [Su, Sū., 19 37.2]
{Su, Sū., 20}
athāto hitāhitīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 2.1]
yadvāyoḥ pathyaṃ tat pittasyāpathyamityanena hetunā na kiṃciddravyamekāntena hitamahitaṃ vāstīti kecidācāryā bruvate | [Su, Sū., 20 3.1]
tattu na samyak | [Su, Sū., 20 3.2]
iha khalu yasmāddravyāṇi svabhāvataḥ saṃyogataścaikāntahitānyekāntāhitāni hitāhitāni ca bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 20 3.3]
tatra ekāntahitāni jātisātmyāt salilaghṛtadugdhaudanaprabhṛtīni ekāntāhitāni tu dahanapacanamāraṇādiṣu pravṛttānyagnikṣāraviṣādīni saṃyogādaparāṇi viṣatulyāni bhavanti hitāhitāni tu yadvāyoḥ pathyaṃ tatpittasyāpathyam iti | [Su, Sū., 20 4.1]
ataḥ sarvaprāṇināmayamāhārārthaṃ varga upadiśyate tadyathā raktaśaliṣaṣṭikakaṅgukamukundakapāṇḍukapītakapramodakakālakāsanapuṣpakakardamakaśakunāhṛtasugandhakakalamanīvārakodravoddālakaśyāmākagodhūmaveṇuyavādaya eṇahariṇakuraṅgamṛgamātṛkāśvadaṃṣṭrākarālakrakarakapotalāvatittirikapiñjalavartīravartikādīnāṃ māṃsāni mudgavanamudgamakuṣṭhakalāyamasūramaṅgalyacaṇakahareṇvāḍhakīsatīnāḥ cillivāstukasuniṣaṇṇakajīvantītaṇḍulīyakamaṇḍūkaparṇyaḥ gavyaṃ ghṛtaṃ saindhavadāḍimāmalakamityeṣa vargaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ sāmānyataḥ pathyatamaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 5.1]
tathā brahmacaryanivātaśayanoṣṇodakasnānaniśāsvapnavyāyāmāś caikāntataḥ pathyatamāḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 6.1]
ekāntahitānyekāntāhitāni ca prāgupadiṣṭāni hitāhitāni tu yadvāyoḥ pathyaṃ tatpittasyāpathyam iti | [Su, Sū., 20 7.1]
saṃyogatastvaparāṇi viṣatulyāni bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 20 8.1]
tadyathā vallīphalakavakakarīrāmlaphalalavaṇakulatthapiṇyākadadhitailavirohipiṣṭaśuṣkaśākājāvikamāṃsamadyajāmbavacilicimamatsyagodhāvarāhāṃś ca naikadhyamaśnīyāt payasā | [Su, Sū., 20 8.2]
rogaṃ sātmyaṃ ca deśaṃ ca kālaṃ dehaṃ ca buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 20 9.1]
avekṣyāgnyādikān bhāvān rogavṛtteḥ prayojayet | [Su, Sū., 20 9.2]
avasthāntarabāhulyādrogādīnāṃ vyavasthitam | [Su, Sū., 20 10.1]
dravyaṃ necchanti bhiṣaja icchanti svastharakṣaṇe | [Su, Sū., 20 10.2]
dvayor anyatarādāne vadanti viṣadugdhayoḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 11.1]
dugdhasyaikāntahitatāṃ viṣamekāntato 'hitam | [Su, Sū., 20 11.2]
evaṃ yuktaraseṣveṣu dravyeṣu salilādiṣu | [Su, Sū., 20 12.1]
ekāntahitatāṃ viddhi vatsa suśruta nānyathā | [Su, Sū., 20 12.2]
ato 'nyānyapi saṃyogādahitāni vakṣyāmaḥ navavirūḍhadhānyair vasāmadhupayoguḍamāṣair vā grāmyānūpaudakapiśitādīni nābhyavaharet na payomadhubhyāṃ rohiṇīśākaṃ jātukaśākaṃ vāśnīyāt balākāṃ vāruṇīkulmāṣābhyāṃ kākamācīṃ pippalīmaricābhyāṃ nāḍībhaṅgaśākakukkuṭadadhīni ca naikadhyaṃ madhu coṣṇodakānupānaṃ pittena cāmamāṃsāni surākṛśarāpāyasāṃś ca naikadhyaṃ sauvīrakeṇa saha tilaśaṣkulīṃ matsyaiḥ sahekṣuvikārān guḍena kākamācīṃ madhunā mūlakaṃ guḍena vārāhaṃ madhunā ca saha viruddhaṃ kṣīreṇa mūlakamāmrajāmbavaśvāvicchūkaragodhāśca sarvāṃś ca matsyān payasā viśeṣeṇa cilicimaṃ kadalīphalaṃ tālaphalena payasā dadhnā takreṇa vā lakucaphalaṃ payasā dadhnā māṣasūpena vā prāk payasaḥ payaso 'nte vā | [Su, Sū., 20 13.1]
ataḥ karmaviruddhān vakṣyāmaḥ kapotān sarṣapatailabhṛṣṭānnādyāt kapiñjalamayūralāvatittirigodhāś cairaṇḍadārvyagnisiddhā eraṇḍatailasiddhā vā nādyāt kāṃsyabhājane daśarātraparyuṣitaṃ sarpiḥ madhu coṣṇair uṣṇe vā matsyaparipacane śṛṅgaveraparipacane vā siddhāṃ kākamācīṃ tilakalkasiddhamupodikāśākaṃ nārikelena varāhavasāparibhṛṣṭāṃ balākāṃ bhāsam aṅgāraśūlyaṃ nāśnīyād iti | [Su, Sū., 20 14.1]
ato mānaviruddhān vakṣyāmaḥ madhvambunī madhusarpiṣī mānatastulye nāśnīyāt snehau madhusnehau jalasnehau vā viśeṣād āntarīkṣodakānupānau | [Su, Sū., 20 15.1]
ata ūrdhvaṃ rasadvandvāni rasato vīryato vipākataś ca viruddhāni vakṣyāmaḥ tatra madhurāmlau rasavīryaviruddhau madhuralavaṇau ca madhurakaṭukau ca sarvataḥ madhuratiktau rasavipākābhyāṃ madhurakaṣāyau ca amlalavaṇau rasataḥ amlakaṭukau rasavipākābhyām amlatiktāvamlakaṣāyau ca sarvataḥ lavaṇakaṭukau rasavipākābhyāṃ lavaṇatiktau lavaṇakaṣāyau ca sarvataḥ kaṭutiktau rasavīryābhyāṃ kaṭukaṣāyau ca tiktakaṣāyau rasataḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 16.1]
taratamayogayuktāṃś ca bhāvān atirūkṣān atisnigdhān atyuṣṇān atiśītān ityevamādīn vivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 20 17.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 20 18.1]
viruddhānyevamādīni vīryato yāni kāni ca | [Su, Sū., 20 18.2]
tānyekāntāhitānyeva śeṣaṃ vidyāddhitāhitam | [Su, Sū., 20 18.3]
vyādhimindriyadaurbalyaṃ maraṇaṃ cādhigacchati | [Su, Sū., 20 19.1]
viruddharasavīryāṇi bhuñjāno 'nātmavānnaraḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 19.2]
yatkiṃciddoṣamutkleśya bhuktaṃ kāyānna nirharet | [Su, Sū., 20 20.1]
rasādiṣvayathārthaṃ vā tadvikārāya kalpate | [Su, Sū., 20 20.2]
viruddhāśanajān rogān pratihanti virecanam | [Su, Sū., 20 21.1]
vamanaṃ śamanaṃ vāpi pūrvaṃ vā hitasevanam | [Su, Sū., 20 21.2]
sātmyato 'lpatayā vāpi dīptāgnestaruṇasya ca | [Su, Sū., 20 22.1]
snigdhavyāyāmabalināṃ viruddhaṃ vitathaṃ bhavet | [Su, Sū., 20 22.2]
atha vātaguṇān vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 23.1]
pūrvaḥ samadhuraḥ snigdho lavaṇaś caiva mārutaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 23.2]
gururvidāhajanano raktapittābhivardhanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 23.3]
kṣatānāṃ viṣajuṣṭānāṃ vraṇinaḥ śleṣmalāś ca ye | [Su, Sū., 20 24.1]
teṣām eva viśeṣeṇa sadā rogavivardhanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 24.2]
vātalānāṃ praśastaś ca śrāntānāṃ kaphaśoṣiṇām | [Su, Sū., 20 25.1]
teṣām eva viśeṣeṇa vraṇakledavivardhanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 25.2]
madhuraścāvidāhī ca kaṣāyānuraso laghuḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 26.1]
dakṣiṇo mārutaḥ śreṣṭhaścakṣuṣyo balavardhanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 26.2]
raktapittapraśamano na ca vātaprakopaṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 27.1]
viśado rūkṣaparuṣaḥ kharaḥ snehabalāpahaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 27.2]
paścimo mārutastīkṣṇaḥ kaphamedoviśoṣaṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 28.1]
sadyaḥ prāṇakṣayakaraḥ śoṣaṇastu śarīriṇām | [Su, Sū., 20 28.2]
uttaro mārutaḥ snigdho mṛdurmadhura eva ca | [Su, Sū., 20 29.1]
kaṣāyānurasaḥ śīto doṣāṇāṃ cāprakopaṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 29.2]
tasmācca prakṛtisthānāṃ kledano balavardhanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 30.1]
kṣīṇakṣayaviṣārtānāṃ viśeṣeṇa tu pūjitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 20 30.2]
{Su, Sū., 21}
athāto vraṇapraśnam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 2.1]
vātapittaśleṣmāṇa eva dehasambhavahetavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 3.1]
tair evāvyāpannair adhomadhyordhvasaṃniviṣṭaiḥ śarīramidaṃ dhāryate 'gāram iva sthūṇābhis tisṛbhir ataś ca tristhūṇamāhureke | [Su, Sū., 21 3.2]
ta eva ca vyāpannāḥ pralayahetavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 3.3]
tadebhir eva śoṇitacaturthaiḥ sambhavasthitipralayeṣvapy avirahitaṃ śarīraṃ bhavati | [Su, Sū., 21 3.4]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 21 4.1]
narte dehaḥ kaphādasti na pittānna ca mārutāt | [Su, Sū., 21 4.2]
śoṇitād api vā nityaṃ deha etaistu dhāryate | [Su, Sū., 21 4.3]
tatra vā gatigandhanayor iti dhātuḥ tapa saṃtāpe śliṣa āliṅgane eteṣāṃ kṛdvihitaiḥ pratyayair vātaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmeti ca rūpāṇi bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 21 5.1]
doṣasthānānyata ūrdhvaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ tatra samāsena vātaḥ śroṇigudasaṃśrayaḥ taduparyadho nābheḥ pakvāśayaḥ pakvāmāśayamadhyaṃ pittasya āmāśayaḥ śleṣmaṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 6.1]
ataḥ paraṃ pañcadhā vibhajyante | [Su, Sū., 21 7.1]
tatra vātasya vātavyādhau vakṣyāmaḥ pittasya yakṛtplīhānau hṛdayaṃ dṛṣṭis tvak pūrvoktaṃ ca śleṣmaṇastūraḥśiraḥkaṇṭhasaṃdhaya iti pūrvoktaṃ ca etāni khalu doṣāṇāṃ sthānānyavyāpannānām | [Su, Sū., 21 7.2]
visargādānavikṣepaiḥ somasūryānilā yathā | [Su, Sū., 21 8.1]
dhārayanti jagaddehaṃ kaphapittānilāstathā | [Su, Sū., 21 8.2]
tatra jijñāsyaṃ kiṃ pittavyatirekādanyo 'gniḥ āhosvit pittamevāgnir iti | [Su, Sū., 21 9.1]
atrocyate na khalu pittavyatirekādanyo 'gnirupalabhyate āgneyatvāt pitte dahanapacanādiṣvabhipravartamāneṣv agnivad upacāraḥ kriyate 'ntaragniriti kṣīṇe hy agniguṇe tatsamānadravyopayogādativṛddhe śītakriyopayogādāgamāc ca paśyāmo na khalu pittavyatirekādanyo 'gnir iti | [Su, Sū., 21 9.2]
taccādṛṣṭahetukena viśeṣeṇa pakvāmāśayamadhyasthaṃ pittaṃ caturvidhamannapānaṃ pacati vivecayati ca doṣarasamūtrapurīṣāṇi tatrastham eva cātmaśaktyā śeṣāṇāṃ pittasthānānāṃ śarīrasya cāgnikarmaṇānugrahaṃ karoti tasmin pitte pācako 'gniriti saṃjñā yattu yakṛtplīhnoḥ pittaṃ tasmin rañjako 'gniriti saṃjñā sa rasasya rāgakṛduktaḥ yat pittaṃ hṛdayasaṃsthaṃ tasmin sādhako 'gniriti saṃjñā so 'bhiprārthitamanorathasādhanakṛd uktaḥ yaddṛṣṭyāṃ pittaṃ tasminnālocako 'gniriti saṃjñā sa rūpagrahaṇādhikṛtaḥ yattu tvaci pittaṃ tasmin bhrājako 'gniriti saṃjñā so 'bhyaṅgapariṣekāvagāhāvalepanādīnāṃ kriyādravyāṇāṃ paktā chāyānāṃ ca prakāśakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 10.1]
pittaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ dravam pūti nīlaṃ pītaṃ tathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 21 11.1]
uṣṇaṃ kaṭurasaṃ caiva vidagdhaṃ cāmlam eva ca | [Su, Sū., 21 11.2]
ata ūrdhvaṃ śleṣmasthānānyanuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 12.1]
tatra āmāśayaḥ pittāśayasyopariṣṭāt tatpratyanīkatvād ūrdhvagatitvāt tejasaścandra iva ādityasya sa caturvidhasyāhārasyādhāraḥ sa ca tatraudakair guṇair āhāraḥ praklinno bhinnasaṃghātaḥ sukhajaraś ca bhavati | [Su, Sū., 21 12.2]
mādhuryāt picchilatvāc ca prakleditvāttathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 21 13.1]
āmāśaye sambhavati śleṣmā madhuraśītalaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 13.2]
sa tatrastha eva svaśaktyā śeṣāṇāṃ śleṣmasthānānāṃ śarīrasya codakakarmaṇānugrahaṃ karoti uraḥsthas trikasaṃdhāraṇam ātmavīryeṇānnarasasahitena hṛdayāvalambanaṃ karoti jihvāmūlakaṇṭhastho jihvendriyasya saumyatvāt samyagrasajñāne vartate śiraḥsthaḥ snehasaṃtarpaṇādhikṛtatvād indriyāṇām ātmavīryeṇānugrahaṃ karoti saṃdhisthastu śleṣmā sarvasaṃdhisaṃśleṣāt sarvasaṃdhyanugrahaṃ karoti | [Su, Sū., 21 14.1]
śleṣmā śveto guruḥ snigdhaḥ picchilaḥ śīta eva ca | [Su, Sū., 21 15.1]
madhurastvavidagdhaḥ syādvidagdho lavaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 15.2]
śoṇitasya sthānaṃ yakṛtplīhānau tac ca prāgabhihitaṃ tatrastham eva śeṣāṇāṃ śoṇitasthānānāmanugrahaṃ karoti | [Su, Sū., 21 16.1]
anuṣṇaśītaṃ madhuraṃ snigdhaṃ raktaṃ ca varṇataḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 17.1]
śoṇitaṃ guru visraṃ syādvidāhaścāsya pittavat | [Su, Sū., 21 17.2]
etāni khalu doṣasthānāni eṣu saṃcīyante doṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 18.1]
prāk saṃcayaheturuktaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 18.2]
tatra saṃcitānāṃ khalu doṣāṇāṃ stabdhapūrṇakoṣṭhatā pītāvabhāsatā mandoṣmatā cāṅgānāṃ gauravamālasyaṃ cayakāraṇavidveṣaś ceti liṅgāni bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 21 18.3]
tatra prathamaḥ kriyākālaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 18.4]
ata ūrdhvaṃ prakopaṇāni vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 19.1]
tatra balavadvigrahātivyāyāmavyavāyādhyayanaprapatanapradhāvanaprapīḍanābhighātalaṅghanaplavanataraṇarātrijāgaraṇabhāraharaṇagajaturagarathapadāticaryākaṭukaṣāyatiktarūkṣalaghuśītavīryaśuṣkaśākavallūravarakoddālakakor adūṣaśyāmākanīvāramudgamasūrāḍhakīhareṇukalāyaniṣpāvānaśanaviṣamāśanādhyaśanavātamūtrapurīṣaśukracchardikṣavathūdgārabāṣpavegavighātādibhir viśeṣair vāyuḥ prakopamāpadyate | [Su, Sū., 21 19.2]
sa śītābhrapravāteṣu gharmānte ca viśeṣataḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 20.1]
pratyūṣasy aparāhṇe tu jīrṇe 'nne ca prakupyati | [Su, Sū., 21 20.2]
krodhaśokabhayāyāsopavāsavidagdhamaithunopagamanakaṭvamlalavaṇatīkṣṇoṣṇalaghuvidāhitilatailapiṇyākakulatthasarṣapātasīharitakaśākagodhāmatsyājāvikamāṃsadadhitakrakūrcikāmastusauvīrakasurāvikārāmlaphalakaṭvaraprabhṛtibhiḥ pittaṃ prakopamāpadyate | [Su, Sū., 21 21.1]
taduṣṇair uṣṇakāle ca ghanānte ca viśeṣataḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 22.1]
madhyāhne cārdharātre ca jīryatyanne ca kupyati | [Su, Sū., 21 22.2]
divāsvapnāvyāyāmālasyamadhurāmlalavaṇaśītasnigdhagurupicchilābhiṣyandihāyanakayavakanaiṣadhetkaṭamāṣamahāmāṣagodhūmatilapiṣṭavikṛtidadhidugdhakṛśarāpāyasekṣuvikārānūpaudakamāṃsavasābisamṛṇālakaserukaśṛṅgāṭakamadhuravallīphalasamaśanādhyaśanaprabhṛtibhiḥ śleṣmā prakopamāpadyate | [Su, Sū., 21 23.1]
sa śītaiḥ śītakāle ca vasante ca viśeṣataḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 24.1]
pūrvāhṇe ca pradoṣe ca bhuktamātre prakupyati | [Su, Sū., 21 24.2]
pittaprakopaṇair eva cābhīkṣṇaṃ dravasnigdhagurubhir āhārair divāsvapnakrodhānalātapaśramābhighātājīrṇaviruddhādhyaśanādibhir viśeṣair asṛk prakopamāpadyate | [Su, Sū., 21 25.1]
yasmādraktaṃ vinā doṣair na kadācit prakupyati | [Su, Sū., 21 26.1]
tasmāt tasya yathādoṣaṃ kālaṃ vidyāt prakopaṇe | [Su, Sū., 21 26.2]
teṣāṃ prakopāt koṣṭhatodasaṃcaraṇāmlikāpipāsāparidāhānnadveṣahṛdayotkledāś ca jāyante | [Su, Sū., 21 27.1]
tatra dvitīyaḥ kriyākālaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 27.2]
ata ūrdhvaṃ prasaraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ teṣāmebhir ātaṅkaviśeṣaiḥ prakupitānāṃ kiṇvodakapiṣṭasamavāya ivodriktānāṃ prasaro bhavati | [Su, Sū., 21 28.1]
teṣāṃ vāyurgatimattvāt prasaraṇahetuḥ satyapyacaitanye | [Su, Sū., 21 28.2]
sa hi rajobhūyiṣṭhaḥ rajaś ca pravartakaṃ sarvabhāvānām | [Su, Sū., 21 28.3]
yathā mahānudakasaṃcayo 'tivṛddhaḥ setum avadāryāpareṇodakena vyāmiśraḥ sarvataḥ pradhāvati evaṃ doṣāḥ kadācidekaśo dviśaḥ samastāḥ śoṇitasahitā vānekadhā prasaranti | [Su, Sū., 21 28.4]
tadyathā vātaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā śoṇitaṃ vātapitte vātaśleṣmāṇau pittaśleṣmāṇau vātaśoṇite pittaśoṇite śleṣmaśoṇite vātapittaśoṇitāni vātaśleṣmaśoṇitāni pittaśleṣmaśoṇitāni vātapittakaphāḥ vātapittakaphaśoṇitāni ity evaṃ pañcadaśadhā prasaranti | [Su, Sū., 21 28.5]
kṛtsne 'rdhe 'vayave vāpi yatrāṅge kupito bhṛśam | [Su, Sū., 21 29.1]
doṣo vikāraṃ nabhasi meghavattatra varṣati | [Su, Sū., 21 29.2]
nātyarthaṃ kupitaś cāpi līno mārgeṣu tiṣṭhati | [Su, Sū., 21 30.1]
niṣpratyanīkaḥ kālena hetumāsādya kupyati | [Su, Sū., 21 30.2]
tatra vāyoḥ pittasthānagatasya pittavat pratīkāraḥ pittasya ca kaphasthānagatasya kaphavat kaphasya ca vātasthānagatasya vātavat eṣa kriyāvibhāgaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 31.1]
evaṃ prakupitānāṃ prasaratāṃ ca vāyor vimārgagamanāṭopau oṣacoṣaparidāhadhūmāyanāni pittasya arocakāvipākāṅgasādāśchardiś ceti śleṣmaṇo liṅgāni bhavanti tatra tṛtīyaḥ kriyākālaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 32.1]
ata ūrdhvaṃ sthānasaṃśrayaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 33.1]
evaṃ prakupitāḥ tāṃstān śarīrapradeśānāgamya tāṃstān vyādhīn janayanti | [Su, Sū., 21 33.2]
te yadodarasaṃniveśaṃ kurvanti tadā gulmavidradhyudarāgnisaṅgānāhaviṣūcikātisāraprabhṛtīn janayanti vastigatāḥ pramehāśmarīmūtrāghātamūtradoṣaprabhṛtīn vṛṣaṇagatā vṛddhīḥ meḍhragatā niruddhaprakaśopadaṃśaśūkadoṣaprabhṛtīn gudagatā bhagaṃdarārśaḥprabhṛtīn ūrdhvajatrugatās tūrdhvajān tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitasthāḥ kṣudrarogān kuṣṭhāni visarpāṃś ca medogatā granthyapacyarbudagalagaṇḍālajīprabhṛtīn asthigatā vidradhyanuśayīprabhṛtīn pādagatāḥ ślīpadavātaśoṇitavātakaṇṭakaprabhṛtīn sarvāṅgagatā jvarasarvāṅgarogaprabhṛtīn teṣāmevamabhiniviṣṭānāṃ pūrvarūpaprādurbhāvaḥ taṃ pratirogaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 33.3]
tatra pūrvarūpagateṣu caturthaḥ kriyākālaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 33.4]
ata ūrdhvaṃ vyādherdarśanaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ śophārbudagranthividradhivisarpaprabhṛtīnāṃ pravyaktalakṣaṇatā jvarātīsāraprabhṛtīnāṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 21 34.1]
tatra pañcamaḥ kriyākālaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 34.2]
ata ūrdhvam eteṣāmavadīrṇānāṃ vraṇabhāvam āpannānāṃ ṣaṣṭhaḥ kriyākālaḥ jvarātisāraprabhṛtīnāṃ ca dīrghakālānubandhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 35.1]
tatrāpratikriyamāṇe 'sādhyatām upayānti | [Su, Sū., 21 35.2]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 21 36.1]
saṃcayaṃ ca prakopaṃ ca prasaraṃ sthānasaṃśrayam | [Su, Sū., 21 36.2]
vyaktiṃ bhedaṃ ca yo vetti doṣāṇāṃ sa bhavedbhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 21 36.3]
saṃcaye 'pahṛtā doṣā labhante nottarā gatīḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 37.1]
te tūttarāsu gatiṣu bhavanti balavattarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 37.2]
sarvair bhāvais tribhir vāpi dvābhyāmekena vā punaḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 38.1]
saṃsarge kupitaḥ kruddhaṃ doṣaṃ doṣo 'nudhāvati | [Su, Sū., 21 38.2]
saṃsarge yo garīyān syādupakramyaḥ sa vai bhavet | [Su, Sū., 21 39.1]
śeṣadoṣāvirodhena saṃnipāte tathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 21 39.2]
vṛṇoti yasmāt rūḍhe 'pi vraṇavastu na naśyati | [Su, Sū., 21 40.1]
ā dehadhāraṇāt tasmād vraṇa ityucyate budhaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 21 40.2]
{Su, Sū., 22}
athāto vraṇāsrāvavijñānīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 2.1]
tvaṅmāṃsasirāsnāyvasthisaṃdhikoṣṭhamarmāṇītyaṣṭau vraṇavastūni | [Su, Sū., 22 3.1]
atra sarvavraṇasaṃniveśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 3.2]
tatra ādyaikavastusaṃniveśī tvagbhedī vraṇaḥ sūpacaraḥ śeṣāḥ svayam avadīryamāṇā durupacārāḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 4.1]
tatrāyataścaturasro vṛttastripuṭaka iti vraṇākṛtisamāsaḥ śeṣāstu vikṛtākṛtayo durupakramā bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 22 5.1]
sarva eva vraṇāḥ kṣipraṃ saṃrohantyātmavatāṃ subhiṣagbhiś copakrāntāḥ anātmavatāmajñaiścopakrāntāḥ praduṣyanti pravṛddhatvāc ca doṣāṇām | [Su, Sū., 22 6.1]
tatrātisaṃvṛto 'tivivṛto 'tikaṭhino 'timṛdur utsanno 'vasanno 'tiśīto 'tyuṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇaraktapītaśuklādīnāṃ varṇānāmanyatamavarṇo bhairavaḥ pūtipūyamāṃsasirāsnāyuprabhṛtibhiḥ pūrṇaḥ pūtipūyāsrāvyunmārgyutsaṅgyamanojñadarśanagandho 'tyarthaṃ vedanāvān dāhapākarāgakaṇḍūśophapiḍakopadruto 'tyarthaṃ duṣṭaśoṇitāsrāvī dīrghakālānubandhī ceti duṣṭavraṇaliṅgāni | [Su, Sū., 22 7.1]
tasya doṣocchrāyeṇa ṣaṭtvaṃ vibhajya yathāsvaṃ pratīkāre prayateta | [Su, Sū., 22 7.2]
ata ūrdhvaṃ sarvasrāvān vakṣyāmaḥ tatra ghṛṣṭāsu chinnāsu vā tvakṣu sphoṭe bhinne vidārite vā salilaprakāśo bhavatyāsrāvaḥ kiṃcidvisraḥ pītāvabhāsaś ca māṃsagataḥ sadyaśchinnāsu sirāsu raktātipravṛttiḥ pakvāsu ca toyanāḍībhir iva toyāgamanaṃ pūyasya āsrāvaś cātra tanurvicchinnaḥ picchilo 'valambī śyāvo 'vaśyāyapratimaś ca snāyugataḥ snigdho ghanaḥ siṅghāṇakapratimaḥ saraktaś ca asthigato 'sthanyabhihate sphuṭite bhinne doṣāvadārite vā doṣabhakṣitatvādasthi niḥsāraṃ śuktidhautam ivābhāti āsrāvaś cātra majjamiśraḥ sarudhiraḥ snigdhaśca saṃdhigataḥ pīḍyamāno na pravartate ākuñcanaprasāraṇonnamanavinamanapradhāvanotkāsanapravāhaṇaiś ca sravati āsrāvaś cātra picchilo 'valambī saphenapūyarudhironmathitaś ca koṣṭhagato 'sṛṅmūtrapurīṣapūyodakāni sravati marmagatastvagādiṣvavaruddhatvānnocyate | [Su, Sū., 22 8.1]
tatra tvagādigatānāmāsrāvāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ pāruṣyaśyāvāvaśyāyadadhimastukṣārodakamāṃsadhāvanapulākodakasaṃnibhatvāni mārutādbhavanti pittād gomedagomūtrabhasmaśaṅkhakaṣāyodakamādhvīkatailasaṃnibhatvāni pittavadraktād ativisratvaṃ ca kaphān navanītakāsīsamajjapiṣṭatilanārikelodakavarāhavasāsaṃnibhatvāni saṃnipātān nārikelodakairvārukarasakāñjikaprasādārukodakapriyaṅguphalayakṛnmudgayūṣasavarṇatvānīti | [Su, Sū., 22 8.2]
ślokau cātra bhavataḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 9.1]
pakvāśayādasādhyastu pulākodakasaṃnibhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 9.2]
kṣārodakanibhaḥ srāvo varjyo raktāśayātsravan | [Su, Sū., 22 9.3]
āmāśayāt kalāyāmbhonibhaś ca trikasaṃdhijaḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 10.1]
srāvānetān parīkṣyādau tataḥ karmācaredbhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 22 10.2]
ata ūrdhvaṃ sarvavraṇavedanā vakṣyāmaḥ todanabhedanatāḍanacchedanāyamanamanthanavikṣepaṇacumucumāyananirdahanāvabhañjanasphoṭanavidāraṇotpāṭanakampanavividhaśūlaviśleṣaṇavikiraṇapūraṇastambhanasvapnākuñcanāṅkuśikāḥ sambhavanti animittavividhavedanāprādurbhāvo vā muhurmuhuryatrāgacchanti vedanāviśeṣāstaṃ vātikamiti vidyāt oṣacoṣaparidāhadhūmāyanāni yatra gātram aṅgārāvakīrṇam iva pacyate yatra coṣmābhivṛddhiḥ kṣate kṣārāvasiktavac ca vedanāviśeṣāstaṃ paittikamiti vidyāt pittavadraktasamutthaṃ jānīyāt kaṇḍūrgurutvaṃ suptatvam upadeho 'lpavedanatvaṃ stambhaḥ śaityaṃ ca yatra taṃ ślaiṣmikamiti vidyāt yatra sarvāsāṃ vedanānāmutpattistaṃ sāṃnipātikamiti vidyāt | [Su, Sū., 22 11]
ata ūrdhvaṃ vraṇavarṇān vakṣyāmaḥ bhasmakapotāsthivarṇaḥ paruṣo 'ruṇaḥ kṛṣṇa iti mārutajasya nīlaḥ pīto haritaḥ śyāvaḥ kṛṣṇo raktaḥ kapilaḥ piṅgala iti raktapittasamutthayoḥ śvetaḥ snigdhaḥ pāṇḍuriti śleṣmajasya sarvavarṇopetaḥ sāṃnipātika iti | [Su, Sū., 22 12.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 22 13.1]
na kevalaṃ vraṇeṣūkto vedanāvarṇasaṃgrahaḥ | [Su, Sū., 22 13.2]
sarvaśophavikāreṣu vraṇavallakṣayedbhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 22 13.3]
{Su, Sū., 23}
athātaḥ kṛtyākṛtyavidhimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 2.1]
tatra vayaḥsthānāṃ dṛḍhānāṃ prāṇavatāṃ sattvavatāṃ ca sucikitsyā vraṇāḥ ekasmin vā puruṣe yatraitadguṇacatuṣṭayaṃ tasya sukhasādhanīyatamāḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 3.1]
tatra vayaḥsthānāṃ pratyagradhātutvādāśu vraṇā rohanti dṛḍhānāṃ sthirabahumāṃsatvācchastramavacāryamāṇaṃ sirāsnāyvādiviśeṣānna prāpnoti prāṇavatāṃ vedanābhighātāhārayantraṇādibhir na glānirutpadyate sattvavatāṃ dāruṇair api kriyāviśeṣair na vyathā bhavati tasmād eteṣāṃ sukhasādhanīyatamāḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 3.2]
ta eva viparītaguṇā vṛddhakṛśālpaprāṇabhīruṣu draṣṭavyāḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 4.1]
sphikpāyuprajananalalāṭagaṇḍauṣṭhapṛṣṭhakarṇaphalakośodarajatrumukhābhyantarasaṃsthāḥ sukharopaṇīyā vraṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 5.1]
akṣidantanāsāpāṅgaśrotranābhijaṭharasevanīnitambapārśvakukṣivakṣaḥkakṣāstanasaṃdhibhāgagatāḥ saphenapūyaraktānilavāhino 'ntaḥśalyāś ca duścikitsyāḥ adhobhāgāś cordhvabhāganirvāhiṇo romāntopanakhamarmajaṅghāsthisaṃśritāś ca bhagandaram api cāntarmukhaṃ sevanīkuṭakāsthisaṃśritam | [Su, Sū., 23 6.1]
kuṣṭhināṃ viṣajuṣṭānāṃ śoṣiṇāṃ madhumehinām | [Su, Sū., 23 7.1]
vraṇāḥ kṛcchreṇa sidhyanti yeṣāṃ cāpi vraṇe vraṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 7.2]
avapāṭikāniruddhaprakaśasaṃniruddhagudajaṭharagranthikṣatakrimayaḥ pratiśyāyajāḥ koṣṭhajāś ca tvagdoṣiṇāṃ pramehiṇāṃ vā ye parikṣateṣu dṛśyante śarkarā sikatāmeho vātakuṇḍalikāṣṭhīlā dantaśarkaropakuśaḥ kaṇṭhaśālūkaṃ niṣkoṣaṇadūṣitāś ca dantaveṣṭā visarpāsthikṣatoraḥkṣatavraṇagranthiprabhṛtayaś ca yāpyāḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 8.1]
sādhyā yāpyatvamāyānti yāpyāścāsādhyatāṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 23 9.1]
ghnanti prāṇānasādhyāstu narāṇāmakriyāvatām | [Su, Sū., 23 9.2]
yāpanīyaṃ vijānīyāt kriyā dhārayate tu yam | [Su, Sū., 23 10.1]
kriyāyāṃ tu nivṛttāyāṃ sadya eva vinaśyati | [Su, Sū., 23 10.2]
prāptā kriyā dhārayati yāpyavyādhitam āturam | [Su, Sū., 23 11.1]
prapatiṣyadivāgāraṃ viṣkambhaḥ sādhuyojitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 11.2]
ata ūrdhvamasādhyān vakṣyāmaḥ māṃsapiṇḍavadudgatāḥ prasekino 'ntaḥpūyavedanāvanto 'śvāpānavad udvṛttauṣṭhāḥ kecit kaṭhinā gośṛṅgavad unnatamṛdumāṃsaprarohāḥ apare duṣṭarudhirāsrāviṇas tanuśītapicchilasrāviṇo vā madhyonnatāḥ kecidavasannaśuṣiraparyantāḥ śaṇatūlavat snāyujālavanto durdarśanāḥ vasāmedomajjamastuluṅgasrāviṇaś ca doṣasamutthāḥ pītāsitamūtrapurīṣavātavāhinaś ca koṣṭhasthāḥ ta evobhayatobhāgavraṇamukheṣu pūyaraktanirvāhiṇaḥ kṣīṇamāṃsānāṃ ca sarvatogatayaścāṇumukhā māṃsabudbudavantaḥ saśabdavātavāhinaś ca śiraḥkaṇṭhasthāḥ kṣīṇamāṃsānāṃ ca pūyaraktanirvāhiṇo 'rocakāvipākakāsaśvāsopadravayuktāḥ bhinne vā śiraḥkapāle yatra mastuluṅgadarśanaṃ tridoṣaliṅgaprādurbhāvaḥ kāsaśvāsau vā yasyeti | [Su, Sū., 23 12.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 23 13.1]
vasāṃ medo 'tha majjānaṃ mastuluṅgaṃ ca yaḥ sravet | [Su, Sū., 23 13.2]
āgantustu vraṇaḥ sidhyenna sidhyeddoṣasaṃbhavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 13.3]
amarmopahite deśe sirāsandhyasthivarjite | [Su, Sū., 23 14.1]
vikāro yo 'nuparyeti tadasādhyasya lakṣaṇam | [Su, Sū., 23 14.2]
krameṇopacayaṃ prāpya dhātūnanugataḥ śanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 15.1]
na śakya unmūlayituṃ vṛddho vṛkṣa ivāmayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 15.2]
sa sthiratvānmahattvāc ca dhātvanukramaṇena ca | [Su, Sū., 23 16.1]
nihantyauṣadhavīryāṇi mantrān duṣṭagraho yathā | [Su, Sū., 23 16.2]
ato yo viparītaḥ syāt sukhasādhyaḥ sa ucyate | [Su, Sū., 23 17.1]
abaddhamūlaḥ kṣupako yadvadutpāṭane sukhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 17.2]
tribhir doṣair anākrāntaḥ śyāvauṣṭhaḥ piḍakī samaḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 18.1]
avedano nirāsrāvo vraṇaḥ śuddha ihocyate | [Su, Sū., 23 18.2]
kapotavarṇapratimā yasyāntāḥ kledavarjitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 19.1]
sthirāścipiṭikāvanto rohatīti tamādiśet | [Su, Sū., 23 19.2]
rūḍhavartmānam agranthim aśūnam arujaṃ vraṇam | [Su, Sū., 23 20.1]
tvaksavarṇaṃ samatalaṃ samyagrūḍhaṃ vinirdiśet | [Su, Sū., 23 20.2]
doṣaprakopādvyāyāmādabhighātādajīrṇataḥ | [Su, Sū., 23 21.1]
harṣāt krodhādbhayādvāpi vraṇo rūḍho 'pi dīryate | [Su, Sū., 23 21.2]
{Su, Sū., 24}
athāto vyādhisamuddeśīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 2.1]
dvividhāstu vyādhayaḥ śastrasādhyāḥ snehādikriyāsādhyāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 3.1]
tatra śastrasādhyeṣu snehādikriyā na pratiṣidhyate snehādikriyāsādhyeṣu śastrakarma na kriyate | [Su, Sū., 24 3.2]
asmin punaḥ śāstre sarvatantrasāmānyāt sarveṣāṃ vyādhīnāṃ yathāsthūlamavarodhaḥ kriyate | [Su, Sū., 24 4.1]
prāgabhihitaṃ tadduḥkhasaṃyogā vyādhaya iti | [Su, Sū., 24 4.2]
tacca duḥkhaṃ trividham ādhyātmikam ādhibhautikam ādhidaivikam iti | [Su, Sū., 24 4.3]
tattu saptavidhe vyādhāvupanipatati | [Su, Sū., 24 4.4]
te punaḥ saptavidhā vyādhayaḥ tadyathā ādibalapravṛttāḥ janmabalapravṛttāḥ doṣabalapravṛttāḥ saṃghātabalapravṛttāḥ kālabalapravṛttāḥ daivabalapravṛttāḥ svabhāvabalapravṛttā iti | [Su, Sū., 24 4.5]
tatrādibalapravṛttā ye śukraśoṇitadoṣānvayāḥ kuṣṭhārśaḥprabhṛtayaḥ te 'pi dvividhāḥ mātṛjāḥ pitṛjāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 5.1]
janmabalapravṛttā ye māturapacārāt paṅgujātyandhabadhiramūkaminminavāmanaprabhṛtayo jāyante te 'pi dvividhā rasakṛtāḥ dauhṛdāpacārakṛtāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 5.2]
doṣabalapravṛttā ya ātaṅkasamutpannā mithyāhārācārakṛtāś ca te 'pi dvividhāḥ āmāśayasamutthāḥ pakvāśayasamutthāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 5.3]
punaś ca dvividhāḥ śārīrā mānasāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 5.4]
ta ete ādhyātmikāḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 5.5]
saṃghātabalapravṛttā ya āgantavo durbalasya balavadvigrahāt te 'pi dvividhāḥ śastrakṛtā vyālakṛtāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 6.1]
ete ādhibhautikāḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 6.2]
kālabalapravṛttā ye śītoṣṇavātavarṣāprabhṛtinimittāḥ te 'pi dvividhāḥ vyāpannartukṛtā avyāpannartukṛtāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 7.1]
daivabalapravṛttā ye devadrohādabhiśastakā atharvaṇakṛtā upasargajāś ca te 'pi dvividhāḥ vidyudaśanikṛtāḥ piśācādikṛtāś ca punaś ca dvividhāḥ saṃsargajā ākasmikāś ca | [Su, Sū., 24 7.2]
svabhāvabalapravṛttā ye kṣutpipāsājarāmṛtyunidrāprabhṛtayaḥ te 'pi dvividhāḥ kālakṛtā akālakṛtāś ca tatra parirakṣaṇakṛtāḥ kālakṛtāḥ aparirakṣaṇakṛtā akālakṛtāḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 7.3]
ete ādhidaivikāḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 7.4]
atra sarvavyādhyavarodhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 7.5]
sarveṣāṃ ca vyādhīnāṃ vātapittaśleṣmāṇa eva mūlaṃ talliṅgatvād dṛṣṭaphalatvād āgamācca | [Su, Sū., 24 8.1]
yathā hi kṛtsnaṃ vikārajātaṃ viśvarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi na vyatiricyante evam eva kṛtsnaṃ vikārajātaṃ viśvarūpeṇāvasthitam avyatiricya vātapittaśleṣmāṇo vartante | [Su, Sū., 24 8.2]
doṣadhātumalasaṃsargād āyatanaviśeṣānnimittataś caiṣāṃ vikalpaḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 8.3]
doṣadūṣiteṣvatyarthaṃ dhātuṣu saṃjñā rasajo 'yaṃ śoṇitajo 'yaṃ māṃsajo 'yaṃ medojo 'yam asthijo 'yaṃ majjajo 'yaṃ śukrajo 'yam vyādhir iti | [Su, Sū., 24 8.4]
tatra annāśraddhārocakāvipākāṅgamardajvarahṛllāsatṛptigauravahṛtpāṇḍurogamārgoparodhakārśyavairasyāṅgasādākālavalipalitadarśanaprabhṛtayo rasadoṣajā vikārāḥ kuṣṭhavisarpapiḍakāmaśakanīlikātilakālakanyacchavyaṅgendraluptaplīhavidradhigulmavātaśoṇitārśo'rbudāṅgamardāsṛgdararaktapittaprabhṛtayo raktadoṣajāḥ gudamukhameḍhrapākāśca adhimāṃsārbudārśo 'dhijihvopajihvopakuśagalaśuṇḍikālajīmāṃsasaṃghātauṣṭhaprakopagalagaṇḍagaṇḍamālāprabhṛtayo māṃsadoṣajāḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 9.1]
granthivṛddhigalagaṇḍārbudamedojauṣṭhaprakopamadhumehātisthaulyātisvedaprabhṛtayo 'sthidoṣajāḥ tamodarśanamūrchābhramaparvasthūlamūlārurjanmanetrābhiṣyandaprabhṛtayo majjadoṣajāḥ klaibyāpraharṣaśukrāśmarīśukramehaśukradoṣādayaś ca taddoṣāḥ tvagdoṣāḥ saṅgo 'tipravṛttirayathāpravṛttirvā malāyatanadoṣāḥ indriyāṇām apravṛttir ayathāpravṛttir vendriyāyatanadoṣāḥ ity eṣa samāsa uktaḥ vistaraṃ nimittāni caiṣāṃ pratirogaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 24 9.2]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 24 10.1]
kupitānāṃ hi doṣāṇāṃ śarīre paridhāvatām | [Su, Sū., 24 10.2]
yatra saṅgaḥ khavaiguṇyādvyādhistatropajāyate | [Su, Sū., 24 10.3]
bhūyo 'tra jijñāsyaṃ kiṃ vātādīnāṃ jvarādīnāṃ ca nityaḥ saṃśleṣaḥ paricchedo vā iti yadi nityaḥ saṃśleṣaḥ syāttarhi nityāturāḥ sarva eva prāṇinaḥ syuḥ athāpyanyathā vātādīnāṃ jvarādīnāṃ cānyatra vartamānānāmanyatra liṅgaṃ na bhavatīti kṛtvā yaducyate vātādayo jvarādīnāṃ mūlānīti tanna | [Su, Sū., 24 11.1]
atrocyate doṣān pratyākhyāya jvarādayo na bhavanti atha ca na nityaḥ sambandhaḥ yathāhi vidyudvātāśanivarṣāṇyākāśaṃ pratyākhyāya na bhavanti satyapyākāśe kadācin na bhavanti atha ca nimittatastata evotpattiriti taraṃgabudbudādayaś codakaviśeṣāḥ eva vātādīnāṃ jvarādīnāṃ ca nāpyevam saṃśleṣo na paricchedaḥ śāśvatikaḥ atha ca nimittata evotpattir iti | [Su, Sū., 24 11.2]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 24 12.1]
vikāraparimāṇaṃ ca saṃkhyā caiṣāṃ pṛthak pṛthak | [Su, Sū., 24 12.2]
vistareṇottare tantre sarvābādhāś ca vakṣyate | [Su, Sū., 24 12.3]
{Su, Sū., 25}
athāto 'ṣṭavidhaśastrakarmīyam adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 2.1]
chedyā bhagandarā granthiḥ ślaiṣmikastilakālakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 3.1]
vraṇavartmārbudānyarśaścarmakīlo 'sthimāṃsagam | [Su, Sū., 25 3.2]
śalyaṃ jatumaṇirmāṃsasaṃghāto galaśuṇḍikā | [Su, Sū., 25 4.1]
snāyumāṃsasirākotho valmīkaṃ śataponakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 4.2]
adhruṣaścopadaṃśāś ca māṃsakandyadhimāṃsakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 5.1]
bhedyā vidradhayo 'nyatra sarvajād granthayastrayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 5.2]
ādito ye visarpāś ca vṛddhayaḥ savidārikāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 6.1]
pramehapiḍakāśophastanarogāvamanthakāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 6.2]
kumbhīkānuśayī nāḍyo vṛndau puṣkarikālajī | [Su, Sū., 25 7.1]
prāyaśaḥ kṣudrarogāś ca puppuṭau tāludantajau | [Su, Sū., 25 7.2]
tuṇḍikerī gilāyuś ca pūrvaṃ ye ca prapākiṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 8.1]
vastistathāśmarīhetor medojā ye ca kecana | [Su, Sū., 25 8.2]
lekhyāścatasro rohiṇyaḥ kilāsam upajihvikā | [Su, Sū., 25 9.1]
medojo dantavaidarbho granthirvartmādhijihvikā | [Su, Sū., 25 9.2]
arśāṃsi maṇḍalaṃ māṃsakandī māṃsonnatistathā | [Su, Sū., 25 10.1]
vedhyāḥ sirā bahuvidhā mūtravṛddhirdakodaram | [Su, Sū., 25 10.2]
eṣyā nāḍyaḥ saśalyāś ca vraṇā unmārgiṇaś ca | [Su, Sū., 25 11.1]
āhāryāḥ śarkarāstisro dantakarṇamalo 'śmarī | [Su, Sū., 25 11.2]
śalyāni mūḍhagarbhāś ca varcaś ca nicitaṃ gude | [Su, Sū., 25 12.1]
srāvyā vidradhayaḥ pañca bhaveyuḥ sarvajādṛte | [Su, Sū., 25 12.2]
kuṣṭhāni vāyuḥ sarujaḥ śopho yaścaikadeśajaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 13.1]
pālyāmayāḥ ślīpadāni viṣajuṣṭaṃ ca śoṇitam | [Su, Sū., 25 13.2]
arbudāni visarpāś ca granthayaścāditastu ye | [Su, Sū., 25 14.1]
trayastrayaścopadaṃśāḥ stanarogā vidārikā | [Su, Sū., 25 14.2]
suṣiro galaśālūkaṃ kaṇṭakāḥ kṛmidantakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 15.1]
dentaveṣṭaḥ sopakuśaḥ śītādo dantapuppuṭaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 15.2]
pittāsṛkkaphajāś cauṣṭhyāḥ kṣudrarogāś ca bhūyaśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 16.1]
sīvyā medaḥsamutthāś ca bhinnāḥ sulikhitā gadāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 16.2]
sadyovraṇāś ca ye caiva calasandhivyapāśritāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 17.1]
na kṣārāgniviṣair juṣṭā na ca mārutavāhinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 17.2]
nāntarlohitaśalyāś ca teṣu samyagviśodhanam | [Su, Sū., 25 18.1]
pāṃśuromanakhādīni calamasthi bhavecca yat | [Su, Sū., 25 18.2]
ahṛtāni yato 'mūni pācayeyurbhṛśaṃ vraṇam | [Su, Sū., 25 19.1]
rujaś ca vividhāḥ kuryustasmād etān viśodhayet | [Su, Sū., 25 19.2]
tato vraṇaṃ samunnamya sthāpayitvā yathāsthitam | [Su, Sū., 25 20.1]
sīvyet sūkṣmeṇa sūtreṇa valkenāśmantakasya vā | [Su, Sū., 25 20.2]
śaṇajakṣaumasūtrābhyāṃ snāyvā vālena vā punaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 21.1]
mūrvāguḍūcītānair vā sīvyedvellitakaṃ śanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 21.2]
sīvyedgophaṇikāṃ vāpi sīvyedvā tunnasevanīm | [Su, Sū., 25 22.1]
ṛjugranthimatho vāpi yathāyogamathāpi vā | [Su, Sū., 25 22.2]
deśe 'lpamāṃse sandhau ca sūcī vṛttāṅguladvayam | [Su, Sū., 25 23.1]
āyatā tryaṅgulā tryasrā māṃsale vāpi pūjitā | [Su, Sū., 25 23.2]
dhanurvakrā hitā marmaphalakośodaropari | [Su, Sū., 25 24.1]
ity etāstrividhāḥ sūcīstīkṣṇāgrāḥ susamāhitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 24.2]
kārayenmālatīpuṣpavṛntāgraparimaṇḍalāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 25.1]
nātidūre nikṛṣṭe vā sūcīṃ karmaṇi pātayet | [Su, Sū., 25 25.2]
dūrādrujo vraṇauṣṭhasya saṃnikṛṣṭe 'valuñcanam | [Su, Sū., 25 26.1]
atha kṣaumapicucchannaṃ susyūtaṃ pratisārayet | [Su, Sū., 25 27.1]
priyaṅgvañjanayaṣṭyāhvarodhracūrṇaiḥ samantataḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 27.2]
śallakīphalacūrṇair vā kṣaumadhyāmena vā punaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 28.1]
tato vraṇaṃ yathāyogaṃ baddhvācārikamādiśet | [Su, Sū., 25 28.2]
etadaṣṭavidhaṃ karma samāsena prakīrtitam | [Su, Sū., 25 29.1]
cikitsiteṣu kārtsnyena vistarastasya vakṣyate | [Su, Sū., 25 29.2]
hīnātiriktaṃ tiryak ca gātracchedanamātmanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 30.1]
etāścatasro 'ṣṭavidhe karmaṇi vyāpadaḥ smṛtāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 30.2]
ajñānalobhāhitavākyayogabhayapramohair aparaiś ca bhāvaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 31.1]
yadā prayuñjīta bhiṣak kuśastraṃ tadā sa śeṣān kurute vikārān | [Su, Sū., 25 31.2]
taṃ kṣāraśastrāgnibhir auṣadhaiś ca bhūyo 'bhiyuñjānamayuktiyuktam | [Su, Sū., 25 32.1]
jijīviṣurdūrata eva vaidyaṃ vivarjayedugraviṣāhitulyam | [Su, Sū., 25 32.2]
tadeva yuktaṃ tvati marmasandhīn hiṃsyāt sirāḥ snāyumathāsthi caiva | [Su, Sū., 25 33.1]
mūrkhaprayuktaṃ puruṣaṃ kṣaṇena prāṇair viyuñjyādathavā kathaṃcit | [Su, Sū., 25 33.2]
bhramaḥ pralāpaḥ patanaṃ pramoho viceṣṭanaṃ saṃlayanoṣṇate ca | [Su, Sū., 25 34.1]
srastāṅgatā mūrchanam ūrdhvavātas tīvrā rujo vātakṛtāś ca tāstāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 34.2]
māṃsodakābhaṃ rudhiraṃ ca gacchet sarvendriyārthoparamastathaiva | [Su, Sū., 25 35.1]
daśārdhasaṃkhyeṣvapi vikṣateṣu sāmānyato marmasu liṅgamuktam | [Su, Sū., 25 35.2]
surendragopapratimaṃ prabhūtaṃ raktaṃ sravedvai kṣatataś ca vāyuḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 36.1]
karoti rogān vividhān yathoktāṃśchinnāsu bhinnāsvathavā sirāsu | [Su, Sū., 25 36.2]
kaubjyaṃ śarīrāvayavāvasādaḥ kriyāsvaśaktis tumulā rujaś ca | [Su, Sū., 25 37.1]
cirādvraṇo rohati yasya cāpi taṃ snāyuviddhaṃ manujaṃ vyavasyet | [Su, Sū., 25 37.2]
śophātivṛddhistumulā rujaś ca balakṣayaḥ parvasu bhedaśophau | [Su, Sū., 25 38.1]
kṣateṣu sandhiṣvacalācaleṣu syāt sandhikarmoparatiś ca liṅgam | [Su, Sū., 25 38.2]
ghorā rujo yasya niśādineṣu sarvāsvavasthāsu na śāntirasti | [Su, Sū., 25 39.1]
tṛṣṇāṅgasādau śvayathuś ca rukca tamasthividdhaṃ manujaṃ vyavasyet | [Su, Sū., 25 39.2]
yathāsvametāni vibhāvayeyurliṅgāni marmasvabhitāḍiteṣu | [Su, Sū., 25 40.1]
sparśaṃ na jānāti vipāṇḍuvarṇo yo māṃsamarmaṇyabhitāḍitaḥ syāt | [Su, Sū., 25 40.2]
ātmānamevātha jaghanyakārī śastreṇa yo hanti hi karma kurvan | [Su, Sū., 25 41.1]
tamātmavān ātmahanaṃ kuvaidyaṃ vivarjayedāyurabhīpsamānaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 41.2]
tiryakpraṇihite śastre doṣāḥ pūrvamudāhṛtāḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 42.1]
tasmāt pariharan doṣān kuryācchastranipātanam | [Su, Sū., 25 42.2]
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ putrān bāndhavān api cāturaḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 43.1]
apyetānabhiśaṅketa vaidye viśvāsameti ca | [Su, Sū., 25 43.2]
visṛjatyātmanātmānaṃ na cainaṃ pariśaṅkate | [Su, Sū., 25 44.1]
tasmāt putravadevainaṃ pālayedāturaṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 25 44.2]
dharmārthau kīrtimityarthaṃ satāṃ grahaṇamuttamam | [Su, Sū., 25 45.1]
prāpnuyāt svargavāsaṃ ca hitam ārabhya karmaṇā | [Su, Sū., 25 45.2]
karmaṇā kaścidekena dvābhyāṃ kaścit tribhistathā | [Su, Sū., 25 46.1]
vikāraḥ sādhyate kaścic caturbhir api karmabhiḥ | [Su, Sū., 25 46.2]
{Su, Sū., 26}
athātaḥ pranaṣṭaśalyavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 26 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 26 2.1]
śala śvala āśugamane dhātus tasya śalyamiti rūpam | [Su, Sū., 26 3.1]
taddvividhaṃ śārīram āgantukaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 26 4.1]
sarvaśarīrābādhakaraṃ śalyaṃ tadihopadiśyata ityataḥ śalyaśāstram | [Su, Sū., 26 5.1]
tatra śārīraṃ dantaromanakhādi dhātavo 'nnamalā doṣāś ca duṣṭāḥ āgantvapi śārīraśalyavyatirekeṇa yāvanto bhāvā duḥkham utpādayanti | [Su, Sū., 26 6.1]
adhikāro hi lohaveṇuvṛkṣatṛṇaśṛṅgāsthimayeṣu tatrāpi viśeṣato loheṣveva viśasanārthopapannatvāllohasya lohānām api durvāratvādaṇumukhatvāddūraprayojanakaratvāc ca śara evādhikṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 26 7.1]
sa dvividhaḥ karṇī ślakṣṇaś ca prāyeṇa vividhavṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphalatulyākṛtayo vyākhyātā vyālamṛgapakṣivaktrasadṛśāś ca | [Su, Sū., 26 7.2]
sarvaśalyānāṃ tu mahatāmaṇūnāṃ vā pañcavidho gativiśeṣa ūrdhvamadho 'rvācīnastiryagṛjur iti | [Su, Sū., 26 8.1]
tāni vegakṣayāt pratighātādvā tvagādiṣu vraṇavastuṣvavatiṣṭhante dhamanīsroto'sthivivarapeśīprabhṛtiṣu vā śarīrapradeśeṣu | [Su, Sū., 26 9.1]
tatra śalyalakṣaṇamucyamānam upadhāraya | [Su, Sū., 26 10.1]
tattu dvividhaṃ sāmānyaṃ vaiśeṣikaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 26 10.2]
śyāvaṃ piḍakācitaṃ śophavedanāvantaṃ muhurmuhuḥ śoṇitāsrāviṇaṃ budbudavadunnataṃ mṛdumāṃsaṃ ca vraṇaṃ jānīyāt saśalyo 'yam iti | [Su, Sū., 26 10.3]
sāmānyametallakṣaṇamuktam | [Su, Sū., 26 10.4]
vaiśeṣikaṃ tu tvaggate vivarṇaḥ śopho bhavatyāyataḥ kaṭhinaś ca māṃsagate śophābhivṛddhiḥ śalyamārgānupasaṃrohaḥ pīḍanāsahiṣṇutā coṣapākau ca peśyantarasthe 'pyetadeva coṣaśophavarjaṃ sirāgate sirādhmānam sirāśūlaṃ sirāśophaś ca snāyugate snāyujālotkṣepaṇaṃ saṃrambhaścogrā ruk ca srotogate srotasāṃ svakarmaguṇahāniḥ dhamanīsthe saphenaṃ raktamīrayannanilaḥ saśabdo nirgacchatyaṅgamardaḥ pipāsā hṛllāsaś ca asthigate vividhavedanāprādurbhāvaḥ śophaś ca asthivivaragate 'sthipūrṇatāsthitodaḥ saṃharṣo balavāṃś ca sandhigate 'sthivacceṣṭoparamaśca koṣṭhagata āṭopānāhau mūtrapurīṣāhāradarśanaṃ ca vraṇamukhāt marmagate marmaviddhavacceṣṭate | [Su, Sū., 26 10.5]
sūkṣmagatiṣu śalyeṣvetānyeva lakṣaṇānyaspaṣṭāni bhavanti | [Su, Sū., 26 10.6]
mahāntyalpāni vā śuddhadehānāmanulomasaṃniviṣṭāni rohanti viśeṣataḥ kaṇṭhasrotaḥsirātvakpeśyasthivivareṣu doṣaprakopavyāyāmābhighātājīrṇebhyaḥ pracalitāni punarbādhante | [Su, Sū., 26 11.1]
tatra tvakpranaṣṭe snigdhasvinnāyāṃ mṛnmāṣayavagodhūmagomayamṛditāyāṃ tvaci yatra saṃrambho vedanā vā bhavati tatra śalyaṃ vijānīyāt styānaghṛtamṛccandanakalkair vā pradigdhāyāṃ śalyoṣmaṇāśu visarati ghṛtam upaśuṣyati vā lepo yatra tatra śalyaṃ vijānīyāt māṃsapranaṣṭe snehasvedādibhiḥ kriyāviśeṣair aviruddhair āturam upapādayet karśitasya tu śithilībhūtam anavabaddhaṃ kṣubhyamāṇaṃ yatra saṃrambhaṃ vedanāṃ vā janayati tatra śalyaṃ vijānīyāt koṣṭhāsthisandhipeśīvivareṣvavasthitam evam eva parīkṣeta sirādhamanīsrotaḥsnāyupranaṣṭe khaṇḍacakrasaṃyukte yāne vyādhitamāropyāśu viṣame 'dhvani yāyādyatra saṃrambho vedanā vā bhavati tatra śalyaṃ jānīyāt asthipranaṣṭe snehasvedopapannānyasthīni bandhanapīḍanābhyāṃ bhṛśam upācaredyatra saṃrambho vedanā vā bhavati tatra śalyaṃ jānīyāt sandhipranaṣṭe snehasvedopapannān sandhīn prasaraṇākuñcanabandhanapīḍanair bhṛśam upācaret yatra saṃrambho vedanā vā bhavati tatra śalyaṃ vijānīyāt marmapranaṣṭe tv ananyabhāvān marmaṇām uktaṃ parīkṣaṇaṃ bhavati | [Su, Sū., 26 12.1]
sāmānyalakṣaṇam api ca hastiskandhāśvapṛṣṭhaparvatadrumārohaṇadhanurvyāyāmadrutayānaniyuddhādhvagamanalaṅghanaprataraṇaplavanavyāyāmair jṛmbhodgārakāsakṣavathuṣṭhīvanahasanaprāṇāyāmair vātamūtrapurīṣaśukrotsargair vā yatra saṃrambho vedanā vā bhavati tatra śalyaṃ jānīyāt | [Su, Sū., 26 13.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 26 14.1]
yasmiṃstodādayo deśe suptatā gurutāpi ca | [Su, Sū., 26 14.2]
ghaṭṭate bahuśo yatra śūyate tudyate 'pi ca | [Su, Sū., 26 14.3]
āturaś cāpi yaṃ deśamabhīkṣṇaṃ parirakṣati | [Su, Sū., 26 15.1]
saṃvāhyamāno bahuśastatra śalyaṃ vinirdiśet | [Su, Sū., 26 15.2]
alpābādhamaśūnaṃ ca nīrujaṃ nirupadravam | [Su, Sū., 26 16.1]
prasannaṃ mṛduparyantaṃ nirāghaṭṭam anunnatam | [Su, Sū., 26 16.2]
eṣaṇyā sarvato dṛṣṭvā yathāmārgaṃ cikitsakaḥ | [Su, Sū., 26 17.1]
prasārākuñcanānnūnaṃ niḥśalyamiti nirdiśet | [Su, Sū., 26 17.2]
asthyātmakaṃ bhajyate tu śalyamantaś ca śīryate | [Su, Sū., 26 18.1]
prāyo nirbhujyate śārṅgamāyasaṃ ceti niścayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 26 18.2]
vārkṣavaiṇavatārṇāni nirhriyante tu no yadi | [Su, Sū., 26 19.1]
pacanti raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ca kṣiprametāni dehinām | [Su, Sū., 26 19.2]
kānakaṃ rājataṃ tāmraṃ raitikaṃ trapusīsakam | [Su, Sū., 26 20.1]
cirasthānādvilīyante pittatejaḥpratāpanāt | [Su, Sū., 26 20.2]
svabhāvaśītā mṛdavo ye cānye 'pīdṛśā matāḥ | [Su, Sū., 26 21.1]
dravībhūtāḥ śarīre 'sminnekatvaṃ yānti dhātubhiḥ | [Su, Sū., 26 21.2]
viṣāṇadantakeśāsthiveṇudārūpalāni tu | [Su, Sū., 26 22.1]
śalyāni na viśīryante śarīre mṛnmayāni ca | [Su, Sū., 26 22.2]
dvividhaṃ pañcagatimattvagādivraṇavastuṣu | [Su, Sū., 26 23.1]
viśliṣṭaṃ vetti yaḥ śalyaṃ sa rājñaḥ kartumarhati | [Su, Sū., 26 23.2]
{Su, Sū., 27}
athātaḥ śalyāpanayanīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 27 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 27 2.1]
śalyaṃ dvividham avabaddham anavabaddhaṃ ca | [Su, Sū., 27 3.1]
tatra samāsenānavabaddhaśalyoddharaṇārthaṃ pañcadaśa hetūn vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 27 4.1]
tadyathā svabhāvaḥ pācanaṃ bhedanaṃ dāraṇaṃ pīḍanaṃ pramārjanaṃ nirdhmāpanaṃ vamanaṃ virecanaṃ prakṣālanaṃ pratimarśaḥ pravāhaṇam ācūṣaṇam ayaskānto harṣaśceti | [Su, Sū., 27 4.2]
tatrāśrukṣavathūdgārakāsamūtrapurīṣānilaiḥ svabhāvabalapravṛttair nayanādibhyaḥ patati māṃsāvagāḍhaṃ śalyam avidahyamānaṃ pācayitvā prakothāttasya pūyaśoṇitavegādgauravādvā patati | [Su, Sū., 27 5.1]
pakvam abhidyamānaṃ bhedayeddārayedvā | [Su, Sū., 27 5.2]
bhinnam anirasyamānaṃ pīḍanīyaiḥ pīḍayet pāṇibhir vā | [Su, Sū., 27 5.3]
aṇūnyakṣaśalyāni pariṣecanādhmāpanair vālavastrapāṇibhiḥ pramārjayet | [Su, Sū., 27 5.4]
āhāraśeṣaśleṣmahīnāṇuśalyāni śvasanotkāsanapradhamanair nirdhamet | [Su, Sū., 27 5.5]
annaśalyāni vamanāṅgulipratimarśaprabhṛtibhiḥ | [Su, Sū., 27 5.6]
virecanaiḥ pakvāśayagatāni | [Su, Sū., 27 5.7]
vraṇadoṣāśayagatāni prakṣālanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 27 5.8]
vātamūtrapurīṣagarbhasaṅgeṣu pravāhaṇamuktam | [Su, Sū., 27 5.9]
mārutodakasaviṣarudhiraduṣṭastanyeṣvācūṣaṇamāsyena viṣāṇair vā | [Su, Sū., 27 5.10]
anulomamanavabaddhamakarṇamanalpavraṇamukhamayaskāntena | [Su, Sū., 27 5.11]
hṛdyavasthitamanekakāraṇotpannaṃ śokaśalyaṃ harṣeṇeti | [Su, Sū., 27 5.12]
sarvaśalyānāṃ tu mahatāmaṇūnāṃ vā dvāvevāharaṇahetū bhavataḥ pratilomo 'nulomaś ca | [Su, Sū., 27 6.1]
tatra pratilomamarvācīnamānayet anulomaṃ parācīnam | [Su, Sū., 27 7.1]
uttuṇḍitaṃ chittvā nirghātayecchedanīyamukham | [Su, Sū., 27 8.1]
chedanīyamukhānyapi kukṣivakṣaḥkakṣāvaṅkṣaṇaparśukāntarapatitāni ca hastaśakyaṃ yathāmārgeṇa hastenaivāpahartuṃ prayateta | [Su, Sū., 27 9.1]
hastenāpahartumaśakyaṃ viśasya śastreṇa yantreṇāpaharet | [Su, Sū., 27 10.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Sū., 27 11.1]
śītalena jalenainaṃ mūrchantam avasecayet | [Su, Sū., 27 11.2]
saṃrakṣedasya marmāṇi muhurāśvāsayec ca tam | [Su, Sū., 27 11.3]
tataḥ śalyamuddhṛtya nirlohitaṃ vraṇaṃ kṛtvā svedārham agnighṛtaprabhṛtibhiḥ saṃsvedya vidahya pradihya sarpirmadhubhyāṃ baddhvācārikam upadiśet | [Su, Sū., 27 12.1]
sirāsnāyuvilagnaṃ śalākādibhir vimocyāpanayet śvayathugrastavāraṅgaṃ samavapīḍya śvayathuṃ durbalavāraṅgaṃ kuśādibhir baddhvā | [Su, Sū., 27 12.2]
hṛdayamabhito vartamānaṃ śalyaṃ śītajalādibhir udvejitasyāpahared yathāmārgaṃ durupaharamanyato 'pabādhyamānaṃ pāṭayitvoddharet | [Su, Sū., 27 13.1]
asthivivarapraviṣṭamasthividaṣṭaṃ vāvagṛhya pādābhyāṃ yantreṇāpaharet aśakyamevaṃ vā balavadbhiḥ suparigṛhītasya yantreṇa grāhayitvā śalyavāraṅgaṃ pravibhujya dhanurguṇair baddhvaikataś cāsya pañcāṅgyām upasaṃyatasyāśvasya vaktrakavike badhnīyāt athainaṃ kaśayā tāḍayedyathonnamayan śiro vegena śalyamuddharati dṛḍhāṃ vā vṛkṣaśākhāmavanamya tasyāṃ pūrvavadbaddhvoddharet | [Su, Sū., 27 14.1]
adeśottuṇḍitamaṣṭhīlāśmamudgarāṇām anyatamasya prahāreṇa vicālya yathāmārgam eva yantreṇa | [Su, Sū., 27 15.1]
yantreṇa vimṛditakarṇāni karṇavantyanābādhakaradeśottuṇḍitāni purastādeva | [Su, Sū., 27 16.1]
jātuṣe kaṇṭhāsakte kaṇṭhe nāḍīṃ praveśyāgnitaptāṃ ca śalākāṃ tayāvagṛhya śītābhir adbhiḥ pariṣicya sthirībhūtāmuddharet | [Su, Sū., 27 17.1]
ajātuṣaṃ jatumadhūcchiṣṭapraliptayā śalākayā pūrvakalpenetyeke | [Su, Sū., 27 18.1]
asthiśalyamanyadvā tiryakkaṇṭhāsaktamavekṣya keśoṇḍukaṃ dṛḍhaikasūtrabaddhaṃ dravabhaktopahitaṃ pāyayed ā kaṇṭhāt pūrṇakoṣṭhaṃ ca vāmayet vamataś ca śalyaikadeśasaktaṃ jñātvā sūtraṃ sahasā tvākṣipet mṛdunā vā dantadhāvanakūrcakenāpaharet praṇuded vāntaḥ | [Su, Sū., 27 19.1]
kṣatakaṇṭhāya ca madhusarpiṣī leḍhuṃ prayacchettriphalācūrṇaṃ vā madhuśarkarāvimiśram | [Su, Sū., 27 19.2]
udakapūrṇodaram avākśirasam avapīḍayed dhunīyād vāmayedvā bhasmarāśau vā nikhaned ā mukhāt | [Su, Sū., 27 20.1]
grāsaśalye tu kaṇṭhāsakte niḥśaṅkam anavabuddhaṃ skandhe muṣṭinābhihanyāt snehaṃ madyaṃ pānīyaṃ vā pāyayet | [Su, Sū., 27 21.1]
bāhurajjulatāpāśaiḥ kaṇṭhapīḍanādvāyuḥ prakupitaḥ śleṣmāṇaṃ kopayitvā sroto niruṇaddhi lālāsrāvaṃ phenāgamanaṃ saṃjñānāśaṃ cāpādayati tamabhyajya saṃsvedya śirovirecanaṃ tasmai tīkṣṇaṃ dadyādrasaṃ ca vātaghnaṃ vidadhyād iti | [Su, Sū., 27 22.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 27 23.1]
śalyākṛtiviśeṣāṃś ca sthānānyāvekṣya buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 27 23.2]
tathā yantrapṛthaktvaṃ ca samyak śalyamathāharet | [Su, Sū., 27 23.3]
karṇavanti tu śalyāni duḥkhāhāryāṇi yāni ca | [Su, Sū., 27 24.1]
ādadīta bhiṣak tasmāt tāni yuktyā samāhitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 27 24.2]
etair upāyaiḥ śalyaṃ tu naiva niryātyate yadi | [Su, Sū., 27 25.1]
matyā nipuṇayā vaidyo yantrayogaiś ca nirharet | [Su, Sū., 27 25.2]
śothapākau rujaścogrāḥ kuryācchalyamanirhṛtam | [Su, Sū., 27 26.1]
vaikalyaṃ maraṇaṃ cāpi tasmād yatnādvinirharet | [Su, Sū., 27 26.2]
{Su, Sū., 28}
athāto viparītāviparītavraṇavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 2.1]
phalāgnijalavṛṣṭīnāṃ puṣpadhūmāmbudā yathā | [Su, Sū., 28 3.1]
khyāpayanti bhaviṣyatvaṃ tathā riṣṭāni pañcatām | [Su, Sū., 28 3.2]
tāni saukṣmyāt pramādādvā tathaivāśu vyatikramāt | [Su, Sū., 28 4.1]
gṛhyante nodgatānyajñair mumūrṣor na tvasaṃbhavāt | [Su, Sū., 28 4.2]
dhruvaṃ tu maraṇaṃ riṣṭe brāhmaṇaistat kilāmalaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 5.1]
rasāyanatapojapyatatparair vā nivāryate | [Su, Sū., 28 5.2]
nakṣatrapīḍā bahudhā yathākālaṃ vipacyate | [Su, Sū., 28 6.1]
tathaivāriṣṭapākaṃ ca bruvate bahavo janāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 6.2]
asiddhimāpnuyālloke pratikurvan gatāyuṣaḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 7.1]
ato 'riṣṭāni yatnena lakṣayet kuśalo bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 28 7.2]
gandhavarṇarasādīnāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ svabhāvataḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 8.1]
vaikṛtaṃ yat tadācaṣṭe vraṇinaḥ pakvalakṣaṇam | [Su, Sū., 28 8.2]
kaṭustīkṣṇaś ca visraś ca gandhastu pavanādibhiḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 9.1]
lohagandhistu raktena vyāmiśraḥ sānnipātikaḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 9.2]
lājātasītailasamāḥ kiṃcidvisrāś ca gandhataḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 10.1]
jñeyāḥ prakṛtigandhāḥ syurato 'nyadgandhavaikṛtam | [Su, Sū., 28 10.2]
madyāgurvājyasumanāpadmacandanacampakaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 11.1]
sagandhā divyagandhāś ca mumūrṣūṇāṃ vraṇāḥ smṛtāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 11.2]
śvavājimūṣikadhvāṅkṣapūtivallūramatkuṇaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 12.1]
sagandhāḥ paṅkagandhāś ca bhūmigandhāś ca garhitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 12.2]
kuṅkumadhyāmakaṅkuṣṭhasavarṇāḥ pittakopataḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 13.1]
na dahyante na cūṣyante bhiṣak tān parivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 28 13.2]
kaṇḍūmantaḥ sthirāḥ śvetāḥ snigdhāḥ kaphanimittataḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 14.1]
dūyante vāpi dahyante bhiṣak tān parivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 28 14.2]
kṛṣṇāstu ye tanusrāvā vātajā marmatāpinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 15.1]
svalpām api na kurvanti rujaṃ tān parivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 28 15.2]
kṣveḍanti ghurghurāyante jvalantīva ca ye vraṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 16.1]
tvaṅmāṃsasthāś ca pavanaṃ saśabdaṃ visṛjanti ye | [Su, Sū., 28 16.2]
ye ca marmasvasaṃbhūtā bhavantyatyarthavedanāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 17.1]
dahyante cāntaratyarthaṃ bahiḥ śītāś ca ye vraṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 17.2]
dahyante bahir atyarthaṃ bhavantyantaś ca śītalāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 18.1]
śaktidhvajarathāḥ kuntavājivāraṇagovṛṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 18.2]
yeṣu cāpyavabhāseran prāsādākṛtayastathā | [Su, Sū., 28 19.1]
cūrṇāvakīrṇā iva ye bhānti vā na ca cūrṇitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 19.2]
prāṇamāṃsakṣayaśvāsakāsārocakapīḍitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 20.1]
pravṛddhapūyarudhirā vraṇā yeṣāṃ ca marmasu | [Su, Sū., 28 20.2]
kriyābhiḥ samyagārabdhā na sidhyanti ca ye vraṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 21.1]
varjayettān bhiṣak prājñaḥ saṃrakṣannātmano yaśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 28 21.2]
{Su, Sū., 29}
athāto viparītāviparītasvapnanidarśanīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 2.1]
dūtadarśanasambhāṣā veṣāśceṣṭitam eva ca | [Su, Sū., 29 3.1]
ṛkṣaṃ velā tithiś caiva nimittaṃ śakuno 'nilaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 3.2]
deśo vaidyasya vāgdehamanasāṃ ca viceṣṭitam | [Su, Sū., 29 4.1]
kathayantyāturagataṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham | [Su, Sū., 29 4.2]
pākhaṇḍāśramavarṇānāṃ sapakṣāḥ karmasiddhaye | [Su, Sū., 29 5.1]
ta eva viparītāḥ syurdūtāḥ karmavipattaye | [Su, Sū., 29 5.2]
napuṃsakaṃ strī bahavo naikakāryā asūyakāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 6.1]
gardabhoṣṭrarathaprāptāḥ prāptā vā syuḥ paramparāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 6.2]
vaidyaṃ ya upasarpanti dūtāste cāpi garhitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 7.1]
pāśadaṇḍāyudhadharāḥ pāṇḍuretaravāsasaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 7.2]
ārdrajīrṇāpasavyaikamalinoddhvastavāsasaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 8.1]
nyūnādhikāṅgā udvignā vikṛtā raudrarūpiṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 8.2]
rūkṣaniṣṭhuravādāś cāpyamaṅgalyābhidhāyinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 9.1]
chindantastṛṇakāṣṭhāni spṛśanto nāsikāṃ stanam | [Su, Sū., 29 9.2]
vastrāntānāmikākeśanakharomadaśāspṛśaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 10.1]
sroto'varodhahṛdgaṇḍamūrdhoraḥkukṣipāṇayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 10.2]
kapālopalabhasmāsthituṣāṅgārakarāś ca ye | [Su, Sū., 29 11.1]
vilikhanto mahīṃ kiṃcinmuñcanto loṣṭabhedinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 11.2]
tailakardamadigdhāṅgā raktasraganulepanāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 12.1]
phalaṃ pakvamasāraṃ vā gṛhītvānyac ca tadvidham | [Su, Sū., 29 12.2]
nakhair nakhāntaraṃ vāpi kareṇa caraṇaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 29 13.1]
upānaccarmahastā vā vikṛtavyādhipīḍitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 13.2]
vāmācārā rudantaś ca śvāsino vikṛtekṣaṇāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 14.1]
yāmyāṃ diśaṃ prāñjalayo viṣamaikapade sthitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 14.2]
vaidyaṃ ya upasarpanti dūtāste cāpi garhitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 15.1]
dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ deśe tvaśucau vā hutāśanam | [Su, Sū., 29 15.2]
jvalayantaṃ pacantaṃ vā krūrakarmaṇi codyatam | [Su, Sū., 29 15.3]
nagnaṃ bhūmau śayānaṃ vā vegotsargeṣu vāśucim | [Su, Sū., 29 16.1]
prakīrṇakeśam abhyaktaṃ svinnaṃ viklavam eva vā | [Su, Sū., 29 16.2]
vaidyaṃ ya upasarpanti dūtāste cāpi garhitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 17.1]
vaidyasya paitrye daive vā kārye cotpātadarśane | [Su, Sū., 29 17.2]
madhyāhne cārdharātre vā sandhyayoḥ kṛttikāsu ca | [Su, Sū., 29 18.1]
ārdrāśleṣāmaghāmūlapūrvāsu bharaṇīṣu ca | [Su, Sū., 29 18.2]
caturthyāṃ vā navamyāṃ vā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ sandhidineṣu ca | [Su, Sū., 29 19.1]
vaidyaṃ ya upasarpanti dūtāste cāpi garhitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 19.2]
svinnābhitaptā madhyāhne jvalanasya samīpataḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 20.1]
garhitāḥ pittarogeṣu dūtā vaidyamupāgatāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 20.2]
ta eva kapharogeṣu karmasiddhikarāḥ smṛtāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 21.1]
etena śeṣaṃ vyākhyātaṃ buddhvā saṃvibhajettu tat | [Su, Sū., 29 21.2]
raktapittātisāreṣu prameheṣu tathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 29 22.1]
praśasto jalarodheṣu dūtavaidyasamāgamaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 22.2]
vijñāyaivaṃ vibhāgaṃ tu śeṣaṃ budhyeta paṇḍitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 23.1]
śuklavāsāḥ śucirgauraḥ śyāmo vā priyadarśanaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 23.2]
svasyām jātau svagotro vā dūtaḥ kāryakaraḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 24.1]
goyānenāgatastuṣṭaḥ pādābhyāṃ śubhaceṣṭitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 24.2]
smṛtimān vidhikālajñaḥ svatantraḥ pratipattimān | [Su, Sū., 29 25.1]
alaṃkṛto maṅgalavān dūtaḥ kāryakaraḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 25.2]
svasthaṃ prāṅmukham āsīnaṃ same deśe śucau śucim | [Su, Sū., 29 26.1]
upasarpati yo vaidyaṃ sa ca kāryakaraḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 26.2]
māṃsodakumbhātapatravipravāraṇagovṛṣāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 27.1]
śuklavarṇāś ca pūjyante prasthāne darśanaṃ gatāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 27.2]
strī putriṇī savatsā gaur vardhamānam alaṃkṛtā | [Su, Sū., 29 28.1]
kanyā matsyāḥ phalaṃ cāmaṃ svastikaṃ modakā dadhi | [Su, Sū., 29 28.2]
hiraṇyākṣatapātraṃ vā ratnāni sumano nṛpaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 29.1]
apraśānto 'nalo vājī haṃsaścāṣaḥ śikhī tathā | [Su, Sū., 29 29.2]
brahmadundubhijīmūtaśaṅkhaveṇurathasvanāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 30.1]
siṃhagovṛṣanādāś ca hreṣitaṃ gajabṛṃhitam | [Su, Sū., 29 30.2]
śastaṃ haṃsarutaṃ nṛṇāṃ kauśikaṃ caiva vāmataḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 31.1]
prasthāne yāyinaḥ śreṣṭhā vācaś ca hṛdayaṅgamāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 31.2]
patrapuṣpaphalopetān sakṣīrān nīrujo drumān | [Su, Sū., 29 32.1]
āśritā vā nabhoveśmadhvajatoraṇavedikāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 32.2]
dikṣu śāntāsu vaktāro madhuraṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nugāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 33.1]
vāmā vā dakṣiṇā vāpi śakunāḥ karmasiddhaye | [Su, Sū., 29 33.2]
śuṣke 'śanihate 'pattre vallīnaddhe sakaṇṭake | [Su, Sū., 29 34.1]
vṛkṣe 'thavāśmabhasmāsthiviṭtuṣāṅgārapāṃśuṣu | [Su, Sū., 29 34.2]
caityavalmīkaviṣamasthitā dīptakharasvarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 35.1]
purato dikṣu dīptāsu vaktāro nārthasādhakāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 35.2]
punnāmānaḥ khagā vāmāḥ strīsaṃjñā dakṣiṇāḥ śubhāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 36.1]
dakṣiṇādvāmagamanaṃ praśastaṃ śvaśṛgālayoḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 36.2]
vāmaṃ nakulacāṣāṇāṃ nobhayaṃ śaśasarpayoḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 36.3]
bhāsakauśikayoś caiva na praśastaṃ kilobhayam | [Su, Sū., 29 37.1]
darśanaṃ vā rutaṃ cāpi na godhākṛkalāsayoḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 37.2]
dūtair aniṣṭaistulyānāmaśastaṃ darśanaṃ nṛṇām | [Su, Sū., 29 38.1]
kulatthatilakārpāsatuṣapāṣāṇabhasmanām | [Su, Sū., 29 38.2]
pātraṃ neṣṭaṃ tathāṅgāratailakardamapūritam | [Su, Sū., 29 39.1]
prasannetaramadyānāṃ pūrṇaṃ vā raktasarṣapaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 39.2]
śavakāṣṭhapalāśānāṃ śuṣkāṇāṃ pathi saṅgamāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 40.1]
neṣyante patitāntasthadīnāndharipavastathā | [Su, Sū., 29 40.2]
mṛduḥ śīto 'nukūlaś ca sugandhiścānilaḥ śubhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 41.1]
kharoṣṇo 'niṣṭagandhaś ca pratilomaś ca garhitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 41.2]
granthyarbudādiṣu sadā chedaśabdastu pūjitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 42.1]
vidradhyudaragulmeṣu bhedaśabdastathaiva ca | [Su, Sū., 29 42.2]
raktapittātisāreṣu ruddhaśabdaḥ praśasyate | [Su, Sū., 29 43.1]
evaṃ vyādhiviśeṣeṇa nimittam upadhārayet | [Su, Sū., 29 43.2]
tathaivākruṣṭahākaṣṭam ākrandaruditasvanāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 44.1]
chardyāṃ vātapurīṣāṇāṃ śabdo vai gardabhoṣṭrayoḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 44.2]
pratiṣiddhaṃ tathā bhagnaṃ kṣutaṃ skhalitamāhatam | [Su, Sū., 29 45.1]
daurmanasyaṃ ca vaidyasya yātrāyāṃ na praśasyate | [Su, Sū., 29 45.2]
praveśe 'pyetaduddeśādavekṣyaṃ ca tathāture | [Su, Sū., 29 46.1]
pratidvāraṃ gṛhe vāsya punaretanna gaṇyate | [Su, Sū., 29 46.2]
keśabhasmāsthikāṣṭhāśmatuṣakārpāsakaṇṭakāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 47.1]
khaṭvordhvapādā madyāpo vasā tailaṃ tilāstṛṇam | [Su, Sū., 29 47.2]
napuṃsakavyaṅgabhagnanagnamuṇḍāsitāmbarāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 48.1]
prasthāne vā praveśe vā neṣyante darśanaṃ gatāḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 48.2]
bhāṇḍānāṃ saṃkarasthānāṃ sthānāt saṃcaraṇaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 29 49.1]
nikhātotpāṭanaṃ bhaṅgaḥ patanaṃ nirgamastathā | [Su, Sū., 29 49.2]
vaidyāsanāvasādo vā rogī vā syādadhomukhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 50.1]
vaidyaṃ sambhāṣamāṇo 'ṅgaṃ kuḍyamāstaraṇāni vā | [Su, Sū., 29 50.2]
pramṛjyādvā dhunīyādvā karau pṛṣṭhaṃ śirastathā | [Su, Sū., 29 51.1]
hastaṃ cākṛṣya vaidyasya nyasecchirasi corasi | [Su, Sū., 29 51.2]
yo vaidyamunmukhaḥ pṛcchedunmārṣṭi svāṅgamāturaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 52.1]
na sa sidhyati vaidyo vā gṛhe yasya na pūjyate | [Su, Sū., 29 52.2]
bhavane pūjyate vāpi yasya vaidyaḥ sa sidhyati | [Su, Sū., 29 53.1]
śubhaṃ śubheṣu dūtādiṣvaśubhaṃ hy aśubheṣu ca | [Su, Sū., 29 53.2]
āturasya dhruvaṃ tasmād dūtādīn lakṣayedbhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 29 54.1]
svapnānataḥ pravakṣyāmi maraṇāya śubhāya ca | [Su, Sū., 29 54.2]
suhṛdo yāṃśca paśyanti vyādhito vā svayaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 29 55.1]
snehābhyaktaśarīrastu karabhavyālagardabhaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 55.2]
varāhair mahiṣair vāpi yo yāyād dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 56.1]
raktāmbaradharā kṛṣṇā hasantī muktamūrdhajā | [Su, Sū., 29 56.2]
yaṃ vā karṣati baddhvā strī nṛtyantī dakṣiṇāmukham | [Su, Sū., 29 57.1]
antāvasāyibhir yo vākṛṣyate dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 57.2]
pariṣvajeran yaṃ vāpi pretāḥ pravrajitāstathā | [Su, Sū., 29 58.1]
muhurāghrāyate yastu śvāpadair vikṛtānanaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 58.2]
pibenmadhu ca tailaṃ ca yo vā paṅke 'vasīdati | [Su, Sū., 29 59.1]
paṅkapradigdhagātro vā pranṛtyet prahasettathā | [Su, Sū., 29 59.2]
nirambaraś ca yo raktāṃ dhārayecchirasi srajam | [Su, Sū., 29 60.1]
yasya vaṃśo nalo vāpi tālo vorasi jāyate | [Su, Sū., 29 60.2]
yaṃ vā matsyo grasedyo vā jananīṃ praviśennaraḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 61.1]
parvatāgrāt patedyo vā śvabhre vā tamasāvṛte | [Su, Sū., 29 61.2]
hriyate srotasā yo vā yo vā mauṇḍyamavāpnuyāt | [Su, Sū., 29 62.1]
parājīyeta badhyeta kākādyair vābhibhūyate | [Su, Sū., 29 62.2]
patanaṃ tārakādīnāṃ praṇāśaṃ dīpacakṣuṣoḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 63.1]
yaḥ paśyeddevatānāṃ ca prakampamavanestathā | [Su, Sū., 29 63.2]
yasya chardirvireko vā daśanāḥ prapatanti vā | [Su, Sū., 29 64.1]
śālmalīṃ kiṃśukaṃ yūpaṃ valmīkaṃ pāribhadrakam | [Su, Sū., 29 64.2]
puṣpāḍhyaṃ kovidāraṃ vā citāṃ vā yo 'dhirohati | [Su, Sū., 29 65.1]
kārpāsatailapiṇyākalohāni lavaṇaṃ tilān | [Su, Sū., 29 65.2]
labhetāśnīta vā pakvamannaṃ yaś ca pibet surām | [Su, Sū., 29 66.1]
svasthaḥ sa labhate vyādhiṃ vyādhito mṛtyumṛcchati | [Su, Sū., 29 66.2]
yathāsvaṃ prakṛtisvapno vismṛto vihatastathā | [Su, Sū., 29 67.1]
cintākṛto divā dṛṣṭo bhavantyaphaladāstu te | [Su, Sū., 29 67.2]
jvaritānāṃ śunā sakhyaṃ kapisakhyaṃ tu śoṣiṇām | [Su, Sū., 29 68.1]
unmāde rākṣasaiḥ pretair apasmāre pravartanam | [Su, Sū., 29 68.2]
mehātisāriṇāṃ toyapānaṃ snehasya kuṣṭhinām | [Su, Sū., 29 69.1]
gulmeṣu sthāvarotpattiḥ koṣṭhe mūrdhni śiroruji | [Su, Sū., 29 69.2]
śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ chardyāmadhvā śvāsapipāsayoḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 70.1]
hāridraṃ bhojanaṃ vāpi yasya syāt pāṇḍurogiṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 70.2]
raktapittī pibedyastu śoṇitaṃ sa vinaśyati | [Su, Sū., 29 71.1]
svapnānevaṃvidhān dṛṣṭvā prātarutthāya yatnavān | [Su, Sū., 29 71.2]
dadyānmāṣāṃstilāṃllohaṃ viprebhyaḥ kāñcanaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 29 72.1]
japeccāpi śubhān mantrān gāyatrīṃ tripadāṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 29 72.2]
dṛṣṭvā tu prathame yāme svapyād dhyātvā punaḥ śubham | [Su, Sū., 29 73.1]
japedvānyatamaṃ vede brahmacārī samāhitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 73.2]
na cācakṣīta kasmaicid dṛṣṭvā svapnam aśobhanam | [Su, Sū., 29 74.1]
devatāyatane caiva vasedrātritrayaṃ tathā | [Su, Sū., 29 74.2]
viprāṃś ca pūjayennityaṃ duḥsvapnāt pravimucyate | [Su, Sū., 29 74.3]
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi praśastaṃ svapnadarśanam | [Su, Sū., 29 75.1]
devān dvijāngovṛṣabhān jīvataḥ suhṛdo nṛpān | [Su, Sū., 29 75.2]
samiddhamagniṃ sādhūṃśca nirmalāni jalāni ca | [Su, Sū., 29 76.1]
paśyet kalyāṇalābhāya vyādherapagamāya ca | [Su, Sū., 29 76.2]
māṃsaṃ matsyān srajaḥ śvetā vāsāṃsi ca phalāni ca | [Su, Sū., 29 77.1]
labhante dhanalābhāya vyādherapagamāya ca | [Su, Sū., 29 77.2]
mahāprāsādasaphalavṛkṣavāraṇaparvatān | [Su, Sū., 29 78.1]
āroheddravyalābhāya vyādherapagamāya ca | [Su, Sū., 29 78.2]
nadīnadasamudrāṃś ca kṣubhitān kaluṣodakān | [Su, Sū., 29 79.1]
taret kalyāṇalābhāya vyādherapagamāya ca | [Su, Sū., 29 79.2]
urago vā jalauko vā bhramaro vāpi yaṃ daśet | [Su, Sū., 29 80.1]
ārogyaṃ nirdiśettasya dhanalābhaṃ ca buddhimān | [Su, Sū., 29 80.2]
evaṃrūpān śubhān svapnān yaḥ paśyedvyādhito naraḥ | [Su, Sū., 29 81.1]
sa dīrghāyuriti jñeyastasmai karma samācaret | [Su, Sū., 29 81.2]
{Su, Sū., 30}
athātaḥ pañcendriyārthavipratipattimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 30 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 30 2.1]
śarīraśīlayor yasya prakṛtervikṛtirbhavet | [Su, Sū., 30 3.1]
tattvariṣṭaṃ samāsena vyāsatastu nibodha me | [Su, Sū., 30 3.2]
śṛṇoti vividhān śabdān yo divyānāmabhāvataḥ | [Su, Sū., 30 4.1]
samudrapurameghānāmasaṃpattau ca niḥsvanān | [Su, Sū., 30 4.2]
tān svanānnāvagṛhṇāti manyate cānyaśabdavat | [Su, Sū., 30 5.1]
grāmyāraṇyasvanāṃścāpi viparītān śṛṇoti ca | [Su, Sū., 30 5.2]
dviṣacchabdeṣu ramate suhṛcchabdeṣu kupyati | [Su, Sū., 30 6.1]
na śṛṇoti ca yo 'kasmāttaṃ bruvanti gatāyuṣam | [Su, Sū., 30 6.2]
yastūṣṇam iva gṛhṇāti śītamuṣṇaṃ ca śītavat | [Su, Sū., 30 7.1]
saṃjātaśītapiḍako yaśca dāhena pīḍyate | [Su, Sū., 30 7.2]
uṣṇagātro 'timātraṃ ca yaḥ śītena pravepate | [Su, Sū., 30 8.1]
prahārānnābhijānāti yo 'ṅgacchedamathāpi vā | [Su, Sū., 30 8.2]
pāṃśunevāvakīrṇāni yaśca gātrāṇi manyate | [Su, Sū., 30 9.1]
varṇānyatā vā rājyo vā yasya gātre bhavanti hi | [Su, Sū., 30 9.2]
snātānuliptaṃ yaṃ cāpi bhajante nīlamakṣikāḥ | [Su, Sū., 30 10.1]
sugandhir vāti yo 'kasmāttaṃ bruvanti gatāyuṣam | [Su, Sū., 30 10.2]
viparītena gṛhṇāti rasān yaścopayojitān | [Su, Sū., 30 11.1]
upayuktāḥ kramādyasya rasā doṣābhivṛddhaye | [Su, Sū., 30 11.2]
yasya doṣāgnisāmyaṃ ca kuryurmithyopayojitāḥ | [Su, Sū., 30 12.1]
yo vā rasānna saṃvetti gatāsuṃ taṃ pracakṣate | [Su, Sū., 30 12.2]
sugandhaṃ vetti durgandhaṃ durgandhasya sugandhitām | [Su, Sū., 30 13.1]
gṛhṇīte vānyathā gandhaṃ śānte dīpe ca nīrujaḥ | [Su, Sū., 30 13.2]
yo vā gandhānna jānāti gatāsuṃ taṃ vinirdiśet | [Su, Sū., 30 14.1]
dvandvānyuṣṇahimādīni kālāvasthā diśastathā | [Su, Sū., 30 14.2]
viparītena gṛhṇāti bhāvānanyāṃśca yo naraḥ | [Su, Sū., 30 15.1]
divā jyotīṃṣi yaścāpi jvalitānīva paśyati | [Su, Sū., 30 15.2]
rātrau sūryaṃ jvalantaṃ vā divā vā candravarcasam | [Su, Sū., 30 16.1]
ameghopaplave yaśca śakracāpataḍidguṇān | [Su, Sū., 30 16.2]
taḍittvato 'sitān yo vā nirmale gagane ghanān | [Su, Sū., 30 17.1]
vimānayānaprāsādair yaśca saṃkulamambaram | [Su, Sū., 30 17.2]
yaścānilaṃ mūrtimantamantarikṣaṃ ca paśyati | [Su, Sū., 30 18.1]
dhūmanīhāravāsobhir āvṛtām iva medinīm | [Su, Sū., 30 18.2]
pradīptam iva lokaṃ ca yo vā plutamivāmbhasā | [Su, Sū., 30 19.1]
bhūmim aṣṭāpadākārāṃ lekhābhir yaśca paśyati | [Su, Sū., 30 19.2]
na paśyati sanakṣatrāṃ yaśca devīmarundhatīm | [Su, Sū., 30 20.1]
dhruvam ākāśagaṅgāṃ vā taṃ vadanti gatāyuṣam | [Su, Sū., 30 20.2]
jyotsnādarśoṣṇatoyeṣu chāyāṃ yaśca na paśyati | [Su, Sū., 30 21.1]
paśyatyekāṅgahīnāṃ vā vikṛtāṃ vānyasattvajām | [Su, Sū., 30 21.2]
śvakākakaṅkagṛdhrāṇāṃ pretānāṃ yakṣarakṣasām | [Su, Sū., 30 22.1]
piśācoraganāgānāṃ bhūtānāṃ vikṛtām api | [Su, Sū., 30 22.2]
yo vā mayūrakaṇṭhābhaṃ vidhūmaṃ vahnimīkṣate | [Su, Sū., 30 23.1]
āturasya bhavenmṛtyuḥ svastho vyādhimavāpnuyāt | [Su, Sū., 30 23.2]
{Su, Sū., 31}
athātaś chāyāvipratipattimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 2.1]
śyāvā lohitikā nīlā pītikā vāpi mānavam | [Su, Sū., 31 3.1]
abhidravanti yaṃ chāyāḥ sa parāsur asaṃśayam | [Su, Sū., 31 3.2]
hrīrapakramate yasya prabhādhṛtismṛtiśriyaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 4.1]
akasmādyaṃ bhajante vā sa parāsur asaṃśayam | [Su, Sū., 31 4.2]
yasyādharauṣṭhaḥ patitaḥ kṣiptaścordhvaṃ tathottaraḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 5.1]
ubhau vā jāmbavābhāsau durlabhaṃ tasya jīvitam | [Su, Sū., 31 5.2]
āraktā daśanā yasya śyāvā vā syuḥ patanti vā | [Su, Sū., 31 6.1]
khañjanapratimā vāpi taṃ gatāyuṣamādiśet | [Su, Sū., 31 6.2]
kṛṣṇā stabdhāvaliptā vā jihvā śūnā ca yasya vai | [Su, Sū., 31 7.1]
karkaśā vā bhavedyasya so 'cirād vijahātyasūn | [Su, Sū., 31 7.2]
kuṭilā sphuṭitā vāpi śuṣkā vā yasya nāsikā | [Su, Sū., 31 8.1]
avasphūrjati magnā vā na sa jīvati mānavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 8.2]
saṃkṣipte viṣame stabdhe rakte sraste ca locane | [Su, Sū., 31 9.1]
syātāṃ vā prasrute yasya sa gatāyurnaro dhruvam | [Su, Sū., 31 9.2]
keśāḥ sīmantino yasya saṃkṣipte vinate bhruvau | [Su, Sū., 31 10.1]
lunanti cākṣipakṣmāṇi so 'cirād yāti mṛtyave | [Su, Sū., 31 10.2]
nāharatyannamāsyasthaṃ na dhārayati yaḥ śiraḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 11.1]
ekāgradṛṣṭirmūḍhātmā sadyaḥ prāṇān jahāti saḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 11.2]
balavān durbalo vāpi saṃmohaṃ yo 'dhigacchati | [Su, Sū., 31 12.1]
utthāpyamāno bahuśastaṃ pakvaṃ bhiṣagādiśet | [Su, Sū., 31 12.2]
uttānaḥ sarvadā śete pādau vikurute ca yaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 13.1]
viprasāraṇaśīlo vā na sa jīvati mānavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 13.2]
śītapādakarocchvāsaśchinnocchvāsaś ca yo bhavet | [Su, Sū., 31 14.1]
kākocchvāsaśca yo martyastaṃ dhīraḥ parivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 31 14.2]
nidrā na chidyate yasya yo vā jāgarti sarvadā | [Su, Sū., 31 15.1]
muhyedvā vaktukāmaśca pratyākhyeyaḥ sa jānatā | [Su, Sū., 31 15.2]
uttarauṣṭhaṃ ca yo lihyād utkārāṃśca karoti yaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 16.1]
pretair vā bhāṣate sārdhaṃ pretarūpaṃ tamādiśet | [Su, Sū., 31 16.2]
khebhyaḥ saromakūpebhyo yasya raktaṃ pravartate | [Su, Sū., 31 17.1]
puruṣasyāviṣārtasya sadyo jahyāt sa jīvitam | [Su, Sū., 31 17.2]
vātāṣṭhīlā tu hṛdaye yasyordhvam anuyāyinī | [Su, Sū., 31 18.1]
rujānnavidveṣakarī sa parāsur asaṃśayam | [Su, Sū., 31 18.2]
ananyopadravakṛtaḥ śophaḥ pādasamutthitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 19.1]
puruṣaṃ hanti nārīṃ tu mukhajo guhyajo dvayam | [Su, Sū., 31 19.2]
atisāro jvaro hikkā chardiḥ śūnāṇḍameḍhratā | [Su, Sū., 31 20.1]
śvāsinaḥ kāsino vāpi yasya taṃ kṣīṇamādiśet | [Su, Sū., 31 20.2]
svedo dāhaś ca balavān hikkā śvāsaś ca mānavam | [Su, Sū., 31 21.1]
balavantam api prāṇair viyuñjanti na saṃśayaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 21.2]
śyāvā jihvā bhavedyasya savyaṃ cākṣi nimajjati | [Su, Sū., 31 22.1]
mukhaṃ ca jāyate pūti yasya taṃ parivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 31 22.2]
vaktramāpūryate 'śrubhiḥ svidyataścaraṇāvubhau | [Su, Sū., 31 23.1]
cakṣuścākulatāṃ yāti yamarāṣṭraṃ gamiṣyataḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 23.2]
atimātraṃ laghūni syurgātrāṇi gurukāṇi vā | [Su, Sū., 31 24.1]
yasyākasmāt sa vijñeyo gantā vaivasvatālayam | [Su, Sū., 31 24.2]
paṅkamatsyavasātailaghṛtagandhāṃś ca ye narāḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 25.1]
mṛṣṭagandhāṃś ca ye vānti gantāraste yamālayam | [Su, Sū., 31 25.2]
yūkā lalāṭamāyānti baliṃ nāśnanti vāyasāḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 26.1]
yeṣāṃ vāpi ratirnāsti yātāraste yamālayam | [Su, Sū., 31 26.2]
jvarātisāraśophāḥ syuryasyānyonyāvasādinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 27.1]
prakṣīṇabalamāṃsasya nāsau śakyaścikitsitum | [Su, Sū., 31 27.2]
kṣīṇasya yasya kṣuttṛṣṇe hṛdyair miṣṭair hitaistathā | [Su, Sū., 31 28.1]
na śāmyato 'nnapānaiś ca tasya mṛtyurupasthitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 28.2]
pravāhikā śiraḥśūlaṃ koṣṭhaśūlaṃ ca dāruṇam | [Su, Sū., 31 29.1]
pipāsā balahāniś ca tasya mṛtyurupasthitaḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 29.2]
viṣameṇopacāreṇa karmabhiś ca purākṛtaiḥ | [Su, Sū., 31 30.1]
anityatvācca jantūnāṃ jīvitaṃ nidhanaṃ vrajet | [Su, Sū., 31 30.2]
pretā bhūtāḥ piśācāśca rakṣāṃsi vividhāni ca | [Su, Sū., 31 31.1]
maraṇābhimukhaṃ nityam upasarpanti mānavam | [Su, Sū., 31 31.2]
tāni bheṣajavīryāṇi pratighnanti jighāṃsayā | [Su, Sū., 31 32.1]
tasmān moghāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā bhavantyeva gatāyuṣām | [Su, Sū., 31 32.2]
{Su, Sū., 32}
athātaḥ svabhāvavipratipattim adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 32 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 32 2.1]
svabhāvaprasiddhānāṃ śarīraikadeśānām anyabhāvitvaṃ maraṇāya | [Su, Sū., 32 3.1]
tadyathā śuklānāṃ kṛṣṇatvaṃ kṛṣṇānāṃ śuklatā raktānāmanyavarṇatvaṃ sthirāṇāṃ mṛdutvaṃ mṛdūnāṃ sthiratā calānāmacalatvam acalānāṃ calatā pṛthūnāṃ saṃkṣiptatvaṃ saṃkṣiptānāṃ pṛthutā dīrghānāṃ hrasvatvaṃ hrasvānāṃ dīrghatā apatanadharmiṇāṃ patanadharmitvaṃ patanadharmiṇām apatanadharmitvam akasmāc ca śaityauṣṇyasnaigdhyaraukṣyaprastambhavaivarṇyāvasādanaṃ cāṅgānām | [Su, Sū., 32 3.2]
svebhyaḥ sthānebhyaḥ śarīraikadeśānām avasrastotkṣiptabhrāntāvakṣiptapatitavimuktanirgatāntargatagurulaghutvāni pravālavarṇavyaṅgaprādurbhāvo vāpyakasmāt sirāṇāṃ ca darśanaṃ lalāṭe nāsāvaṃśe vā piḍakotpattiḥ lalāṭe prabhātakāle svedaḥ netrarogādvinā vāśrupravṛttiḥ gomayacūrṇaprakāśasya vā rajaso darśanamuttamāṅge nilayanaṃ vā kapotakaṅkakākaprabhṛtīnāṃ mūtrapurīṣavṛddhir abhuñjānānāṃ tatpraṇāśo bhuñjānānāṃ vā stanamūlahṛdayoraḥsu ca śūlotpattayaḥ madhye śūnatvamanteṣu parimlāyitvaṃ viparyayo vā tathārdhāṅge śvayathuḥ śoṣo 'ṅgapakṣayor vā naṣṭahīnavikalavikṛtasvaratā vā vivarṇapuṣpaprādurbhāvo vā dantamukhanakhaśarīreṣu yasya vāpsu kaphapurīṣaretāṃsi nimajjanti yasya vā dṛṣṭimaṇḍale bhinnavikṛtāni rūpāṇyālokyante snehābhyaktakeśāṅga iva yo bhāti yaś ca durbalo bhaktadveṣātisārābhyāṃ pīḍyate kāsamānaś ca tṛṣṇābhibhūtaḥ kṣīṇaś chardibhaktadveṣayuktaḥ saphenapūyarudhirodvāmī hatasvaraḥ śūlābhipannaś ca manuṣyaḥ śūnakaracaraṇavadanaḥ kṣīṇo 'nnadveṣī srastapiṇḍikāṃsapāṇipādo jvarakāsābhibhūtaḥ yastu pūrvāhṇe bhuktam aparāhṇe chardayatyavidagdhamatisāryate vā jvarakāsābhibhūtaḥ sa śvāsānmriyate bastavadvilapan yaś ca bhūmau patati srastamuṣkaḥ stabdhameḍhro bhagnagrīvaḥ pranaṣṭamehanaś ca manuṣyaḥ prāgviśuṣyamāṇahṛdaya ārdraśarīraḥ yaś ca loṣṭaṃ loṣṭenābhihanti kāṣṭhaṃ kāṣṭhena tṛṇāni vā chinatti adharoṣṭhaṃ daśati uttaroṣṭhaṃ vā leḍhi āluñcati vā karṇau keśāṃś ca devadvijagurusuhṛdvaidyāṃś ca dveṣṭi yasya vakrānuvakragā grahā garhitasthānagatāḥ pīḍayanti janmarkṣaṃ vā yasyolkāśanibhyāmabhihanyate horā vā gṛhadāraśayanāsanayānavāhanamaṇiratnopakaraṇagarhitalakṣaṇanimittaprādurbhāvo veti | [Su, Sū., 32 4.1]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Sū., 32 5.1]
cikitsyamānaḥ samyak ca vikāro yo 'bhivardhate | [Su, Sū., 32 5.2]
prakṣīṇabalamāṃsasya lakṣaṇaṃ tadgatāyuṣaḥ | [Su, Sū., 32 5.3]
nivartate mahāvyādhiḥ sahasā yasya dehinaḥ | [Su, Sū., 32 6.1]
na cāhāraphalaṃ yasya dṛśyate sa vinaśyati | [Su, Sū., 32 6.2]
etānyariṣṭarūpāṇi samyag budhyeta yo bhiṣak | [Su, Sū., 32 7.1]
sādhyāsādhyaparīkṣāyāṃ sa rājñaḥ saṃmato bhavet | [Su, Sū., 32 7.2]
{Su, Sū., 33}
athāto 'vāraṇīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 2.1]
upadravaistu ye juṣṭā vyādhayo yāntyavāryatām | [Su, Sū., 33 3.1]
rasāyanādvinā vatsa tān śṛṇvekamanā mama | [Su, Sū., 33 3.2]
vātavyādhiḥ pramehaś ca kuṣṭhamarśo bhagaṃdaram | [Su, Sū., 33 4.1]
aśmarī mūḍhagarbhaś ca tathaivodaramaṣṭamam | [Su, Sū., 33 4.2]
aṣṭāvete prakṛtyaiva duścikitsyā mahāgadāḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 5.1]
prāṇamāṃsakṣayaśvāsatṛṣṇāśoṣavamījvaraiḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 5.2]
mūrcchātisārahikkābhiḥ punaścaitair upadrutāḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 6.1]
varjanīyā viśeṣeṇa bhiṣajā siddhimicchatā | [Su, Sū., 33 6.2]
śūnaṃ suptatvacaṃ bhagnaṃ kampādhmānanipīḍitam | [Su, Sū., 33 7.1]
naraṃ rujārtamantaś ca vātavyādhirvināśayet | [Su, Sū., 33 7.2]
yathoktopadravāviṣṭam atiprasrutam eva vā | [Su, Sū., 33 8.1]
piḍakāpīḍitaṃ gāḍhaṃ prameho hanti mānavam | [Su, Sū., 33 8.2]
prabhinnaṃ prasrutāṅgaṃ ca raktanetraṃ hatasvaram | [Su, Sū., 33 9.1]
pañcakarmaguṇātītaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ hantīha kuṣṭhinam | [Su, Sū., 33 9.2]
tṛṣṇārocakaśūlārtam atiprasrutaśoṇitam | [Su, Sū., 33 10.1]
śophātīsārasaṃyuktamarśovyādhirvināśayet | [Su, Sū., 33 10.2]
vātamūtrapurīṣāṇi krimayaḥ śukram eva ca | [Su, Sū., 33 11.1]
bhagandarāt prasravanti yasya taṃ parivarjayet | [Su, Sū., 33 11.2]
praśūnanābhivṛṣaṇaṃ ruddhamūtraṃ ruganvitam | [Su, Sū., 33 12.1]
aśmarī kṣapayatyāśu sikatāśarkarānvitā | [Su, Sū., 33 12.2]
garbhakoṣaparāsaṅgo makkallo yonisaṃvṛtiḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 13.1]
hanyāt striyaṃ mūḍhagarbhe yathoktāścāpyupadravāḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 13.2]
pārśvabhaṅgānnavidveṣaśophātīsārapīḍitam | [Su, Sū., 33 14.1]
viriktaṃ pūryamāṇaṃ ca varjayedudarārditam | [Su, Sū., 33 14.2]
yastāmyati visaṃjñaś ca śete nipatito 'pi vā | [Su, Sū., 33 15.1]
śītārdito 'ntaruṣṇaś ca jvareṇa mriyate naraḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 15.2]
yo hṛṣṭaromā raktākṣo hṛdi saṃghātaśūlavān | [Su, Sū., 33 16.1]
nityaṃ vaktreṇa cocchvasyāttaṃ jvaro hanti mānavam | [Su, Sū., 33 16.2]
hikkāśvāsapipāsārtaṃ mūḍhaṃ vibhrāntalocanam | [Su, Sū., 33 17.1]
saṃtatocchvāsinaṃ kṣīṇaṃ naraṃ kṣapayati jvaraḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 17.2]
āvilākṣaṃ pratāmyantaṃ nidrāyuktamatīva ca | [Su, Sū., 33 18.1]
kṣīṇaśoṇitamāṃsaṃ ca naraṃ nāśayati jvaraḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 18.2]
śvāsaśūlapipāsārtaṃ kṣīṇaṃ jvaranipīḍitam | [Su, Sū., 33 19.1]
viśeṣeṇa naraṃ vṛddhamatīsāro vināśayet | [Su, Sū., 33 19.2]
śuklākṣam annadveṣṭāram ūrdhvaśvāsanipīḍitam | [Su, Sū., 33 20.1]
kṛcchreṇa bahu mehantaṃ yakṣmā hantīha mānavam | [Su, Sū., 33 20.2]
śvāsaśūlapipāsānnavidveṣagranthimūḍhatāḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 21.1]
bhavanti durbalatvaṃ ca gulmino mṛtyumeṣyataḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 21.2]
ādhmātaṃ baddhaniṣyandaṃ chardihikkātṛḍanvitam | [Su, Sū., 33 22.1]
rujāśvāsasamāviṣṭaṃ vidradhirnāśayennaram | [Su, Sū., 33 22.2]
pāṇḍudantanakho yaś ca pāṇḍunetraś ca mānavaḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 23.1]
pāṇḍusaṃghātadarśī ca pāṇḍurogī vinaśyati | [Su, Sū., 33 23.2]
lohitaṃ chardayedyastu bahuśo lohitekṣaṇaḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 24.1]
raktānāṃ ca diśāṃ draṣṭā raktapittī vinaśyati | [Su, Sū., 33 24.2]
avāṅmukhastūnmukho vā kṣīṇamāṃsabalo naraḥ | [Su, Sū., 33 25.1]
jāgariṣṇur asaṃdehamunmādena vinaśyati | [Su, Sū., 33 25.2]
bahuśo 'pasmarantaṃ tu prakṣīṇaṃ calitabhruvam | [Su, Sū., 33 26.1]
netrābhyāṃ ca vikurvāṇamapasmāro vināśayet | [Su, Sū., 33 26.2]
{Su, Sū., 34}
athāto yuktasenīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Sū., 34 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Sū., 34 2.1]
yuktasenasya nṛpateḥ parān abhijigīṣataḥ | [Su, Sū., 34 3.1]
bhiṣajā rakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ yathā tadupadekṣyate | [Su, Sū., 34 3.2]
vijigīṣuḥ sahāmātyair yātrāyuktaḥ prayatnataḥ | [Su, Sū., 34 4.1]
rakṣitavyo viśeṣeṇa viṣādeva narādhipaḥ | [Su, Sū., 34 4.2]
panthānamudakaṃ chāyāṃ bhaktaṃ yavasamindhanam | [Su, Sū., 34 5.1]
dūṣayantyarayastacca jānīyācchodhayettathā | [Su, Sū., 34 5.2]
tasya liṅgaṃ cikitsā ca kalpasthāne pravakṣyate | [Su, Sū., 34 5.3]
eka uttaram mṛtyu śatam atharvāṇaḥ pracakṣate | [Su, Sū., 34 2550_1]
tatra ekaḥ kāla saṃyuktaḥ | [Su, Sū., 34 2551_1]
śeṣāḥ āgantavaḥ smṛtāḥ | [Su, Sū., 34 2551_2]
