tatra darvīkarāḥ kṛṣṇasarpo mahākṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇodaraḥ śvetakapoto mahākapoto balāhako mahāsarpaḥ śaṅkhakapālo lohitākṣo gavedhukaḥ parisarpaḥ khaṇḍaphaṇaḥ kakudaḥ padmo mahāpadmo darbhapuṣpo dadhimukhaḥ puṇḍarīko bhrūkuṭīmukho viṣkiraḥ puṣpābhikīrṇo girisarpa ṛjusarpaḥ śvetodaro mahāśirā alagarda āśīviṣa iti maṇḍalinastu ādarśamaṇḍalaḥ śvetamaṇḍalo raktamaṇḍalaś citramaṇḍalaḥ pṛṣato rodhrapuṣpo milindako gonaso vṛddhagonasaḥ panaso mahāpanaso veṇupatrakaḥ śiśuko madanaḥ pālindiraḥ piṅgalas tantukaḥ puṣpapāṇḍuḥ ṣaḍaṅgo 'gniko babhruḥ kaṣāyaḥ kaluṣaḥ pārāvato hastābharaṇaś citraka eṇīpada iti rājimantastu puṇḍarīko rājicitro 'ṅgularājiḥ bindurājiḥ kardamakas tṛṇaśoṣakaḥ sarṣapakaḥ śvetahanuḥ darbhapuṣpaścakrako godhūmakaḥ kikkisāda iti nirviṣāstu galagolī śūkapatro 'jagaro divyako varṣāhikaḥ puṣpaśakalī jyotīrathaḥ kṣīrikāpuṣpako 'hipatāko 'ndhāhiko gaurāhiko vṛkṣeśaya iti vaikarañjāstu trayāṇāṃ darvīkarādīnāṃ vyatikarājjātāḥ tadyathā mākuliḥ poṭagalaḥ snigdharājiriti | [Su, Ka., 4 34.1]
tatra kṛṣṇasarpeṇa gonasyāṃ vaiparītyena vā jāto mākuliḥ rājilena gonasyāṃ vaiparītyena vā jātaḥ poṭagalaḥ kṛṣṇasarpeṇa rājimatyāṃ vaiparītyena vā jātaḥ snigdharājiriti | [Su, Ka., 4 34.2]

tatra darvīkaraviṣeṇa tvaṅnayananakhadaśanavadanamūtrapurīṣadaṃśakṛṣṇatvaṃ raukṣyaṃ śiraso gauravaṃ sandhivedanā kaṭīpṛṣṭhagrīvādaurbalyaṃ jṛmbhaṇaṃ vepathuḥ svarāvasādo ghurghurako jaḍatā śuṣkodgāraḥ kāsaśvāsau hikkā vāyorūrdhvagamanaṃ śūlodveṣṭanaṃ tṛṣṇā lālāsrāvaḥ phenāgamanaṃ sroto'varodhastāstāśca vātavedanā bhavanti maṇḍaliviṣeṇa tvagādīnāṃ pītatvaṃ śītābhilāṣaḥ paridhūpanaṃ dāhastṛṣṇā mado mūrcchā jvaraḥ śoṇitāgamanamūrdhvamadhaśca māṃsānāmavaśātanaṃ śvayathurdaṃśakothaḥ pītarūpadarśanamāśukopastāstāśca pittavedanā bhavanti rājimadviṣeṇa śuklatvaṃ tvagādīnāṃ śītajvaro romaharṣaḥ stabdhatvaṃ gātrāṇāmādaṃśaśophaḥ sāndrakaphaprasekaś chardir abhīkṣṇam akṣṇoḥ kaṇḍūḥ kaṇṭhe śvayathurghurghuraka ucchvāsanirodhas tamaḥpraveśas tāstāśca kaphavedanā bhavanti | [Su, Ka., 4 37.1]

upasargādayo rogā ye cāpyāgantavaḥ smṛtāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 6.2]

yuktārthā yuktayaścaiva doṣabhedāstathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 1 7.2]
yatroktā vividhā arthā rogasādhanahetavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 8.1]
mahatastasya tantrasya durgādhasyāmbudheriva | [Su, Utt., 1 8.2]
ādāvevottamāṅgasthān rogānabhidadhāmyaham | [Su, Utt., 1 9.1]
saṃkhyayā lakṣaṇaiścāpi sādhyāsādhyakrameṇa ca | [Su, Utt., 1 9.2]
vidyād dvyaṅgulabāhulyaṃ svāṅguṣṭhodarasaṃmitam | [Su, Utt., 1 10.1]
dvyaṅgulaṃ sarvataḥ sārdhaṃ bhiṣaṅnayanabudbudam | [Su, Utt., 1 10.2]
suvṛttaṃ gostanākāraṃ sarvabhūtaguṇodbhavam | [Su, Utt., 1 11.1]
palaṃ bhuvo 'gnito raktaṃ vātāt kṛṣṇaṃ sitaṃ jalāt | [Su, Utt., 1 11.2]
ākāśādaśrumārgāśca jāyante netrabudbude | [Su, Utt., 1 12.1]
dṛṣṭiṃ cātra tathā vakṣye yathā brūyād viśāradaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 12.2]
netrāyāmatribhāgaṃ tu kṛṣṇamaṇḍalam ucyate | [Su, Utt., 1 13.1]
kṛṣṇāt saptamam icchanti dṛṣṭiṃ dṛṣṭiviśāradāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 13.2]
maṇḍalāni ca sandhīṃśca paṭalāni ca locane | [Su, Utt., 1 14.1]
yathākramaṃ vijānīyāt pañca ṣaṭ ca ṣaḍeva ca | [Su, Utt., 1 14.2]
pakṣmavartmaśvetakṛṣṇadṛṣṭīnāṃ maṇḍalāni tu | [Su, Utt., 1 15.1]
anupūrvaṃ tu te madhyāścatvāro 'ntyā yathottaram | [Su, Utt., 1 15.2]
pakṣmavartmagataḥ sandhir vartmaśuklagato 'paraḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 16.1]
śuklakṛṣṇagatastvanyaḥ kṛṣṇadṛṣṭigato 'paraḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 16.2]
tataḥ kanīnakagataḥ ṣaṣṭhaścāpāṅgagaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 16.3]
dve vartmapaṭale vidyāccatvāryanyāni cākṣiṇi | [Su, Utt., 1 17.1]
jāyate timiraṃ yeṣu vyādhiḥ paramadāruṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 17.2]
tejojalāśritaṃ bāhyaṃ teṣvanyat piśitāśritam | [Su, Utt., 1 18.1]
medastṛtīyaṃ paṭalamāśritaṃ tvasthi cāparam | [Su, Utt., 1 18.2]
pañcamāṃśasamaṃ dṛṣṭesteṣāṃ bāhulyamiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 1 19.1]
sirāṇāṃ kaṇḍarāṇāṃ ca medasaḥ kālakasya ca | [Su, Utt., 1 19.2]
guṇāḥ kālāt paraḥ śleṣmā bandhane 'kṣṇoḥ sirāyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 20.1]
sirānusāribhir doṣair viguṇairūrdhvamāgataiḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 20.2]
jāyante netrabhāgeṣu rogāḥ paramadāruṇāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 21.1]
tatrāvilaṃ sasaṃrambham aśrukaṇḍūpadehavat | [Su, Utt., 1 21.2]
gurūṣātodarāgādyair juṣṭaṃ cāvyaktalakṣaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 22.1]
saśūlaṃ vartmakośeṣu śūkapūrṇābham eva ca | [Su, Utt., 1 22.2]
vihanyamānaṃ rūpe vā kriyāsvakṣi yathā purā | [Su, Utt., 1 23.1]
dṛṣṭvaiva dhīmān budhyeta doṣeṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ tu tat | [Su, Utt., 1 23.2]
tatra saṃbhavamāsādya yathādoṣaṃ bhiṣagjitam | [Su, Utt., 1 24.1]
vidadhyānnetrajā rogā balavantaḥ syuranyathā | [Su, Utt., 1 24.2]
saṃkṣepataḥ kriyāyogo nidānaparivarjanam | [Su, Utt., 1 25.1]
vātādīnāṃ pratīghātaḥ prokto vistarataḥ punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 25.2]
uṣṇābhitaptasya jalapraveśāddūrekṣaṇāt svapnaviparyayācca | [Su, Utt., 1 26.1]
prasaktasaṃrodanakopaśokakleśābhighātādatimaithunācca | [Su, Utt., 1 26.2]
śuktāranālāmlakulatthamāṣaniṣevaṇādvegavinigrahācca | [Su, Utt., 1 27.1]
svedādatho dhūmaniṣevaṇācca chardervighātādvamanātiyogāt | [Su, Utt., 1 27.2]
bāṣpagrahāt sūkṣmanirīkṣaṇācca netre vikārān janayanti doṣāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 28.1]
vātāddaśa tathā pittāt kaphāccaiva trayodaśa | [Su, Utt., 1 28.2]
raktāt ṣoḍaśa vijñeyāḥ sarvajāḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 29.1]
tathā bāhyau punardvau ca rogāḥ ṣaṭsaptatiḥ smṛtāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 29.2]
hatādhimantho nimiṣo dṛṣṭirgambhīrikā ca yā | [Su, Utt., 1 29.3]
yacca vātahataṃ vartma na te sidhyanti vātajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 30.1]
yāpyo 'tha tanmayaḥ kācaḥ sādhyāḥ syuḥsānyamārutāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 30.2]
śuṣkākṣipākādhīmanthasyandamārutaparyayāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 31.1]
asādhyo hrasvajāḍyo yo jalasrāvaśca paittikaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 31.2]
parimlāyī ca nīlaśca yāpyaḥ kāco 'tha tanmayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 32.1]
abhiṣyando 'dhimantho 'mlādhyuṣitaṃ śuktikā ca yā | [Su, Utt., 1 32.2]
dṛṣṭiḥ pittavidagdhā ca dhūmadarśī ca sidhyati | [Su, Utt., 1 33.1]
asādhyaḥ kaphajaḥ srāvo yāpyaḥ kācaśca tanmayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 33.2]
abhiṣyando 'dhimanthaśca balāsagrathitaṃ ca yat | [Su, Utt., 1 34.1]
dṛṣṭiḥ śleṣmavidagdhā ca pothakyo lagaṇaśca yaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 34.2]
krimigranthipariklinnavartmaśuklārmapiṣṭakāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 35.1]
śleṣmopanāhaḥ sādhyāstu kathitāḥ śleṣmajeṣu tu | [Su, Utt., 1 35.2]
raktasrāvo 'jakājātaṃ śoṇitārśovraṇānvitam | [Su, Utt., 1 36.1]
śukraṃ na sādhyaṃ kācaśca yāpyastajjaḥ prakīrtitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 36.2]
manthasyandau kliṣṭavartma harṣotpātau tathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 1 37.1]
sirājātāñjanākhyā ca sirājālaṃ ca yat smṛtam | [Su, Utt., 1 37.2]
parvaṇyathāvraṇaṃ śukraṃ śoṇitārmārjunaśca yaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 38.1]
ete sādhyā vikāreṣu raktajeṣu bhavanti hi | [Su, Utt., 1 38.2]
pūyāsrāvo nākulāndhyam akṣipākātyayo 'lajī | [Su, Utt., 1 39.1]
asādhyāḥ sarvajā yāpyaḥ kācaḥ kopaśca pakṣmaṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 39.2]
vartmāvabandho yo vyādhiḥ sirāsu piḍakā ca yā | [Su, Utt., 1 40.1]
prastāryarmādhimāṃsārma snāyvarmotsaṅginī ca yā | [Su, Utt., 1 40.2]
pūyālasaścārbudaṃ ca śyāvakardamavartmanī | [Su, Utt., 1 41.1]
tathārśovartma śuṣkārśaḥ śarkarāvartma yacca vai | [Su, Utt., 1 41.2]
saśophaś cāpyaśophaśca pāko bahalavartma ca | [Su, Utt., 1 42.1]
aklinnavartma kumbhīkā bisavartma ca sidhyati | [Su, Utt., 1 42.2]
sanimitto 'nimittaśca dvāvasādhyau tu bāhyajau | [Su, Utt., 1 43.1]
ṣaṭsaptatirvikārāṇāmeṣā saṃgrahakīrtitā | [Su, Utt., 1 43.2]
nava sandhyāśrayāsteṣu vartmajāstvekaviṃśatiḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 44.1]
śuklabhāge daśaikaśca catvāraḥ kṛṣṇabhāgajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 44.2]
sarvāśrayāḥ saptadaśa dṛṣṭijā dvādaśaiva tu | [Su, Utt., 1 45.1]
bāhyajau dvau samākhyātau rogau paramadāruṇau | [Su, Utt., 1 45.2]
bhūya etān pravakṣyāmi saṃkhyārūpacikitsitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 1 45.3]
{Su, Utt., 2}
athātaḥ saṃdhigatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 2]
pūyālasaḥ sopanāhaḥ srāvāḥ parvaṇikālajī | [Su, Utt., 2 3.1]
krimigranthiśca vijñeyā rogāḥ sandhigatā nava | [Su, Utt., 2 3.2]
pakvaḥ śophaḥ sandhijaḥ saṃsravedyaḥ sāndraṃ pūyaṃ pūti pūyālasaḥ saḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 4.1]
granthirnālpo dṛṣṭisandhāvapākaḥ kaṇḍūprāyo nīrujastūpanāhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 4.2]
gatvā sandhīnaśrumārgeṇa doṣāḥ kuryuḥ srāvān rugvihīnān kanīnāt | [Su, Utt., 2 5.1]
tān vai srāvān netranāḍīmathaike tasyā liṅgaṃ kīrtayiṣye caturdhā | [Su, Utt., 2 5.2]
pākaḥ sandhau saṃsravedyaśca pūyaṃ pūyāsrāvo naikarūpaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 6.1]
śvetaṃ sāndraṃ picchilaṃ saṃsravedyaḥ śleṣmāsrāvo nīrujaḥ sa pradiṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 6.2]
raktāsrāvaḥ śoṇitotthaḥ saraktamuṣṇaṃ nālpaṃ saṃsravennātisāndram | [Su, Utt., 2 7.1]
pītābhāsaṃ nīlamuṣṇaṃ jalābhaṃ pittāsrāvaḥ saṃsravet sandhimadhyāt | [Su, Utt., 2 7.2]
tāmrā tanvī dāhaśūlopapannā raktājjñeyā parvaṇī vṛttaśophā | [Su, Utt., 2 8.1]
jātā sandhau kṛṣṇaśukle 'lajī syāttasminneva khyāpitā pūrvaliṅgaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 8.2]
krimigranthirvartmanaḥ pakṣmaṇaś ca kaṇḍūṃ kuryuḥ krimayaḥ sandhijātāḥ | [Su, Utt., 2 9.1]
nānārūpā vartmaśuklasya sandhau caranto 'ntarnayanaṃ dūṣayanti | [Su, Utt., 2 9.2]
{Su, Utt., 3}
athāto vartmagatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 2.1]
pṛthagdoṣāḥ samastā vā yadā vartmavyapāśrayāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 3.1]
sirā vyāpyāvatiṣṭhante vartmasvadhikamūrchitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 3.2]
vivardhya māṃsaṃ raktaṃ ca tadā vartmavyapāśrayān | [Su, Utt., 3 4.1]
vikārāñjanayantyāśu nāmatastānnibodhata | [Su, Utt., 3 4.2]
utsaṅginyatha kumbhīkā pothakyo vartmaśarkarā | [Su, Utt., 3 5.1]
tathārśovartma śuṣkārśastathaivāñjananāmikā | [Su, Utt., 3 5.2]
bahalaṃ vartma yaccāpi vyādhirvartmāvabandhakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 6.1]
kliṣṭakardamavartmākhyau śyāvavartma tathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 3 6.2]
praklinnamapariklinnaṃ vartma vātahataṃ tu yat | [Su, Utt., 3 7.1]
arbudaṃ nimiṣaścāpi śoṇitārśaśca yat smṛtam | [Su, Utt., 3 7.2]
lagaṇo biśanāmā ca pakṣmakopastathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 3 8.1]
ekaviṃśatirityete vikārā vartmasaṃśrayāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 8.2]
nāmabhiste samuddiṣṭā lakṣaṇaistān pracakṣmahe | [Su, Utt., 3 9.1]
abhyantaramukhī bāhyotsaṅge 'dho vartmanaśca yā | [Su, Utt., 3 9.2]
vijñeyotsaṅginī nāma tadrūpapiḍakācitā | [Su, Utt., 3 10.1]
kumbhīkabījapratimāḥ piḍakā yāstu vartmajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 10.2]
ādhmāpayanti bhinnā yāḥ kumbhīkapiḍakāstu tāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 11.1]
srāviṇyaḥ kaṇḍurā gurvyo raktasarṣapasannibhāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 11.2]
piḍakāśca rujāvatyaḥ pothakya iti saṃjñitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 11.3]
piḍakābhiḥ susūkṣmābhir ghanābhirabhisaṃvṛtā | [Su, Utt., 3 12.1]
piḍakā yā kharā sthūlā sā jñeyā vartmaśarkarā | [Su, Utt., 3 12.2]
ervārubījapratimāḥ piḍakā mandavedanāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 13.1]
sūkṣmāḥ kharāśca vartmasthāstadarśovartma kīrtyate | [Su, Utt., 3 13.2]
dīrgho 'ṅkuraḥ kharaḥ stabdho dāruṇo vartmasaṃbhavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 14.1]
vyādhireṣa samākhyātaḥ śuṣkārśa iti saṃjñitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 14.2]
dāhatodavatī tāmrā piḍakā vartmasaṃbhavā | [Su, Utt., 3 15.1]
mṛdvī mandarujā sūkṣmā jñeyā sāñjananāmikā | [Su, Utt., 3 15.2]
vartmopacīyate yasya piḍakābhiḥ samantataḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 16.1]
savarṇābhiḥ samābhiśca vidyādbahalavartma tat | [Su, Utt., 3 16.2]
kaṇḍūmatālpatodena vartmaśophena yo naraḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 17.1]
na samaṃ chādayedakṣi bhavedbandhaḥ sa vartmanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 17.2]
mṛdvalpavedanaṃ tāmraṃ yadvartma samam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 3 18.1]
akasmācca bhavedraktaṃ kliṣṭavartma tadādiśet | [Su, Utt., 3 18.2]
kliṣṭaṃ punaḥ pittayutaṃ vidahecchoṇitaṃ yadā | [Su, Utt., 3 19.1]
tadā klinnatvamāpannam ucyate vartmakardamaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 19.2]
yadvartma bāhyato 'ntaśca śyāvaṃ śūnaṃ savedanam | [Su, Utt., 3 20.1]
dāhakaṇḍūparikledi śyāvavartmeti tanmatam | [Su, Utt., 3 20.2]
arujaṃ bāhyataḥ śūnamantaḥ klinnaṃ sravatyapi | [Su, Utt., 3 21.1]
kaṇḍūnistodabhūyiṣṭhaṃ klinnavartma taducyate | [Su, Utt., 3 21.2]
yasya dhautāni dhautāni sambadhyante punaḥ punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 22.1]
vartmānyaparipakvāni vidyādaklinnavartma tat | [Su, Utt., 3 22.2]
vimuktasandhi niśceṣṭaṃ vartma yasya na mīlyate | [Su, Utt., 3 23.1]
etadvātahataṃ vidyāt sarujaṃ yadi vārujam | [Su, Utt., 3 23.2]
vartmāntarasthaṃ viṣamaṃ granthibhūtamavedanam | [Su, Utt., 3 24.1]
vijñeyamarbudaṃ puṃsāṃ saraktamavalambitam | [Su, Utt., 3 24.2]
nimeṣaṇīḥ sirā vāyuḥ praviṣṭo vartmasaṃśrayāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 25.1]
cālayatyati vartmāni nimeṣaḥ sa gado mataḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 25.2]
chinnāśchinnā vivardhante vartmasthā mṛdavo 'ṅkurāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 26.1]
dāhakaṇḍūrujopetāste 'rśaḥ śoṇitasaṃbhavāḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 26.2]
apākaḥ kaṭhinaḥ sthūlo granthirvartmabhavo 'rujaḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 27.1]
sakaṇḍūḥ picchilaḥ kolapramāṇo lagaṇastu saḥ | [Su, Utt., 3 27.2]
śūnaṃ yadvartma bahubhiḥ sūkṣmaiśchidraiḥ samanvitam | [Su, Utt., 3 28.1]
bisamantarjala iva bisavartmeti tanmatam | [Su, Utt., 3 28.2]
doṣāḥ pakṣmāśayagatāstīkṣṇāgrāṇi kharāṇi ca | [Su, Utt., 3 29.1]
nirvartayanti pakṣmāṇi tair ghuṣṭaṃ cākṣi dūyate | [Su, Utt., 3 29.2]
uddhṛtairuddhṛtaiḥ śāntiḥ pakṣmabhiścopajāyate | [Su, Utt., 3 30.1]
vātātapānaladveṣī pakṣmakopaḥ sa ucyate | [Su, Utt., 3 30.2]
{Su, Utt., 4}
athātaḥ śuklagatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 2.1]
prastāriśuklakṣatajādhimāṃsasrāyvarmasaṃjñāḥ khalu pañca rogāḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 3.1]
syuḥ śuktikā cārjunapiṣṭakau ca jālaṃ sirāṇāṃ piḍakāśca yāḥ syuḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 3.2]
rogā balāsagrathitena sārdhamekādaśākṣṇoḥ khalu śuklabhāge | [Su, Utt., 4 4.1]
prastāri prathitamihārma śuklabhāge vistīrṇaṃ tanu rudhiraprabhaṃ sanīlam | [Su, Utt., 4 4.2]
śuklākhyaṃ mṛdu kathayanti śuklabhāge saśvetaṃ samamiha vardhate cireṇa | [Su, Utt., 4 5.1]
yanmāṃsaṃ pracayam upaiti śuklabhāge padmābhaṃ tadupadiśanti lohitārma | [Su, Utt., 4 5.2]
vistīrṇaṃ mṛdu bahalaṃ yakṛtprakāśaṃ śyāvaṃ vā tad adhikamāṃsajārma vidyāt | [Su, Utt., 4 6.1]
śukle yat piśitam upaiti vṛddhimetat snāyvarmetyabhipaṭhitaṃ kharaṃ prapāṇḍu | [Su, Utt., 4 6.2]
śyāvāḥ syuḥ piśitanibhāśca bindavo ye śuktyābhāḥ sitanayane sa śuktisaṃjñaḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 7.1]
eko yaḥ śaśarudhiropamastu binduḥ śuklastho bhavati tamarjunaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 4 7.2]
utsannaḥ salilanibho 'tha piṣṭaśuklo binduryo bhavati sa piṣṭakaḥ suvṛttaḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 8.1]
jālābhaḥ kaṭhinasiro mahān saraktaḥ saṃtānaḥ smṛta iha jālasaṃjñitastu | [Su, Utt., 4 8.2]
śuklasthāḥ sitapiḍakāḥ sirāvṛtā yāstā vidyādasitasamīpajāḥ sirājāḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 9.1]
kāṃsyābho bhavati site 'mbubindutulyaḥ sa jñeyo 'mṛdurarujo balāsakākhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 4 9.2]
{Su, Utt., 5}
athātaḥ kṛṣṇagatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 5 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 5 2.1]
yat savraṇaṃ śuklamathāvraṇaṃ vā pākātyayaścāpyajakā tathaiva | [Su, Utt., 5 3.1]
catvāra ete 'bhihitā vikārāḥ kṛṣṇāśrayāḥ saṃgrahataḥ purastāt | [Su, Utt., 5 3.2]
nimagnarūpaṃ hi bhavettu kṛṣṇe sūcyeva viddhaṃ pratibhāti yadvai | [Su, Utt., 5 4.1]
srāvaṃ sraveduṣṇamatīva ruk ca tat savraṇaṃ śukramudāharanti | [Su, Utt., 5 4.2]
dṛṣṭeḥ samīpe na bhavettu yacca na cāvagāḍhaṃ na ca saṃsraveddhi | [Su, Utt., 5 5.1]
avedanāvanna ca yugmaśukraṃ tatsiddhimāpnoti kadācideva | [Su, Utt., 5 5.2]
vicchinnamadhyaṃ piśitāvṛtaṃ vā calaṃ sirāsaktamadṛṣṭikṛcca | [Su, Utt., 5 6.1]
dvitvaggataṃ lohitamantataśca cirotthitaṃ cāpi vivarjanīyam | [Su, Utt., 5 6.2]
uṣṇāśrupātaḥ piḍakā ca kṛṣṇe yasmin bhavenmudganibhaṃ ca śukram | [Su, Utt., 5 7.1]
tadapyasādhyaṃ pravadanti kecidanyacca yattittiripakṣatulyam | [Su, Utt., 5 7.2]
sitaṃ yadā bhātyasitapradeśe syandātmakaṃ nātirugaśruyuktam | [Su, Utt., 5 8.1]
vihāyasīvācchaghanānukāri tadavraṇaṃ sādhyatamaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 5 8.2]
gambhīrajātaṃ bahalaṃ ca śukraṃ cirotthitaṃ cāpi vadanti kṛcchram | [Su, Utt., 5 9.1]
saṃchādyate śvetanibhena sarvaṃ doṣeṇa yasyāsitamaṇḍalaṃ tu | [Su, Utt., 5 9.2]
tam akṣipākātyayam akṣikopasamutthitaṃ tīvrarujaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 5 10.1]
ajāpurīṣapratimo rujāvān salohito lohitapicchilāśruḥ | [Su, Utt., 5 10.2]
vidārya kṛṣṇaṃ pracayo 'bhyupaiti taṃ cājakājātamiti vyavasyet | [Su, Utt., 5 10.3]
{Su, Utt., 6}
athātaḥ sarvagatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 2]
syandāstu catvāra ihopadiṣṭāstāvanta eveha tathādhimanthāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 3.1]
śophānvito 'śophayutaśca pākāvityevamete daśa sampradiṣṭāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 3.2]
hatādhimantho 'nilaparyayaśca śuṣkākṣipāko 'nyata eva vātaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 4.1]
dṛṣṭis tathāmlādhyuṣitā sirāṇāmutpātaharṣāvapi sarvabhāgāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 4.2]
prāyeṇa sarve nayanāmayāstu bhavantyabhiṣyandanimittamūlāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 5.1]
tasmād abhiṣyandam udīryamāṇam upācaredāśu hitāya dhīmān | [Su, Utt., 6 5.2]
nistodanaṃ stambhanaromaharṣasaṃgharṣapāruṣyaśirobhitāpāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 6.1]
viśuṣkabhāvaḥ śiśirāśrutā ca vātābhipanne nayane bhavanti | [Su, Utt., 6 6.2]
dāhaprapākau śiśirābhinandā dhūmāyanaṃ bāṣpasamucchrayaśca | [Su, Utt., 6 7.1]
uṣṇāśrutā pītakanetratā ca pittābhipanne nayane bhavanti | [Su, Utt., 6 7.2]
uṣṇābhinandā gurutākṣiśophaḥ kaṇḍūpadehau sitatātiśaityam | [Su, Utt., 6 8.1]
srāvo muhuḥ picchila eva cāpi kaphābhipanne nayane bhavanti | [Su, Utt., 6 8.2]
tāmrāśrutā lohitanetratā ca rājyaḥ samantādatilohitāśca | [Su, Utt., 6 9.1]
pittasya liṅgāni ca yāni tāni raktābhipanne nayane bhavanti | [Su, Utt., 6 9.2]
vṛddhairetairabhiṣyandair narāṇāmakriyāvatām | [Su, Utt., 6 10.1]
tāvantastvadhimanthāḥ syurnayane tīvravedanāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 10.2]
utpāṭyata ivātyarthaṃ netraṃ nirmathyate tathā | [Su, Utt., 6 11.1]
śiraso'rdhaṃ ca taṃ vidyādadhimanthaṃ svalakṣaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 11.2]
netramutpāṭyata iva mathyate 'raṇivacca yat | [Su, Utt., 6 12.1]
saṃgharṣatodanirbhedamāṃsasaṃrabdham āvilam | [Su, Utt., 6 12.2]
kuñcanāsphoṭanādhmānavepathuvyathanair yutam | [Su, Utt., 6 13.1]
śiraso'rdhaṃ ca yena syādadhimanthaḥ sa mārutāt | [Su, Utt., 6 13.2]
raktarājicitaṃ srāvi vahninevāvadahyate | [Su, Utt., 6 14.1]
yakṛtpiṇḍopamaṃ dāhi kṣāreṇāktam iva kṣatam | [Su, Utt., 6 14.2]
prapakvocchūnavartmāntaṃ sasvedaṃ pītadarśanam | [Su, Utt., 6 15.1]
mūrcchāśirodāhayutaṃ pittenākṣyadhimanthitam | [Su, Utt., 6 15.2]
śophavan nātisaṃrabdhaṃ srāvakaṇḍūsamanvitam | [Su, Utt., 6 16.1]
śaityagauravapaicchilyadūṣikāharṣaṇānvitam | [Su, Utt., 6 16.2]
rūpaṃ paśyati duḥkhena pāṃśupūrṇamivāvilam | [Su, Utt., 6 17.1]
nāsādhmānaśiroduḥkhayutaṃ śleṣmādhimanthitam | [Su, Utt., 6 17.2]
bandhujīvapratīkāśaṃ tāmyati sparśanākṣamam | [Su, Utt., 6 18.1]
raktāsrāvaṃ sanistodaṃ paśyatyagninibhā diśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 18.2]
raktamagnāriṣṭavacca kṛṣṇabhāgaśca lakṣyate | [Su, Utt., 6 19.1]
yaddīptaṃ raktaparyantaṃ tadraktenādhimanthitam | [Su, Utt., 6 19.2]
hanyāddṛṣṭiṃ saptarātrāt kaphottho 'dhīmantho 'sṛksaṃbhavaḥ pañcarātrāt | [Su, Utt., 6 20.1]
ṣaḍrātrādvai mārutottho nihanyānmithyācārāt paittikaḥ sadya eva | [Su, Utt., 6 20.2]
kaṇḍūpadehāśruyutaḥ pakvodumbarasannibhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 21.1]
dāhasaṃharṣatāmratvaśophanistodagauravaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 21.2]
juṣṭo muhuḥ sraveccāsramuṣṇaśītāmbu picchilam | [Su, Utt., 6 22.1]
saṃrambhī pacyate yaśca netrapākaḥ saśophajaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 22.2]
śophahīnāni liṅgāni netrapāke tvaśophaje | [Su, Utt., 6 23.1]
upekṣaṇādakṣi yadādhimantho vātātmakaḥ sādayati prasahya | [Su, Utt., 6 23.2]
rujābhirugrābhirasādhya eṣa hatādhimanthaḥ khalu nāma rogaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 23.3]
antaḥsirāṇāṃ śvasanaḥ sthito dṛṣṭiṃ pratikṣipan | [Su, Utt., 6 24.1]
hatādhimanthaṃ janayettamasādhyaṃ vidurbudhāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 24.2]
pakṣmadvayākṣibhruvam āśritastu yatrānilaḥ saṃcarati praduṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 25.1]
paryāyaśaścāpi rujaḥ karoti taṃ vātaparyāyamudāharanti | [Su, Utt., 6 25.2]
yat kūṇitaṃ dāruṇarūkṣavartma vilokane cāviladarśanaṃ yat | [Su, Utt., 6 26.1]
sudāruṇaṃ yat pratibodhane ca śuṣkākṣipākopahataṃ tadakṣi | [Su, Utt., 6 26.2]
yasyāvaṭūkarṇaśirohanustho manyāgato vāpyanilo 'nyato vā | [Su, Utt., 6 27.1]
kuryādrujo 'ti bhruvi locane vā tamanyatovātamudāharanti | [Su, Utt., 6 27.2]
amlena bhuktena vidāhinā ca saṃchādyate sarvata eva netram | [Su, Utt., 6 28.1]
śophānvitaṃ lohitakaiḥ sanīlair etādṛg amlādhyuṣitaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 6 28.2]
avedanā vāpi savedanā vā yasyākṣirājyo hi bhavanti tāmrāḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 29.1]
muhurvirajyanti ca tāḥ samantād vyādhiḥ sirotpāta iti pradiṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 29.2]
mohāt sirotpāta upekṣitastu jāyeta rogastu sirāpraharṣaḥ | [Su, Utt., 6 30.1]
tāmrācchamasraṃ sravati pragāḍhaṃ tathā na śaknotyabhivīkṣituṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 6 30.2]
{Su, Utt., 7}
athāto dṛṣṭigatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 2.1]
masūradalamātrāṃ tu pañcabhūtaprasādajām | [Su, Utt., 7 3.1]
khadyotavisphuliṅgābhāmiddhāṃ tejobhiravyayaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 3.2]
āvṛtāṃ paṭalenākṣṇor bāhyena vivarākṛtim | [Su, Utt., 7 4.1]
śītasātmyāṃ nṛṇāṃ dṛṣṭimāhur nayanacintakāḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 4.2]
rogāṃstadāśrayān ghorān ṣaṭ ca ṣaṭ ca pracakṣmahe | [Su, Utt., 7 5.1]
paṭalānupraviṣṭasya timirasya ca lakṣaṇam | [Su, Utt., 7 5.2]
sirābhirabhisamprāpya viguṇo 'bhyantare bhṛśam | [Su, Utt., 7 6.1]
prathame paṭale doṣo yasya dṛṣṭau vyavasthitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 6.2]
avyaktāni sa rūpāṇi sarvāṇyeva prapaśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 7.1]
dṛṣṭirbhṛśaṃ vihvalati dvitīyaṃ paṭalaṃ gate | [Su, Utt., 7 7.2]
makṣikā maśakān keśāñjālakāni ca paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 8.1]
maṇḍalāni patākāṃśca marīcīḥ kuṇḍalāni ca | [Su, Utt., 7 8.2]
pariplavāṃśca vividhān varṣamabhraṃ tamāṃsi ca | [Su, Utt., 7 9.1]
dūrasthānyapi rūpāṇi manyate ca samīpataḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 9.2]
samīpasthāni dūre ca dṛṣṭergocaravibhramāt | [Su, Utt., 7 10.1]
yatnavān api cātyarthaṃ sūcīpāśaṃ na paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 10.2]
ūrdhvaṃ paśyati nādhastāttṛtīyaṃ paṭalaṃ gate | [Su, Utt., 7 11.1]
mahāntyapi ca rūpāṇi chāditānīva vāsasā | [Su, Utt., 7 11.2]
karṇanāsākṣiyuktāni viparītāni vīkṣate | [Su, Utt., 7 12.1]
yathādoṣaṃ ca rajyeta dṛṣṭirdoṣe balīyasi | [Su, Utt., 7 12.2]
adhaḥsthite samīpasthaṃ dūrasthaṃ coparisthite | [Su, Utt., 7 13.1]
pārśvasthite tathā doṣe pārśvasthāni na paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 13.2]
samantataḥ sthite doṣe saṃkulānīva paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 14.1]
dṛṣṭimadhyagate doṣe sa ekaṃ manyate dvidhā | [Su, Utt., 7 14.2]
dvidhāsthite tridhā paśyedbahudhā cānavasthite | [Su, Utt., 7 15.1]
timirākhyaḥ sa vai doṣaḥ caturthaṃ paṭalaṃ gataḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 15.2]
ruṇaddhi sarvato dṛṣṭiṃ liṅganāśaḥ sa ucyate | [Su, Utt., 7 16.1]
tasminn api tamobhūte nātirūḍhe mahāgade | [Su, Utt., 7 16.2]
candrādityau sanakṣatrāvantarīkṣe ca vidyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 17.1]
nirmalāni ca tejāṃsi bhrājiṣṇūni ca paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 17.2]
sa eva liṅganāśastu nīlikākācasaṃjñitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 18.1]
tatra vātena rūpāṇi bhramantīva sa paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 18.2]
āvilānyaruṇābhāni vyāviddhāni ca mānavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 19.1]
pittenādityakhadyotaśakracāpataḍidguṇān | [Su, Utt., 7 19.2]
śikhibarhavicitrāṇi nīlakṛṣṇāni paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 20.1]
kaphena paśyedrūpāṇi snigdhāni ca sitāni ca | [Su, Utt., 7 20.2]
gauracāmaragaurāṇi śvetābhrapratimāni ca | [Su, Utt., 7 21.1]
paśyedasūkṣmāṇyatyarthaṃ vyabhre caivābhrasaṃplavam | [Su, Utt., 7 21.2]
salilaplāvitānīva parijāḍyāni mānavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 22.1]
tathā raktena raktāni tamāṃsi vividhāni ca | [Su, Utt., 7 22.2]
haritaśyāvakṛṣṇāni dhūmadhūmrāṇi cekṣate | [Su, Utt., 7 23.1]
sannipātena citrāṇi viplutāni ca paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 23.2]
bahudhā vā dvidhā vāpi sarvāṇyeva samantataḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 24.1]
hīnādhikāṅgānyathavā jyotīṃṣyapi ca paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 24.2]
pittaṃ kuryāt parimlāyi mūrchitaṃ raktatejasā | [Su, Utt., 7 25.1]
pītā diśastathodyantamādityam iva paśyati | [Su, Utt., 7 25.2]
vikīryamāṇān khadyotair vṛkṣāṃstejobhireva ca | [Su, Utt., 7 26.1]
vakṣyāmi ṣaḍvidhaṃ rāgair liṅganāśamataḥ param | [Su, Utt., 7 26.2]
rāgo 'ruṇo mārutajaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ pittāt parimlāyyathavāpi nīlaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 27.1]
kaphāt sitaḥ śoṇitajastu raktaḥ samastadoṣo 'tha vicitrarūpaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 27.2]
raktajaṃ maṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭau sthūlakācānalaprabham | [Su, Utt., 7 28.1]
parimlāyini roge syānmlāyyānīlaṃ ca maṇḍalam | [Su, Utt., 7 28.2]
doṣakṣayāt kadācit syātsvayaṃ tatra ca darśanam | [Su, Utt., 7 29.1]
aruṇaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vātāccañcalaṃ paruṣaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 7 29.2]
pittānmaṇḍalamānīlaṃ kāṃsyābhaṃ pītam eva vā | [Su, Utt., 7 30.1]
śleṣmaṇā bahalaṃ snigdhaṃ śaṅkhakundendupāṇḍuram | [Su, Utt., 7 30.2]
calatpadmapalāśasthaḥ śuklo bindurivāmbhasaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 31.1]
saṃkucatyātape 'tyarthaṃ chāyāyāṃ vistṛto bhavet | [Su, Utt., 7 31.2]
mṛdyamāne ca nayane maṇḍalaṃ tadvisarpati | [Su, Utt., 7 32.1]
pravālapadmapatrābhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ śoṇitātmakam | [Su, Utt., 7 32.2]
dṛṣṭirāgo bhaveccitro liṅganāśe tridoṣaje | [Su, Utt., 7 33.1]
yathāsvaṃ doṣaliṅgāni sarveṣveva bhavanti hi | [Su, Utt., 7 33.2]
ṣaḍ liṅganāśāḥ ṣaḍime ca rogā dṛṣṭyāśrayāḥ ṣaṭ ca ṣaḍeva ca syuḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 34.1]
tathā naraḥ pittavidagdhadṛṣṭiḥ kaphena cānyastvatha dhūmadarśī | [Su, Utt., 7 34.2]
yo hrasvajāḍyo nakulāndhatā ca gambhīrasaṃjñā ca tathaiva dṛṣṭiḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 35.1]
pittena duṣṭena gatena dṛṣṭiṃ pītā bhavedyasya narasya dṛṣṭiḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 35.2]
pītāni rūpāṇi ca manyate yaḥ sa mānavaḥ pittavidagdhadṛṣṭiḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 36.1]
prāpte tṛtīyaṃ paṭalaṃ tu doṣe divā na paśyenniśi vīkṣate ca | [Su, Utt., 7 36.2]
rātrau sa śītānugṛhītadṛṣṭiḥ pittālpabhāvād api tāni paśyet | [Su, Utt., 7 37.1]
tathā naraḥ śleṣmavidagdhadṛṣṭistānyeva śuklāni hi manyate tu | [Su, Utt., 7 37.2]
triṣu sthito'lpaḥ paṭaleṣu doṣo naktāndhyamāpādayati prasahya | [Su, Utt., 7 38.1]
divā sa sūryānugṛhītacakṣurīkṣeta rūpāṇi kaphālpabhāvāt | [Su, Utt., 7 38.2]
śokajvarāyāsaśiro'bhitāpair abhyāhatā yasya narasya dṛṣṭiḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 39.1]
sadhūmakān paśyati sarvabhāvāṃstaṃ dhūmadarśīti vadanti rogam | [Su, Utt., 7 39.2]
sa hrasvajāḍyo divaseṣu kṛcchrāddhrasvāni rūpāṇi ca yena paśyet | [Su, Utt., 7 40.1]
vidyotate yena narasya dṛṣṭirdoṣābhipannā nakulasya yadvat | [Su, Utt., 7 40.2]
citrāṇi rūpāṇi divā sa paśyet sa vai vikāro nakulāndhyasaṃjñaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 41.1]
dṛṣṭirvirūpā śvasanopasṛṣṭā saṃkucyate 'bhyantarataśca yāti | [Su, Utt., 7 41.2]
rujāvagāḍhā ca tamakṣirogaṃ gambhīriketi pravadanti tajjñāḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 42.1]
bāhyau punardvāviha sampradiṣṭau nimittataścāpyanimittataśca | [Su, Utt., 7 42.2]
nimittatastatra śiro'bhitāpājjñeyas tvabhiṣyandanidarśanaiśca | [Su, Utt., 7 43.1]
surarṣigandharvamahoragāṇāṃ saṃdarśanenāpi ca bhāsvarāṇām | [Su, Utt., 7 43.2]
hanyeta dṛṣṭirmanujasya yasya sa liṅganāśastvanimittasaṃjñaḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 44.1]
tatrākṣi vispaṣṭamivāvabhāti vaidūryavarṇā vimalā ca dṛṣṭiḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 44.2]
vidīryate sīdati hīyate vā nṝṇām abhīghātahatā tu dṛṣṭiḥ | [Su, Utt., 7 45.1]
ityete nayanagatā mayā vikārāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ pṛthagiha ṣaṭ ca saptatiśca | [Su, Utt., 7 46.1]
eteṣāṃ pṛthagiha vistareṇa sarvaṃ vakṣye 'haṃ tadanu cikitsitaṃ yathāvat | [Su, Utt., 7 46.2]
{Su, Utt., 8}
athātaścikitsitapravibhāgavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 2.1]
ṣaṭsaptatirye 'bhihitā vyādhayo nāmalakṣaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 3.1]
cikitsitamidaṃ teṣāṃ samāsavyāsataḥ śṛṇu | [Su, Utt., 8 3.2]
chedyāsteṣu daśaikaśca nava lekhyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 4.1]
bhedyāḥ pañca vikārāḥ syurvyadhyāḥ pañcadaśaiva tu | [Su, Utt., 8 4.2]
dvādaśāśastrakṛtyāśca yāpyāḥ sapta bhavanti hi | [Su, Utt., 8 5.1]
rogā varjayitavyāḥ syurdaśa pañca ca jānatā | [Su, Utt., 8 5.2]
asādhyau vā bhavetāṃ tu yāpyau cāgantusaṃjñitau | [Su, Utt., 8 5.3]
arśo'nvitaṃ bhavati vartma tu yattathārśaḥ śuṣkaṃ tathārbudamatho piḍakāḥ sirājāḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 6.1]
jālaṃ sirājam api pañcavidhaṃ tathārma chedyā bhavanti saha parvaṇikāmayena | [Su, Utt., 8 6.2]
utsaṅginī bahalakardamavartmanī ca śyāvaṃ ca yacca paṭhitaṃ tviha baddhavartma | [Su, Utt., 8 7.1]
kliṣṭaṃ ca pothakiyutaṃ khalu yacca vartma kumbhīkinī ca saha śarkarayā ca lekhyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 7.2]
śleṣmopanāhalagaṇau ca bisaṃ ca bhedyā granthiśca yaḥ kṛmikṛto 'ñjananāmikā ca | [Su, Utt., 8 8.1]
ādau sirā nigaditāstu yayoḥ prayoge pākau ca yau nayanayoḥ pavano 'nyataśca | [Su, Utt., 8 8.2]
pūyālasānilaviparyayamanthasaṃjñāḥ syandāstu yantyupaśamaṃ hi sirāvyadhena | [Su, Utt., 8 9.1]
śuṣkākṣipākakaphapittavidagdhadṛṣṭiṣvamlākhyaśukrasahitārjunapiṣṭakeṣu | [Su, Utt., 8 9.2]
aklinnavartmahutabhugdhvajadarśiśuktipraklinnavartmasu tathaiva balāsasaṃjñe | [Su, Utt., 8 10.1]
āgantunāmayayugena ca dūṣitāyāṃ dṛṣṭau na śastrapatanaṃ pravadanti tajjñāḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 10.2]
saṃpaśyataḥ ṣaḍ api ye 'bhihitāstu kācāste pakṣmakopasahitāstu bhavanti yāpyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 8 11.1]
catvāra eva pavanaprabhavāstvasādhyā dvau pittajau kaphanimittaja eka eva | [Su, Utt., 8 11.2]
aṣṭārdhakā rudhirajāśca gadāstridoṣāstāvanta eva gaditāvapi bāhyajau dvau | [Su, Utt., 8 11.3]
{Su, Utt., 9}
athāto vātābhiṣyandapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 2]
purāṇasarpiṣā snigdhau syandādhīmanthapīḍitau | [Su, Utt., 9 3.1]
svedayitvā yathānyāyaṃ sirāmokṣeṇa yojayet | [Su, Utt., 9 3.2]
sampādayedbastibhistu samyak snehavirecitau | [Su, Utt., 9 4.1]
tarpaṇaiḥ puṭapākaiśca dhūmairāścyotanaistathā | [Su, Utt., 9 4.2]
nasyasnehaparīṣekaiḥ śirobastibhireva ca | [Su, Utt., 9 5.1]
vātaghnānūpajalajamāṃsāmlakvāthasecanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 5.2]
snehaiścaturbhiruṣṇaiśca tatpītāmbaradhāraṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 6.1]
payobhir vesavāraiśca sālvaṇaiḥ pāyasaistathā | [Su, Utt., 9 6.2]
bhiṣak sampādayedetāvupanāhaiśca pūjitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 7.1]
grāmyānūpaudakarasaiḥ snigdhaiḥ phalarasānvitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 7.2]
susaṃskṛtaiḥ payobhiśca tayorāhāra iṣyate | [Su, Utt., 9 8.1]
tathā copari bhaktasya sarpiḥ pānaṃ praśasyate | [Su, Utt., 9 8.2]
triphalākvāthasaṃsiddhaṃ kevalaṃ jīrṇam eva vā | [Su, Utt., 9 9.1]
siddhaṃ vātaharaiḥ kṣīraṃ prathamena gaṇena vā | [Su, Utt., 9 9.2]
snehāstailādvinā siddhā vātaghnaistarpaṇe hitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 10.1]
snaihikaḥ puṭapākaśca dhūmo nasyaṃ ca tadvidham | [Su, Utt., 9 10.2]
nasyādiṣu sthirākṣīramadhuraistailamiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 9 11.1]
eraṇḍapallave mūle tvaci vājaṃ payaḥ śṛtam | [Su, Utt., 9 11.2]
kaṇṭakāryāśca mūleṣu sukhoṣṇaṃ secane hitam | [Su, Utt., 9 12.1]
saindhavodīcyayaṣṭyāhvapippalībhiḥ śṛtaṃ payaḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 12.2]
hitamardhodakaṃ seke tathāścyotanam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 9 13.1]
hrīveravakramañjiṣṭhodumbaratvakṣu sādhitam | [Su, Utt., 9 13.2]
sāmbhaśchāgaṃ payo vāpi śūlāścyotanamuttamam | [Su, Utt., 9 14.1]
madhukaṃ rajanīṃ pathyāṃ devadāruṃ ca peṣayet | [Su, Utt., 9 14.2]
ājena payasā śreṣṭhamabhiṣyande tadañjanam | [Su, Utt., 9 15.1]
gairikaṃ saindhavaṃ kṛṣṇāṃ nāgaraṃ ca yathottaram | [Su, Utt., 9 15.2]
dviguṇaṃ piṣṭamadbhistu guṭikāñjanamiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 9 16.1]
snehāñjanaṃ hitaṃ cātra vakṣyate tadyathāvidhi | [Su, Utt., 9 16.2]
rogo yaścānyatovāto yaśca mārutaparyayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 17.1]
anenaiva vidhānena bhiṣak tāvapi sādhayet | [Su, Utt., 9 17.2]
pūrvabhaktaṃ hitaṃ sarpiḥ kṣīraṃ vāpyatha bhojane | [Su, Utt., 9 18.1]
vṛkṣādanyāṃ kapitthe ca pañcamūle mahatyapi | [Su, Utt., 9 18.2]
sakṣīraṃ karkaṭarase siddhaṃ cātra ghṛtaṃ pibet | [Su, Utt., 9 19.1]
siddhaṃ vā hitamatrāhuḥ pattūrārtagalāgnikaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 19.2]
sakṣīraṃ meṣaśṛṅgyā vā sarpirvīratareṇa vā | [Su, Utt., 9 20.1]
saindhavaṃ dāru śuṇṭhī ca mātuluṅgaraso ghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 9 20.2]
stanyodakābhyāṃ kartavyaṃ śuṣkapāke tadañjanam | [Su, Utt., 9 21.1]
pūjitaṃ sarpiṣaścātra pānamakṣṇośca tarpaṇam | [Su, Utt., 9 21.2]
ghṛtena jīvanīyena nasyaṃ tailena cāṇunā | [Su, Utt., 9 22.1]
pariṣeke hitaṃ cātra payaḥ śītaṃ sasaindhavam | [Su, Utt., 9 22.2]
rajanīdārusiddhaṃ vā saindhavena samāyutam | [Su, Utt., 9 23.1]
sarpiryutaṃ stanyaghṛṣṭamañjanaṃ vā mahauṣadham | [Su, Utt., 9 23.2]
vasā vānūpajalajā saindhavena samāyutā | [Su, Utt., 9 24.1]
nāgaronmiśritā kiṃcicchuṣkapāke tadañjanam | [Su, Utt., 9 24.2]
pavanaprabhavā rogā ye keciddṛṣṭināśanāḥ | [Su, Utt., 9 25.1]
bījenānena matimān teṣu karma prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 9 25.2]
{Su, Utt., 10}
athātaḥ pittābhiṣyandapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 10 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 10 2.1]
pittasyande paittike cādhimanthe raktāsrāvaḥ sraṃsanaṃ cāpi kāryam | [Su, Utt., 10 3.1]
akṣṇoḥ sekālepanasyāñjanāni paitte ca syādyadvisarpe vidhānam | [Su, Utt., 10 3.2]
gundrāṃ śāliṃ śaivalaṃ śailabhedaṃ dārvīmelāmutpalaṃ rodhramabhram | [Su, Utt., 10 4.1]
padmātpatraṃ śarkarā darbhamikṣuṃ tālaṃ rodhraṃ vetasaṃ padmakaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 10 4.2]
drākṣāṃ kṣaudraṃ candanaṃ yaṣṭikāhvaṃ yoṣitkṣīraṃ rātryanante ca piṣṭvā | [Su, Utt., 10 5.1]
sarpiḥ siddhaṃ tarpaṇe sekanasye śastaṃ kṣīraṃ siddhameteṣu cājam | [Su, Utt., 10 5.2]
yojyo vargo vyasta eṣo 'nyathā vā samyaṅnasye 'ṣṭārdhasaṃkhye 'pi nityam | [Su, Utt., 10 6.1]
kriyāḥ sarvāḥ pittaharyaḥ praśastāstryahāccordhvaṃ kṣīrasarpiśca nasyam | [Su, Utt., 10 6.2]
pālāśaṃ syācchoṇitaṃ cāñjanārthe śallakyā vā śarkarākṣaudrayuktam | [Su, Utt., 10 7.1]
rasakriyāṃ śarkarākṣaudrayuktāṃ pālindyāṃ vā madhuke vāpi kuryāt | [Su, Utt., 10 7.2]
mustā phenaḥ sāgarasyotpalaṃ ca kṛmighnailādhātribījādrasaśca | [Su, Utt., 10 8.1]
tālīśailāgairikośīraśaṅkhairevaṃ yuñjyādañjanaṃ stanyapiṣṭaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 10 8.2]
cūrṇaṃ kuryādañjanārthe raso vā stanyopeto dhātakīsyandanābhyām | [Su, Utt., 10 9.1]
yoṣitstanyaṃ śātakumbhaṃ vighṛṣṭaṃ kṣaudropetaṃ kaiṃśukaṃ cāpi puṣpam | [Su, Utt., 10 9.2]
rodhraṃ drākṣāṃ śarkarāmutpalaṃ ca nāryāḥ kṣīre yaṣṭikāhvaṃ vacāṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 10 10.1]
piṣṭvā kṣīre varṇakasya tvacaṃ ca toyonmiśre candanodumbare ca | [Su, Utt., 10 10.2]
kāryaḥ phenaḥ sāgarasyāñjanārthe nārīstanye mākṣike cāpi ghṛṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 10 11.1]
yoṣitstanye sthāpitaṃ yaṣṭikāhvaṃ rodhraṃ drākṣāṃ śarkarāmutpalaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 10 11.2]
kṣaumābaddhaṃ pathyamāścyotane vā sarpirghṛṣṭaṃ yaṣṭikāhvaṃ sarodhram | [Su, Utt., 10 12.1]
toyonmiśrāḥ kāśmarīdhātripathyāstadvaccāhuḥ kaṭphalaṃ cāmbunaiva | [Su, Utt., 10 12.2]
eṣo 'mlākhye 'nukramaścāpi śuktau kāryaḥ sarvaḥ syātsirāmokṣavarjyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 10 13.1]
sarpiḥ peyaṃ traiphalaṃ tailvakaṃ vā peyaṃ vā syāt kevalaṃ yat purāṇam | [Su, Utt., 10 14.1]
doṣe 'dhastācchuktikāyāmapāste śītair dravyairañjanaṃ kāryamāśu | [Su, Utt., 10 14.2]
vaidūryaṃ yat sphāṭikaṃ vaidrumaṃ ca mauktaṃ śāṅkhaṃ rājataṃ śātakumbham | [Su, Utt., 10 15.1]
cūrṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śarkarākṣaudrayuktaṃ śuktiṃ hanyādañjanaṃ caitadāśu | [Su, Utt., 10 15.2]
yuñjyāt sarpirdhūmadarśī narastu śeṣaṃ kuryādraktapitte vidhānam | [Su, Utt., 10 16.1]
yaccaivānyat pittahṛccāpi sarvaṃ yadvīsarpe paittike vai vidhānam | [Su, Utt., 10 16.2]
{Su, Utt., 11}
athātaḥ śleṣmābhiṣyandapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 2]
syandādhimanthau kaphajau pravṛddhau jayet sirāṇāmatha mokṣaṇena | [Su, Utt., 11 3.1]
svedāvapīḍāñjanadhūmasekapralepayogaiḥ kavalagrahaiśca | [Su, Utt., 11 3.2]
rūkṣaistathāścyotanasaṃvidhānaistathaiva rūkṣaiḥ puṭapākayogaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 4.1]
tryahāt tryahāccāpyapatarpaṇānte prātastayostiktaghṛtaṃ praśastam | [Su, Utt., 11 4.2]

kuṭannaṭāsphoṭaphaṇijjhabilvapattūrapilvarkakapitthabhaṅgaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 5.2]
svedaṃ vidadhyāt athavānulepaṃ barhiṣṭhaśuṇṭhīsurakāṣṭhakuṣṭhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 6.1]
sindhūtthahiṅgutriphalāmadhūkaprapauṇḍarīkāñjanatutthatāmraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 6.2]
piṣṭair jalenāñjanavartayaḥ syuḥ pathyāharidrāmadhukāñjanair vā | [Su, Utt., 11 7.1]
trīṇyūṣaṇāni triphalā haridrā viḍaṅgasāraśca samāni ca syuḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 7.2]
barhiṣṭhakuṣṭhāmarakāṣṭhaśaṅkhapāṭhāmalavyoṣamanaḥśilāśca | [Su, Utt., 11 8.1]
piṣṭvāmbunā vā kusumāni jātikarañjaśobhāñjanajāni yuñjyāt | [Su, Utt., 11 8.2]
phalaṃ prakīryādathavāpi śigroḥ puṣpaṃ ca tulyaṃ bṛhatīdvayasya | [Su, Utt., 11 9.1]
rasāñjanaṃ saindhavacandanaṃ ca manaḥśilāle laśunaṃ ca tulyam | [Su, Utt., 11 9.2]
piṣṭvāñjanārthe kaphajeṣu dhīmān vartīrvidadhyānnayanāmayeṣu | [Su, Utt., 11 10.1]
roge balāsagrathite 'ñjanaṃ jñaiḥ kartavyametat suviśuddhakāye | [Su, Utt., 11 10.2]
nīlān yavān gavyapayo 'nupītān śalākinaḥ śuṣkatanūn vidahya | [Su, Utt., 11 11.1]
tathārjakāsphotakapitthabilvanirguṇḍijātīkusumāni caiva | [Su, Utt., 11 11.2]
tatkṣāravatsaindhavatuttharocanaṃ pakvaṃ vidadhyādatha lohanāḍyām | [Su, Utt., 11 12.1]
etadbalāsagrathite 'ñjanaṃ syādeṣo 'nukalpastu phaṇijjhakādau | [Su, Utt., 11 12.2]
mahauṣadhaṃ māgadhikāṃ ca mustāṃ sasaindhavaṃ yanmaricaṃ ca śuklam | [Su, Utt., 11 13.1]
tanmātuluṅgasvarasena piṣṭaṃ netrāñjanaṃ piṣṭakamāśu hanyāt | [Su, Utt., 11 13.2]
phale bṛhatyā magadhodbhavānāṃ nidhāya kalkaṃ phalapākakāle | [Su, Utt., 11 14.1]
srotojayuktaṃ ca taduddhṛtaṃ syāttadvattu piṣṭe vidhireṣa cāpi | [Su, Utt., 11 14.2]
vārtākaśigrvindrasurāpaṭolakirātatiktāmalakīphaleṣu | [Su, Utt., 11 15.1]
kāsīsasāmudrarasāñjanāni jātyāstathā kṣārakameva cāpi | [Su, Utt., 11 15.2]
praklinnavartmanyupadiśyate tu yogāñjanaṃ tanmadhunāvaghṛṣṭam | [Su, Utt., 11 16.1]
nādeyamagryaṃ maricaṃ ca śuklaṃ nepālajātā ca samapramāṇā | [Su, Utt., 11 16.2]
samātuluṅgadrava eṣa yogaḥ kaṇḍūṃ nihanyāt sakṛdañjanena | [Su, Utt., 11 17.1]
saśṛṅgaveraṃ suradāru mustaṃ sindhuprabhūtaṃ mukulāni jātyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 17.2]
surāprapiṣṭaṃ tvidamañjanaṃ hi kaṇḍvāṃ ca śophe ca hitaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 11 18.1]
syandādhimanthakramamācarecca sarveṣu caiteṣu sadāpramattaḥ | [Su, Utt., 11 18.2]
{Su, Utt., 12}
athāto raktābhiṣyandapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 2]
manthaṃ syandaṃ sirotpātaṃ sirāharṣaṃ ca raktajam | [Su, Utt., 12 3.1]
ekenaiva vidhānena cikitseccaturo gadān | [Su, Utt., 12 3.2]
vyādhyārtāṃścaturo 'pyetān snigdhānkaumbhena sarpiṣā | [Su, Utt., 12 4.1]
rasairudārairathavā sirāmokṣeṇa yojayet | [Su, Utt., 12 4.2]
viriktānāṃ prakāmaṃ ca śirāṃsyeṣāṃ viśodhayet | [Su, Utt., 12 5.1]
vairecanikasiddhena sitāyuktena sarpiṣā | [Su, Utt., 12 5.2]
tataḥ pradehāḥ pariṣecanāni nasyāni dhūmāśca yathāsvameva | [Su, Utt., 12 6.1]
āścyotanābhyañjanatarpaṇāni snigdhāśca kāryāḥ puṭapākayogāḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 6.2]
nīlotpalośīrakaṭaṅkaṭerīkālīyayaṣṭīmadhumustarodhraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 7.1]
sapadmakair dhautaghṛtapradigdhair akṣṇoḥ pralepaṃ paritaḥ prakuryāt | [Su, Utt., 12 7.2]
rujāyāṃ cāpyatibhṛśaṃ svedāśca mṛdavo hitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 8.1]
akṣṇoḥ samantataḥ kāryaṃ pātanaṃ ca jalaukasām | [Su, Utt., 12 8.2]
ghṛtasya mahatī mātrā pītā cārtiṃ niyacchati | [Su, Utt., 12 9.1]
pittābhiṣyandaśamano vidhiścāpyupapāditaḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 9.2]
kaśerumadhukābhyāṃ vā cūrṇamambarasaṃvṛtam | [Su, Utt., 12 10.1]
nyastam apsv āntarikṣāsu hitamāścyotanaṃ bhavet | [Su, Utt., 12 10.2]
pāṭalyarjunaśrīparṇīdhātakīdhātribilvataḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 11.1]
puṣpāṇyatha bṛhatyośca bimbīloṭācca tulyaśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 11.2]
samañjiṣṭhāni madhunā piṣṭānīkṣurasena vā | [Su, Utt., 12 12.1]
raktābhiṣyandaśāntyarthametadañjanamiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 12 12.2]
candanaṃ kumudaṃ patraṃ śilājatu sakuṅkumam | [Su, Utt., 12 13.1]
ayastāmrarajastutthaṃ nimbaniryāsamañjanam | [Su, Utt., 12 13.2]
trapu kāṃsyamalaṃ cāpi piṣṭvā puṣparasena tu | [Su, Utt., 12 14.1]
vipulā yāḥ kṛtā vartyaḥ pūjitāścāñjane sadā | [Su, Utt., 12 14.2]
syādañjanaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣaudraṃ sirotpātasya bheṣajam | [Su, Utt., 12 15.1]
tadvatsaindhavakāsīsaṃ stanyaghṛṣṭaṃ ca pūjitam | [Su, Utt., 12 15.2]
madhunā śaṅkhanaipālītutthadārvyaḥ sasaindhavāḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 16.1]
rasaḥ śirīṣapuṣpācca surāmaricamākṣikaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 16.2]
yuktaṃ tu madhunā vāpi gairikaṃ hitamañjane | [Su, Utt., 12 17.1]
sirāharṣe 'ñjanaṃ kuryāt phāṇitaṃ madhusaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 12 17.2]
madhunā tārkṣyajaṃ vāpi kāsīsaṃ vā sasaindhavam | [Su, Utt., 12 18.1]
vetrāmlastanyasaṃyuktaṃ phāṇitaṃ ca sasaindhavam | [Su, Utt., 12 18.2]
paittaṃ vidhim aśeṣeṇa kuryādarjunaśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 12 19.1]
ikṣukṣaudrasitāstanyadārvīmadhukasaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 19.2]
sekāñjanaṃ cātra hitamamlairāścyotanaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 12 20.1]
sitāmadhukakaṭvaṅgamastukṣaudrāmlasaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 20.2]
bījapūrakakolāmladāḍimāmlaiśca yuktitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 21.1]
ekaśo vā dviśo vāpi yojitaṃ vā tribhistribhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 21.2]
sphaṭikaṃ vidrumaṃ śaṅkho madhukaṃ madhu caiva hi | [Su, Utt., 12 22.1]
śaṅkhakṣaudrasitāyuktaḥ sāmudraḥ phena eva vā | [Su, Utt., 12 22.2]
dvāvimau vihitau yogāvañjane 'rjunanāśanau | [Su, Utt., 12 23.1]
saindhavakṣaudrakatakāḥ sakṣaudraṃ vā rasāñjanam | [Su, Utt., 12 23.2]
kāsīsaṃ madhunā vāpi yojyamatrāñjane sadā | [Su, Utt., 12 24.1]
lohacūrṇāni sarvāṇi dhātavo lavaṇāni ca | [Su, Utt., 12 24.2]
ratnāni dantāḥ śṛṅgāṇi gaṇaścāpyavasādanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 25.1]
kukkuṭāṇḍakapālāni laśunaṃ kaṭukatrayam | [Su, Utt., 12 25.2]
karañjabījamelā ca lekhyāñjanamidaṃ smṛtam | [Su, Utt., 12 26.1]
puṭapākāvasānena raktavisrāvaṇādinā | [Su, Utt., 12 26.2]
sampāditasya vidhinā kṛtsnena syandaghātinā | [Su, Utt., 12 27.1]
anenāpaharecchukramavraṇaṃ kuśalo bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 12 27.2]
uttānamavagāḍhaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vāpi savraṇam | [Su, Utt., 12 28.1]
śirīṣabījamaricapippalīsaindhavairapi | [Su, Utt., 12 28.2]
śukrasya gharṣaṇaṃ kāryamathavā saindhavena tu | [Su, Utt., 12 29.1]
kuryāt tāmrarajaḥśaṅkhaśilāmaricasaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 29.2]
antyāddviguṇitairebhirañjanaṃ śukranāśanam | [Su, Utt., 12 30.1]
kuryādañjanayogau vā samyak ślokārdhikāvimau | [Su, Utt., 12 30.2]
śaṅkhakolāsthikatakadrākṣāmadhukamākṣikaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 31.1]
kṣaudradantārṇavamalaśirīṣakusumairapi | [Su, Utt., 12 31.2]
kṣārāñjanaṃ vā vitaredbalāsagrathitāpaham | [Su, Utt., 12 32.1]
mudgān vā nistuṣān bhṛṣṭān śaṅkhakṣaudrasitāyutān | [Su, Utt., 12 32.2]
madhūkasāraṃ madhunā yojayeccāñjane sadā | [Su, Utt., 12 33.1]
bibhītakāsthimajjā vā sakṣaudraḥ śukranāśanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 33.2]
śaṅkhaśuktimadhudrākṣāmadhukaṃ katakāni ca | [Su, Utt., 12 34.1]
dvitvaggate saśūle vā vātaghnaṃ tarpaṇaṃ hitam | [Su, Utt., 12 34.2]
vaṃśajāruṣkarau tālaṃ nārikelaṃ ca dāhayet | [Su, Utt., 12 35.1]
visrāvya kṣāravaccūrṇaṃ bhāvayetkarabhāsthijam | [Su, Utt., 12 35.2]
bahuśo 'ñjanametatsyācchukravaivarṇyanāśanam | [Su, Utt., 12 36.1]
ajakāṃ pārśvato viddhvā sūcyā visrāvya codakam | [Su, Utt., 12 36.2]
vraṇaṃ gomāṃsacūrṇena pūrayet sarpiṣā saha | [Su, Utt., 12 37.1]
bahuśo 'valikheccāpi vartmāsyopagataṃ yadi | [Su, Utt., 12 37.2]
saśophaś cāpyaśophaś ca dvau pākau yau prakīrtitau | [Su, Utt., 12 38.1]
snehasvedopapannasya tatra viddhvā sirāṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 12 38.2]
sekāścyotananasyāni puṭapākāṃśca kārayet | [Su, Utt., 12 39.1]
sarvataścāpi śuddhasya kartavyamidamañjanam | [Su, Utt., 12 39.2]
tāmrapātrasthitaṃ māsaṃ sarpiḥ saindhavasaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 12 40.1]
maireyaṃ vāpi dadhyevaṃ dadhyuttarakam eva vā | [Su, Utt., 12 40.2]
ghṛtaṃ kāṃsyamalopetaṃ stanyaṃ vāpi sasaindhavam | [Su, Utt., 12 41.1]
madhūkasāraṃ madhunā tulyāṃśaṃ gairikeṇa vā | [Su, Utt., 12 41.2]
sarpiḥ saindhavatāmrāṇi yoṣitstanyayutāni vā | [Su, Utt., 12 42.1]
dāḍimārevatāśmantakolāmlaiśca sasaindhavām | [Su, Utt., 12 42.2]
rasakriyāṃ vā vitaretsamyakpākajighāṃsayā | [Su, Utt., 12 42.3]
māsaṃ saindhavasaṃyuktaṃ sthitaṃ sarpiṣi nāgaram | [Su, Utt., 12 43.1]
āścyotanāñjanaṃ yojyamabalākṣīrasaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 12 43.2]
jātyāḥ puṣpaṃ saindhavaṃ śṛṅgaveraṃ kṛṣṇābījaṃ kīṭaśatrośca sāram | [Su, Utt., 12 44.1]
etat piṣṭaṃ netrapāke 'ñjanārthaṃ kṣaudropetaṃ nirviśaṅkaṃ prayojyam | [Su, Utt., 12 44.2]
pūyālase śoṇitamokṣaṇaṃ ca hitaṃ tathaivāpyupanāhanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 12 45.1]
kṛtsno vidhiścekṣaṇapākaghātī yathāvidhānaṃ bhiṣajā prayojyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 45.2]
kāsīsasindhuprabhavārdrakaistu hitaṃ bhavedañjanam eva cātra | [Su, Utt., 12 46.1]
kṣaudrānvitairebhirathopayuñjyādanyattu tāmrāyasacūrṇayuktaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 46.2]
snehādibhiḥ samyagapāsya doṣāṃstṛptiṃ vidhāyātha yathāsvameva | [Su, Utt., 12 47.1]
praklinnavartmānam upakrameta sekāñjanāścyotananasyadhūmaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 47.2]
mustāharidrāmadhukapriyaṅgusiddhārtharodhrotpalasārivābhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 12 48.1]
kṣuṇṇābhirāścyotanam eva kāryamatrāñjanaṃ cāñjanamākṣikaṃ syāt | [Su, Utt., 12 48.2]
patraṃ phalaṃ cāmalakasya paktvā kriyāṃ vidadhyādathavāñjanārthe | [Su, Utt., 12 49.1]
vaṃśasya mūlena rasakriyāṃ vā vartīkṛtāṃ tāmrakapālapakvām | [Su, Utt., 12 49.2]
rasakriyāṃ vā triphalāvipakvāṃ palāśapuṣpaiḥ kharamañjarervā | [Su, Utt., 12 50.1]
piṣṭvā chagalyāḥ payasā malaṃ vā kāṃsyasya dagdhvā saha tāntavena | [Su, Utt., 12 50.2]
pratyañjanaṃ tanmaricairupetaṃ cūrṇena tāmrasya sahopayojyam | [Su, Utt., 12 51.1]
samudraphenaṃ lavaṇottamaṃ ca śaṅkho 'tha mudgo maricaṃ ca śuklam | [Su, Utt., 12 51.2]
cūrṇāñjanaṃ jāḍyamathāpi kaṇḍūmaklinnavartmānyupahanti śīghram | [Su, Utt., 12 52.1]
praklinnavartmanyapi caita eva yogāḥ prayojyāśca samīkṣya doṣam | [Su, Utt., 12 52.2]
sakajjalaṃ tāmraghaṭe ca ghṛṣṭaṃ sarpiryutaṃ tutthakam añjanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 12 53]
{Su, Utt., 13}
athāto lekhyarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 2]
nava ye 'bhihitā lekhyāḥ sāmānyasteṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 3.1]
snigdhavāntaviriktasya nivātātapasadmani | [Su, Utt., 13 3.2]
sukhodakaprataptena vāsasā susamāhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 4.1]
svedayedvartma nirbhujya vāmāṅguṣṭhāṅgulisthitam | [Su, Utt., 13 4.2]
aṅgulyaṅguṣṭhakābhyāṃ tu nirbhugnaṃ vartma yatnataḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 5.1]
plotāntarābhyāṃ na yathā calati sraṃsate 'pi vā | [Su, Utt., 13 5.2]
tataḥ pramṛjya plotena vartma śastrapadāṅkitam | [Su, Utt., 13 6.1]
likhecchastreṇa patrair vā tato rakte sthite punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 6.2]
svinnaṃ manohvākāsīsavyoṣārdrāñjanasaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 7.1]
ślakṣṇapiṣṭaiḥ samākṣīkaiḥ pratisāryoṣṇavāriṇā | [Su, Utt., 13 7.2]
prakṣālya haviṣā siktaṃ vraṇavat samupācaret | [Su, Utt., 13 8.1]
svedāvapīḍaprabhṛtīṃstryahādūrdhvaṃ prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 13 8.2]
vyāsataste samuddiṣṭaṃ vidhānaṃ lekhyakarmaṇi | [Su, Utt., 13 9.1]
asṛgāsrāvarahitaṃ kaṇḍūśophavivarjitam | [Su, Utt., 13 9.2]
samaṃ nakhanibhaṃ vartma likhitaṃ samyagiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 13 10.1]
raktam akṣi sravet skannaṃ kṣatācchastrakṛtāddhruvam | [Su, Utt., 13 10.2]
rāgaśophaparisrāvāstimiraṃ vyādhyanirjayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 11.1]
vartma śyāvaṃ guru stabdhaṃ kaṇḍūharṣopadehavat | [Su, Utt., 13 11.2]
netrapākamudīrṇaṃ vā kurvītāpratikāriṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 12.1]
etaddurlikhitaṃ jñeyaṃ snehayitvā punarlikhet | [Su, Utt., 13 12.2]
vyāvartate yadā vartma pakṣma cāpi vimuhyati | [Su, Utt., 13 13.1]
syāt saruk srāvabahulaṃ tadatisrāvitaṃ viduḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 13.2]
snehasvedādiriṣṭaḥ syāt kramastatrānilāpahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 14.1]
vartmāvabandhaṃ kliṣṭaṃ ca bahalaṃ yacca kīrtitam | [Su, Utt., 13 14.2]
pothakīścāpyavalikhet pracchayitvāgrataḥ śanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 15.1]
samaṃ likhettu medhāvī śyāvakardamavartmanī | [Su, Utt., 13 15.2]
kumbhīkinīṃ śarkarāṃ ca tathaivotsaṅginīm api | [Su, Utt., 13 16.1]
kalpayitvā tu śastreṇa likhet paścādatandritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 16.2]
bhaveyurvartmasu ca yāḥ piḍakāḥ kaṭhinā bhṛśam | [Su, Utt., 13 17.1]
hrasvāstāmrāśca tāḥ pakvā bhindyādbhinnā likhed api | [Su, Utt., 13 17.2]
taruṇīścālpasaṃrambhā piḍakā bāhyavartmajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 18.1]
viditvaitāḥ praśamayet svedālepanaśodhanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 13 18.2]
{Su, Utt., 14}
athāto bhedyarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 14 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 14 2]
svedayitvā bisagranthiṃ chidrāṇyasya nirāśayam | [Su, Utt., 14 3.1]
pakvaṃ bhittvā tu śastreṇa saindhavenāvacūrṇayet | [Su, Utt., 14 3.2]
kāsīsamāgadhīpuṣpanepālyelāyutena tu | [Su, Utt., 14 4.1]
tataḥ kṣaudraghṛtaṃ dattvā samyagbandhamathācaret | [Su, Utt., 14 4.2]
rocanākṣāratutthāni pippalyaḥ kṣaudram eva ca | [Su, Utt., 14 5.1]
pratisāraṇamekaikaṃ bhinne lagaṇa iṣyate | [Su, Utt., 14 5.2]
mahatyapi ca yuñjīta kṣārāgnī vidhikovidaḥ | [Su, Utt., 14 6.1]
svinnāṃ bhinnāṃ viniṣpīḍya bhiṣagañjananāmikām | [Su, Utt., 14 6.2]
śilailānatasindhūtthaiḥ sakṣaudraiḥ pratisārayet | [Su, Utt., 14 7.1]
rasāñjanamadhubhyāṃ tu bhittvā vā śastrakarmavit | [Su, Utt., 14 7.2]
pratisāryāñjanair yuñjyāduṣṇair dīpaśikhodbhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 14 8.1]
samyaksvinne kṛmigranthau bhinne syāt pratisāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 14 8.2]
triphalātutthakāsīsasaindhavaiśca rasakriyā | [Su, Utt., 14 9.1]
bhittvopanāhaṃ kaphajaṃ pippalīmadhusaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 14 9.2]
lekhayenmaṇḍalāgreṇa samantāt pracchayed api | [Su, Utt., 14 10.1]
saṃsnehya pattrabhaṅgaiśca svedayitvā yathāsukham | [Su, Utt., 14 10.2]
sarveṣveteṣu vihitaṃ vidhānaṃ snehapūrvakam | [Su, Utt., 14 11.1]
saṃpakve prayato bhūtvā kurvīta vraṇaropaṇam | [Su, Utt., 14 11.2]
{Su, Utt., 15}
athātaśchedyarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 2]
snigdhaṃ bhuktavato hyannam upaviṣṭasya yatnataḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 3.1]
saṃroṣayettu nayanaṃ bhiṣak cūrṇaistu lāvaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 3.2]
tataḥ saṃroṣitaṃ tūrṇaṃ susvinnaṃ parighaṭṭitam | [Su, Utt., 15 4.1]
arma yatra valījātaṃ tatraitallagayedbhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 15 4.2]
apāṅgaṃ prekṣamāṇasya baḍiśena samāhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 5.1]
mucuṇḍyādāya medhāvī sūcīsūtreṇa vā punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 5.2]
na cotthāpayatā kṣipraṃ kāryamabhyunnataṃ tu tat | [Su, Utt., 15 6.1]
śastrābādhabhayāccāsya vartmanī grāhayeddṛḍham | [Su, Utt., 15 6.2]
tataḥ praśithilībhūtaṃ tribhireva vilambitam | [Su, Utt., 15 7.1]
ullikhanmaṇḍalāgreṇa tīkṣṇena pariśodhayet | [Su, Utt., 15 7.2]
vimuktaṃ sarvataścāpi kṛṣṇācchuklācca maṇḍalāt | [Su, Utt., 15 8.1]
nītvā kanīnakopāntaṃ chindyānnātikanīnakam | [Su, Utt., 15 8.2]
caturbhāgasthite māṃse nākṣi vyāpattimṛcchati | [Su, Utt., 15 9.1]
kanīnakavadhādasraṃ nāḍī vāpyupajāyate | [Su, Utt., 15 9.2]
hīnacchedāt punarvṛddhiṃ śīghramevādhigacchati | [Su, Utt., 15 10.1]
arma yajjālavadvyāpi tadapyunmārjya lambitam | [Su, Utt., 15 10.2]
chindyādvakreṇa śastreṇa vartmaśuklāntam āśritam | [Su, Utt., 15 11.1]
pratisāraṇam akṣṇos tu tataḥ kāryamanantaram | [Su, Utt., 15 11.2]
yāvanālasya cūrṇena trikaṭor lavaṇasya ca | [Su, Utt., 15 12.1]
svedayitvā tataḥ paścādbadhnīyāt kuśalo bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 15 12.2]
doṣartubalakālajñaḥ snehaṃ dattvā yathāhitam | [Su, Utt., 15 13.1]
vraṇavat saṃvidhānaṃ tu tasya kuryādataḥ param | [Su, Utt., 15 13.2]
tryahānmuktvā karasvedaṃ dattvā śodhanamācaret | [Su, Utt., 15 14.1]
karañjabījāmalakamadhukaiḥ sādhitaṃ payaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 14.2]
hitamāścyotanaṃ śūle dvirahnaḥ kṣaudrasaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 15 15.1]
madhukotpalakiñjalkadūrvākalkaiśca mūrdhani | [Su, Utt., 15 15.2]
pralepaḥ saghṛtaḥ śītaḥ kṣīrapiṣṭaḥ praśasyate | [Su, Utt., 15 16.1]
lekhyāñjanairapaharedarmaśeṣaṃ bhavedyadi | [Su, Utt., 15 16.2]
arma cālpaṃ dadhinibhaṃ nīlaṃ raktamathāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 15 17.1]
dhūsaraṃ tanu yaccāpi śukravattadupācaret | [Su, Utt., 15 17.2]
carmābhaṃ bahulaṃ yattu snāyumāṃsaghanāvṛtam | [Su, Utt., 15 18.1]
chedyam eva tadarma syāt kṛṣṇamaṇḍalagaṃ ca yat | [Su, Utt., 15 18.2]
viśuddhavarṇamakliṣṭaṃ kriyāsvakṣi gataklamam | [Su, Utt., 15 19.1]
chinne 'rmaṇi bhavet samyag yathāsvam anupadravam | [Su, Utt., 15 19.2]
sirājāle sirā yāstu kaṭhināstāśca buddhimān | [Su, Utt., 15 20.1]
ullikhenmaṇḍalāgreṇa baḍiśenāvalambitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 20.2]
sirāsu piḍakā jātā yā na sidhyanti bheṣajaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 21.1]
armavanmaṇḍalāgreṇa tāsāṃ chedanamiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 15 21.2]
rogayoścaitayoḥ kāryamarmoktaṃ pratisāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 15 22.1]
vidhiścāpi yathādoṣaṃ lekhanadravyasaṃbhṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 22.2]
sandhau saṃsvedya śastreṇa parvaṇīkāṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 23.1]
uttare ca tribhāge ca baḍiśenāvalambitām | [Su, Utt., 15 23.2]
chindyāttato 'rdhamagre syādaśrunāḍī hyato 'nyathā | [Su, Utt., 15 24.1]
pratisāraṇamatrāpi saindhavakṣaudramiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 15 24.2]
lekhanīyāni cūrṇāni vyādhiśeṣasya bheṣajam | [Su, Utt., 15 25.1]
śaṅkhaṃ samudraphenaṃ ca maṇḍūkīṃ ca samudrajām | [Su, Utt., 15 25.2]
sphaṭikaṃ kuruvindaṃ ca pravālāśmantakaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 15 26.1]
vaidūryaṃ pulakaṃ muktām ayas tāmrarajāṃsi ca | [Su, Utt., 15 26.2]
samabhāgāni sampiṣya sārdhaṃ srotoñjanena tu | [Su, Utt., 15 27.1]
cūrṇāñjanaṃ kārayitvā bhājane meṣaśṛṅgaje | [Su, Utt., 15 27.2]
saṃsthāpyobhayataḥ kālamañjayet satataṃ budhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 28.1]
armāṇi piḍakāṃ hanyāt sirājālāni tena vai | [Su, Utt., 15 28.2]
arśastathā yacca nāmnā śuṣkārśo 'rbudam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 15 29.1]
abhyantaraṃ vartmaśayā vidhānaṃ teṣu vakṣyate | [Su, Utt., 15 29.2]
vartmopasvedya nirbhujya sūcyotkṣipya prayatnataḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 30.1]
maṇḍalāgreṇa tīkṣṇena mūle bhindyādbhiṣagvaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 30.2]
tataḥ saindhavakāsīsakṛṣṇābhiḥ pratisārayet | [Su, Utt., 15 31.1]
sthite ca rudhire vartma dahet samyak śalākayā | [Su, Utt., 15 31.2]
kṣāreṇāvalikheccāpi vyādhiśeṣo bhavedyadi | [Su, Utt., 15 32.1]
tīkṣṇairubhayatobhāgaistato doṣamadhikṣipet | [Su, Utt., 15 32.2]
vitarecca yathādoṣamabhiṣyandakriyāvidhim | [Su, Utt., 15 33.1]
śastrakarmaṇyuparate māsaṃ ca syāt suyantritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 15 33.2]
{Su, Utt., 16}
athātaḥ pakṣmakopapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 16 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 16 2]
yāpyastu yo vartmabhavo vikāraḥ pakṣmaprakopo 'bhihitaḥ purastāt | [Su, Utt., 16 3.1]
tatropaviṣṭasya narasya carma vartmopariṣṭādanutiryageva | [Su, Utt., 16 3.2]
bhruvoradhastāt parimucya bhāgau pakṣmāśritaṃ caikamato 'vakṛntet | [Su, Utt., 16 4.1]
kanīnakāpāṅgasamaṃ samantādyavākṛti snigdhatanor narasya | [Su, Utt., 16 4.2]
utkṛtya śastreṇa yavapramāṇaṃ vālena sīvyed bhiṣag apramattaḥ | [Su, Utt., 16 5.1]
dattvā ca sarpirmadhunāvaśeṣaṃ kuryādvidhānaṃ vihitaṃ vraṇe yat | [Su, Utt., 16 5.2]
lalāṭadeśe ca nibaddhapaṭṭaṃ prāksyūtamatrāpyaparaṃ ca baddhvā | [Su, Utt., 16 6.1]
sthairyaṃ gate cāpyatha śastramārge vālān vimuñcet kuśalo 'bhivīkṣya | [Su, Utt., 16 6.2]
evaṃ na cecchāmyati tasya vartma nirbhujya doṣopahatāṃ valiṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 16 7.1]
tato 'gninā vā pratisārayettāṃ kṣāreṇa vā samyagavekṣya dhīraḥ | [Su, Utt., 16 7.2]
chittvā samaṃ vāpyupapakṣmamālāṃ samyaggṛhītvā baḍiśaistribhistu | [Su, Utt., 16 8.1]
pathyāphalena pratisārayettu ghṛṣṭena vā tauvarakeṇa samyak | [Su, Utt., 16 8.2]
catvāra ete vidhayo vihantuṃ pakṣmoparodhaṃ pṛthageva śastāḥ | [Su, Utt., 16 9.1]
virecanāścyotanadhūmanasyalepāñjanasneharasakriyāśca | [Su, Utt., 16 9.2]
{Su, Utt., 17}
athāto dṛṣṭigatarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 2]
trayaḥ sādhyāstrayo 'sādhyā yāpyāḥ ṣaṭ ca bhavanti hi | [Su, Utt., 17 3.1]
tatraikasya pratīkāraḥ kīrtito dhūmadarśinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 3.2]
dṛṣṭau pittavidagdhāyāṃ vidagdhāyāṃ kaphena ca | [Su, Utt., 17 4.1]
pittaśleṣmaharaṃ kuryādvidhiṃ śastrakṣatādṛte | [Su, Utt., 17 4.2]
nasyasekāñjanālepapuṭapākaiḥ satarpaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 5.1]
ādye tu traiphalaṃ peyaṃ sarpistraivṛtamuttare | [Su, Utt., 17 5.2]
tailvakaṃ cobhayoḥ pathyaṃ kevalaṃ jīrṇam eva vā | [Su, Utt., 17 6.1]
gairikaṃ saindhavaṃ kṛṣṇā godantasya maṣī tathā | [Su, Utt., 17 6.2]
gomāṃsaṃ maricaṃ bījaṃ śirīṣasya manaḥśilā | [Su, Utt., 17 7.1]
vṛntaṃ kapitthānmadhunā svayaṃguptāphalāni ca | [Su, Utt., 17 7.2]
catvāra ete yogāḥ syurubhayorañjane hitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 8.1]
kubjakāśokaśālāmrapriyaṅgunalinotpalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 8.2]
puṣpair hareṇukṛṣṇāhvāpathyāmalakasaṃyutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 9.1]
sarpirmadhuyutaiścūrṇair veṇunāḍyāmavasthitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 9.2]
añjayed dvāvapi bhiṣak pittaśleṣmavibhāvitau | [Su, Utt., 17 10.1]
āmrajambūdbhavaṃ puṣpaṃ tadrasena hareṇukām | [Su, Utt., 17 10.2]
piṣṭvā kṣaudrājyasaṃyuktaṃ prayojyamathavāñjanam | [Su, Utt., 17 11.1]
nalinotpalakiñjalkagairikair gośakṛdrasaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 11.2]
guḍikāñjanametadvā dinarātryandhayor hitam | [Su, Utt., 17 12.1]
rasāñjanarasakṣaudratālīśasvarṇagairikam | [Su, Utt., 17 12.2]
gośakṛdrasasaṃyuktaṃ pittopahatadṛṣṭaye | [Su, Utt., 17 13.1]
śītaṃ sauvīrakaṃ vāpi piṣṭvātha rasabhāvitam | [Su, Utt., 17 13.2]
kūrmapittena matimān bhāvayedrauhitena vā | [Su, Utt., 17 14.1]
cūrṇāñjanamidaṃ nityaṃ prayojyaṃ pittaśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 17 14.2]
kāśmarīpuṣpamadhukadārvīrodhrarasāñjanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 15.1]
sakṣaudramañjanaṃ tadvaddhitamatrāmaye sadā | [Su, Utt., 17 15.2]
srotojaṃ saindhavaṃ reṇukāṃ cāpi peṣayet | [Su, Utt., 17 16.1]
ajāmūtreṇa tā vartyaḥ kṣaṇadāndhyāñjane hitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 16.2]
kālānusārivāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ nāgaraṃ madhukaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 17 17.1]
tālīśapatraṃ kṣaṇade gāṅgeyaṃ ca yakṛdrase | [Su, Utt., 17 17.2]
kṛtāstā vartayaḥ piṣṭāśchāyāśuṣkāḥ sukhāvahāḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 18.1]
manaḥśilābhayāvyoṣabalākālānusārivāḥ | [Su, Utt., 17 18.2]

{Su, Utt., 19}
athāto nayanābhighātapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 2.1]

svedāgnidhūmabhayaśokarujābhighātairabhyāhatām api tathaiva bhiṣak cikitset | [Su, Utt., 19 4.2]
