abhyāhataṃ nayanamīṣadathāsyabāṣpasaṃsveditaṃ bhavati tannirujaṃ kṣaṇena | [Su, Utt., 19 5.2]
sādhyaṃ kṣataṃ paṭalamekamubhe tu kṛcchre trīṇi kṣatāni paṭalāni vivarjayettu | [Su, Utt., 19 6.1]
syāt piccitaṃ ca nayanaṃ hyati cāvasannaṃ srastaṃ cyutaṃ ca hatadṛk ca bhavettu yāpyam | [Su, Utt., 19 6.2]
vistīrṇadṛṣṭitanurāgam asatpradarśi sādhyaṃ yathāsthitamanāviladarśanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 19 7.1]
prāṇoparodhavamanakṣutakaṇṭharodhair unnamyamāśu nayanaṃ yadatipraviṣṭam | [Su, Utt., 19 7.2]
netre vilambini vidhirvihitaḥ purastāducchiṅghanaṃ śirasi vāryavasecanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 19 8.1]
ṣaṭsaptatirnayanajā ya ime pradiṣṭā rogā bhavantyamahatāṃ mahatāṃ ca tebhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 8.2]
stanyaprakopakaphamārutapittaraktair balākṣivartmabhava eva kukūṇako 'nyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 9.1]
mṛdnāti netramatikaṇḍumathākṣikūṭaṃ nāsālalāṭam api tena śiśuḥ sa nityam | [Su, Utt., 19 9.2]
sūryaprabhāṃ na sahate sravati prabaddhaṃ tasyāharedrudhiramāśu vinirlikhecca | [Su, Utt., 19 10.1]
kṣaudrāyutaiśca kaṭubhiḥ pratisārayettu mātuḥ śiśorabhihitaṃ ca vidhiṃ vidadhyāt | [Su, Utt., 19 10.2]
taṃ vāmayettu madhusaindhavasamprayuktaiḥ pītaṃ payaḥ khalu phalaiḥ kharamañjarīṇām | [Su, Utt., 19 11.1]
syātpippalīlavaṇamākṣikasaṃyutair vā nainaṃ vamantam api vāmayituṃ yateta | [Su, Utt., 19 12.1]
dattvā vacāmaśanadugdhabhuje prayojyam ūrdhvaṃ tataḥ phalayutaṃ vamanaṃ vidhijñaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 12.2]
jambvāmradhātryaṇudalaiḥ paridhāvanārthaṃ kāryaṃ kaṣāyamavasecanam eva cāpi | [Su, Utt., 19 13.1]
āścyotane ca hitamatra ghṛtaṃ guḍūcīsiddhaṃ tathāhurapi ca triphalāvipakvam | [Su, Utt., 19 13.2]
nepālajāmaricaśaṅkharasāñjanāni sindhuprasūtaguḍamākṣikasaṃyutāni | [Su, Utt., 19 14.1]
syādañjanaṃ madhurasāmadhukāmrakair vā kṛṣṇāyasaṃ ghṛtapayo madhu vāpi dagdham | [Su, Utt., 19 14.2]
vyoṣaṃ palāṇḍu madhukaṃ lavaṇottamaṃ ca lākṣāṃ ca gairikayutāṃ guṭikāñjanaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 19 15.1]
nimbacchadaṃ madhukadārvi satāmralodhramicchanti cātra bhiṣajo 'ñjanamaṃśatulyam | [Su, Utt., 19 15.2]
srotojaśaṅkhadadhisaindhavamardhapakṣaṃ śukraṃ śiśor nudati bhāvitamañjanena | [Su, Utt., 19 16.1]
syande kaphādabhihitaṃ kramamācarecca bālasya rogakuśalo 'kṣigadaṃ jighāṃsuḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 16.2]
samudra iva gambhīraṃ naiva śakyaṃ cikitsitam | [Su, Utt., 19 17.1]
vaktuṃ niravaśeṣeṇa ślokānāmayutairapi | [Su, Utt., 19 17.2]
sahasrairapi vā proktamarthamalpamatirnaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 18.1]
tarkagranthārtharahito naiva gṛhṇātyapaṇḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 19 18.2]
tadidaṃ bahugūḍhārthaṃ cikitsābījamīritam | [Su, Utt., 19 19.1]
kuśalenābhipannaṃ tadbahudhābhiprarohati | [Su, Utt., 19 19.2]
tasmānmatimatā nityaṃ nānāśāstrārthadarśinā | [Su, Utt., 19 20.1]
sarvamūhyamagādhārthaṃ śāstramāgamabuddhinā | [Su, Utt., 19 20.2]
{Su, Utt., 20}
athātaḥ karṇagatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 2.1]
karṇaśūlaṃ praṇādaśca bādhiryaṃ kṣveḍa eva ca | [Su, Utt., 20 3.1]
karṇasrāvaḥ karṇakaṇḍūḥ karṇavarcastathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 20 3.2]
kṛmikarṇapratināhau vidradhirdvividhastathā | [Su, Utt., 20 4.1]
karṇapākaḥ pūtikarṇastathaivārśaścaturvidham | [Su, Utt., 20 4.2]
karṇārbudaṃ saptavidhaṃ śophaścāpi caturvidhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 5.1]
ete karṇagatā rogā aṣṭāviṃśatirīritāḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 5.2]
samīraṇaḥ śrotragato 'nyathācaraḥ samantataḥ śūlamatīva karṇayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 6.1]
karoti doṣaiśca yathāsvamāvṛtaḥ sa karṇaśūlaḥ kathito durācaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 6.2]
yadā tu nāḍīṣu vimārgamāgataḥ sa eva śabdābhivahāsu tiṣṭhati | [Su, Utt., 20 7.1]
śṛṇoti śabdān vividhāṃstadā naraḥ praṇādamenaṃ kathayanti cāmayam | [Su, Utt., 20 7.2]
sa eva śabdānuvahā yadā sirāḥ kaphānuyāto vyanusṛtya tiṣṭhati | [Su, Utt., 20 8.1]
tadā narasyāpratikārasevino bhavettu bādhiryamasaṃśayaṃ khalu | [Su, Utt., 20 8.2]
śramāt kṣayādrūkṣakaṣāyabhojanāt samīraṇaḥ śabdapathe pratiṣṭhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 9.1]
viriktaśīrṣasya ca śītasevinaḥ karoti hi kṣveḍamatīva karṇayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 9.2]
śiro'bhighātādathavā nimajjato jale prapākād athavāpi vidradheḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 10.1]
sravettu pūyaṃ śravaṇo 'nilāvṛtaḥ sa karṇasaṃsrāva iti prakīrtitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 10.2]
kaphena kaṇḍūḥ pracitena karṇayor bhṛśaṃ bhavet srotasi karṇasaṃjñite | [Su, Utt., 20 11.1]
viśoṣite śleṣmaṇi pittatejasā nṛṇāṃ bhavet srotasi karṇagūthakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 11.2]
sa karṇaviṭko dravatāṃ yadā gato vilāyito ghrāṇamukhaṃ prapadyate | [Su, Utt., 20 12.1]
tadā sa karṇapratināhasaṃjñito bhavedvikāraḥ śiraso 'bhitāpanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 12.2]
yadā tu mūrchantyathavāpi jantavaḥ sṛjantyapatyānyathavāpi makṣikāḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 13.1]
tadañjanatvācchravaṇo nirucyate bhiṣagbhirādyaiḥ kṛmikarṇako gadaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 13.2]
kṣatābhighātaprabhavastu vidradhirbhavettathā doṣakṛto 'paraḥ punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 14.1]
saraktapītāruṇam asram āsravet pratodadhūmāyanadāhacoṣavān | [Su, Utt., 20 14.2]
bhavet prapākaḥ khalu pittakopato vikothavikledakaraśca karṇayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 15.1]
sthite kaphe srotasi pittatejasaḥ vilāyyamāne bhṛśasaṃpratāpavān | [Su, Utt., 20 15.2]
avedano vāpyathavā savedano ghanaṃ sravet pūti ca pūtikarṇakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 16.1]
pradiṣṭaliṅgānyarśāṃsi tattvatastathaiva śophārbudaliṅgamīritam | [Su, Utt., 20 16.2]
mayā purastāt prasamīkṣya yojayediha iva tāvat prayato bhiṣagvaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 20 16.3]
{Su, Utt., 21}
athātaḥ karṇagatarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 2]
sāmānyaṃ karṇarodheṣu ghṛtapānaṃ rasāyanam | [Su, Utt., 21 3.1]
avyāyāmo 'śiraḥsnānaṃ brahmacaryamakatthanam | [Su, Utt., 21 3.2]
karṇaśūle praṇāde ca bādhiryakṣveḍayorapi | [Su, Utt., 21 4.1]
caturṇām api rogāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ bheṣajaṃ viduḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 4.2]
snigdhaṃ vātaharaiḥ svedair naraṃ snehavirecitam | [Su, Utt., 21 5.1]
nāḍīsvedairupacaretpiṇḍasvedaistathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 21 5.2]
bilvairaṇḍārkavarṣābhūdadhitthonmattaśigrubhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 6.1]
bastagandhāśvagandhābhyāṃ tarkārīyavaveṇubhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 6.2]
āranālaśṛtairebhir nāḍīsvedaḥ prayojitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 7.1]
kaphavātasamutthānaṃ karṇaśūlaṃ nirasyati | [Su, Utt., 21 7.2]
mīnakukkuṭalāvānāṃ māṃsajaiḥ payasāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 21 8.1]
piṇḍaiḥ svedaṃ ca kurvīta karṇaśūlanivāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 8.2]
aśvatthapatrakhallaṃ vā vidhāya bahupatrakam | [Su, Utt., 21 9.1]
tadaṅgāraiḥ susampūrṇaṃ nidadhyācchravaṇopari | [Su, Utt., 21 9.2]
yattailaṃ cyavate tasmāt khallādaṅgāratāpitāt | [Su, Utt., 21 10.1]
tat prāptaṃ śravaṇasrotaḥ sadyo gṛhṇāti vedanām | [Su, Utt., 21 10.2]
kṣaumaguggulvagurubhiḥ saghṛtair dhūpayecca tam | [Su, Utt., 21 11.1]
bhaktopari hitaṃ sarpirbastikarma ca pūjitam | [Su, Utt., 21 11.2]
niranno niśi tatsarpiḥ pītvopari pibet payaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 12.1]
mūrdhabastiṣu nasye ca mastiṣke pariṣecane | [Su, Utt., 21 12.2]
śatapākaṃ balātailaṃ praśastaṃ cāpi bhojane | [Su, Utt., 21 13.1]
kaṇṭakārīmajākṣīre paktvā kṣīreṇa tena ca | [Su, Utt., 21 13.2]
vipacet kukkuṭavasāṃ karṇayostatprapūraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 14.1]
taṇḍulīyakamūlāni phalamaṅkolajaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 21 14.2]
ahiṃsrākendukānmūlaṃ saralaṃ devadāru ca | [Su, Utt., 21 15.1]
laśunaṃ śṛṅgaveraṃ ca tathā vaṃśāvalekhanam | [Su, Utt., 21 15.2]
kalkaireṣāṃ tathāmlaiśca pacet snehaṃ caturvidham | [Su, Utt., 21 16.1]
vedanāyāḥ praśāntyarthaṃ hitaṃ tatkarṇapūraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 16.2]
laśunārdrakaśigrūṇāṃ muraṅgyā mūlakasya ca | [Su, Utt., 21 17.1]
kadalyāḥ svarasaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kaduṣṇaḥ karṇapūraṇe | [Su, Utt., 21 17.2]
śṛṅgaverarasaḥ kṣaudraṃ saindhavaṃ tailam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 21 18.1]
kaduṣṇaṃ karṇayor deyametadvā vedanāpaham | [Su, Utt., 21 18.2]
vaṃśāvalekhanāyukte mūtre cājāvike bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 21 19.1]
sarpiḥ pacettena karṇaṃ pūrayet karṇaśūlinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 19.2]
mahataḥ pañcamūlasya kāṇḍamaṣṭādaśāṅgulam | [Su, Utt., 21 20.1]
kṣaumeṇāveṣṭya saṃsicya tailenādīpayettataḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 20.2]
yattailaṃ cyavate tebhyo dhṛtebhyo bhājanopari | [Su, Utt., 21 21.1]
jñeyaṃ taddīpikātailaṃ sadyo gṛhṇāti vedanām | [Su, Utt., 21 21.2]
kuryādevaṃ bhadrakāṣṭhe kuṣṭhe kāṣṭhe ca sārale | [Su, Utt., 21 22.1]
matimān dīpikātailaṃ karṇaśūlanibarhaṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 22.2]
arkāṅkurānamlapiṣṭāṃstailāktān lavaṇānvitān | [Su, Utt., 21 23.1]
saṃnidadhyāt snuhīkāṇḍe korite tacchadāvṛte | [Su, Utt., 21 23.2]
puṭapākakramasvinnān pīḍayed ā rasāgamāt | [Su, Utt., 21 24.1]
sukhoṣṇaṃ tadrasaṃ karṇe dāpayecchūlaśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 21 24.2]
kapitthamātuluṅgāmlaśṛṅgaverarasaiḥ śubhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 25.1]
sukhoṣṇaiḥ pūrayet karṇaṃ tacchūlavinivṛttaye | [Su, Utt., 21 25.2]
karṇaṃ koṣṇena cukreṇa pūrayet karṇaśūlinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 26.1]
samudraphenacūrṇena yuktyā cāpyavacūrṇayet | [Su, Utt., 21 26.2]
aṣṭānāmiha mūtrāṇāṃ mūtreṇānyatamena tu | [Su, Utt., 21 27.1]
koṣṇena pūrayet karṇaṃ karṇaśūlopaśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 21 27.2]
mūtreṣvamleṣu vātaghne gaṇe ca kvathite bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 21 28.1]
paceccaturvidhaṃ snehaṃ pūraṇaṃ tacca karṇayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 28.2]
etā eva kriyāḥ kuryāt pittaghnaiḥ pittasaṃyute | [Su, Utt., 21 29.1]
kākolyādau daśakṣīraṃ tiktaṃ cātra hitaṃ haviḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 29.2]
kṣīravṛkṣapravāleṣu madhuke candane tathā | [Su, Utt., 21 30.1]
kalkakvāthe paraṃ pakvaṃ śarkarāmadhukaiḥ saraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 30.2]
iṅgudīsarṣapasnehau sakaphe pūraṇe hitau | [Su, Utt., 21 31.1]
tiktauṣadhānāṃ yūṣāśca svedāśca kaphanāśanāḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 31.2]
surasādau kṛtaṃ tailaṃ pañcamūle mahatyapi | [Su, Utt., 21 32.1]
mātuluṅgarasaḥ śuktaṃ laśunārdrakayo rasaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 32.2]
ekaikaḥ pūraṇe pathyastailaṃ teṣvapi vā kṛtam | [Su, Utt., 21 33.1]
tīkṣṇā mūrdhavirekāśca kavalāścātra pūjitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 33.2]
karṇaśūlavidhiḥ kṛtsnaḥ pittaghnaḥ śoṇitāvṛte | [Su, Utt., 21 34.1]
śūlapraṇādabādhiryakṣveḍānāṃ tu prakīrtitam | [Su, Utt., 21 34.2]
sāmānyato viśeṣeṇa bādhirye pūraṇaṃ śṛṇu | [Su, Utt., 21 35.1]
gavāṃ mūtreṇa bilvāni piṣṭvā tailaṃ vipācayet | [Su, Utt., 21 35.2]
sajalaṃ ca sadugdhaṃ ca bādhirye karṇapūraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 36.1]
sitāmadhukabimbībhiḥ siddhaṃ vāje payasyapi | [Su, Utt., 21 36.2]
bimbīkvāthe vimathyoṣṇaṃ śītībhūtaṃ taduddhṛtam | [Su, Utt., 21 37.1]
punaḥ paceddaśakṣīraṃ sitāmadhukacandanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 37.2]
bilvāmbugāḍhaṃ tattailaṃ bādhirye karṇapūraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 38.1]
vakṣyate yaḥ pratiśyāye vidhiḥ so 'pyatra pūjitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 38.2]
vātavyādhiṣu yaścokto vidhiḥ sa ca hito bhavet | [Su, Utt., 21 39.1]
karṇasrāve pūtikarṇe tathaiva kṛmikarṇake | [Su, Utt., 21 39.2]
samānaṃ karma kurvīta yogān vaiśeṣikān api | [Su, Utt., 21 40.1]
śirovirecanaṃ caiva dhūpanaṃ pūraṇaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 21 40.2]
pramārjanaṃ dhāvanaṃ ca vīkṣya vīkṣyāvacārayet | [Su, Utt., 21 41.1]
rājavṛkṣāditoyena surasādigaṇena vā | [Su, Utt., 21 41.2]
karṇaprakṣālanaṃ kāryaṃ cūrṇaireṣāṃ ca pūraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 42.1]
kvāthaṃ pañcakaṣāyaṃ tu kapittharasayojitam | [Su, Utt., 21 42.2]
karṇasrāve praśaṃsanti pūraṇaṃ madhunā saha | [Su, Utt., 21 43.1]
sarjatvakcūrṇasaṃyuktaḥ kārpāsīphalajo rasaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 43.2]
yojito madhunā vāpi karṇasrāve praśasyate | [Su, Utt., 21 44.1]
lākṣā rasāñjanaṃ sarjaścūrṇitaṃ karṇapūraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 44.2]
saśaivalaṃ mahāvṛkṣajambvāmraprasavāyutam | [Su, Utt., 21 45.1]
kulīrakṣaudramaṇḍūkīsiddhaṃ tailaṃ ca pūjitam | [Su, Utt., 21 45.2]
tindukānyabhayā rodhraṃ samaṅgāmalakaṃ madhu | [Su, Utt., 21 46.1]
pūraṇaṃ cātra pathyaṃ syātkapittharasayojitam | [Su, Utt., 21 46.2]
rasamāmrakapitthānāṃ madhūkadhavaśālajam | [Su, Utt., 21 47.1]
pūraṇārthaṃ praśaṃsanti tailaṃ vā tair vipācitam | [Su, Utt., 21 47.2]
priyaṅgumadhukāmbaṣṭhādhātakīśilaparṇibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 48.1]
mañjiṣṭhālodhralākṣābhiḥ kapitthasya rasena vā | [Su, Utt., 21 48.2]
pacettailaṃ tadāsrāvamavagṛhṇāti pūraṇāt | [Su, Utt., 21 49.1]
ghṛtaṃ rasāñjanaṃ nāryāḥ kṣīreṇa madhusaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 21 49.2]
tatpraśastaṃ cirotthe 'pi sāsrāve pūtikarṇake | [Su, Utt., 21 50.1]
nirguṇḍīsvarasastailaṃ sindhurdhūmarajo guḍaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 50.2]
pūraṇaḥ pūtikarṇasya śamano madhusaṃyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 21 51.1]
kṛmikarṇakanāśārthaṃ kṛmighnaṃ yojayedvidhim | [Su, Utt., 21 51.2]
vārtākudhūmaśca hitaḥ sārṣapasneha eva ca | [Su, Utt., 21 52.1]
kṛmighnaṃ haritālena gavāṃ mūtrayutena ca | [Su, Utt., 21 52.2]
gugguloḥ karṇadaurgandhye dhūpanaṃ śreṣṭham ucyate | [Su, Utt., 21 53.1]
chardanaṃ dhūmapānaṃ ca kavalasya ca dhāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 53.2]
karṇakṣveḍe hitaṃ tailaṃ sārṣapaṃ caiva pūraṇam | [Su, Utt., 21 54.1]
vidradhau cāpi kurvīta vidradhyuktaṃ cikitsitam | [Su, Utt., 21 54.2]
prakledya dhīmāṃstailena svedena pravilāyya ca | [Su, Utt., 21 55.1]
śodhayetkarṇaviṭkaṃ tu bhiṣak samyak śalākayā | [Su, Utt., 21 55.2]
nāḍīsvedo 'tha vamanaṃ dhūmo mūrdhavirecanam | [Su, Utt., 21 56.1]
vidhiśca kaphahṛtsarvaḥ karṇakaṇḍūmapohati | [Su, Utt., 21 56.2]
atha karṇapratīnāhe snehasvedau prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 21 57.1]
tato viriktaśirasaḥ kriyāṃ prāptāṃ samācaret | [Su, Utt., 21 57.2]
karṇapākasya bhaiṣajyaṃ kuryātpittavisarpavat | [Su, Utt., 21 58.1]
karṇacchidre vartamānaṃ kīṭaṃ kledamalādi vā | [Su, Utt., 21 58.2]
śṛṅgeṇāpahareddhīmānathavāpi śalākayā | [Su, Utt., 21 59.1]
śeṣāṇāṃ tu vikārāṇāṃ prāk cikitsitamīritam | [Su, Utt., 21 59.2]
{Su, Utt., 22}
athāto nāsāgatarogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 2.1]
apīnasaḥ pūtinasyaṃ nāsāpākastathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 22 3.1]
tathā śoṇitapittaṃ ca pūyaśoṇitam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 22 3.2]
kṣavathur bhraṃśathur dīpto nāsānāhaḥ parisravaḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 4.1]
nāsāśoṣeṇa sahitā daśaikāśceritā gadāḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 4.2]
catvāryarśāṃsi catvāraḥ śophāḥ saptārbudāni ca | [Su, Utt., 22 5.1]
pratiśyāyāśca ye pañca vakṣyante sacikitsitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 5.2]
ekatriṃśanmitāste tu nāsārogāḥ prakīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 5.3]
ānahyate yasya vidhūpyate ca praklidyate śuṣyati cāpi nāsā | [Su, Utt., 22 6.1]
na vetti yo gandharasāṃśca janturjuṣṭaṃ vyavasyettamapīnasena | [Su, Utt., 22 6.2]
taṃ cānilaśleṣmabhavaṃ vikāraṃ brūyāt pratiśyāyasamānaliṅgam | [Su, Utt., 22 7.1]
doṣair vidagdhair galatālumūle saṃvāsito yasya samīraṇastu | [Su, Utt., 22 7.2]
nireti pūtirmukhanāsikābhyāṃ taṃ pūtināsaṃ pravadanti rogam | [Su, Utt., 22 8.1]
ghrāṇāśritaṃ pittamarūṃṣi kuryādyasmin vikāre balavāṃśca pākaḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 8.2]
taṃ nāsikāpākamiti vyavasyedvikledakothāvapi yatra dṛṣṭau | [Su, Utt., 22 9.1]
caturvidhaṃ dviprabhavaṃ vakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ khalu raktapittam | [Su, Utt., 22 9.2]
doṣair vidagdhairathavāpi jantor lalāṭadeśe 'bhihatasya taistu | [Su, Utt., 22 10.1]
nāsā sravet pūyamasṛgvimiśraṃ taṃ pūyaraktaṃ pravadanti rogam | [Su, Utt., 22 10.2]
ghrāṇāśrite marmaṇi sampraduṣṭe yasyānilo nāsikayā nireti | [Su, Utt., 22 11.1]
kaphānuyāto bahuśaḥ saśabdastaṃ rogamāhuḥ kṣavathuṃ vidhijñāḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 12.1]
tīkṣṇopayogādatijighrato vā bhāvān kaṭūnarkanirīkṣaṇādvā | [Su, Utt., 22 12.2]
sūtrādibhir vā taruṇāsthimarmaṇyudghāṭite 'nyaḥ kṣavathurnireti | [Su, Utt., 22 13.1]
prabhraśyate nāsikayaiva yaśca sāndro vidagdho lavaṇaḥ kaphastu | [Su, Utt., 22 13.2]
prāk saṃcito mūrdhani pittataptastaṃ bhraṃśathuṃ vyādhimudāharanti | [Su, Utt., 22 14.1]
ghrāṇe bhṛśaṃ dāhasamanvite tu viniḥsareddhūma iveha vāyuḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 14.2]
nāsā pradīpteva ca yasya jantor vyādhiṃ tu taṃ dīptamudāharanti | [Su, Utt., 22 15.1]
kaphāvṛto vāyurudānasaṃjño yadā svamārge viguṇaḥ sthitaḥ syāt | [Su, Utt., 22 15.2]
ghrāṇaṃ vṛṇotīva tadā sa rogo nāsāpratīnāha iti pradiṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 16.1]
ajasramacchaṃ salilaprakāśaṃ yasyāvivarṇaṃ sravatīha nāsā | [Su, Utt., 22 16.2]
rātrau viśeṣeṇa hi taṃ vikāraṃ nāsāparisrāvamiti vyavasyet | [Su, Utt., 22 17.1]
ghrāṇāśrite śleṣmaṇi mārutena pittena gāḍhaṃ pariśoṣite ca | [Su, Utt., 22 17.2]
samucchvasityūrdhvamadhaśca kṛcchrādyastasya nāsāpariśoṣa uktaḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 18.1]
doṣaistribhistaiḥ pṛthagekaśaśca brūyāttathārśāṃsi tathaiva śophān | [Su, Utt., 22 18.2]
śālākyasiddhāntamavekṣya cāpi sarvātmakaṃ saptamamarbudaṃ tu | [Su, Utt., 22 19.1]
rogaḥ pratiśyāya ihopadiṣṭaḥ sa vakṣyate pañcavidhaḥ purastāt | [Su, Utt., 22 19.2]
nāsāsrotogatā rogāstriṃśadekaśca kīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 20.1]
srotaḥpathe yadvipulaṃ kośavaccārbudaṃ bhavet | [Su, Utt., 22 20.2]
śophāstu śophavijñānā nāsāsrotovyavasthitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 22 21.1]
nidāne 'rśāṃsi nirdiṣṭānyevaṃ tāni vibhāvayet | [Su, Utt., 22 21.2]
{Su, Utt., 23}
athāto nāsāgatarogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 23 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 23 2]
pūrvoddiṣṭe pūtinasye ca jantoḥ snehasvedau chardanaṃ sraṃsanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 23 3.1]
yuktaṃ bhaktaṃ tīkṣṇamalpaṃ laghu syāduṣṇaṃ toyaṃ dhūmapānaṃ ca kāle | [Su, Utt., 23 3.2]
hiṅgu vyoṣaṃ vatsakākhyaṃ śivāṭī lākṣā bījaṃ saurabhaṃ kaṭphalaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 23 4.1]
ugrā kuṣṭhaṃ tīkṣṇagandhā viḍaṅgaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nityaṃ cāvapīḍe karañjam | [Su, Utt., 23 4.2]
etair dravyaiḥ sārṣapaṃ mūtrayuktaṃ tailaṃ dhīmān nasyahetoḥ paceta | [Su, Utt., 23 5.1]
nāsāpāke pittahṛtsaṃvidhānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 23 5.2]
hṛtvā raktaṃ kṣīravṛkṣatvacaśca sājyāḥ sekā yojanīyāśca lepāḥ | [Su, Utt., 23 6.1]
vakṣyāmyūrdhvaṃ raktapittopaśāntiṃ nāḍīvatsyāt pūyarakte cikitsā | [Su, Utt., 23 6.2]
vānte samyak cāvapīḍaṃ vadanti tīkṣṇaṃ dhūmaṃ śodhanaṃ cātra nasyam | [Su, Utt., 23 7.1]
kṣepyaṃ nasyaṃ mūrdhavairecanīyair nāḍyā cūrṇaṃ kṣavathau bhraṃśathau ca | [Su, Utt., 23 7.2]
kuryāt svedān mūrdhni vātāmayaghnān snigdhān dhūmān yadyad anyaddhitaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 23 8.1]
dīpte roge paittikaṃ saṃvidhānaṃ kuryāt sarvaṃ svādu yacchītalaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 23 8.2]
nāsānāhe snehapānaṃ pradhānaṃ snigdhā dhūmā mūrdhabastiśca nityam | [Su, Utt., 23 9.1]
balātailaṃ sarvathaivopayojyaṃ vātavyādhāvanyaduktaṃ ca yadyat | [Su, Utt., 23 9.2]
nāsāsrāve ghrāṇataścūrṇamuktaṃ nāḍyā deyaṃ yo 'vapīḍaśca tīkṣṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 23 10.1]
tīkṣṇaṃ dhūmaṃ devadārvagnikābhyāṃ māṃsaṃ vājaṃ yuktamatrādiśanti | [Su, Utt., 23 10.2]
nāsāśoṣe kṣīrasarpiḥ pradhānaṃ siddhaṃ tailaṃ cāṇukalpena nasyam | [Su, Utt., 23 11.1]
sarpiḥ pānaṃ bhojanaṃ jāṅgalaiśca snehaḥ svedaḥ snaihikaścāpi dhūmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 23 11.2]
śeṣān rogān ghrāṇajān saṃniyaccheduktaṃ teṣāṃ yadyathā saṃvidhānam | [Su, Utt., 23 12.1]
{Su, Utt., 24}
athātaḥ pratiśyāyapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 2]
nārīprasaṅgaḥ śiraso 'bhitāpo dhūmo rajaḥ śītamatipratāpaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 3.1]
saṃdhāraṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayośca sadyaḥ pratiśyāyanidānamuktam | [Su, Utt., 24 3.2]
cayaṃ gatā mūrdhani mārutādayaḥ pṛthak samastāśca tathaiva śoṇitam | [Su, Utt., 24 4.1]
prakopyamāṇā vividhaiḥ prakopaṇair nṛṇāṃ pratiśyāyakarā bhavanti hi | [Su, Utt., 24 4.2]
śirogurutvaṃ kṣavathoḥ pravartanaṃ tathāṅgamardaḥ parihṛṣṭaromatā | [Su, Utt., 24 5.1]
upadravāścāpyapare pṛthagvidhā nṛṇāṃ pratiśyāyapuraḥsarāḥ smṛtāḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 5.2]
ānaddhā pihitā nāsā tanusrāvapravartinī | [Su, Utt., 24 6.1]
galatālvoṣṭhaśoṣaśca nistodaḥ śaṅkhayostathā | [Su, Utt., 24 6.2]
svaropaghātaśca bhavet pratiśyāye 'nilātmake | [Su, Utt., 24 7.1]
uṣṇaḥ sapītakaḥ srāvo ghrāṇāt sravati paittike | [Su, Utt., 24 7.2]
kṛśo 'tipāṇḍuḥ saṃtapto bhavettṛṣṇānipīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 8.1]
sadhūmaṃ sahasā vahniṃ vamatīva ca mānavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 8.2]
kaphaḥ kaphakṛte ghrāṇācchuklaḥ śītaḥ sravenmuhuḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 9.1]
śuklāvabhāsaḥ śūnākṣo bhavedguruśiromukhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 9.2]
śirogalauṣṭhatālūnāṃ kaṇḍūyanamatīva ca | [Su, Utt., 24 10.1]
bhūtvā bhūtvā pratiśyāyo yo 'kasmādvinivartate | [Su, Utt., 24 10.2]
saṃpakvo vāpyapakvo vā sa sarvaprabhavaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 11.1]
liṅgāni caiva sarveṣāṃ pīnasānāṃ ca sarvaje | [Su, Utt., 24 11.2]
raktaje tu pratiśyāye raktāsrāvaḥ pravartate | [Su, Utt., 24 12.1]
tāmrākṣaśca bhavejjantururoghātaprapīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 12.2]
durgandhocchvāsavadanastathā gandhānna vetti ca | [Su, Utt., 24 13.1]
mūrchanti cātra kṛmayaḥ śvetāḥ snigdhāstathāṇavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 13.2]
kṛmimūrdhavikāreṇa samānaṃ cāsya lakṣaṇam | [Su, Utt., 24 14.1]
praklidyati punarnāsā punaśca pariśuṣyati | [Su, Utt., 24 14.2]
muhurānahyate cāpi muhurvivriyate tathā | [Su, Utt., 24 15.1]
niḥśvāsocchvāsadaurgandhyaṃ tathā gandhānna vetti ca | [Su, Utt., 24 15.2]
evaṃ duṣṭapratiśyāyaṃ jānīyāt kṛcchrasādhanam | [Su, Utt., 24 16.1]
sarva eva pratiśyāyā narasyāpratikāriṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 16.2]
kālena rogajananā jāyante duṣṭapīnasāḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 17.1]
bādhiryamāndhyamaghrāṇaṃ ghorāṃśca nayanāmayān | [Su, Utt., 24 17.2]
kāsāgnisādaśophāṃśca vṛddhāḥ kurvanti pīnasāḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 17.3]
navaṃ pratiśyāyamapāsya sarvamupācaret sarpiṣa eva pānaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 18.1]
svedair vicitrair vamanaiśca yuktaiḥ kālopapannairavapīḍanaiśca | [Su, Utt., 24 18.2]
apacyamānasya hi pācanārthaṃ svedo hito 'mlairahimaṃ ca bhojyam | [Su, Utt., 24 19.1]
niṣevyamāṇaṃ payasārdrakaṃ vā saṃpācayedikṣuvikārayogaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 19.2]
pakvaṃ ghanaṃ cāpyavalambamānaṃ śirovirekairapakarṣayettam | [Su, Utt., 24 20.1]
virecanāsthāpanadhūmapānairavekṣya doṣān kavalagrahaiśca | [Su, Utt., 24 20.2]
nivātaśayyāsanaceṣṭanāni mūrdhno gurūṣṇaṃ ca tathaiva vāsaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 21.1]
tīkṣṇā virekāḥ śirasaḥ sadhūmā rūkṣaṃ yavānnaṃ vijayā ca sevyā | [Su, Utt., 24 21.2]
śītāmbuyoṣicchiśirāvagāhacintātirūkṣāśanavegarodhān | [Su, Utt., 24 22.1]
śokaṃ ca madyāni navāni caiva vivarjayet pīnasarogajuṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 22.2]
chardyaṅgasādajvaragauravārtam arocakāratyatisārayuktam | [Su, Utt., 24 23.1]
vilaṅghanaiḥ pācanadīpanīyairupācaret pīnasinaṃ yathāvat | [Su, Utt., 24 23.2]
bahudravair vātakaphopasṛṣṭaṃ pracchardayet pīnasinaṃ vayaḥstham | [Su, Utt., 24 24.1]
upadravāṃścāpi yathopadeśaṃ svair bheṣajair bhojanasaṃvidhānaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 24.2]
jayedviditvā mṛdutāṃ gateṣu prāglakṣaṇeṣūktamathādiśecca | [Su, Utt., 24 24.3]
vātike tu pratiśyāye pibet sarpiryathākramam | [Su, Utt., 24 25.1]
pañcabhir lavaṇaiḥ siddhaṃ prathamena gaṇena ca | [Su, Utt., 24 25.2]
nasyādiṣu vidhiṃ kṛtsnamavekṣetārditeritam | [Su, Utt., 24 26.1]
pittaraktotthayoḥ peyaṃ sarpirmadhurakaiḥ śṛtam | [Su, Utt., 24 26.2]
pariṣekān pradehāṃśca kuryād api ca śītalān | [Su, Utt., 24 27.1]
śrīsarjarasapattaṅgapriyaṅgumadhuśarkarāḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 27.2]
drākṣāmadhūlikāgojīśrīparṇīmadhukais tathā | [Su, Utt., 24 28.1]
yujyante kavalāścātra vireko madhurairapi | [Su, Utt., 24 28.2]
dhavatvaktriphalāśyāmātilvakair madhukena ca | [Su, Utt., 24 29.1]
śrīparṇīrajanīmiśraiḥ kṣīre daśaguṇe pacet | [Su, Utt., 24 29.2]
tailaṃ kālopapannaṃ tannasyaṃ syādanayor hitam | [Su, Utt., 24 30.1]
kaphaje sarpiṣā snigdhaṃ tilamāṣavipakvayā | [Su, Utt., 24 30.2]
yavāgvā vāmayedvāntaḥ kaphaghnaṃ kramamācaret | [Su, Utt., 24 31.1]
ubhe bale bṛhatyau ca viḍaṅgaṃ satrikaṇṭakam | [Su, Utt., 24 31.2]
śvetāmūlaṃ sadābhadrāṃ varṣābhūṃ cātra saṃharet | [Su, Utt., 24 32.1]
tailamebhir vipakvaṃ tu nasyamasyopakalpayet | [Su, Utt., 24 32.2]
saralākiṇihīdārunikumbheṅgudibhiḥ kṛtāḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 33.1]
vartayaścopayojyāḥ syurdhūmapāne yathāvidhi | [Su, Utt., 24 33.2]
sarpīṃṣi kaṭutiktāni tīkṣṇadhūmāḥ kaṭūni ca | [Su, Utt., 24 34.1]
bheṣajānyupayuktāni hanyuḥ sarvaprakopajam | [Su, Utt., 24 34.2]
rasāñjane sātiviṣe mustāyāṃ bhadradāruṇi | [Su, Utt., 24 35.1]
tailaṃ vipakvaṃ nasyārthe vidadhyāccātra buddhimān | [Su, Utt., 24 35.2]
mustā tejovatī pāṭhā kaṭphalaṃ kaṭukā vacā | [Su, Utt., 24 36.1]
sarṣapāḥ pippalīmūlaṃ pippalyaḥ saindhavāgnikaḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 36.2]
tutthaṃ karañjabījaṃ ca lavaṇaṃ bhadradāru ca | [Su, Utt., 24 37.1]
etaiḥ kṛtaṃ kaṣāyaṃ tu kavale saṃprayojayet | [Su, Utt., 24 37.2]
hitaṃ mūrdhavireke ca tailamebhir vipācitam | [Su, Utt., 24 38.1]
kṣīramardhajale kvāthyaṃ jāṅgalair mṛgapakṣibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 38.2]
puṣpair vimiśraṃ jalajair vātaghnairauṣadhairapi | [Su, Utt., 24 39.1]
hime kṣīrāvaśiṣṭe 'smin ghṛtamutpādya yatnataḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 39.2]
sarvagandhasitānantāmadhukaṃ candanaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 24 40.1]
āvāpya vipacedbhūyo daśakṣīraṃ tu tadghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 24 40.2]
nasye prayuktamudriktān pratiśyāyān vyapohati | [Su, Utt., 24 41.1]
yathāsvaṃ doṣaśamanaistailaṃ kuryācca yatnataḥ | [Su, Utt., 24 41.2]
samūtrapittāścoddiṣṭāḥ kriyāḥ kṛmiṣu yojayet | [Su, Utt., 24 42.1]
yāpanārthaṃ kṛmighnāni bheṣajāni ca buddhimān | [Su, Utt., 24 42.2]
{Su, Utt., 25}
athātaḥ śirorogavijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 2]
śiro rujati martyānāṃ vātapittakaphaistribhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 3.1]
sannipātena raktena kṣayeṇa krimibhistathā | [Su, Utt., 25 3.2]
sūryāvartānantavātārdhāvabhedakaśaṅkhakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 4.1]
ekādaśaprakārasya lakṣaṇaṃ sampravakṣyate | [Su, Utt., 25 4.2]
yasyānimittaṃ śiraso rujaśca bhavanti tīvrā niśi cātimātram | [Su, Utt., 25 5.1]
bandhopatāpaiśca bhavedviśeṣaḥ śiro'bhitāpaḥ sa samīraṇena | [Su, Utt., 25 5.2]
yasyoṣṇamaṅgāracitaṃ yathaiva dahyeta dhūpyeta śiro'kṣināsam | [Su, Utt., 25 6.1]
śītena rātrau ca bhavedviśeṣaḥ śiro'bhitāpaḥ sa tu pittakopāt | [Su, Utt., 25 6.2]
śirogalaṃ yasya kaphopadigdhaṃ guru pratiṣṭabdhamatho himaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 25 7.1]
śūnākṣikūṭaṃ vadanaṃ ca yasya śiro'bhitāpaḥ sa kaphaprakopāt | [Su, Utt., 25 7.2]
śiro'bhitāpe tritayapravṛtte sarvāṇi liṅgāni samudbhavanti | [Su, Utt., 25 8.1]
raktātmakaḥ pittasamānaliṅgaḥ sparśāsahatvaṃ śiraso bhavecca | [Su, Utt., 25 8.2]
vasābalāsakṣatasaṃbhavānāṃ śirogatānāmiha saṃkṣayeṇa | [Su, Utt., 25 9.1]
kṣayapravṛttaḥ śiraso 'bhitāpaḥ kaṣṭo bhavedugrarujo 'timātram | [Su, Utt., 25 9.2]
saṃsvedanachardanadhūmanasyair asṛgvimokṣaiśca vivṛddhimeti | [Su, Utt., 25 10.1]
nistudyate yasya śiro 'timātraṃ saṃbhakṣyamāṇaṃ sphuṭatīva cāntaḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 10.2]
ghrāṇācca gacchetsalilaṃ saraktaṃ śiro'bhitāpaḥ kṛmibhiḥ sa ghoraḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 11.1]
sūryodayaṃ yā prati mandamandam akṣibhruvaṃ ruk samupaiti gāḍham | [Su, Utt., 25 11.2]
vivardhate cāṃśumatā sahaiva sūryāpavṛttau vinivartate ca | [Su, Utt., 25 12.1]
śītena śāntiṃ labhate kadāciduṣṇena jantuḥ sukhamāpnuyācca | [Su, Utt., 25 12.2]
taṃ bhāskarāvartam udāharanti sarvātmakaṃ kaṣṭatamaṃ vikāram | [Su, Utt., 25 13.1]
doṣāstu duṣṭāstraya eva manyāṃ saṃpīḍya ghāṭāsu rujāṃ sutīvrām | [Su, Utt., 25 13.2]
kurvanti sākṣibhruvi śaṅkhadeśe sthitiṃ karotyāśu viśeṣatastu | [Su, Utt., 25 14.1]
gaṇḍasya pārśve tu karoti kampaṃ hanugrahaṃ locanajāṃśca rogān | [Su, Utt., 25 14.2]
anantavātaṃ tamudāharanti doṣatrayotthaṃ śiraso vikāram | [Su, Utt., 25 15.1]
yasyottamāṅgārdhamatīva jantoḥ sambhedatodabhramaśūlajuṣṭam | [Su, Utt., 25 15.2]
pakṣād daśāhād athavāpyakasmāt tasyārdhabhedaṃ tritayādvyavasyet | [Su, Utt., 25 16.1]
śaṅkhāśrito vāyurudīrṇavegaḥ kṛtānuyātraḥ kaphapittaraktaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 16.2]
rujaḥ sutīvrāḥ pratanoti mūrdhni viśeṣataścāpi hi śaṅkhayostu | [Su, Utt., 25 17.1]
sukaṣṭam enaṃ khalu śaṅkhakākhyaṃ maharṣayo vedavidaḥ purāṇāḥ | [Su, Utt., 25 17.2]
vyādhiṃ vadantyudgatamṛtyukalpaṃ bhiṣaksahasrairapi durnivāram | [Su, Utt., 25 18.1]
{Su, Utt., 26}
athātaḥ śirorogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 2.1]
vātavyādhividhiḥ kāryaḥ śiroroge 'nilātmake | [Su, Utt., 26 3.1]
payo'nupānaṃ seveta ghṛtaṃ tailamathāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 26 3.2]
mudgān kulatthānmāṣāṃśca khādecca niśi kevalān | [Su, Utt., 26 4.1]
kaṭūṣṇāṃśca sasarpiṣkānuṣṇaṃ cānu payaḥ pibet | [Su, Utt., 26 4.2]
pibedvā payasā tailaṃ tatkalkaṃ vāpi mānavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 5.1]
vātaghnasiddhaiḥ kṣīraiśca sukhoṣṇaiḥ sekamācaret | [Su, Utt., 26 5.2]
tatsiddhaiḥ pāyasair vāpi sukhoṣṇair lepayecchiraḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 6.1]
svinnair vā matsyapiśitaiḥ kṛsarair vā sasaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 6.2]
candanotpalakuṣṭhair vā suślakṣṇair magadhāyutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 7.1]
snigdhasya tailaṃ nasyaṃ syāt kulīrarasasādhitam | [Su, Utt., 26 7.2]
varuṇādau gaṇe kṣuṇṇe kṣīramardhodakaṃ pacet | [Su, Utt., 26 8.1]
kṣīraśeṣaṃ ca tanmathyaṃ śītaṃ sāramupāharet | [Su, Utt., 26 8.2]
tato madhurakaiḥ siddhaṃ nasye tat pūjitaṃ haviḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 9.1]
tasmin vipakve kṣīre tu peyaṃ sarpiḥ saśarkaram | [Su, Utt., 26 9.2]
dhūmaṃ cāsya yathākālaṃ snaihikaṃ yojayedbhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 26 10.1]
pānābhyañjananasyeṣu bastikarmaṇi secane | [Su, Utt., 26 10.2]
vidadhyāttraivṛtaṃ dhīmān balātailamathāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 26 11.1]
bhojayecca rasaiḥ snigdhaiḥ payobhir vā susaṃskṛtaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 11.2]
pittaraktasamutthānau śirorogau nivārayet | [Su, Utt., 26 12.1]
śirolepaiḥ sasarpiṣkaiḥ pariṣekaiśca śītalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 12.2]
kṣīrekṣurasadhānyāmlamastukṣaudrasitājalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 13.1]
nalavañjulakahlāracandanotpalapadmakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 13.2]
vaṃśaśaivalayaṣṭyāhvamustāmbhoruhasaṃyutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 14.1]
śiraḥpralepaiḥ saghṛtair vaisarpaiśca tathāvidhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 14.2]
madhuraiśca mukhālepair nasyakarmabhireva ca | [Su, Utt., 26 15.1]
āsthāpanair virekaiśca pathyaiśca snehabastibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 15.2]
kṣīrasarpirhitaṃ nasyaṃ vasā vā jāṅgalā śubhā | [Su, Utt., 26 16.1]
utpalādivipakvena kṣīreṇāsthāpanaṃ hitam | [Su, Utt., 26 16.2]
bhojanaṃ jāṅgalarasaiḥ sarpiṣā cānuvāsanam | [Su, Utt., 26 17.1]
madhuraiḥ kṣīrasarpistu snehane ca saśarkaram | [Su, Utt., 26 17.2]
pittaraktaghnamuddiṣṭaṃ yaccānyad api taddhitam | [Su, Utt., 26 18.1]
kaphotthitaṃ śirorogaṃ jayet kaphanivāraṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 18.2]
śirovirekair vamanaistīkṣṇair gaṇḍūṣadhāraṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 19.1]
acchaṃ ca pāyayetsarpiḥ svedayeccāpyabhīkṣṇaśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 19.2]
śiro madhūkasāreṇa snigdhaṃ cāpi virecayet | [Su, Utt., 26 20.1]
iṅgudasya tvacā vāpi meṣaśṛṅgasya vā bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 26 20.2]
ābhyām eva kṛtāṃ vartiṃ dhūmapāne prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 26 21.1]
ghreyaṃ kaṭphalacūrṇaṃ ca kavalāśca kaphāpahāḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 21.2]
saralākuṣṭhaśārṅgeṣṭādevakāṣṭhaiḥ sarohiṣaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 22.1]
kṣārapiṣṭaiḥ salavaṇaiḥ sukhoṣṇair lepayecchiraḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 22.2]
yavaṣaṣṭikayoścānnaṃ vyoṣakṣārasamāyutam | [Su, Utt., 26 23.1]
paṭolamudgakaulatthair mātrāvadbhojayedrasaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 23.2]
śiroroge tridoṣotthe tridoṣaghno vidhirhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 24.1]
sarpiḥ pānaṃ viśeṣeṇa purāṇaṃ vā diśanti hi | [Su, Utt., 26 24.2]
kṣayaje kṣayamāsādya kartavyo bṛṃhaṇo vidhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 25.1]
pāne nasye ca sarpiḥ syādvātaghnamadhuraiḥ śṛtam | [Su, Utt., 26 25.2]
kṣayakāsāpahaṃ cātra sarpiḥ pathyatamaṃ viduḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 26.1]
kṛmibhir bhakṣyamāṇasya vakṣyate śirasaḥ kriyā | [Su, Utt., 26 26.2]
nasye hi śoṇitaṃ dadyāttena mūrchanti jantavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 27.1]
mattāḥ śoṇitagandhena samāyānti yatastataḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 27.2]
teṣāṃ nirharaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tato mūrdhavirecanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 28.1]
hrasvaśigrukabījair vā kāṃsyanīlīsamāyutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 28.2]
kṛmighnairavapīḍaiśca mūtrapiṣṭairupācaret | [Su, Utt., 26 29.1]
pūtimatsyayutān dhūmān kṛmighnāṃśca prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 26 29.2]
bhojanāni kṛmighnāni pānāni vividhāni ca | [Su, Utt., 26 30.1]
sūryāvarte vidhātavyaṃ nasyakarmādibheṣajam | [Su, Utt., 26 30.2]
bhojanaṃ jāṅgalaprāyaṃ kṣīrānnavikṛtirghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 26 31.1]
tathārdhabhedake vyādhau prāptamanyacca yadbhavet | [Su, Utt., 26 31.2]
śirīṣamūlakaphalairavapīḍo 'nayor hitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 32.1]
vaṃśamūlakaphalairavapīḍo 'nayor hitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 32.2]
avapīḍo hitaścātra vacāmāgadhikāyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 33.1]
madhukenāvapīḍo vā madhunā saha saṃyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 33.2]
manaḥśilāvapīḍo vā madhunā candanena vā | [Su, Utt., 26 34.1]
teṣāmante hitaṃ nasyaṃ sarpirmadhurasānvitam | [Su, Utt., 26 34.2]
sārivotpalakuṣṭhāni madhukaṃ cāmlapeṣitam | [Su, Utt., 26 35.1]
sarpistailayuto lepo dvayorapi sukhāvahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 35.2]
eṣa eva prayoktavyaḥ śiroroge kaphātmake | [Su, Utt., 26 36.1]
anantavāte kartavyaḥ sūryāvartaharo vidhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 36.2]
sirāvyadhaśca kartavyo 'nantavātapraśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 26 37.1]
āhāraśca vidhātavyo vātapittavināśanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 37.2]
madhumastakasaṃyāvaghṛtapūraiśca bhojanam | [Su, Utt., 26 38.1]
kṣīrasarpiḥ praśaṃsanti nasye pāne ca śaṅkhake | [Su, Utt., 26 38.2]
jāṅgalānāṃ rasaiḥ snigdhairāhāraścātra śasyate | [Su, Utt., 26 39.1]
śatāvarīṃ tilān kṛṣṇān madhukaṃ nīlamutpalam | [Su, Utt., 26 39.2]
dūrvāṃ punarnavāṃ caiva lepe sādhvavacārayet | [Su, Utt., 26 40.1]
mahāsugandhāmathavā pālindīṃ cāmlapeṣitām | [Su, Utt., 26 40.2]
śītāṃścātra parīṣekān pradehāṃśca prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 26 41.1]
avapīḍaśca deyo 'tra sūryāvartanivāraṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 41.2]
kṛmikṣayakṛtau hitvā śirorogeṣu buddhimān | [Su, Utt., 26 42.1]
madhutailasamāyuktaiḥ śirāṃsyativirecayet | [Su, Utt., 26 42.2]
paścātsarṣapatailena tato nasyaṃ prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 26 43.1]
na cecchāntiṃ vrajantyevaṃ snigdhasvinnāṃstato bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 26 43.2]
paścādupācaretsamyak sirāṇāmatha mokṣaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 44.1]
ṣaṭsaptatirnetrarogā daśāṣṭādaśa karṇajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 44.2]
ekatriṃśad ghrāṇagatāḥ śirasyekādaśaiva tu | [Su, Utt., 26 45.1]
iti vistarato dṛṣṭāḥ salakṣaṇacikitsitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 45.2]
etāvanto yathāsthūlamuttamāṅgagatā gadāḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 46.1]
asmiñchāstre nigaditāḥ saṃkhyārūpacikitsitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 26 46.2]
{Su, Utt., 27}
athāto navagrahākṛtivijñānīyamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 2]
bālagrahāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ sādhanaṃ cāpyanantaram | [Su, Utt., 27 3.1]
utpattiṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva suśrutaikamanāḥ śṛṇu | [Su, Utt., 27 3.2]
skandagrahastu prathamaḥ skandāpasmāra eva ca | [Su, Utt., 27 4.1]
śakunī revatī caiva pūtanā cāndhapūtanā | [Su, Utt., 27 4.2]
pūtanā śītanāmā ca tathaiva mukhamaṇḍikā | [Su, Utt., 27 5.1]
navamo naigameṣaśca yaḥ pitṛgrahasaṃjñitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 5.2]
dhātrīmātroḥ prākpradiṣṭāpacārāc chaucabhraṣṭānmaṅgalācārahīnān | [Su, Utt., 27 6.1]
trastān hṛṣṭāṃtarjitān tāḍitān vā pūjāhetor hiṃsyurete kumārān | [Su, Utt., 27 6.2]
aiśvaryasthāste na śakyā viśanto dehaṃ draṣṭuṃ mānuṣair viśvarūpāḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 7.1]
āptaṃ vākyaṃ tatsamīkṣyābhidhāsye liṅgānyeṣāṃ yāni dehe bhavanti | [Su, Utt., 27 7.2]
śūnākṣau kṣatajasagandhikaḥ stanadviḍ vakrāsyo hatacalitaikapakṣmanetraḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 8.1]
udvignaḥ sululitacakṣur alparodī skandārto bhavati ca gāḍhamuṣṭivarcāḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 8.2]
niḥsaṃjño bhavati punarbhavetsasaṃjñaḥ saṃrabdhaḥ karacaraṇaiśca nṛtyatīva | [Su, Utt., 27 9.1]
viṇmūtre sṛjati vinadya jṛmbhamāṇaḥ phenaṃ ca prasṛjati tatsakhābhipannaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 9.2]
srastāṅgo bhayacakito vihaṅgagandhiḥ saṃsrāvivraṇaparipīḍitaḥ samantāt | [Su, Utt., 27 10.1]
sphoṭaiśca pracitatanuḥ sadāhapākair vijñeyo bhavati śiśuḥ kṣataḥ śakunyā | [Su, Utt., 27 10.2]
raktāsyo haritamalo 'tipāṇḍudehaḥ śyāvo vā jvaramukhapākavedanātaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 11.1]
revatyā vyathitatanuśca karṇanāsaṃ mṛdnāti dhruvamabhipīḍitaḥ kumāraḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 11.2]
srastāṅgaḥ svapiti sukhaṃ divā na rātrau viḍ bhinnaṃ sṛjati ca kākatulyagandhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 12.1]
chardyārto hṛṣitatanūruhaḥ kumāras tṛṣṇālur bhavati ca pūtanāgṛhītaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 12.2]
yo dveṣṭi stanam atisārakāsahikkāchardībhir jvarasahitābhirardyamānaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 13.1]
durvarṇaḥ satatam adhaḥśayo 'mlagandhistaṃ brūyurbhiṣaja ihāndhapūtanārtam | [Su, Utt., 27 13.2]
udvigno bhṛśam ativepate prarudyāt saṃlīnaḥ svapiti ca yasya cāntrakūjaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 14.1]
visrāṅgo bhṛśamatisāryate ca yastaṃ jānīyādbhiṣagiha śītapūtanārtam | [Su, Utt., 27 14.2]
mlānāṅgaḥ surucirapāṇipādavaktro bahvāśī kaluṣasirāvṛtodaro yaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 15.1]
sodvego bhavati ca mūtratulyagandhiḥ sa jñeyaḥ śiśuriha vaktramaṇḍikārtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 15.2]
yaḥ phenaṃ vamati vinamyate ca madhye sodvegaṃ vilapati cordhvam īkṣamāṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 16.1]
jvaryeta pratatamatho vasāsagandhir niḥsaṃjño bhavati hi naigameṣajuṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 16.2]
prastabdho yaḥ stanadveṣī muhyate cāviśanmuhuḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 17.1]
taṃ bālamacirāddhanti grahaḥ sampūrṇalakṣaṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 17.2]
viparītamataḥ sādhyaṃ cikitsedacirārditam | [Su, Utt., 27 18.1]
gṛhe purāṇahaviṣābhyajya bālaṃ śucau śuciḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 18.2]
sarṣapān prakiretteṣāṃ tailair dīpaṃ ca kārayet | [Su, Utt., 27 19.1]
sadā saṃnihitaṃ cāpi juhuyāddhavyavāhanam | [Su, Utt., 27 19.2]
sarvagandhauṣadhībījair gandhamālyair alaṃkṛtam | [Su, Utt., 27 20.1]
agnaye kṛttikābhyaśca svāhā svāheti saṃtatam | [Su, Utt., 27 20.2]
namaḥ skandāya devāya grahādhipataye namaḥ | [Su, Utt., 27 21.1]
śirasā tvābhivande 'haṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva me balim | [Su, Utt., 27 21.2]
nīrujo nirvikāraśca śiśurme jāyatāṃ drutam | [Su, Utt., 27 21.3]
{Su, Utt., 28}
athātaḥ skandhagrahapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 2]
skandagrahopasṛṣṭānāṃ kumārāṇāṃ praśasyate | [Su, Utt., 28 3.1]
vātaghnadrumapatrāṇāṃ niṣkvāthaḥ pariṣecane | [Su, Utt., 28 3.2]
teṣāṃ mūleṣu siddhaṃ ca tailamabhyañjane hitam | [Su, Utt., 28 4.1]
sarvagandhasurāmaṇḍakaiḍaryāvāpam iṣyate | [Su, Utt., 28 4.2]
devadāruṇi rāsnāyāṃ madhureṣu drumeṣu ca | [Su, Utt., 28 5.1]
siddhaṃ sarpiśca sakṣīraṃ pānamasmai prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 28 5.2]
sarṣapāḥ sarpanirmoko vacā kākādanī ghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 28 6.1]
uṣṭrājāvigavāṃ caiva romāṇyuddhūpanaṃ śiśoḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 6.2]
somavallīmindravallīṃ śamīṃ bilvasya kaṇṭakān | [Su, Utt., 28 7.1]
mṛgādanyāśca mūlāni grathitānyeva dhārayet | [Su, Utt., 28 7.2]
raktāni mālyāni tathā patākā raktāśca gandhā vividhāśca bhakṣyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 8.1]
ghaṇṭā ca devāya balirnivedyaḥ sukukkuṭaḥ skandagrahe hitāya | [Su, Utt., 28 8.2]
snānaṃ trirātraṃ niśi catvareṣu kuryāt puraṃ śāliyavair navaistu | [Su, Utt., 28 9.1]
adbhiśca gāyatryabhimantritābhiḥ prajvālanaṃ vyāhṛtibhiśca vahneḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 9.2]
rakṣāmataḥ pravakṣyāmi bālānāṃ pāpanāśinīm | [Su, Utt., 28 10.1]
ahanyahani kartavyā yā bhiṣagbhiratandritaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 10.2]
tapasāṃ tejasāṃ caiva yaśasāṃ vapuṣāṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 28 11.1]
nidhānaṃ yo 'vyayo devaḥ sa te skandaḥ prasīdatu | [Su, Utt., 28 11.2]
grahasenāpatirdevo devasenāpatirvibhuḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 12.1]
devasenāripuharaḥ pātu tvāṃ bhagavān guhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 12.2]
devadevasya mahataḥ pāvakasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 13.1]
gaṅgomākṛttikānāṃ ca sa te śarma prayacchatu | [Su, Utt., 28 13.2]
raktamālyāmbaraḥ śrīmān raktacandanabhūṣitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 14.1]
raktadivyavapurdevaḥ pātu tvāṃ krauñcasūdanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 28 14.2]
{Su, Utt., 29}
athātaḥ skandāpasmārapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 29 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 29 2]
bilvaḥ śirīṣo golomī surasādiśca yo gaṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 29 3.1]
pariṣeke prayoktavyaḥ skandāpasmāraśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 29 3.2]
sarvagandhavipakvaṃ tu tailamabhyañjane hitam | [Su, Utt., 29 4.1]
kṣīravṛkṣakaṣāye ca kākolyādau gaṇe tathā | [Su, Utt., 29 4.2]
vipaktavyaṃ ghṛtaṃ cāpi pānīyaṃ payasā saha | [Su, Utt., 29 5.1]
utsādanaṃ vacāhiṅguyuktaṃ skandagrahe hitam | [Su, Utt., 29 5.2]
gṛdhrolūkapurīṣāṇi keśā hastinakhā ghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 29 6.1]
vṛṣabhasya ca romāṇi yojyānyuddhūpane 'pi ca | [Su, Utt., 29 6.2]
anantāṃ kukkuṭīṃ bimbīṃ markaṭīṃ cāpi dhārayet | [Su, Utt., 29 7.1]
pakvāpakvāni māṃsāni prasannā rudhiraṃ payaḥ | [Su, Utt., 29 7.2]
bhūtaudano nivedyaśca skandāpasmāriṇe 'vaṭe | [Su, Utt., 29 8.1]
catuṣpathe ca kartavyaṃ snānamasya yatātmanā | [Su, Utt., 29 8.2]
skandāpasmārasaṃjño yaḥ skandasya dayitaḥ sakhā | [Su, Utt., 29 9.1]
viśākhasaṃjñaśca śiśoḥ śivo 'stu vikṛtānanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 29 9.2]
{Su, Utt., 30}
athātaḥ śakunīpratīṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 30 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 30 2]
śakunyabhiparītasya kāryo vaidyena jānatā | [Su, Utt., 30 3.1]
vetasāmrakapitthānāṃ niṣkvāthaḥ pariṣecane | [Su, Utt., 30 3.2]
kaṣāyamadhuraistailaṃ kāryamabhyañjane śiśoḥ | [Su, Utt., 30 4.1]
madhukośīrahrīberasārivotpalapadmakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 30 4.2]
rodhrapriyaṅgumañjiṣṭhāgairikaiḥ pradihecchiśum | [Su, Utt., 30 5.1]
vraṇeṣūktāni cūrṇāni pathyāni vividhāni ca | [Su, Utt., 30 5.2]
skandagrahe dhūpanāni tānīhāpi prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 30 6.1]
śatāvarīmṛgairvārunāgadantīnidigdhikāḥ | [Su, Utt., 30 6.2]
lakṣmaṇāṃ sahadevāṃ ca bṛhatīṃ cāpi dhārayet | [Su, Utt., 30 7.1]
tilataṇḍulakaṃ mālyaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥśilā | [Su, Utt., 30 7.2]
balireṣa karañjeṣu nivedyo niyatātmanā | [Su, Utt., 30 8.1]
niṣkuṭe ca prayoktavyaṃ snānamasya yathāvidhi | [Su, Utt., 30 8.2]
skandāpasmāraśamanaṃ ghṛtaṃ cāpīha pūjitam | [Su, Utt., 30 9.1]
kuryācca vividhāṃ pūjāṃ śakunyāḥ kusumaiḥ śubhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 30 9.2]
antarīkṣacarā devī sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā | [Su, Utt., 30 10.1]
ayomukhī tīkṣṇatuṇḍā śakunī te prasīdatu | [Su, Utt., 30 10.2]
durdarśanā mahākāyā piṅgākṣī bhairavasvarā | [Su, Utt., 30 11.1]
lambodarī śaṅkukarṇī śakunī te prasīdatu | [Su, Utt., 30 11.2]
{Su, Utt., 31}
athāto revatīpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 31 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 31 2]
aśvagandhā ca śṛṅgī ca sārivā sapunarnavā | [Su, Utt., 31 3.1]
sahe tathā vidārī ca kaṣāyāḥ secane hitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 31 3.2]
tailamabhyañjane kāryaṃ kuṣṭhe sarjarase 'pi ca | [Su, Utt., 31 4.1]
palaṅkaṣāyāṃ nalade tathā girikadambake | [Su, Utt., 31 4.2]
dhavāśvakarṇakakubhadhātakītindukīṣu ca | [Su, Utt., 31 5.1]
kākolyādigaṇe caiva pānīyaṃ sarpiriṣyate | [Su, Utt., 31 5.2]
kulatthāḥ śaṅkhacūrṇaṃ ca pradehaḥ sārvagandhikaḥ | [Su, Utt., 31 6.1]
gṛdhrolūkapurīṣāṇi yavā yavaphalo ghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 31 6.2]
sandhyayorubhayoḥ kāryametaduddhūpanaṃ śiśoḥ | [Su, Utt., 31 7.1]
varuṇāriṣṭakamayaṃ rucakaṃ saindukaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 31 7.2]
satataṃ dhārayeccāpi kṛtaṃ vā pautrajīvikam | [Su, Utt., 31 8.1]
śuklāḥ sumanaso lājāḥ payaḥ śālyodanaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 31 8.2]
balirnivedyo gotīrthe revatyai prayatātmanā | [Su, Utt., 31 9.1]
saṅgame ca bhiṣak snānaṃ kuryāddhātrīkumārayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 31 9.2]
nānāvastradharā devī citramālyānulepanā | [Su, Utt., 31 10.1]
calatkuṇḍalinī śyāmā revatī te prasīdatu | [Su, Utt., 31 10.2]
upāsate yāṃ satataṃ devyo vividhabhūṣaṇāḥ | [Su, Utt., 31 11.1]
lambā karālā vinatā tathaiva bahuputrikā | [Su, Utt., 31 11.2]
revatī śuṣkanāmā yā sā te devī prasīdatu | [Su, Utt., 31 11.3]
{Su, Utt., 32}
athātaḥ pūtanāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 32 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 32 2]
kapotavaṅkāraluko varuṇaḥ pāribhadrakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 32 3.1]
āsphotā caiva yojyāḥ syurbālānāṃ pariṣecane | [Su, Utt., 32 3.2]
vacā vayaḥsthā golomī haritālaṃ manaḥśilā | [Su, Utt., 32 4.1]
kuṣṭhaṃ sarjarasaścaiva tailārthe varga iṣyate | [Su, Utt., 32 4.2]
hitaṃ ghṛtaṃ tugākṣīryāṃ siddhaṃ madhurakeṣu ca | [Su, Utt., 32 5.1]
kuṣṭhatālīśakhadiracandanasyandane tathā | [Su, Utt., 32 5.2]
devadāruvacāhiṅgukuṣṭhaṃ girikadambakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 32 6.1]
elā hareṇavaścāpi yojyā uddhūpane sadā | [Su, Utt., 32 6.2]
gandhanākulikumbhīke majjāno badarasya ca | [Su, Utt., 32 7.1]
karkaṭāsthi ghṛtaṃ cāpi dhūpanaṃ sarṣapaiḥ saha | [Su, Utt., 32 7.2]
kākādanīṃ citraphalāṃ bimbīṃ guñjāṃ ca dhārayet | [Su, Utt., 32 8.1]
matsyaudanaṃ ca kurvīta kṛśarāṃ palalaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 32 8.2]
śarāvasaṃpuṭe kṛtvā baliṃ śūnyagṛhe haret | [Su, Utt., 32 8.3]
ucchiṣṭenābhiṣekeṇa śiśoḥ snapanamiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 32 9.1]
pūjyā ca pūtanā devī balibhiḥ sopahārakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 32 9.2]
malināmbarasaṃvītā malinā rūkṣamūrdhajā | [Su, Utt., 32 10.1]
śūnyāgārāśritā devī dārakaṃ pātu pūtanā | [Su, Utt., 32 10.2]
durdarśanā sudurgandhā karālā meghakālikā | [Su, Utt., 32 11.1]
bhinnagārāśrayā devī dārakaṃ pātu pūtanā | [Su, Utt., 32 11.2]
{Su, Utt., 33}
athāto 'ndhapūtanāprasiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 33 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 33 2]
tiktakadrumapatrāṇāṃ kāryaḥ kvātho 'vasecane | [Su, Utt., 33 3.1]
surā sauvīrakaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haritālaṃ manaḥśilā | [Su, Utt., 33 3.2]
tathā sarjarasaścaiva tailārtham upadiśyate | [Su, Utt., 33 4.1]
pippalyaḥ pippalīmūlaṃ vargo madhurako madhu | [Su, Utt., 33 4.2]
śālaparṇī bṛhatyau ca ghṛtārtham upadiśyate | [Su, Utt., 33 5.1]
sarvagandhaiḥ pradehaśca gātreṣv akṣṇośca śītalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 33 5.2]
purīṣaṃ kaukkuṭaṃ keśāṃścarma sarpatvacaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 33 6.1]
jīrṇāṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghāṭīṃ dhūmanāyopakalpayet | [Su, Utt., 33 6.2]
kukkuṭīṃ markaṭīṃ śimbīmanantāṃ cāpi dhārayet | [Su, Utt., 33 7.1]
māṃsamāmaṃ tathā pakvaṃ śoṇitaṃ ca catuṣpathe | [Su, Utt., 33 7.2]
nivedyamantaśca gṛhe śiśo rakṣānimittataḥ | [Su, Utt., 33 8.1]
śiśośca snapanaṃ kuryāt sarvagandhodakaiḥ śubhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 33 8.2]
karālā piṅgalā muṇḍā kaṣāyāmbaravāsinī | [Su, Utt., 33 9.1]
devī bālamimaṃ prītā saṃrakṣatvandhapūtanā | [Su, Utt., 33 9.2]
{Su, Utt., 34}
athātaḥ śītapūtanāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 34 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 34 2]
kapitthaṃ suvahāṃ bimbīṃ tathā bilvaṃ pracībalam | [Su, Utt., 34 3.1]
nandīṃ bhallātakaṃ cāpi pariṣeke prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 34 3.2]
bastamūtraṃ gavāṃ mūtraṃ mustaṃ ca suradāru ca | [Su, Utt., 34 4.1]
kuṣṭhaṃ ca sarvagandhāṃśca tailārthamavacārayet | [Su, Utt., 34 4.2]
rohiṇīsarjakhadirapalāśakakubhatvacaḥ | [Su, Utt., 34 5.1]
niṣkvāthya tasminniṣkvāthe sakṣīraṃ vipacedghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 34 5.2]
gṛdhrolūkapurīṣāṇi bastagandhāmahestvacaḥ | [Su, Utt., 34 6.1]
nimbapatrāṇi madhukaṃ dhūpanārthaṃ prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 34 6.2]
dhārayed api lambāṃ ca guñjāṃ kākādanīṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 34 7.1]
nadyāṃ mudgakṛtaiścānnaistarpayecchītapūtanām | [Su, Utt., 34 7.2]
devyai deyaścopahāro vāruṇī rudhiraṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 34 8.1]
jalāśayānte bālasya snapanaṃ copadiśyate | [Su, Utt., 34 8.2]
mudgaudanāśanā devī surāśoṇitapāyinī | [Su, Utt., 34 9.1]
jalāśayālayā devī pātu tvāṃ śītapūtanā | [Su, Utt., 34 9.2]
{Su, Utt., 35}
athāto mukhamaṇḍikāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 35 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 35 2]
kapitthabilvatarkārīvāṃśīgandharvahastakāḥ | [Su, Utt., 35 3.1]
kuberākṣī ca yojyāḥ syurbālānāṃ pariṣecane | [Su, Utt., 35 3.2]
svarasair bhṛṅgavṛkṣāṇāṃ tathājaharigandhayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 35 4.1]
tailaṃ vasāṃ ca saṃyojya pacedabhyañjane śiśoḥ | [Su, Utt., 35 4.2]
madhūlikāyāṃ payasi tugākṣīryāṃ gaṇe tathā | [Su, Utt., 35 5.1]
madhure pañcamūle ca kanīyasi ghṛtaṃ pacet | [Su, Utt., 35 5.2]
vacā sarjarasaḥ kuṣṭhaṃ sarpiścoddhūpanaṃ hitam | [Su, Utt., 35 6.1]
dhārayed api jihvāśca cāṣacīrallisarpajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 35 6.2]
varṇakaṃ cūrṇakaṃ mālyamañjanaṃ pāradaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 35 7.1]
manaḥśilāṃ copaharedgoṣṭhamadhye baliṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 35 7.2]
pāyasaṃ sapuroḍāśaṃ balyartham upasaṃharet | [Su, Utt., 35 8.1]
mantrapūtābhir adbhiśca tatraiva snapanaṃ hitam | [Su, Utt., 35 8.2]
alaṃkṛtā rūpavatī subhagā kāmarūpiṇī | [Su, Utt., 35 9.1]
goṣṭhamadhyālayaratā pātu tvāṃ mukhamaṇḍikā | [Su, Utt., 35 9.2]
{Su, Utt., 36}
athāto naigameṣapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 36 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 36 2]
bilvāgnimanthapūtīkāḥ kāryāḥ syuḥ pariṣecane | [Su, Utt., 36 3.1]
surā sabījaṃ dhānyāmlaṃ pariṣeke ca śasyate | [Su, Utt., 36 3.2]
priyaṅgusaralānantāśatapuṣpākuṭannaṭaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 36 4.1]
pacettailaṃ sagomūtrair dadhimastvamlakāñjikaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 36 4.2]
pañcamūladvayakvāthe kṣīre madhurakeṣu ca | [Su, Utt., 36 5.1]
pacedghṛtaṃ ca medhāvī kharjūrīmastake 'pi vā | [Su, Utt., 36 5.2]
vacāṃ vayaḥsthāṃ golomīṃ jaṭilāṃ cāpi dhārayet | [Su, Utt., 36 6.1]
utsādanaṃ hitaṃ cātra skandāpasmāranāśanam | [Su, Utt., 36 6.2]
siddhārthakavacāhiṅgukuṣṭhaṃ caivākṣataiḥ saha | [Su, Utt., 36 7.1]
bhallātakājamodāśca hitamuddhūpanaṃ śiśoḥ | [Su, Utt., 36 7.2]
markaṭolūkagṛdhrāṇāṃ purīṣāṇi navagrahe | [Su, Utt., 36 8.1]
dhūpaḥ supte jane kāryo bālasya hitamicchatā | [Su, Utt., 36 8.2]
tilataṇḍulakaṃ mālyaṃ bhakṣyāṃśca vividhān api | [Su, Utt., 36 9.1]
kumārapitṛmeṣāya vṛkṣamūle nivedayet | [Su, Utt., 36 9.2]
adhastādvaṭavṛkṣasya snapanaṃ copadiśyate | [Su, Utt., 36 10.1]
baliṃ nyagrodhavṛkṣeṣu tithau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ nivedayet | [Su, Utt., 36 10.2]
ajānanaścalākṣibhrūḥ kāmarūpī mahāyaśāḥ | [Su, Utt., 36 11.1]
bālaṃ bālapitā devo naigameṣo 'bhirakṣatu | [Su, Utt., 36 11.2]
{Su, Utt., 37}
athāto grahotpattimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 2]
nava skandādayaḥ proktā bālānāṃ ya ime grahāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 3.1]
śrīmanto divyavapuṣo nārīpuruṣavigrahāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 3.2]
ete guhasya rakṣārthaṃ kṛttikomāgniśūlibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 4.1]
sṛṣṭāḥ śaravaṇasthasya rakṣitasyātmatejasā | [Su, Utt., 37 4.2]
strīvigrahā grahā ye tu nānārūpā mayeritāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 5.1]
gaṅgomākṛttikānāṃ te bhāgā rājasatāmasāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 5.2]
naigameṣastu pārvatyā sṛṣṭo meṣānano grahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 6.1]
kumāradhārī devasya guhasyātmasamaḥ sakhā | [Su, Utt., 37 6.2]
skandāpasmārasaṃjño yaḥ so 'gnināgnisamadyutiḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 7.1]
sa ca skandasakhā nāma viśākha iti cocyate | [Su, Utt., 37 7.2]
skandaḥ sṛṣṭo bhagavatā devena tripurāriṇā | [Su, Utt., 37 8.1]
bibharti cāparāṃ saṃjñāṃ kumāra iti sa grahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 8.2]
bālalīlādharo yo 'yaṃ devo rudrāgnisaṃbhavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 9.1]
mithyācāreṣu bhagavān svayaṃ naiṣa pravartate | [Su, Utt., 37 9.2]
kumāraḥ skandasāmānyādatra kecidapaṇḍitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 10.1]
gṛhṇātītyalpavijñānā bruvate dehacintakāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 10.2]
tato bhagavati skande surasenāpatau kṛte | [Su, Utt., 37 11.1]
upatasthurgrahāḥ sarve dīptaśaktidharaṃ guham | [Su, Utt., 37 11.2]
ūcuḥ prāñjalayaścainaṃ vṛttiṃ naḥ saṃvidhatsva vai | [Su, Utt., 37 12.1]
teṣāmarthe tataḥ skandaḥ śivaṃ devamacodayat | [Su, Utt., 37 12.2]
tato grahāṃstānuvāca bhagavān bhaganetrahṛt | [Su, Utt., 37 13.1]
tiryagyoniṃ mānuṣaṃ ca tritayaṃ jagat | [Su, Utt., 37 13.2]
parasparopakāreṇa vartate dhāryate 'pi ca | [Su, Utt., 37 14.1]
devā manuṣyān prīṇanti tairyagyonīṃstathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 37 14.2]
vartamānair yathākālaṃ śītavarṣoṣṇamārutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 15.1]
ijyāñjalinamaskārajapahomavratādibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 15.2]
narāḥ samyak prayuktaiśca prīṇanti tridiveśvarān | [Su, Utt., 37 16.1]
bhāgadheyaṃ vibhaktaṃ ca śeṣaṃ kiṃcin na vidyate | [Su, Utt., 37 16.2]
tadyuṣmākaṃ śubhā vṛttirbāleṣveva bhaviṣyati | [Su, Utt., 37 17.1]
kuleṣu yeṣu nejyante devāḥ pitara eva ca | [Su, Utt., 37 17.2]
brāhmaṇāḥ sādhavaścaiva guravo 'tithayastathā | [Su, Utt., 37 18.1]
nivṛttācāraśauceṣu parapākopajīviṣu | [Su, Utt., 37 18.2]
utsannabalibhikṣeṣu bhinnakāṃsyopabhojiṣu | [Su, Utt., 37 19.1]
gṛheṣu teṣu ye bālāstān gṛhṇīdhvamaśaṅkitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 19.2]
tatra vo vipulā vṛttiḥ pūjā caiva bhaviṣyati | [Su, Utt., 37 20.1]
evaṃ grahāḥ samutpannā bālān gṛhṇanti cāpyataḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 20.2]
grahopasṛṣṭā bālāstu duścikitsyatamā matāḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 21.1]
vaikalyaṃ maraṇaṃ cāpi dhruvaṃ skandagrahe matam | [Su, Utt., 37 21.2]
skandagraho 'tyugratamaḥ sarveṣveva yataḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 37 22.1]
anyo vā sarvarūpastu na sādhyo graha ucyate | [Su, Utt., 37 22.2]
{Su, Utt., 38}
athāto yonivyāpatpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 2]
pravṛddhaliṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ yātyartham upasevate | [Su, Utt., 38 3.1]
rūkṣadurbalabālā yā tasyā vāyuḥ prakupyati | [Su, Utt., 38 3.2]
sa duṣṭo yonimāsādya yonirogāya kalpate | [Su, Utt., 38 4.1]
trayāṇām api doṣāṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ lakṣaṇena tu | [Su, Utt., 38 4.2]
viṃśatirvyāpado yonernirdiṣṭā rogasaṃgrahe | [Su, Utt., 38 5.1]
mithyācāreṇa yāḥ strīṇāṃ praduṣṭenārtavena ca | [Su, Utt., 38 5.2]
jāyante bījadoṣācca daivācca śṛṇu tāḥ pṛthak | [Su, Utt., 38 6.1]
udāvartā tathā vandhyā viplutā ca pariplutā | [Su, Utt., 38 6.2]
vātalā ceti vātotthāḥ pittotthā rudhirakṣarā | [Su, Utt., 38 7.1]
vāminī sraṃsinī cāpi putraghnī pittalā ca yā | [Su, Utt., 38 7.2]
atyānandā ca yā yoniḥ karṇinī caraṇādvayam | [Su, Utt., 38 8.1]
śleṣmalā ca kaphājjñeyā ṣaṇḍākhyā phalinī tathā | [Su, Utt., 38 8.2]
mahatī sūcivaktrā ca sarvajeti tridoṣajā | [Su, Utt., 38 9.1]
saphenilamudāvartā rajaḥ kṛcchreṇa muñcati | [Su, Utt., 38 9.2]
vandhyāṃ naṣṭārtavāṃ vidyādviplutāṃ nityavedanām | [Su, Utt., 38 10.1]
pariplutāyāṃ bhavati grāmyadharme rujā bhṛśam | [Su, Utt., 38 10.2]
vātalā karkaśā stabdhā śūlanistodapīḍitā | [Su, Utt., 38 11.1]
catasṛṣvapi cādyāsu bhavantyanilavedanāḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 11.2]
sadāhaṃ prakṣaratyasraṃ yasyāṃ sā lohitakṣarā | [Su, Utt., 38 12.1]
savātamudgiredbījaṃ vāminī rajasā yutam | [Su, Utt., 38 12.2]
prasraṃsinī syandate tu kṣobhitā duḥprasūśca yā | [Su, Utt., 38 13.1]
sthitaṃ sthitaṃ hanti garbhaṃ putraghnī raktasaṃsravāt | [Su, Utt., 38 13.2]
atyarthaṃ pittalā yonirdāhapākajvarānvitā | [Su, Utt., 38 14.1]
catasṛṣvapi cādyāsu pittaliṅgocchrayo bhavet | [Su, Utt., 38 14.2]
atyānandā na saṃtoṣaṃ grāmyadharmeṇa gacchati | [Su, Utt., 38 15.1]
karṇinyāṃ karṇikā yonau śleṣmāsṛgbhyāṃ prajāyate | [Su, Utt., 38 15.2]
maithune 'caraṇā pūrvaṃ puruṣādatiricyate | [Su, Utt., 38 16.1]
bahuśaścāticaraṇādanyā bījaṃ na vindati | [Su, Utt., 38 16.2]
śleṣmalā picchilā yoniḥ kaṇḍūyuktātiśītalā | [Su, Utt., 38 17.1]
catasṛṣvapi cādyāsu śleṣmaliṅgocchritirbhavet | [Su, Utt., 38 17.2]
anārtavastanā ṣaṇḍī kharasparśā ca maithune | [Su, Utt., 38 18.1]
atikāyagṛhītāyāstaruṇyāḥ phalinī bhavet | [Su, Utt., 38 18.2]
vivṛtātimahāyoniḥ sūcīvaktrātisaṃvṛtā | [Su, Utt., 38 19.1]
sarvaliṅgasamutthānā sarvadoṣaprakopajā | [Su, Utt., 38 19.2]
catasṛṣvapi cādyāsu sarvaliṅgocchritirbhavet | [Su, Utt., 38 20.1]
pañcāsādhyā bhavantīmā yonayaḥ sarvadoṣajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 20.2]
pratidoṣaṃ tu sādhyāsu snehādikrama iṣyate | [Su, Utt., 38 21.1]
dadyāduttarabastīṃśca viśeṣeṇa yathoditān | [Su, Utt., 38 21.2]
karkaśāṃ śītalāṃ stabdhāmalpasparśāṃ ca maithune | [Su, Utt., 38 22.1]
kumbhīsvedairupacaret sānūpaudakasaṃyutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 22.2]
madhurauṣadhasaṃyuktān vesavārāṃśca yoniṣu | [Su, Utt., 38 23.1]
nikṣipeddhārayeccāpi picutailamatandritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 23.2]
dhāvanāni ca pathyāni kurvītāpūraṇāni ca | [Su, Utt., 38 24.1]
oṣacoṣānvitāsūktaṃ kuryācchītaṃ vidhiṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 38 24.2]
durgandhāṃ picchilāṃ cāpi cūrṇaiḥ pañcakaṣāyajaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 25.1]
pūrayedrājavṛkṣādikaṣāyaiścāpi dhāvanam | [Su, Utt., 38 25.2]
yonyāṃ tu pūyasrāviṇyāṃ śodhanadravyasaṃbhṛtaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 26.1]
sagomūtraiḥ salavaṇaiḥ śodhanaṃ hitamiṣyate | [Su, Utt., 38 26.2]
bṛhatīphalakalkasya dviharidrāyutasya ca | [Su, Utt., 38 27.1]
kaṇḍūmatīmalpasparśāṃ pūrayeddhūpayettathā | [Su, Utt., 38 27.2]
vartiṃ pradadyāt karṇinyāṃ śodhanadravyasaṃbhṛtām | [Su, Utt., 38 28.1]
prasraṃsinīṃ ghṛtābhyaktāṃ kṣīrasvinnāṃ praveśayet | [Su, Utt., 38 28.2]
pidhāya vesavāreṇa tato bandhaṃ samācaret | [Su, Utt., 38 29.1]
pratidoṣaṃ vidadhyācca surāriṣṭāsavān bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 38 29.2]
prātaḥ prātarniṣeveta rasonāduddhṛtaṃ rasam | [Su, Utt., 38 30.1]
kṣīramāṃsarasaprāyam āhāraṃ vidadhīta ca | [Su, Utt., 38 30.2]
śukrārtavādayo doṣāḥ stanarogāśca kīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 38 31.1]
klaibyasthānāni mūḍhasya garbhasya vidhireva ca | [Su, Utt., 38 31.2]
garbhiṇīpratirogeṣu cikitsā cāpyudāhṛtā | [Su, Utt., 38 32.1]
sarvathā tāṃ prayuñjīta yonivyāpatsu buddhimān | [Su, Utt., 38 32.2]
apaprajātārogāṃśca cikitseduttarādbhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 38 32.3]
{Su, Utt., 39}
athāto jvarapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 39 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 39 2.1]
yenāmṛtam apāṃ madhyāduddhṛtaṃ pūrvajanmani | [Su, Utt., 39 3.1]

yathādoṣocchrayaṃ tasya viśuddhasya yathākramam | [Su, Utt., 40 178.1]
peyādiṃ vitaret samyagdīpanīyopasaṃbhṛtam | [Su, Utt., 40 178.2]
tataḥ pācanasaṃgrāhidīpanīyagaṇatrayam | [Su, Utt., 40 179.1]
pibet prātaḥ surāriṣṭasnehamūtrasukhāmbubhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 40 179.2]
takreṇa vātha takraṃ vā kevalaṃ hitam ucyate | [Su, Utt., 40 180.1]
kṛmigulmodarārśoghnīḥ kriyāścātrāvacārayet | [Su, Utt., 40 180.2]
cūrṇaṃ hiṅgvādikaṃ cātra ghṛtaṃ vā plīhanāśanam | [Su, Utt., 40 181.1]
kalkena magadhādeśca cāṅgerīsvarasena ca | [Su, Utt., 40 181.2]
caturguṇena dadhnā ca ghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ hitaṃ bhavet | [Su, Utt., 40 182.1]

{Su, Utt., 41}
athātaḥ śoṣapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 2.1]
anekarogānugato bahurogapurogamaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 3.1]
durvijñeyo durnivāraḥ śoṣo vyādhirmahābalaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 3.2]
saṃśoṣaṇādrasādīnāṃ śoṣa ityabhidhīyate | [Su, Utt., 41 4.1]
kriyākṣayakaratvācca kṣaya ityucyate punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 4.2]
rājñaścandramaso yasmādabhūdeṣa kilāmayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 5.1]

ekādaśānāmekasmin sāṃnidhyāt tantrayuktitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 6.2]
kriyāṇāmavibhāgena prāgekotpādanena ca | [Su, Utt., 41 7.1]

śirasaḥ paripūrṇatvamabhaktacchanda eva ca | [Su, Utt., 41 13.1]

ekādaśabhirebhir vā ṣaḍbhir vāpi samanvitam | [Su, Utt., 41 14.1]
kāsātīsārapārśvārtisvarabhedārucijvaraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 14.2]

jahyācchoṣārditaṃ jantumicchan suvipulaṃ yaśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 15.2]
vyavāyaśokasthāviryavyāyāmādhvopavāsataḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 16.1]
vraṇoraḥkṣatapīḍābhyāṃ śoṣānanye vadanti hi | [Su, Utt., 41 16.2]
vyavāyaśoṣī śukrasya kṣayaliṅgairupadrutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 17.1]
pāṇḍudeho yathāpūrvaṃ kṣīyante cāsya dhātavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 17.2]
pradhyānaśīlaḥ srastāṅgaḥ śokaśoṣyapi tādṛśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 18.1]
vinā śukrakṣayakṛtair vikārairabhilakṣitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 18.2]
jarāśoṣī kṛśo mandavīryabuddhibalendriyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 19.1]
kampano 'rucimān bhinnakāṃsyapātrahatasvaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 19.2]
ṣṭhīvati śleṣmaṇā hīnaṃ gauravārucipīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 20.1]

prasuptagātrāvayavaḥ śuṣkaklomagalānanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 21.2]
vyāyāmaśoṣī bhūyiṣṭhamebhireva samanvitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 22.1]
uraḥkṣatakṛtair liṅgaiḥ saṃyuktaśca kṣatādvinā | [Su, Utt., 41 22.2]
raktakṣayādvedanābhistathaivāhārayantraṇāt | [Su, Utt., 41 23.1]
vraṇitasya bhavecchoṣaḥ sa cāsādhyatamaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 23.2]
vyāyāmabhārādhyayanair abhighātātimaithunaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 24.1]
karmaṇā cāpyurasyena vakṣo yasya vidāritam | [Su, Utt., 41 24.2]
tasyorasi kṣate raktaṃ pūyaḥ śleṣmā ca gacchati | [Su, Utt., 41 24.3]
kāsamānaśchardayecca pītaraktāsitāruṇam | [Su, Utt., 41 25.1]

durgandhavadanocchvāso bhinnavarṇasvaro naraḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 26.1]

śvāsāṅgasādakaphasaṃsravatāluśoṣachardyagnisādamadapīnasapāṇḍunidrāḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 29.1]

upācaredātmavantaṃ dīptāgnimakṛśaṃ navam | [Su, Utt., 41 32.1]
sthirādivargasiddhena ghṛtenājāvikena ca | [Su, Utt., 41 32.2]
snigdhasya mṛdu kartavyamūrdhvaṃ cādhaśca śodhanam | [Su, Utt., 41 33.1]
āsthāpanaṃ tathā kāryaṃ śirasaśca virecanam | [Su, Utt., 41 33.2]
yavagodhūmaśālīṃśca rasair bhuñjīta śodhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 34.1]
dṛḍhe 'gnau bṛṃhayeccāpi nivṛttopadravaṃ naram | [Su, Utt., 41 34.2]
vyavāyaśoṣiṇaṃ prāyo bhajante vātajā gadāḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 35.1]
bṛṃhaṇīyo vidhistasmai hitaḥ snigdho 'nilāpahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 35.2]
kākānulūkānnakulān biḍālān gaṇḍūpadān vyālabileśayākhūn | [Su, Utt., 41 36.1]
gṛdhrāṃśca dadyādvividhaiḥ pravādaiḥ sasaindhavān sarṣapatailabhṛṣṭān | [Su, Utt., 41 36.2]
deyāni māṃsāni ca jāṅgalāni mudgāḍhakīsūparasāśca hṛdyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 37.1]
kharoṣṭranāgāśvatarāśvajāni deyāni māṃsāni sukalpitāni | [Su, Utt., 41 37.2]
māṃsopadaṃśāṃśca pibedariṣṭān mārdvīkayuktān madirāśca sevyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 38.1]
arkāmṛtākṣārajaloṣitebhyaḥ kṛtvā yavebhyo vividhāṃśca bhakṣyān | [Su, Utt., 41 38.2]
khādet pibet sarpirajāvikaṃ vā kṛśo yavāgvā saha bhaktakāle | [Su, Utt., 41 39.1]
sarpirmadhubhyāṃ trikaṭu pralihyāc cavyāviḍaṅgopahitaṃ kṣayārtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 41 39.2]
māṃsādamāṃseṣu ghṛtaṃ ca siddhaṃ śoṣāpahaṃ kṣaudrakaṇāsametam | [Su, Utt., 41 40.1]
drākṣāsitāmāgadhikāvalehaḥ sakṣaudratailaḥ kṣayarogaghātī | [Su, Utt., 41 40.2]

dve pañcamūlyau varuṇaṃ karañjaṃ bhallātakaṃ bilvapunarnave ca | [Su, Utt., 41 46.2]

{Su, Utt., 42}
athāto gulmapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 2.1]
yathoktaiḥ kopanair doṣāḥ kupitāḥ koṣṭhamāgatāḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 3.1]
janayanti nṛṇāṃ gulmaṃ sa pañcavidha ucyate | [Su, Utt., 42 3.2]
hṛdbastyorantare granthiḥ saṃcārī yadi vācalaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 4.1]
cayāpacayavān vṛttaḥ sa gulma iti kīrtitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 4.2]
pañca gulmāśrayā nṝṇāṃ pārśve hṛnnābhibastayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 5.1]
gupitānilamūlatvādgūḍhamūlodayād api | [Su, Utt., 42 5.2]
gulmavadvā viśālatvādgulma ityabhidhīyate | [Su, Utt., 42 6.1]
sa yasmādātmani cayaṃ gacchaty apsviva budbudaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 6.2]
antaḥ sarati yasmācca na pākam upayātyataḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 7.1]
sa vyastair jāyate doṣaiḥ samastairapi cocchritaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 7.2]
puruṣāṇāṃ tathā strīṇāṃ jñeyo raktena cāparaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 8.1]
sadanaṃ madantā vahnerāṭopo 'ntravikūjanam | [Su, Utt., 42 8.2]
viṇmūtrānilasaṅgaśca sauhityāsahatā tathā | [Su, Utt., 42 9.1]
dveṣo 'nne vāyurūrdhvaṃ ca pūrvarūpeṣu gulminām | [Su, Utt., 42 9.2]
hṛtkukṣiśūlaṃ mukhakaṇṭhaśoṣo vāyor nirodho viṣamāgnitā ca | [Su, Utt., 42 10.1]
te te vikārāḥ pavanātmakāśca bhavanti gulme 'nilasaṃbhave tu | [Su, Utt., 42 10.2]
svedajvarāhāravidāhadāhās tṛṣṇāṅgarāgaḥ kaṭuvaktratā ca | [Su, Utt., 42 11.1]
pittasya liṅgānyakhilāni yāni pittātmake tāni bhavanti gulme | [Su, Utt., 42 11.2]
staimityamanne 'ruciraṅgasādaśchardiḥ praseko madhurāsyatā ca | [Su, Utt., 42 12.1]
kaphasya liṅgāni ca yāni tāni bhavanti gulme kaphasaṃbhave tu | [Su, Utt., 42 12.2]
sarvātmakaḥ sarvavikārayuktaḥ so 'sādhya uktaḥ kṣatajaṃ pravakṣye | [Su, Utt., 42 13.1]
navaprasūtāhitabhojanā yā yā cāmagarbhaṃ visṛjedṛtau vā | [Su, Utt., 42 13.2]
vāyurhi tasyāḥ parigṛhya raktaṃ karoti gulmaṃ sarujaṃ sadāham | [Su, Utt., 42 14.1]
paittasya liṅgena samānaliṅgaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ cāpyaparaṃ nibodha | [Su, Utt., 42 14.2]
na spandate nodarameti vṛddhiṃ bhavanti liṅgāni ca garbhiṇīnām | [Su, Utt., 42 15.1]
taṃ garbhakālātigame cikitsyam asṛgbhavaṃ gulmamuśanti tajjñāḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 15.2]
vātagulmārditaṃ snigdhaṃ yuktaṃ snehavirecanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 16.1]
upācaredyathākālaṃ nirūhaiḥ sānuvāsanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 16.2]
pittagulmārditaṃ snigdhaṃ kākolyādighṛtena tu | [Su, Utt., 42 17.1]
viriktaṃ madhurair yogair nirūhaiḥ samupācaret | [Su, Utt., 42 17.2]
śleṣmagulmārditaṃ snigdhaṃ pippalyādighṛtena tu | [Su, Utt., 42 18.1]
tīkṣṇair viriktaṃ tadrūpair nirūhaiḥ samupācaret | [Su, Utt., 42 18.2]
sannipātotthite gulme tridoṣaghno vidhirhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 19.1]
pittavadraktagulminyā nāryāḥ kāryaḥ kriyāvidhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 19.2]
viśeṣamaparaṃ cāsyāḥ śṛṇu raktavibhedanam | [Su, Utt., 42 20.1]
palāśakṣāratoyena siddhaṃ sarpiḥ prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 42 20.2]
dadyāduttarabastiṃ ca pippalyādighṛtena tu | [Su, Utt., 42 21.1]
uṣṇair vā bhedayedbhinne vidhirāsṛgdaro hitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 21.2]
ānūpaudakamajjāno vasā tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ dadhi | [Su, Utt., 42 22.1]
vipakvamekataḥ śastaṃ vātagulme 'nuvāsanam | [Su, Utt., 42 22.2]
jāṅgalaikaśaphānāṃ tu vasā sarpiśca paittike | [Su, Utt., 42 23.1]
tailaṃ jāṅgalamajjāna evaṃ gulme kaphotthite | [Su, Utt., 42 23.2]
dhātrīphalānāṃ svarase ṣaḍaṅgaṃ vipacedghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 42 24.1]

dīpyakagranthikājājīhapuṣādhānyakaiḥ samaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 25.2]
dadhyāranālabadaramūlakasvarasair ghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 42 26.1]
tatpibedvātagulmāgnidaurbalyāṭopaśūlanut | [Su, Utt., 42 26.2]
hiṅgusauvarcalājājīviḍadāḍimadīpyakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 27.1]
puṣkaravyoṣadhānyāmlavetasakṣāracitrakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 27.2]
śaṭīvacājagandhailāsurasaiśca vipācitam | [Su, Utt., 42 28.1]
śūlānāhaharaṃ sarpirdadhnā cānilagulminām | [Su, Utt., 42 28.2]
viḍadāḍimasindhūtthahutabhugvyoṣajīrakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 29.1]
hiṅgusauvarcalakṣārarugvṛkṣāmlāmlavetasaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 29.2]
bījapūrarasopetaṃ sarpirdadhicaturguṇam | [Su, Utt., 42 30.1]
sādhitaṃ dādhikaṃ nāma gulmahṛt plīhaśūlajit | [Su, Utt., 42 30.2]
rasonasvarase sarpiḥ pañcamūlarasānvitam | [Su, Utt., 42 31.1]
surāranāladadhyamlamūlakasvarasaiḥ saha | [Su, Utt., 42 31.2]

saṃrodhāt kupito vāyurbastimāvṛtya tiṣṭhati | [Su, Utt., 42 133.2]
bastivaṅkṣaṇanābhīṣu tataḥ śūlo 'sya jāyate | [Su, Utt., 42 134.1]
viṇmūtravātasaṃrodhī bastiśūlaḥ sa mārutāt | [Su, Utt., 42 134.2]
nābhyāṃ vaṅkṣaṇapārśveṣu kukṣau meḍhrāntramardakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 135.1]
mūtramāvṛtya gṛhṇāti mūtraśūlaḥ sa mārutāt | [Su, Utt., 42 135.2]
vāyuḥ prakupito yasya rūkṣāhārasya dehinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 136.1]
malaṃ ruṇaddhi koṣṭhasthaṃ mandīkṛtya tu pāvakam | [Su, Utt., 42 136.2]
śūlaṃ saṃjanayaṃstīvraṃ srotāṃsyāvṛtya tasya hi | [Su, Utt., 42 137.1]
dakṣiṇaṃ yadi vā vāmaṃ kukṣimādāya jāyate | [Su, Utt., 42 137.2]
sarvatra vardhate kṣipraṃ bhramannatha saghoṣavān | [Su, Utt., 42 138.1]
pipāsā vardhate tīvrā bhramo mūrcchā ca jāyate | [Su, Utt., 42 138.2]
uccārito mūtritaśca na śāntimadhigacchati | [Su, Utt., 42 139.1]
viṭśūlametajjānīyādbhiṣak paramadāruṇam | [Su, Utt., 42 139.2]
kṣipraṃ doṣaharaṃ kāryaṃ bhiṣajā sādhu jānatā | [Su, Utt., 42 140.1]
svedanaṃ śamanaṃ caiva nirūhāḥ snehabastayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 140.2]
pūrvoddiṣṭān pāyayeta yogān koṣṭhaviśodhanān | [Su, Utt., 42 141.1]
udāvartaharāścāsya kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sukhāvahāḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 141.2]
atimātraṃ yadā bhuktaṃ pāvake mṛdutāṃ gate | [Su, Utt., 42 142.1]
sthirībhūtaṃ tu tatkoṣṭhe vāyurāvṛtya tiṣṭhati | [Su, Utt., 42 142.2]
avipākagataṃ hyannaṃ śūlaṃ tīvraṃ karotyati | [Su, Utt., 42 143.1]
mūrcchādhmānaṃ vidāhaśca hṛdutkleśo vilambikā | [Su, Utt., 42 143.2]
viricyate chardayati kampate 'tha vimuhyati | [Su, Utt., 42 144.1]
avipākād bhavecchūlas tvannadoṣasamudbhavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 144.2]
vamanaṃ laṅghanaṃ svedaḥ pācanaṃ phalavartayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 145.1]
kṣārāścūrṇāni guṭikāḥ śasyante śūlanāśanāḥ | [Su, Utt., 42 145.2]
gulmāvasthāḥ kriyāḥ kāryā yathāvat sarvaśūlinām | [Su, Utt., 42 146]
{Su, Utt., 43}
athāto hṛdrogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 2]
vegāghātoṣṇarūkṣānnair atimātropasevitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 3.1]
viruddhādhyaśanājīrṇair asātmyaiścāpi bhojanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 3.2]
dūṣayitvā rasaṃ doṣā viguṇā hṛdayaṃ gatāḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 4.1]
kurvanti hṛdaye bādhāṃ hṛdrogaṃ taṃ pracakṣate | [Su, Utt., 43 4.2]
caturvidhaḥ sa doṣaiḥ syāt kṛmibhiśca pṛthak pṛthak | [Su, Utt., 43 5.1]
lakṣaṇaṃ tasya vakṣyāmi cikitsitamanantaram | [Su, Utt., 43 5.2]
āyamyate mārutaje hṛdayaṃ tudyate tathā | [Su, Utt., 43 6.1]
nirmathyate dīryate ca sphoṭyate pāṭyate 'pi ca | [Su, Utt., 43 6.2]
tṛṣṇoṣādāhacoṣāḥ syuḥ paittike hṛdayaklamaḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 7.1]
dhūmāyanaṃ ca mūrcchā ca svedaḥ śoṣo mukhasya ca | [Su, Utt., 43 7.2]
gauravaṃ kaphasaṃsrāvo 'ruciḥ stambho 'gnimārdavam | [Su, Utt., 43 8.1]
mādhuryam api cāsyasya balāsāvatate hṛdi | [Su, Utt., 43 8.2]
utkleśaḥ ṣṭhīvanaṃ todaḥ śūlo hṛllāsakas tamaḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 9.1]
aruciḥ śyāvanetratvaṃ śoṣaśca kṛmije bhavet | [Su, Utt., 43 9.2]
bhramaklamau sādaśoṣau jñeyāsteṣām upadravāḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 10.1]
kṛmije kṛmijātīnāṃ ślaiṣmikāṇāṃ ca ye matāḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 10.2]
vātopasṛṣṭe hṛdaye vāmayet snigdhamāturam | [Su, Utt., 43 11.1]
dvipañcamūlakvāthena sasnehalavaṇena tu | [Su, Utt., 43 11.2]
pippalyelāvacāhiṅguyavabhasmāni saindhavam | [Su, Utt., 43 12.1]
sauvarcalamatho śuṇṭhīmajamodāṃ ca cūrṇitam | [Su, Utt., 43 12.2]
phaladhānyāmlakaulatthadadhimadyāsavādibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 13.1]
pāyayeta viśuddhaṃ ca snehenānyatamena vā | [Su, Utt., 43 13.2]
bhojayejjīrṇaśālyannaṃ jāṅgalaiḥ saghṛtai rasaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 14.1]
vātaghnasiddhaṃ tailaṃ ca dadyādbastiṃ pramāṇataḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 14.2]
śrīparṇīmadhukakṣaudrasitotpalajalair vamet | [Su, Utt., 43 15.1]
pittopasṛṣṭe hṛdaye seveta madhuraiḥ śṛtam | [Su, Utt., 43 15.2]
ghṛtaṃ kaṣāyāṃścoddiṣṭān pittajvaravināśanān | [Su, Utt., 43 16.1]
tṛptasya ca rasair mukhyair madhuraiḥ saghṛtair bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 43 16.2]
sakṣaudraṃ vitaredbastau tailaṃ madhukasādhitam | [Su, Utt., 43 17.1]
vacānimbakaṣāyābhyāṃ vāntaṃ hṛdi kaphātmake | [Su, Utt., 43 17.2]
cūrṇaṃ tu pāyayetoktaṃ vātaje bhojayecca tam | [Su, Utt., 43 18.1]
phalādimatha mustādiṃ triphalāṃ vā pibennaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 18.2]
śyāmātrivṛtkalkayutaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāpi virecanam | [Su, Utt., 43 19.1]
balātailair vidadhyācca bastiṃ bastiviśāradaḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 19.2]
kṛmihṛdrogiṇaṃ snigdhaṃ bhojayet piśitaudanam | [Su, Utt., 43 20.1]
dadhnā ca palalopetaṃ tryahaṃ paścādvirecayet | [Su, Utt., 43 20.2]
sugandhibhiḥ salavaṇair yogaiḥ sājājiśarkaraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 43 21.1]
viḍaṅgagāḍhaṃ dhānyāmlaṃ pāyayetāpyanantaram | [Su, Utt., 43 21.2]
hṛdayasthāḥ patantyevamadhastāt krimayo nṛṇām | [Su, Utt., 43 22.1]
yavānnaṃ vitareccāsya saviḍaṅgamataḥ param | [Su, Utt., 43 22.2]
{Su, Utt., 44}
athātaḥ pāṇḍurogapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 2]
vyavāyamamlaṃ lavaṇāni madyaṃ mṛdaṃ divāsvapnamatīva tīkṣṇam | [Su, Utt., 44 3.1]
niṣevamāṇasya vidūṣya raktaṃ kurvanti doṣāstvaci pāṇḍubhāvam | [Su, Utt., 44 3.2]
pāṇḍvāmayo 'ṣṭārdhavidhaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ pṛthaksamastair yugapac ca doṣaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 4.1]
sarveṣu caiteṣviha pāṇḍubhāvo yato 'dhiko 'taḥ khalu pāṇḍurogaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 4.2]
tvaksphoṭanaṃ ṣṭhīvanagātrasādau mṛdbhakṣaṇaṃ prekṣaṇakūṭaśothaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 5.1]
viṇmūtrapītatvamathāvipāko bhaviṣyatastasya puraḥsarāṇi | [Su, Utt., 44 5.2]
sa kāmalāpānakipāṇḍurogaḥ kumbhāhvayo lāgharako 'lasākhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 6.1]
vibhāṣyate lakṣaṇamasya kṛtsnaṃ nibodha vakṣyāmyanupūrvaśastat | [Su, Utt., 44 6.2]
kṛṣṇekṣaṇaṃ kṛṣṇasirāvanaddhaṃ tadvarṇaviṇmūtranakhānanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 7.1]
vātena pāṇḍuṃ manujaṃ vyavasyedyuktaṃ tathānyaistadupadravaiśca | [Su, Utt., 44 7.2]
pītekṣaṇaṃ pītasirāvanaddhaṃ tadvarṇaviṇmūtranakhānanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 8.1]
pittena pāṇḍuṃ manujaṃ vyavasyedyuktaṃ tathānyaistadupadravaiśca | [Su, Utt., 44 8.2]
śuklekṣaṇaṃ śuklasirāvanaddhaṃ tadvarṇaviṇmūtranakhānanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 9.1]
kaphena pāṇḍuṃ manujaṃ vyavasyedyuktaṃ tathānyaistadupadravaiśca | [Su, Utt., 44 9.2]
sarvātmake sarvamidaṃ vyavasyed vakṣyāmi liṅgānyatha kāmalāyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 10.1]
yo hyāmayānte sahasānnam amlam adyād apathyāni ca tasya pittam | [Su, Utt., 44 10.2]
karoti pāṇḍuṃ vadanaṃ viśeṣāt pūrveritau tandribalakṣayau ca | [Su, Utt., 44 11.1]
bhedastu tasyāḥ khalu kumbhasāhvaḥ śopho mahāṃstatra ca parvabhedaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 11.2]
jvarāṅgamardabhramasādatandrākṣayānvito lāgharako 'lasākhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 12.1]
taṃ vātapittāddharipītanīlaṃ halīmakaṃ nāma vadanti tajjñāḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 12.2]
upadravāsteṣvaruciḥ pipāsā chardirjvaro mūrdharujāgnisādaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 13.1]
śophastathā kaṇṭhagato 'balatvaṃ mūrcchā klamo hṛdyavapīḍanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 13.2]
sādhyaṃ tu pāṇḍvāmayinaṃ samīkṣya snigdhaṃ ghṛtenordhvamadhaśca śuddham | [Su, Utt., 44 14.1]
sampādayet kṣaudraghṛtapragāḍhair harītakīcūrṇayutaiḥ prayogaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 14.2]
pibedghṛtaṃ vā rajanīvipakvaṃ yat traiphalaṃ tailvakam eva vāpi | [Su, Utt., 44 15.1]
virecanadravyakṛtaṃ pibedvā yogāṃśca vairecanikān ghṛtena | [Su, Utt., 44 15.2]
mūtre nikumbhārdhapalaṃ vipācya pibedabhīkṣṇaṃ kuḍavārdhamātram | [Su, Utt., 44 16.1]
khādedguḍaṃ vāpyabhayāvipakvamāragvadhādikvathitaṃ pibedvā | [Su, Utt., 44 16.2]
ayorajovyoṣaviḍaṅgacūrṇaṃ lihyāddharidrāṃ triphalānvitāṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 44 17.1]
sarpirmadhubhyāṃ vidadhīta vāpi śāstrapradeśābhihitāṃśca yogān | [Su, Utt., 44 17.2]
harecca doṣān bahuśo 'lpamātrān śvayeddhi doṣeṣvatinirhṛteṣu | [Su, Utt., 44 18.1]
dhātrīphalānāṃ rasamikṣujaṃ ca manthaṃ pibet kṣaudrayutaṃ hitāśī | [Su, Utt., 44 18.2]
ubhe bṛhatyau rajanīṃ śukākhyāṃ kākādanīṃ cāpi sakākamācīm | [Su, Utt., 44 19.1]
ādāribimbīṃ sakadambapuṣpīṃ vipācya sarpirvipacet kaṣāye | [Su, Utt., 44 19.2]
tat pāṇḍutāṃ hantyupayujyamānaṃ kṣīreṇa vā māgadhikā yathāgni | [Su, Utt., 44 20.1]
hitaṃ ca yaṣṭīmadhujaṃ kaṣāyaṃ cūrṇaṃ samaṃ vā madhunāvalihyāt | [Su, Utt., 44 20.2]
gomūtrayuktaṃ triphalādalānāṃ dattvāyasaṃ cūrṇamanalpakālam | [Su, Utt., 44 21.1]
pravālamuktāñjanaśaṅkhacūrṇaṃ lihyāttathā kāñcanagairikottham | [Su, Utt., 44 21.2]
ājaṃ śakṛtsyāt kuḍavapramāṇaṃ viḍaṃ haridrā lavaṇottamaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 22.1]
pṛthak palāṃśāni samagrametaccūrṇaṃ hitāśī madhunāvalihyāt | [Su, Utt., 44 22.2]
maṇḍūralohāgniviḍaṅgapathyāvyoṣāṃśakaḥ sarvasamānatāpyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 23.1]
mūtrāsuto 'yaṃ madhunāvalehaḥ pāṇḍvāmayaṃ hantyacireṇa ghoram | [Su, Utt., 44 23.2]
bibhītakāyomalanāgarāṇāṃ cūrṇaṃ tilānāṃ ca guḍaśca mukhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 24.1]
takrānupāno vaṭakaḥ prayuktaḥ kṣiṇoti ghorān api pāṇḍurogān | [Su, Utt., 44 24.2]
sauvarcalaṃ hiṅgu kirātatiktaṃ kalāyamātrāṇi sukhāmbunā vā | [Su, Utt., 44 25.1]
mūrvāharidrāmalakaṃ ca lihyāt sthitaṃ gavāṃ saptadināni mūtre | [Su, Utt., 44 25.2]
mūlaṃ balācitrakayoḥ pibedvā pāṇḍvāmayārto 'kṣasamaṃ hitāśī | [Su, Utt., 44 26.1]
sukhāmbunā vā lavaṇena tulyaṃ śigroḥ phalaṃ kṣīrabhujopayojyam | [Su, Utt., 44 26.2]
nyagrodhavargasya pibet kaṣāyaṃ śītaṃ sitākṣaudrayutaṃ hitāśī | [Su, Utt., 44 27.1]
śālādikaṃ cāpyatha sāracūrṇaṃ dhātrīphalaṃ vā madhunāvalihyāt | [Su, Utt., 44 27.2]
viḍaṅgamustatriphalājamodaparūṣakavyoṣavinirdahanyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 44 28.1]
cūrṇāni kṛtvā guḍaśarkare ca tathaiva sarpirmadhunī śubhe ca | [Su, Utt., 44 28.2]
saṃbhārametadvipacennidhāya sārodake sāravato gaṇasya | [Su, Utt., 44 29.1]
jātaṃ ca lehyaṃ matimān viditvā nidhāpayenmokṣakaje samudge | [Su, Utt., 44 29.2]
hantyeṣa lehaḥ khalu pāṇḍurogaṃ saśothamugrām api kāmalāṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 30.1]
saśarkarā kāmalināṃ tribhaṇḍī hitā gavākṣī saguḍā ca śuṇṭhī | [Su, Utt., 44 30.2]
kāleyake cāpi ghṛtaṃ vipakvaṃ hitaṃ ca tat syādrajanīvimiśram | [Su, Utt., 44 31.1]
dhātuṃ nadījaṃ jatu śailajaṃ vā kumbhāhvaye mūtrayutaṃ pibedvā | [Su, Utt., 44 31.2]
mūtre sthitaṃ saindhavasamprayuktaṃ māsaṃ pibedvāpi hi lohakiṭṭam | [Su, Utt., 44 32.1]
dagdhvākṣakāṣṭhair malamāyasaṃ vā gomūtranirvāpitamaṣṭavārān | [Su, Utt., 44 32.2]
vicūrṇya līḍhaṃ madhunācireṇa kumbhāhvayaṃ pāṇḍugadaṃ nihanyāt | [Su, Utt., 44 33.1]
sindhūdbhavaṃ vāgnisamaṃ ca kṛtvā kṣiptvā ca mūtre sakṛdeva taptam | [Su, Utt., 44 33.2]
lauhaṃ ca kiṭṭaṃ bahuśaśca taptvā nirvāpya mūtre bahuśastathaiva | [Su, Utt., 44 34.1]
ekīkṛtaṃ gojalapiṣṭametadaikadhyamāvāpya pacedukhāyām | [Su, Utt., 44 34.2]
yathā na dahyeta tathā viśuṣkaṃ cūrṇīkṛtaṃ peyamudaśvitā tat | [Su, Utt., 44 35.1]
takraudanāśī vijayeta rogaṃ pāṇḍuṃ tathā dīpayate 'nalaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 35.2]
drākṣāguḍūcyāmalakīrasaiśca siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ lāgharake hitaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 36.1]
gauḍānariṣṭān madhuśarkarāśca mūtrāsavān kṣārakṛtāṃstathaiva | [Su, Utt., 44 36.2]
snigdhān rasānāmalakairupetān kolānvitān vāpi hi jāṅgalānām | [Su, Utt., 44 37.1]
seveta śophābhihitāṃśca yogān pāṇḍvāmayī śāliyavāṃśca nityam | [Su, Utt., 44 37.2]
śvāsātisārārucikāsamūrcchātṛṭchardiśūlajvaraśophadāhān | [Su, Utt., 44 38.1]
tathāvipākasvarabhedasādān jayedyathāsvaṃ prasamīkṣya śāstram | [Su, Utt., 44 38.2]
anteṣu śūnaṃ parihīnamadhyaṃ mlānaṃ tathānteṣu ca madhyaśūnam | [Su, Utt., 44 39.1]
gude ca śephasyatha muṣkaśūnaṃ pratāmyamānaṃ ca visaṃjñakalpam | [Su, Utt., 44 39.2]
vivarjayet pāṇḍukinaṃ yaśo'rthī tathātisārajvarapīḍitaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 44 40.1]
{Su, Utt., 45}
athāto raktapittapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 2.1]
krodhaśokabhayāyāsaviruddhānnātapānalān | [Su, Utt., 45 3.1]
kaṭvamlalavaṇakṣāratīkṣṇoṣṇātividāhinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 3.2]
nityamabhyasato duṣṭo rasaḥ pittaṃ prakopayet | [Su, Utt., 45 4.1]
vidagdhaṃ svaguṇaiḥ pittaṃ vidahatyāśu śoṇitam | [Su, Utt., 45 4.2]
tataḥ pravartate raktamūrdhvaṃ cādho dvidhāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 45 5.1]
āmāśayādvrajedūrdhvamadhaḥ pakvāśayādvrajet | [Su, Utt., 45 5.2]
vidagdhayor dvayoścāpi dvidhābhāgaṃ pravartate | [Su, Utt., 45 6.1]
kecit sayakṛtaḥ plīhnaḥ pravadantyasṛjo gatim | [Su, Utt., 45 6.2]
ūrdhvaṃ sādhyam adho yāpyam asādhyaṃ yugapadgatam | [Su, Utt., 45 7.1]
sadanaṃ śītakāmitvaṃ kaṇṭhadhūmāyanaṃ vamiḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 7.2]
lohagandhiśca niḥśvāso bhavatyasmin bhaviṣyati | [Su, Utt., 45 8.1]
bāhyāsṛglakṣaṇaistasya saṃkhyādoṣocchritīr viduḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 8.2]
daurbalyaśvāsakāsajvaravamathumadās tandritādāhamūrcchā bhukte cānne vidāhastvadhṛtirapi sadā hṛdyatulyā ca pīḍā | [Su, Utt., 45 9.1]
tṛṣṇā kaṇṭhasya bhedaḥ śirasi ca davanaṃ pūtiniṣṭhīvanaṃ ca dveṣo bhakte 'vipāko viratirapi rate raktapittopasargāḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 9.2]
māṃsaprakṣālanābhaṃ kvathitam iva ca yat kardamāmbhonibhaṃ vā medaḥpūyāsrakalpaṃ yakṛd iva yadi vā pakvajambūphalābham | [Su, Utt., 45 10.1]
yat kṛṣṇaṃ yacca nīlaṃ bhṛśamatikuṇapaṃ yatra coktā vikārāstadvarjyaṃ raktapittaṃ surapatidhanuṣā yacca tulyaṃ vibhāti | [Su, Utt., 45 10.2]
nādau saṃgrāhyamudriktaṃ yadasṛgbalino 'śnataḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 11.1]
tat pāṇḍugrahaṇīkuṣṭhaplīhagulmajvarāvaham | [Su, Utt., 45 11.2]
adhaḥpravṛttaṃ vamanairūrdhvagaṃ ca virecanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 12.1]
jayedanyataradvāpi kṣīṇasya śamanairasṛk | [Su, Utt., 45 12.2]
atipravṛddhadoṣasya pūrvaṃ lohitapittinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 13.1]
akṣīṇabalamāṃsāgneḥ kartavyamapatarpaṇam | [Su, Utt., 45 13.2]
laṅghitasya tataḥ peyāṃ vidadhyāt svalpataṇḍulām | [Su, Utt., 45 14.1]
rasayūṣau pradātavyau surabhisnehasaṃskṛtau | [Su, Utt., 45 14.2]
tarpaṇaṃ pācanaṃ lehān sarpīṃṣi vividhāni ca | [Su, Utt., 45 14.3]
drākṣāmadhukakāśmaryasitāyuktaṃ virecanam | [Su, Utt., 45 15.1]
yaṣṭīmadhukayuktaṃ ca sakṣaudraṃ vamanaṃ hitam | [Su, Utt., 45 15.2]

śuddhekṣukāṇḍamāpothya nave kumbhe himāmbhasā | [Su, Utt., 45 21.2]
yojayitvā kṣipedrātrāvākāśe sotpalaṃ tu tat | [Su, Utt., 45 22.1]
prātaḥ srutaṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ pibecchoṇitapittavān | [Su, Utt., 45 22.2]
pibecchītakaṣāyaṃ vā jambvāmrārjunasaṃbhavam | [Su, Utt., 45 23.1]
udumbaraphalaṃ piṣṭvā pibettadrasam eva vā | [Su, Utt., 45 23.2]
trapuṣīmūlakalkaṃ vā sakṣaudraṃ taṇḍulāmbunā | [Su, Utt., 45 24.1]

karañjabījamevaṃ vā sitākṣaudrayutaṃ pibet | [Su, Utt., 45 25.2]
majjānamiṅgudasyaivaṃ pibenmadhukasaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 45 26.1]
sukhoṣṇaṃ lavaṇaṃ bījaṃ kārañjaṃ dadhimastunā | [Su, Utt., 45 26.2]

pathyāścaivāvapīḍeṣu ghrāṇataḥ prasrute 'sṛji | [Su, Utt., 45 28.1]
atinisrutarakto vā kṣaudrayuktaṃ pibedasṛk | [Su, Utt., 45 28.2]
yakṛdvā bhakṣayedājamāmaṃ pittasamāyutam | [Su, Utt., 45 28.3]
palāśavṛkṣasvarase vipakvaṃ sarpiḥ pibet kṣaudrayutaṃ suśītam | [Su, Utt., 45 29.1]
vanaspatīnāṃ svarasaiḥ kṛtaṃ vā saśarkaraṃ kṣīraghṛtaṃ pibedvā | [Su, Utt., 45 29.2]
drākṣāmuśīrāṇyatha padmakaṃ sitā pṛthakpalāṃśānyudake samāvapet | [Su, Utt., 45 30.1]
sthitaṃ niśāṃ tadrudhirāmayaṃ jayet pītaṃ payo vāmbusamaṃ hitāśinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 30.2]

lihettathā vāstukabījacūrṇaṃ kṣaudrānvitaṃ taṇḍulasāhvayaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 45 31.2]

gāyatrijambvarjunakovidāraśirīṣarodhrāśanaśālmalīnām | [Su, Utt., 45 34.2]
puṣpāṇi śigrośca vicūrṇya leho madhvanvitaḥ śoṇitapittaroge | [Su, Utt., 45 35.1]
sakṣaudramindīvarabhasmavāri karañjabījaṃ madhusarpiṣī ca | [Su, Utt., 45 35.2]
jambvarjunāmrakvathitaṃ ca toyaṃ ghnanti trayaḥ pittamasṛk ca yogāḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 36.1]
mūlāni puṣpāṇi ca mātuluṅgyāḥ piṣṭvā pibettaṇḍuladhāvanena | [Su, Utt., 45 36.2]
ghrāṇapravṛtte jalamāśu deyaṃ saśarkaraṃ nāsikayā payo vā | [Su, Utt., 45 37.1]
drākṣārasaṃ kṣīraghṛtaṃ pibedvā saśarkaraṃ cekṣurasaṃ himaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 45 37.2]

drākṣāghṛtakṣaudrasitāyutena vidārigandhādivipācitena | [Su, Utt., 45 38.2]
kṣīreṇa cāsthāpanamagryamuktaṃ hitaṃ ghṛtaṃ cāpyanuvāsanārtham | [Su, Utt., 45 39.1]

kṣīraudanaṃ bhuktamathānuvāsayedghṛtena yaṣṭīmadhusādhitena ca | [Su, Utt., 45 41.1]
adhovahaṃ śoṇitameṣa nāśayettathātisāraṃ rudhirasya dustaram | [Su, Utt., 45 41.2]
virekayoge tvati caiva śasyate vāmyaśca rakte vijite balānvitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 45 42.1]

pravṛttarakteṣu ca pāyujeṣu kuryādvidhānaṃ khalu raktapaittam | [Su, Utt., 45 43.2]
vidhiścāsṛgdare 'pyeṣa strīṇāṃ kāryo vijānatā | [Su, Utt., 45 44.1]
