{Su, Utt., 46}
athāto mūrcchāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 2]
kṣīṇasya bahudoṣasya viruddhāhārasevinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 3.1]
vegāghātādabhīghātāddhīnasattvasya vā punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 3.2]
karaṇāyataneṣūgrā bāhyeṣvābhyantareṣu ca | [Su, Utt., 46 4.1]
niviśante yadā doṣāstadā mūrchanti mānavāḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 4.2]
hṛtpīḍā jṛmbhaṇaṃ glāniḥ saṃjñānāśo balasya ca | [Su, Utt., 46 5.1]
sarvāsāṃ pūrvarūpāṇi yathāsvaṃ tā vibhāvayet | [Su, Utt., 46 5.2]
saṃjñāvahāsu nāḍīṣu pihitāsvanilādibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 6.1]
tamo 'bhyupaiti sahasā sukhaduḥkhavyapohakṛt | [Su, Utt., 46 6.2]
sukhaduḥkhavyapohācca naraḥ patati kāṣṭhavat | [Su, Utt., 46 7.1]
moho mūrccheti tāṃ prāhuḥ ṣaḍvidhā sā prakīrtitā | [Su, Utt., 46 7.2]
vātādibhiḥ śoṇitena madyena ca viṣeṇa ca | [Su, Utt., 46 8.1]
ṣaṭsvapyetāsu pittaṃ hi prabhutvenāvatiṣṭhate | [Su, Utt., 46 8.2]
apasmāroktaliṅgāni tāsāmuktāni tattvataḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 9.1]
pṛthivyambhastamorūpaṃ raktagandhaśca tanmayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 9.2]
tasmād raktasya gandhena mūrchanti bhuvi mānavāḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 10.1]
dravyasvabhāva ityeke dṛṣṭvā yad abhimuhyati | [Su, Utt., 46 10.2]
guṇāstīvrataratvena sthitāstu viṣamadyayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 11.1]
ta eva tasmājjāyeta mohastābhyāṃ yatheritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 11.2]
madyena vilapan śete naṣṭavibhrāntamānasaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 12.1]
gātrāṇi vikṣipan bhūmau jarāṃ yāvanna yāti tat | [Su, Utt., 46 12.2]
vepathusvapnatṛṣṇāḥ syuḥ stambhaśca viṣamūrchite | [Su, Utt., 46 13.1]
veditavyaṃ tīvrataraṃ yathāsvaṃ viṣalakṣaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 13.2]
sekāvagāhau maṇayaḥ sahārāḥ śītāḥ pradehā vyajanānilāśca | [Su, Utt., 46 14.1]
śītāni pānāni ca gandhavanti sarvāsu mūrcchāsvanivāritāni | [Su, Utt., 46 14.2]
sitāpriyālekṣurasaplutāni drākṣāmadhūkasvarasānvitāni | [Su, Utt., 46 15.1]
kharjūrakāśmaryarasaiḥ śṛtāni pānāni sarpīṃṣi ca jīvanāni | [Su, Utt., 46 15.2]
siddhāni varge madhure payāṃsi sadāḍimā jāṅgalajā rasāśca | [Su, Utt., 46 16.1]
tathā yavā lohitaśālayaśca mūrcchāsu pathyāśca sadā satīnāḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 16.2]
bhujaṅgapuṣpaṃ maricānyuśīraṃ kolasya madhyaṃ ca pibet samāni | [Su, Utt., 46 17.1]
śītena toyena bisaṃ mṛṇālaṃ kṣaudreṇa kṛṣṇāṃ sitayā ca pathyām | [Su, Utt., 46 17.2]
kuryācca nāsāvadanāvarodhaṃ kṣīraṃ pibedvāpyatha mānuṣīṇām | [Su, Utt., 46 18.1]
mūrcchāṃ prasaktāṃ tu śirovirekair jayedabhīkṣṇaṃ vamanaiśca tīkṣṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 18.2]
harītakīkvāthaśṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā dhātrīphalānāṃ svarasaiḥ kṛtaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 46 19.1]
drākṣāsitādāḍimalājavanti śītāni nīlotpalapadmavanti | [Su, Utt., 46 19.2]
pibet kaṣāyāṇi ca gandhavanti pittajvaraṃ yāni śamaṃ nayanti | [Su, Utt., 46 20.1]
prabhūtadoṣastamaso 'tirekāt saṃmūrchito naiva vibudhyate yaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 20.2]
saṃnyastasaṃjño bhṛśaduścikitsyo jñeyastadā buddhimatā manuṣyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 21.1]
yathāmaloṣṭaṃ salile niṣiktaṃ samuddhared āśvavilīnam eva | [Su, Utt., 46 21.2]
tadvaccikitsettvarayā bhiṣaktamasvedanaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayātam | [Su, Utt., 46 22.1]
tīkṣṇāñjanābhyañjanadhūmayogaistathā nakhābhyantaratotrapātaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 22.2]
vāditragītānunayairapūrvair vighaṭṭanair guptaphalāvagharṣaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 46 23.1]

{Su, Utt., 47}
athātaḥ pānātyayapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 2.1]
madyamuṣṇaṃ tathā tīkṣṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ viśadam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 47 3.1]
rūkṣamāśukaraṃ caiva vyavāyi ca vikāśi ca | [Su, Utt., 47 3.2]
auṣṇyācchītopacāraṃ tattaikṣṇyāddhanti manogatim | [Su, Utt., 47 4.1]
viśatyavayavān saukṣmyādvaiśadyātkaphaśukranut | [Su, Utt., 47 4.2]
mārutaṃ kopayedraukṣyād āśutvāccāśukarmakṛt | [Su, Utt., 47 5.1]
harṣadaṃ ca vyavāyitvādvikāśitvādvisarpati | [Su, Utt., 47 5.2]
tadamlaṃ rasataḥ proktaṃ laghu rocanadīpanam | [Su, Utt., 47 6.1]
kecil lavaṇavarjyāṃstu rasānatrādiśanti hi | [Su, Utt., 47 6.2]

bhavedāyuḥprakarṣāya balāyopacayāya ca | [Su, Utt., 47 7.2]
kāmyatā manasastuṣṭirdhairyaṃ tejo 'tivikramaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 8.1]
vidhivat sevyamāne tu madye saṃnihitā guṇāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 8.2]
tadevānannam ajñena sevyamānamamātrayā | [Su, Utt., 47 9.1]
kāyāgninā hyagnisamaṃ sametya kurute madam | [Su, Utt., 47 9.2]
madena karaṇānāṃ tu bhāvānyatve kṛte sati | [Su, Utt., 47 10.1]
nigūḍham api bhāvaṃ svaṃ prakāśīkurute 'vaśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 10.2]
tryavasthaśca mado jñeyaḥ pūrvo madhyo 'tha paścimaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 11.1]
pūrve vīryaratiprītiharṣabhāṣyādivardhanam | [Su, Utt., 47 11.2]
pralāpo madhyame moho yuktāyuktakriyāstathā | [Su, Utt., 47 12.1]
visaṃjñaḥ paścime śete naṣṭakarmakriyāguṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 12.2]
ślaiṣmikānalpapittāṃśca snigdhānmātropasevinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 13.1]
pānaṃ na bādhate 'tyarthaṃ viparītāṃstu bādhate | [Su, Utt., 47 13.2]
nirbhaktamekāntata eva madyaṃ niṣevyamāṇaṃ manujena nityam | [Su, Utt., 47 14.1]
utpādayet kaṣṭatamān vikārānāpādayeccāpi śarīrabhedam | [Su, Utt., 47 14.2]
kruddhena bhītena pipāsitena śokābhitaptena bubhukṣitena | [Su, Utt., 47 15.1]
vyāyāmabhārādhvaparikṣatena vegāvarodhābhihatena cāpi | [Su, Utt., 47 15.2]

uṣṇābhitaptena ca sevyamānaṃ karoti madyaṃ vividhān vikārān | [Su, Utt., 47 16.2]
pānātyayaṃ paramadaṃ pānājīrṇamathāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 47 17.1]
pānavibhramamugraṃ ca teṣāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam | [Su, Utt., 47 17.2]
stambhāṅgamardahṛdayagrahatodakampāḥ pānātyaye 'nilakṛte śiraso rujaśca | [Su, Utt., 47 18.1]
svedapralāpamukhaśoṣaṇadāhamūrcchāḥ pittātmake vadanalocanapītatā ca | [Su, Utt., 47 18.2]
śleṣmātmake vamathuśītakaphaprasekāḥ sarvātmake bhavati sarvavikārasaṃpat | [Su, Utt., 47 19.1]
ūṣmāṇamaṅgagurutāṃ virasānanatvaṃ śleṣmādhikatvamaruciṃ malamūtrasaṅgam | [Su, Utt., 47 19.2]
liṅgaṃ parasya tu madasya vadanti tajjñāstṛṣṇāṃ rujāṃ śirasi sandhiṣu cāpi bhedam | [Su, Utt., 47 20.1]

jñeyāni tatra bhiṣajā suviniścitāni pittaprakopajanitāni ca kāraṇāni | [Su, Utt., 47 21.1]
hṛdgātratodavamathujvarakaṇṭhadhūmamūrcchākaphasravaṇamūrdharujo vidāhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 21.2]
dveṣaḥ surānnavikṛteṣu ca teṣu teṣu taṃ pānavibhramamuśantyakhilena dhīrāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 22.1]
hīnottarauṣṭham atiśītam amandadāhaṃ tailaprabhāsyamatipānahataṃ vijahyāt | [Su, Utt., 47 22.2]

pānātyaye kaphakṛte kaphamullikhecca madyena bimbividulodakasaṃyutena | [Su, Utt., 47 28.1]
seveta tiktakaṭukāṃśca rasānudārān yūṣāṃśca tiktakaṭukopahitān hitāya | [Su, Utt., 47 28.2]
pathyaṃ yavānnavikṛtāni ca jāṅgalāni śleṣmaghnamanyad api yacca niratyayaṃ syāt | [Su, Utt., 47 29.1]
kuryācca sarvamatha sarvabhave vidhānaṃ dvandvodbhave dvayamavekṣya yathāpradhānam | [Su, Utt., 47 29.2]
sāmānyamanyad api yacca samagramagryaṃ vakṣyāmi yacca manaso madakṛt sukhaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 47 30.1]
tvaṅnāgapuṣpamagadhailamadhūkadhānyaiḥ ślakṣṇairajājimaricaiśca kṛtaṃ samāṃśaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 30.2]
pānaṃ kapittharasavāriparūṣakāḍhyaṃ pānātyayeṣu vidhivatsrutamambarānte | [Su, Utt., 47 31.1]
hrīverapadmaparipelavasamprayuktaiḥ puṣpair vilipya karavīrajalodbhavaiśca | [Su, Utt., 47 31.2]
piṣṭaiḥ sapadmakayutairapi sārivādyaiḥ sekaṃ jalaiśca vitaredamalaiḥ suśītaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 32.1]
tvakpatracocamaricailabhujaṅgapuṣpaśleṣmātakaprasavavalkaguḍair upetam | [Su, Utt., 47 32.2]
drākṣāyutaṃ hṛtamalaṃ madirāmayārtaistatpānakaṃ śuci sugandhi narair niṣevyam | [Su, Utt., 47 33.1]
piṣṭvā pibecca madhukaṃ kaṭurohiṇīṃ ca drākṣāṃ ca mūlamasakṛt trapuṣībhavaṃ yat | [Su, Utt., 47 33.2]
kārpāsinīm atha ca nāgabalāṃ ca tulyāṃ pītvā sukhī bhavati sādhu suvarcalāṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 47 34.1]
kāśmaryadāruviḍadāḍimapippalīṣu drākṣānvitāsu kṛtamambuni pānakaṃ yat | [Su, Utt., 47 34.2]
tadbījapūrakarasāyutamāśu pītaṃ śāntiṃ parāṃ paramade tvacirāt karoti | [Su, Utt., 47 35.1]
drākṣāsitāmadhukajīrakadhānyakṛṣṇāsvevaṃ kṛtaṃ trivṛtayā ca pibettathaiva | [Su, Utt., 47 35.2]
sauvarcalāyutamudārarasaṃ phalāmlaṃ bhārgīśṛtena ca jalena hito 'vasekaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 36.1]
ikṣvākudhāmārgavavṛkṣakāṇi kākāhvayodumbarikāśca dugdhe | [Su, Utt., 47 37.1]

tvakpippalībhujagapuṣpaviḍairupetaṃ seveta hiṅgumaricailayutaṃ phalāmlam | [Su, Utt., 47 38.1]
uṣṇāmbusaindhavayutāstvathavā viḍatvakcavyailahiṅgumagadhāphalamūlaśuṇṭhīḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 38.2]
hṛdyaiḥ khaḍairapi ca bhojanamatra śastaṃ drākṣākapitthaphaladāḍimapānakaṃ yat | [Su, Utt., 47 39.1]
tat pānavibhramaharaṃ madhuśarkarāḍhyamāmrātakolarasapānakam eva cāpi | [Su, Utt., 47 39.2]
kharjūravetrakakarīraparūṣakeṣu drākṣātrivṛtsu ca kṛtaṃ sasitaṃ himaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 47 40.1]
śrīparṇiyuktamathavā tu pibedimāni yaṣṭyāhvayotpalahimāmbuvimiśritāni | [Su, Utt., 47 40.2]
kṣīripravālabisajīrakanāgapuṣpapattrailavālusitasārivapadmakāni | [Su, Utt., 47 41.1]
āmrātabhavyakaramardakapitthakolavṛkṣāmlavetraphalajīrakadāḍimāni | [Su, Utt., 47 41.2]
seveta vā maricajīrakanāgapuṣpatvakpatraviśvacavikailayutān rasāṃśca | [Su, Utt., 47 42.1]
sūkṣmāmbarasrutahimāṃśca sugandhigandhān pānodbhavānnudati saptagadānaśeṣān | [Su, Utt., 47 42.2]
pañcendriyārthaviṣayā mṛdupānayogā hṛdyāḥ sukhāśca manasaḥ satataṃ niṣevyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 43.1]
pānātyayeṣu vikaṭorunitambavatyaḥ pīnonnatastanabharānatamadhyadeśāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 43.2]
prauḍhāḥ striyo 'bhinavayauvanapīnagātryaḥ sevyāśca pañcaviṣayātiśayasvabhāvāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 44.1]
pibedrasaṃ puṣpaphalodbhavaṃ vā sitāmadhūkatrisugandhiyuktam | [Su, Utt., 47 45.1]
saṃcūrṇya saṃyojya ca nāgapuṣpairajājikṛṣṇāmaricaiśca tulyaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 45.2]
varṣābhūyaṣṭyāhvamadhūkalākṣātvakkarbudārāṅkurajīrakāṇi | [Su, Utt., 47 46.1]
drākṣāṃ ca kṛṣṇāmatha keśaraṃ ca kṣīre samāloḍya pibet sukhepsuḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 46.2]
bhavecca madyena tu yena pātitaḥ prakāmapītena surāsavādinā | [Su, Utt., 47 47.1]
tadeva tasmai vidhivat pradāpayedviparyaye bhraṃśamavaśyamṛcchati | [Su, Utt., 47 47.2]
yathā narendropahatasya kasyacidbhavet prasādastata eva nānyataḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 48.1]
dhruvaṃ tathā madyahatasya dehino bhavet prasādastata eva nānyataḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 48.2]
vicchinnamadyaḥ sahasā yo 'timadyaṃ niṣevate | [Su, Utt., 47 49.1]
tasya pānātyayoddiṣṭā vikārāḥ sambhavanti hi | [Su, Utt., 47 49.2]
madyasyāgneyavāyavyau guṇāvambuvahāni tu | [Su, Utt., 47 50.1]
srotāṃsi śoṣayeyātāṃ tena tṛṣṇopajāyate | [Su, Utt., 47 50.2]
pāṭalotpalakandeṣu mudgaparṇyāṃ ca sādhitam | [Su, Utt., 47 51.1]
pibenmāgadhikonmiśraṃ tatrāmbho himaśītalam | [Su, Utt., 47 51.2]
sarpistailavasāmajjadadhibhṛṅgarasair yutam | [Su, Utt., 47 52.1]
kvāthena bilvayavayoḥ sarvagandhaiśca peṣitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 52.2]
pakvamabhyañjane śreṣṭhaṃ seke kvāthaśca śītalaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 53.1]
rasavanti ca bhojyāni yathāsvamavacārayet | [Su, Utt., 47 53.2]
pānakāni suśītāni hṛdyāni surabhīṇi ca | [Su, Utt., 47 54.1]
tvacaṃ prāptastu pānoṣmā pittaraktābhimūrchitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 54.2]
dāhaṃ prakurute ghoraṃ pittavattatra bheṣajam | [Su, Utt., 47 54.3]
śītaṃ vidhānamata ūrdhvamahaṃ pravakṣye dāhapraśāntikaramṛddhimatāṃ narāṇām | [Su, Utt., 47 55.1]
tatrādito malayajena hitaḥ pradehaścandrāṃśuhāratuhinodakaśītalena | [Su, Utt., 47 55.2]
śītāmbuśītalataraiśca śayānamenaṃ hārair mṛṇālavalayairabalāḥ spṛśeyuḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 56.1]
bhinnotpalojjvalahime śayane śayīta patreṣu vā sajalabinduṣu padminīnām | [Su, Utt., 47 56.2]
āsādayan pavanamāhṛtamaṅganābhiḥ kahlārapadmadalaśaivalasaṃcayeṣu | [Su, Utt., 47 57.1]
kāntair vanāntapavanaiḥ parimṛśyamānaḥ śaktaścared bhavanakānanadīrghikāsu | [Su, Utt., 47 57.2]
dāhābhibhūtamathavā pariṣecayettu lāmajjakāmburuhacandanatoyatoyaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 58.1]
visrāvitāṃ hṛtamalāṃ navavāripūrṇāṃ padmotpalākulajalāmadhivāsitāmbum | [Su, Utt., 47 58.2]
vāpīṃ bhajeta haricandanabhūṣitāṅgaḥ kāntākaraspṛśan akarkaśaromakūpaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 59.1]
tatrainamamburuhapatrasamaiḥ spṛśantyaḥ śītaiḥ karoruvadanaiḥ kaṭhinaiḥ stanaiśca | [Su, Utt., 47 59.2]
toyāvagāhakuśalā madhurasvabhāvāḥ saṃharṣayeyurabalāḥ sukalaiḥ pralāpaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 60.1]
dhārāgṛhe pragalitodakadurdinābhe klāntaḥ śayīta salilānilaśītakukṣau | [Su, Utt., 47 60.2]
gandhodakaiḥ sakusumair upasiktabhūmau patrāmbucandanarasairupaliptakuḍye | [Su, Utt., 47 61.1]
jātyutpalapriyakakeśarapuṇḍarīkapunnāganāgakaravīrakṛtopacāre | [Su, Utt., 47 61.2]
tasmin gṛhe kamalareṇvaruṇe śayīta yatnāhṛtānilavikampitapuṣpadāmni | [Su, Utt., 47 62.1]
hemantavindhyahimavanmalayācalānāṃ śītāmbhasāṃ sakadalīharitadrumāṇām | [Su, Utt., 47 62.2]
udbhinnanīlanalināmburuhākarāṇāṃ candrodayasya ca kathāḥ śṛṇuyānmanojñāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 63.1]
mlānaṃ pratāntamanasaṃ manaso 'nukūlāḥ pīnastanorujaghanā haricandanāṅgyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 63.2]
tā enamārdravasanāḥ saha saṃviśeyuḥ śliṣṭvābalāḥ śithilamekhalahārayaṣṭyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 64.1]
harṣayeyurnaraṃ nāryaḥ svaguṇai rahasi sthitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 65.1]
tāḥ śaityācchamayeyuśca pittapānātyayāntaram | [Su, Utt., 47 65.2]
tṛḍdāharaktapitteṣu kāryo 'yaṃ bheṣajakramaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 66.1]
sāmānyato viśeṣaṃ tu śṛṇu dāheṣvaśeṣataḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 66.2]
kṛtsnadehānugaṃ raktamudriktaṃ dahati hyati | [Su, Utt., 47 67.1]
saṃcūṣyate dahyate ca tāmrābhastāmralocanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 67.2]
lohagandhāṅgavadano vahninevāvakīryate | [Su, Utt., 47 68.1]
taṃ vilaṅghya vidhānena saṃsṛṣṭāhāramācaret | [Su, Utt., 47 68.2]
apraśāmyati dāhe ca rasaistṛptasya jāṅgalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 69.1]
śākhāśrayā yathānyāyaṃ rohiṇīrvyadhayet sirāḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 69.2]
pittajvarasamaḥ pittāt sa cāpyasya vidhirhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 70.1]
tṛṣṇānirodhādabdhātau kṣīṇe tejaḥ samuddhatam | [Su, Utt., 47 70.2]
sabāhyābhyantaraṃ dehaṃ dahedvai mandacetasaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 71.1]
saṃśuṣkagalatālvoṣṭho jihvāṃ niṣkṛṣya ceṣṭate | [Su, Utt., 47 71.2]
tatropaśamayettejastvabdhātuṃ ca vivardhayet | [Su, Utt., 47 72.1]
pāyayet kāmamambhaśca śarkarāḍhyaṃ payo 'pi vā | [Su, Utt., 47 72.2]
śītamikṣurasaṃ manthaṃ vitarecceritaṃ vidhim | [Su, Utt., 47 73.1]
asṛjā pūrṇakoṣṭhasya dāho bhavati duḥsahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 73.2]
vidhiḥ sadyovraṇīyoktastasya lakṣaṇam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 47 74.1]
dhātukṣayokto yo dāhastena mūrcchātṛṣānvitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 74.2]
kṣāmasvaraḥ kriyāhīno bhṛśaṃ sīdati pīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 75.1]
raktapittavidhistasya hitaḥ snigdho 'nilāpahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 75.2]
kṣatajenāśnataścānyaḥ śocato vāpyanekadhā | [Su, Utt., 47 76.1]
tenāntardahyate 'tyarthaṃ tṛṣṇāmūrcchāpralāpavān | [Su, Utt., 47 76.2]
tamiṣṭaviṣayopetaṃ suhṛdbhirabhisaṃvṛtam | [Su, Utt., 47 77.1]
kṣīramāṃsarasāhāraṃ vidhinoktena sādhayet | [Su, Utt., 47 77.2]
marmābhighātajo 'pyasti sa cāsādhyatamaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 78.1]
sarva eva ca varjyāḥ syuḥ śītagātreṣu dehiṣu | [Su, Utt., 47 78.2]
evaṃvidho bhavedyastu madirāmayapīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 47 79.1]
praśāntopadrave cāpi śodhanaṃ prāptamācaret | [Su, Utt., 47 79.2]
sajīrakāṇyārdrakaśṛṅgaverasauvarcalānyardhajalaplutāni | [Su, Utt., 47 80.1]
madyāni hṛdyānyatha gandhavanti pītāni sadyaḥ śamayanti tṛṣṇām | [Su, Utt., 47 80.2]
jalaplutaścandanabhūṣitāṅgaḥ sragvī sabhaktāṃ piśitopadaṃśām | [Su, Utt., 47 81.1]
pibet surāṃ naiva labheta rogān mano'nuvighnaṃ ca madaṃ na yāti | [Su, Utt., 47 81.2]
{Su, Utt., 48}
athātastṛṣṇāpratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 2.1]
satataṃ yaḥ pibedvāri na tṛptimadhigacchati | [Su, Utt., 48 3.1]
punaḥ kāṅkṣati toyaṃ ca taṃ tṛṣṇārditamādiśet | [Su, Utt., 48 3.2]
sakṣobhaśokaśramamadyapānād rūkṣāmlaśuṣkoṣṇakaṭūpayogāt | [Su, Utt., 48 4.1]
dhātukṣayāllaṅghanasūryatāpāt pittaṃ ca vātaśca bhṛśaṃ pravṛddhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 4.2]
srotāṃsi saṃdūṣayataḥ sametau yānyambuvāhīni śarīriṇāṃ hi | [Su, Utt., 48 5.1]
srotaḥsv apāṃvāhiṣu dūṣiteṣu jāyeta tṛṣṇātibalā tatastu | [Su, Utt., 48 5.2]
tisraḥ smṛtāstāḥ kṣatajā caturthī kṣayāttathānyāmasamudbhavā ca | [Su, Utt., 48 6.1]
syāt saptamī bhaktanimittajā tu nibodha liṅgānyanupūrvaśastu | [Su, Utt., 48 6.2]
tālvoṣṭhakaṇṭhāsyaviśoṣadāhāḥ saṃtāpamohabhramavipralāpāḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 7.1]
pūrvāṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti tāsāmutpattikāleṣu viśeṣatastu | [Su, Utt., 48 7.2]
śuṣkāsyatā mārutasaṃbhavāyāṃ todastathā śaṅkhaśiraḥsu cāpi | [Su, Utt., 48 8.1]
srotonirodho virasaṃ ca vaktraṃ śītābhir adbhiśca vivṛddhimeti | [Su, Utt., 48 8.2]
mūrcchāpralāpārucivaktraśoṣāḥ pītekṣaṇatvaṃ pratataśca dāhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 9.1]
śītābhikāṅkṣā mukhatiktatā ca pittātmikāyāṃ paridhūpanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 48 9.2]
kaphāvṛtābhyāmanilānalābhyāṃ kapho 'pi śuṣkaḥ prakaroti tṛṣṇām | [Su, Utt., 48 10.1]
nidrā gurutvaṃ madhurāsyatā ca tayārditaḥ śuṣyati cātimātram | [Su, Utt., 48 10.2]
kaṇṭhopalepo mukhapicchilatvaṃ śītajvaraśchardirarocakaśca | [Su, Utt., 48 11.1]
kaphātmikāyāṃ gurugātratā ca śākhāsu śophastvavipāka eva | [Su, Utt., 48 11.2]
etāni rūpāṇi bhavanti tasyāṃ tayārditaḥ kāṅkṣati nāti cāmbhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 11.3]
kṣatasya rukśoṇitanirgamābhyāṃ tṛṣṇā caturthī kṣatajā matā tu | [Su, Utt., 48 12.1]
tayābhibhūtasya niśādināni gacchanti duḥkhaṃ pibato 'pi toyam | [Su, Utt., 48 12.2]
rasakṣayādyā kṣayajā matā sā tayārditaḥ śuṣyati dahyate ca | [Su, Utt., 48 13.1]
atyarthamākāṅkṣati cāpi toyaṃ tāṃ sannipātāditi kecidāhuḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 13.2]
rasakṣayoktāni ca lakṣaṇāni tasyāmaśeṣeṇa bhiṣagvyavasyet | [Su, Utt., 48 14.1]
tridoṣaliṅgāmasamudbhavā ca hṛcchūlaniṣṭhīvanasādayuktā | [Su, Utt., 48 14.2]
snigdhaṃ tathāmlaṃ lavaṇaṃ ca bhuktaṃ gurvannam evātitṛṣāṃ karoti | [Su, Utt., 48 15.1]
kṣīṇaṃ vicittaṃ badhiraṃ tṛṣārtaṃ vivarjayennirgatajihvamāśu | [Su, Utt., 48 15.2]
tṛṣṇābhivṛddhāvudare ca pūrṇe taṃ vāmayenmāgadhikodakena | [Su, Utt., 48 16.1]
vilobhanaṃ cātra hitaṃ vidheyaṃ syāddāḍimāmrātakamātuluṅgaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 16.2]
tisraḥ prayogairiha saṃnivāryāḥ śītaiśca samyagrasavīryajātaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 17.1]
gaṇḍūṣamamlair virase ca vaktre kuryācchubhairāmalakasya cūrṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 17.2]
suvarṇarūpyādibhiragnitaptair loṣṭaiḥ kṛtaṃ vā sikatādibhir vā | [Su, Utt., 48 18.1]
jalaṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ śamayettu tṛṣṇāṃ saśarkaraṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ himaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 48 18.2]
pañcāṅgikāḥ pañcagaṇā ya uktāsteṣvambu siddhaṃ prathame gaṇe vā | [Su, Utt., 48 19.1]
pibet sukhoṣṇaṃ manujo 'cireṇa tṛṣo vimucyeta hi vātajāyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 19.2]
pittaghnavargaistu kṛtaḥ kaṣāyaḥ saśarkaraḥ kṣaudrayutaḥ suśītaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 20.1]
pītastṛṣāṃ pittakṛtāṃ nihanti kṣīraṃ śṛtaṃ vāpyatha jīvanīyaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 20.2]
bilvāḍhakīkanyakapañcamūlīdarbheṣu siddhaṃ kaphajāṃ nihanti | [Su, Utt., 48 21.1]
hitaṃ bhavecchardanam eva cātra taptena nimbaprasavodakena | [Su, Utt., 48 21.2]
sarvāsu tṛṣṇāsvathavāpi paittaṃ kuryādvidhiṃ tena hi tā na santi | [Su, Utt., 48 22.1]
paryāgatodumbarajo rasastu saśarkaras tatkvathitodakaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 48 22.2]
vargasya siddhasya ca sārivādeḥ pātavyamambhaḥ śiśiraṃ tṛṣārtaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 23.1]
kaśeruśṛṅgāṭakapadmamocabisekṣusiddhaṃ kṣatajāṃ nihanti | [Su, Utt., 48 23.2]
lājotpalośīrakucandanāni dattvā pravāte niśi vāsayettu | [Su, Utt., 48 24.1]
taduttamaṃ toyamudāragandhi sitāyutaṃ kṣaudrayutaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 48 24.2]
drākṣāpragāḍhaṃ ca hitāya vaidyastṛṣṇārditebhyo vitarennarebhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 25.1]
sasārivādau tṛṇapañcamūle tathotpalādau prathame gaṇe ca | [Su, Utt., 48 25.2]
kuryāt kaṣāyaṃ ca yatheritena madhūkapuṣpādiṣu cāpareṣu | [Su, Utt., 48 26.1]
rājādanakṣīrikapītaneṣu ṣaṭ pānakānyatra hitāni ca syuḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 26.2]
satuṇḍikerāṇyathavā pibettu piṣṭāni kārpāsasamudbhavāni | [Su, Utt., 48 27.1]
kṣatodbhavāṃ rugvinivāraṇena jayedrasānāmasṛjaśca pānaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 27.2]
kṣayotthitāṃ kṣīraghṛtaṃ nihanyānmāṃsodakaṃ vā madhukodakaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 48 28.1]
āmodbhavāṃ bilvavacāyutaistu jayet kaṣāyairatha dīpanīyaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 28.2]
āmrātabhallātabalāyutāni pibet kaṣāyāṇyatha dīpanāni | [Su, Utt., 48 29.1]
gurvannajātāṃ vamanair jayecca kṣayādṛte sarvakṛtāṃ ca tṛṣṇām | [Su, Utt., 48 29.2]
śramodbhavāṃ māṃsaraso nihanti guḍodakaṃ vāpyathavāpi manthaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 30.1]
bhaktoparodhāttṛṣito yavāgūmuṣṇāṃ pibenmanthamatho himaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 48 30.2]
yā snehapītasya bhavecca tṛṣṇā tatroṣṇamambhaḥ prapibenmanuṣyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 31.1]
madyodbhavāmardhajalaṃ nihanti madyaṃ tṛṣāṃ yāpi ca madyapasya | [Su, Utt., 48 31.2]
tṛṣṇodbhavāṃ hanti jalaṃ suśītaṃ saśarkaraṃ sekṣurasaṃ tathāmbhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 48 32.1]
svaiḥ svaiḥ kaṣāyair vamanāni tāsāṃ tathā jvaroktāni ca pācanāni | [Su, Utt., 48 32.2]
lepāvagāhau pariṣecanāni kuryāttathā śītagṛhāṇi cāpi | [Su, Utt., 48 33.1]
saṃśodhanaṃ kṣīrarasau ghṛtāni sarvāsu lehānmadhurān himāṃśca | [Su, Utt., 48 33.2]
{Su, Utt., 49}
athātaśchardipratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 2.1]
atidravair atisnigdhair ahṛdyair lavaṇairati | [Su, Utt., 49 3.1]
akāle cātimātraiśca tathāsātmyaiśca bhojanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 3.2]
śramāt kṣayāttathodvegādajīrṇāt kṛmidoṣataḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 4.1]
nāryāścāpannasattvāyās tathātidrutam aśnataḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 4.2]
atyantāmaparītasya chardervai saṃbhavo dhruvam | [Su, Utt., 49 5.1]
bībhatsair hetubhiścānyair drutamutkleśito balāt | [Su, Utt., 49 5.2]
chādayannānanaṃ vegairardayannaṅgabhañjanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 6.1]
nirucyate chardiriti doṣo vaktrādviniścaran | [Su, Utt., 49 6.2]
doṣānudīrayan vṛddhānudāno vyānasaṅgataḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 7.1]
ūrdhvamāgacchati bhṛśaṃ viruddhāhārasevanāt | [Su, Utt., 49 7.2]
praseko hṛdayotkleśo bhaktasyānabhinandanam | [Su, Utt., 49 8.1]
pūrvarūpaṃ mataṃ chardyā yathāsvaṃ ca vibhāvayet | [Su, Utt., 49 8.2]
pracchardayet phenilamalpamalpaṃ śūlārdito 'bhyarditapārśvapṛṣṭhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 9.1]
śrāntaḥ saghoṣaṃ bahuśaḥ kaṣāyaṃ jīrṇe 'dhikaṃ sānilajā vamistu | [Su, Utt., 49 9.2]
yo 'mlaṃ bhṛśaṃ vā kaṭutiktavaktraḥ pītaṃ saraktaṃ haritaṃ vamedvā | [Su, Utt., 49 10.1]
sadāhacoṣajvaravaktraśoṣo mūrcchānvitaḥ pittanimittajā sā | [Su, Utt., 49 10.2]
yo hṛṣṭaromā madhuraṃ prabhūtaṃ śuklaṃ himaṃ sāndrakaphānuviddham | [Su, Utt., 49 11.1]
abhaktaruggauravasādayukto vamedvamī sā kaphakopajā syāt | [Su, Utt., 49 11.2]
sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bhavanti yasyāṃ sā sarvadoṣaprabhavā matā tu | [Su, Utt., 49 12.1]
bībhatsajā dauhṛdajāmajā ca sātmyaprakopāt kṛmijā ca yā hi | [Su, Utt., 49 12.2]
sā pañcamī tāṃ ca vibhāvayettu doṣocchrayeṇaiva yathoktamādau | [Su, Utt., 49 12.3]
śūlahṛllāsabahulā kṛmijā ca viśeṣataḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 13.1]
kṛmihṛdrogatulyena lakṣaṇena ca lakṣitā | [Su, Utt., 49 13.2]
kṣīṇasyopadravair yuktāṃ sāsṛkpūyāṃ sacandrikām | [Su, Utt., 49 14.1]
chardiṃ prasaktāṃ kuśalo nārabheta cikitsitum | [Su, Utt., 49 14.2]
āmāśayotkleśabhavā hi sarvāstasmāddhitaṃ laṅghanam eva tāsu | [Su, Utt., 49 15.1]
vamīṣu bahudoṣāsu chardanaṃ hitam ucyate | [Su, Utt., 49 16.1]
virecanaṃ vā kurvīta yathādoṣocchrayaṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 49 16.2]
saṃsargaścānupūrveṇa yathāsvaṃ bheṣajāyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 17.1]
laghūni pariśuṣkāṇi sātmyānyannāni cācaret | [Su, Utt., 49 17.2]
yathāsvaṃ ca kaṣāyāṇi jvaraghnāni prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 49 18.1]
hanyāt kṣīraghṛtaṃ pītaṃ chardiṃ pavanasaṃbhavām | [Su, Utt., 49 18.2]
sasaindhavaṃ pibet sarpirvātacchardinivāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 49 19.1]
mudgāmalakayūṣo vā sasarpiṣkaḥ sasaindhavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 19.2]
yavāgūṃ madhumiśrāṃ vā pañcamūlīkṛtāṃ pibet | [Su, Utt., 49 19.3]
pibedvā vyaktasindhūtthaṃ phalāmlaṃ vaiṣkiraṃ rasam | [Su, Utt., 49 20.1]
sukhoṣṇalavaṇaṃ cātra hitaṃ snehavirecanam | [Su, Utt., 49 20.2]
pittopaśamanīyāni pākyāni śiśirāṇi ca | [Su, Utt., 49 21.1]
kaṣāyāṇyupayuktāni ghnanti pittakṛtāṃ vamīm | [Su, Utt., 49 21.2]
śodhanaṃ madhuraiścātra drākṣārasasamāyutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 22.1]
balavatyāṃ praśaṃsanti sarpistailvakam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 49 22.2]
āragvadhādiniryūhaṃ daśāṅgayogam eva vā | [Su, Utt., 49 23.1]
pāyayetātha sakṣaudraṃ kaphajāyāṃ cikitsakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 23.2]
kṛtaṃ guḍūcyā vidhivat kaṣāyaṃ himasaṃjñitam | [Su, Utt., 49 24.1]
tisṛṣvapi bhavet pathyaṃ mākṣikeṇa samanvitam | [Su, Utt., 49 24.2]
bībhatsajāṃ hṛdyatamair dauhṛdīṃ kāṅkṣitaiḥ phalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 25.1]
laṅghanair vamanaiścāmāṃ sātmyaiḥ sātmyaprakopajām | [Su, Utt., 49 25.2]
kṛmihṛdrogavaccāpi kṛmijāṃ sādhayedvamīm | [Su, Utt., 49 26.1]
vitarecca yathādoṣaṃ śastaṃ vidhimanantaram | [Su, Utt., 49 26.2]
dadhittharasasaṃsaktāṃ pippalīṃ mākṣikānvitām | [Su, Utt., 49 27.1]
muhurmuhurnaro līḍhvā chardibhyaḥ pravimucyate | [Su, Utt., 49 27.2]
samākṣikā madhurasā pītā vā taṇḍulāmbunā | [Su, Utt., 49 28.1]
tarpaṇaṃ vā madhuyutaṃ tisṛṇām api bheṣajam | [Su, Utt., 49 28.2]
svayaṃguptāṃ sayaṣṭyāhvāṃ taṇḍulāmbumadhudravām | [Su, Utt., 49 29.1]
pibedyavāgūmathavā siddhāṃ patraiḥ karañjajaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 29.2]
yuktāmlalavaṇāḥ piṣṭāḥ kustumburyo 'thavā hitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 30.1]
taṇḍulāmbuyutaṃ khādet kapitthaṃ tryūṣaṇena vā | [Su, Utt., 49 30.2]
sitācandanamadhvāktaṃ lihyādvā makṣikāśakṛt | [Su, Utt., 49 31.1]
pibet payo 'gnitaptaṃ ca nirvāpya gṛhagodhikām | [Su, Utt., 49 31.2]
sarpiḥ kṣaudrayutān vāpi lājaśaktūn pibettathā | [Su, Utt., 49 32.1]
sarpiḥ kṣaudrasitopetāṃ māgadhīṃ vā lihettathā | [Su, Utt., 49 32.2]
dhātrīrase candanaṃ vā ghṛṣṭaṃ mudgadalāmbunā | [Su, Utt., 49 33.1]
kolāmalakamajjānaṃ lihyādvā trisugandhikam | [Su, Utt., 49 33.2]
sakṣaudrāṃ śālilājānāṃ yavāgūṃ vā pibennaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 34.1]
ghreyāṇyupahareccāpi manoghrāṇasukhāni ca | [Su, Utt., 49 34.2]
jāṅgalāni ca māṃsāni śubhāni pānakāni ca | [Su, Utt., 49 35.1]
bhojanāni vicitrāṇi kuryātsarvāsvatandritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 49 35.2]
{Su, Utt., 50}
athāto hikkāpratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 2.1]
vidāhiguruviṣṭambhirūkṣābhiṣyandibhojanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 3.1]
śītapānāsanasthānarajodhūmānilānalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 3.2]
vyāyāmakarmabhārādhvavegāghātāpatarpaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 4.1]
āmadoṣābhighātastrīkṣayadoṣaprapīḍanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 4.2]
viṣamāśanādhyanaśanaistathā samaśanairapi | [Su, Utt., 50 5.1]
hikkā śvāsaśca kāsaśca nṛṇāṃ samupajāyate | [Su, Utt., 50 5.2]
muhurmuhurvāyurudeti sasvano yakṛtplihāntrāṇi mukhādivākṣipan | [Su, Utt., 50 6.1]
sa ghoṣavānāśu hinastyasūn yatastatastu hikketi bhiṣagbhirucyate | [Su, Utt., 50 6.2]
annajāṃ yamalāṃ kṣudrāṃ gambhīrāṃ mahatīṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 50 7.1]
vāyuḥ kaphenānugataḥ pañca hikkāḥ karoti hi | [Su, Utt., 50 7.2]
mukhaṃ kaṣāyamaratirgauravaṃ kaṇṭhavakṣasoḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 8.1]
pūrvarūpāṇi hikkānāmāṭopo jaṭharasya ca | [Su, Utt., 50 8.2]
tvaramāṇasya cāhāraṃ bhuñjānasyāthavā ghanam | [Su, Utt., 50 9.1]
vāyurannairavastīrṇaḥ kaṭukairardito bhṛśam | [Su, Utt., 50 9.2]
hikkayatyūrdhvago bhūtvā tāṃ vidyādannajāṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 50 10.1]
cireṇa yamalair vegair yā hikkā sampravartate | [Su, Utt., 50 10.2]
kampayantī śirogrīvaṃ yamalāṃ tāṃ vinirdiśet | [Su, Utt., 50 11.1]
vikṛṣṭakālair yā vegair mandaiḥ samabhivartate | [Su, Utt., 50 11.2]
kṣudrikā nāma sā hikkā jatrumūlāt pradhāvitā | [Su, Utt., 50 12.1]
nābhipravṛttā yā hikkā ghorā gambhīranādinī | [Su, Utt., 50 12.2]
śuṣkauṣṭhakaṇṭhajihvāsyaśvāsapārśvarujākarī | [Su, Utt., 50 13.1]
anekopadravayutā gambhīrā nāma sā smṛtā | [Su, Utt., 50 13.2]
marmāṇyāpīḍayantīva satataṃ yā pravartate | [Su, Utt., 50 14.1]
dehamāyamya vegena ghoṣayatyatitṛṣyataḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 14.2]
mahāhikketi sā jñeyā sarvagātraprakampinī | [Su, Utt., 50 14.3]
āyamyate hikkato 'ṅgāni yasya dṛṣṭiścordhvaṃ tāmyate yasya gāḍham | [Su, Utt., 50 15.1]
kṣīṇo 'nnadviṭ kāsate yaśca hikkī tau dvāvantyau varjayeddhikkamānau | [Su, Utt., 50 15.2]
prāṇāyāmodvejanatrāsanāni sūcītodaiḥ saṃbhramaścātra śastaḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 16.1]
yaṣṭyāhvaṃ vā mākṣikeṇāvapīḍe pippalyo vā śarkarācūrṇayuktāḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 16.2]
sarpiḥ koṣṇaṃ kṣīramikṣo raso vā nātikṣīṇe chardanaṃ śāntihetoḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 17.1]
nārīpayaḥpiṣṭamaśuklacandanaṃ ghṛtaṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ ca sasaindhavaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 50 17.2]
cūrṇīkṛtaṃ saindhavamambhasāthavā nihanti hikkāṃ ca hitaṃ ca nasyataḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 18.1]
yuñjyāddhūmaṃ śālaniryāsajātaṃ naipālaṃ vā goviṣāṇodbhavaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 50 18.2]
sarpiḥ snigdhaiścarmavālaiḥ kṛtaṃ vā hikkāsthāne svedanaṃ cāpi kāryam | [Su, Utt., 50 19.1]
kṣaudropetaṃ gairikaṃ kāñcanāhvaṃ lihyādbhasma grāmyasattvāsthijaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 50 19.2]
tadvacchvāvinmeṣagośalyakānāṃ romāṇyantardhūmadagdhāni cātra | [Su, Utt., 50 20.1]
madhvājyāktaṃ barhipatraprasūtamevaṃ bhasmaudumbaraṃ tailvakaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 50 20.2]
svarjikṣāraṃ bījapūrādrasena kṣaudropetaṃ hanti līḍhvāśu hikkām | [Su, Utt., 50 21.1]
sarpiḥsnigdhā ghnanti hikkāṃ yavāgvaḥ koṣṇagrāsāḥ pāyaso vā sukhoṣṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 21.2]
śuṇṭhītoye sādhitaṃ kṣīramājaṃ tadvat pītaṃ śarkarāsaṃyutaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 50 22.1]
ā tṛpter vā sevyamānaṃ nihanyād ghrātaṃ hikkāmāśu mūtraṃ tvajāvyoḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 22.2]
sapūtikīṭaṃ laśunogragandhāhiṅgvabjam ācūrṇya subhāvitaṃ tat | [Su, Utt., 50 23.1]
kṣaudraṃ sitāṃ vāraṇakeśaraṃ ca pibedrasenekṣumadhūkajena | [Su, Utt., 50 23.2]
pibet palaṃ vā lavaṇottamasya dvābhyāṃ palābhyāṃ haviṣaḥ samagram | [Su, Utt., 50 24.1]
harītakīṃ koṣṇajalānupānāṃ pibedghṛtaṃ kṣāramadhūpapannam | [Su, Utt., 50 24.2]
rasaṃ kapitthānmadhupippalībhyāṃ śuktipramāṇaṃ prapibet sukhāya | [Su, Utt., 50 25.1]
kṛṣṇāṃ sitāṃ cāmalakaṃ ca līḍhaṃ saśṛṅgaveraṃ madhunāthavāpi | [Su, Utt., 50 26.1]
kolāsthimajjāñjanalājacūrṇaṃ hikkā nihanyānmadhunāvalīḍham | [Su, Utt., 50 26.2]
pāṭalāyāḥ phalaṃ puṣpaṃ gairikaṃ kaṭurohiṇī | [Su, Utt., 50 27.1]
kharjūramadhyaṃ māgadhyaḥ kāśīśaṃ dadhināma ca | [Su, Utt., 50 27.2]
catvāra ete yogāḥ syuḥ pratipādapradarśitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 50 28.1]
madhudvitīyāḥ kartavyāste hikkāsu vijānatā | [Su, Utt., 50 28.2]
kapotapārāvatalāvaśakaśvadaṃṣṭragodhāvṛṣadaṃśajān rasān | [Su, Utt., 50 29.1]
pibet phalāmlānahimān sasaindhavān snigdhāṃstathaivarṣyamṛgadvijodbhavān | [Su, Utt., 50 29.2]
virecanaṃ pathyatamaṃ sasaindhavaṃ ghṛtaṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ ca sitopalāyutam | [Su, Utt., 50 30.1]
sadāgatāvūrdhvagate 'nuvāsanaṃ vadanti kecicca hitāya hikkinām | [Su, Utt., 50 30.2]
{Su, Utt., 51}
athātaḥ śvāsapratiṣedhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 2]
yaireva kāraṇair hikkā bahubhiḥ sampravartate | [Su, Utt., 51 3.1]
taireva kāraṇaiḥ śvāso ghoro bhavati dehinām | [Su, Utt., 51 3.2]
vihāya prakṛtiṃ vāyuḥ prāṇo 'tha kaphasaṃyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 4.1]
śvāsayatyūrdhvago bhūtvā taṃ śvāsaṃ paricakṣate | [Su, Utt., 51 4.2]
kṣudrakastamakaśchinno mahānūrdhvaśca pañcadhā | [Su, Utt., 51 5.1]
bhidyate sa mahāvyādhiḥ śvāsa eko viśeṣataḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 5.2]
prāgrūpaṃ tasya hṛtpīḍā bhaktadveṣo 'ratiḥ parā | [Su, Utt., 51 6.1]
ānāhaḥ pārśvayoḥ śūlaṃ vairasyaṃ vadanasya ca | [Su, Utt., 51 6.2]
kiṃcidārabhamāṇasya yasya śvāsaḥ pravartate | [Su, Utt., 51 7.1]
niṣaṇṇasyaiti śāntiṃ ca sa kṣudra iti saṃjñitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 7.2]
tṛṭsvedavamathuprāyaḥ kaṇṭhaghurghurikānvitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 8.1]
viśeṣāddurdine tāmyecchvāsaḥ sa tamako mataḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 8.2]
ghoṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ sakāsaḥ sakapho naraḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 9.1]
yaḥ śvasityabalo 'nnadviṭ suptastamakapīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 9.2]
sa śāmyati kaphe hīne svapataśca vivardhate | [Su, Utt., 51 10.1]
mūrcchājvarābhibhūtasya jñeyaḥ pratamakastu saḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 10.2]
ādhmāto dahyamānena bastinā sarujaṃ naraḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 11.1]
sarvaprāṇena vicchinnaṃ śvasyācchinnaṃ tamādiśet | [Su, Utt., 51 11.2]
niḥsaṃjñaḥ pārśvaśūlārtaḥ śuṣkakaṇṭho 'tighoṣavān | [Su, Utt., 51 12.1]
saṃrabdhanetrastvāyamya yaḥ śvasyāt sa mahān smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 12.2]
marmasvāyamyamāneṣu śvasanmūḍho muhuśca yaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 13.1]
ūrdhvaprekṣī hataravastamūrdhvaśvāsamādiśet | [Su, Utt., 51 13.2]
kṣudraḥ sādhyatamasteṣāṃ tamakaḥ kṛcchra ucyate | [Su, Utt., 51 14.1]
trayaḥ śvāsā na sidhyanti tamako durbalasya ca | [Su, Utt., 51 14.2]
snehavastiṃ vinā kecidūrdhvaṃ cādhaśca śodhanam | [Su, Utt., 51 15.1]
mṛdu prāṇavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śvāsināmādiśanti hi | [Su, Utt., 51 15.2]
śvāse kāse ca hikkāyāṃ hṛdroge cāpi pūjitam | [Su, Utt., 51 16.1]
ghṛtaṃ purāṇaṃ saṃsiddhamabhayāviḍarāmaṭhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 16.2]
sauvarcalābhayābilvaiḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vānavaṃ ghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 51 17.1]
pippalyādipratīvāpaṃ siddhaṃ vā prathame gaṇe | [Su, Utt., 51 17.2]
sapañcalavaṇaṃ sarpiḥ śvāsakāsau vyapohati | [Su, Utt., 51 18.1]
hiṃsrāviḍaṅgapūtīkatriphalāvyoṣacitrakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 18.2]
dvikṣīraṃ sādhitaṃ sarpiścaturguṇajalāplutam | [Su, Utt., 51 19.1]
kolamātraiḥ pibettaddhi śvāsakāsau vyapohati | [Su, Utt., 51 19.2]
arśāṃsyarocakaṃ gulmaṃ śakṛdbhedaṃ kṣayaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 51 20.1]
kṛtsne vṛṣakaṣāye vā pacet sarpiścaturguṇe | [Su, Utt., 51 20.2]
tanmūlakusumāvāpaṃ śītaṃ kṣaudreṇa yojayet | [Su, Utt., 51 21.1]
śṛṅgīmadhūlikābhārgīśuṇṭhītārkṣyasitāmbudaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 21.2]
saharidraiḥ sayaṣṭyāhvaiḥ samairāvāpya yogataḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 22.1]
ghṛtaprasthaṃ paceddhīmān śītatoye caturguṇe | [Su, Utt., 51 22.2]
śvāsaṃ kāsaṃ tathā hikkāṃ sarpiretanniyacchati | [Su, Utt., 51 23.1]
suvahā kālikā bhārgī śukākhyā naiculaṃ phalam | [Su, Utt., 51 23.2]
kākādanī śṛṅgaveraṃ varṣābhūr bṛhatīdvayam | [Su, Utt., 51 24.1]
kolamātrair ghṛtaprasthaṃ pacedebhir jaladvikam | [Su, Utt., 51 24.2]
kaṭūṣṇaṃ pītametaddhi śvāsāmayavināśanam | [Su, Utt., 51 25.1]
sauvarcalayavakṣārakaṭukāvyoṣacitrakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 25.2]
vacābhayāviḍaṅgaiśca sādhitaṃ śvāsaśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 51 26.1]
gopavallyudake siddhaṃ syādanyaddviguṇe ghṛtam | [Su, Utt., 51 26.2]
pañcaitāni havīṃṣyāhurbhiṣajaḥ śvāsakāsayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 27.1]
tālīśatāmalakyugrājīvantīkuṣṭhasaindhavaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 27.2]
bilvapuṣkarabhūtīkasauvarcalakaṇāgnibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 28.1]
pathyātejovatīyuktaiḥ sarpirjalacaturguṇam | [Su, Utt., 51 28.2]
hiṅgupādayutaṃ siddhaṃ sarvaśvāsaharaṃ param | [Su, Utt., 51 29.1]
vāsāghṛtaṃ ṣaṭpalaṃ vā ghṛtaṃ cātra hitaṃ bhavet | [Su, Utt., 51 29.2]
tailaṃ daśaguṇe siddhaṃ bhṛṅgarājarase śubhe | [Su, Utt., 51 30.1]
sevyamānaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śvāsakāsau vyapohati | [Su, Utt., 51 30.2]
phalāmlā viṣkirarasāḥ snigdhāḥ pravyaktasaindhavāḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 31.1]
eṇādīnāṃ śirobhir vā kaulatthā vā susaṃskṛtāḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 31.2]
hanyuḥ śvāsaṃ ca kāsaṃ ca saṃskṛtāni payāṃsi ca | [Su, Utt., 51 32.1]
timirasya ca bījāni karkaṭākhyā ca cūrṇitā | [Su, Utt., 51 32.2]
durālabhātha pippalyaḥ kaṭukākhyā harītakī | [Su, Utt., 51 33.1]
śvāvinmayūraromāṇi kolā māgadhikākaṇāḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 33.2]
bhārgītvak śṛṅgaveraṃ ca śarkarā śallakāṅgajam | [Su, Utt., 51 34.1]
nṛttakauṇḍakabījāni cūrṇitāni tu kevalam | [Su, Utt., 51 34.2]
pañca ślokārdhikāstvete lehā ye samyagīritāḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 35.1]
sarpirmadhubhyāṃ te lehyāḥ kāsaśvāsārditair naraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 35.2]
saptacchadasya puṣpāṇi pippalīścāpi mastunā | [Su, Utt., 51 36.1]
pibet saṃcūrṇya madhunā dhānāścāpyatha bhakṣayet | [Su, Utt., 51 36.2]
arkāṅkurair bhāvitānāṃ yavānāṃ sādhvanekaśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 37.1]
tarpaṇaṃ vā pibedeṣāṃ sakṣaudraṃ śvāsapīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 37.2]
śirīṣakadalīkundapuṣpaṃ māgadhikāyutam | [Su, Utt., 51 38.1]
taṇḍulāmbuyutaṃ pītvā jayecchvāsān aśeṣataḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 38.2]
kolamajjāṃ tālamūlamṛṣyacarmamasīm api | [Su, Utt., 51 39.1]
lihyāt kṣaudreṇa bhārgīṃ vā sarpirmadhusamāyutām | [Su, Utt., 51 39.2]
nīcaiḥ kadambabījaṃ vā sakṣaudraṃ taṇḍulāmbunā | [Su, Utt., 51 40.1]
drākṣāṃ harītakīṃ kṛṣṇāṃ karkaṭākhyāṃ durālabhām | [Su, Utt., 51 40.2]
sarpirmadhubhyāṃ vilihan hanti śvāsān sudāruṇān | [Su, Utt., 51 41.1]
haridrāṃ maricaṃ drākṣāṃ guḍaṃ rāsnāṃ kaṇāṃ śaṭīm | [Su, Utt., 51 41.2]
lihyāttailena tulyāni śvāsārto hitabhojanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 42.1]
gavāṃ purīṣasvarasaṃ madhusarpiḥ kaṇāyutam | [Su, Utt., 51 42.2]
lihyācchvāseṣu kāseṣu vājināṃ vā śakṛdrasam | [Su, Utt., 51 43.1]
pāṇḍurogeṣu śotheṣu ye yogāḥ saṃprakīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 43.2]
śvāsakāsāpahāste 'pi kāsaghnā ye ca kīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 44.1]
bhārgītvak tryūṣaṇaṃ tailaṃ haridrāṃ kaṭurohiṇīm | [Su, Utt., 51 44.2]
pippalīṃ maricaṃ caṇḍāṃ gośakṛdrasam eva ca | [Su, Utt., 51 45.1]
talakoṭasya bījeṣu pacedutkārikāṃ śubhām | [Su, Utt., 51 45.2]
sevyamānā nihantyeṣā śvāsānāśu sudustarān | [Su, Utt., 51 46.1]
purāṇasarpiḥ pippalyaḥ kaulatthā jāṅgalā rasāḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 46.2]
surā sauvīrakaṃ hiṅgu mātuluṅgaraso madhu | [Su, Utt., 51 47.1]
drākṣāmalakabilvāni śastāni śvāsihikkinām | [Su, Utt., 51 47.2]
śvāsahikkāparigataṃ snigdhaiḥ svedairupācaret | [Su, Utt., 51 48.1]
āktaṃ lavaṇatailābhyāṃ tairasya grathitaḥ kaphaḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 48.2]
khastho vilayanaṃ yāti mārutaśca praśāmyati | [Su, Utt., 51 49.1]
svinnaṃ jñātvā tataścaiva bhojayitvā rasaudanam | [Su, Utt., 51 49.2]
vātaśleṣmavibandhe vā bhiṣag dhūmaṃ prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 51 50.1]
manaḥśilādevadāruharidrāchadanāmiṣaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 50.2]
lākṣorubūkamūlaiśca kṛtvā vartīrvidhānataḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 51.1]
sarpiryavamadhūcchiṣṭaśālaniryāsajaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 51 51.2]
śṛṅgavālakhurasnāyutvak samastaṃ gavām api | [Su, Utt., 51 52.1]
turuṣkaśallakīnāṃ ca gugguloḥ padmakasya ca | [Su, Utt., 51 52.2]
ete sarve sasarpiṣkā dhūmāḥ kāryā vijānatā | [Su, Utt., 51 53.1]
balīyasi kaphagraste vamanaṃ savirecanam | [Su, Utt., 51 53.2]
durbale caiva rūkṣe ca tarpaṇaṃ hitam ucyate | [Su, Utt., 51 54.1]
jāṅgalorabhrajair māṃsairānūpair vā susaṃskṛtaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 51 54.2]
nidigdhikāṃ cāmalakapramāṇāṃ hiṅgvardhayuktāṃ madhunā suyuktām | [Su, Utt., 51 55.1]
lihannaraḥ śvāsanipīḍito hi śvāsaṃ jayatyeva balāttryaheṇa | [Su, Utt., 51 55.2]
yathāgniriddhaḥ pavanānuviddho vajraṃ yathā vā surarājamuktam | [Su, Utt., 51 56.1]
rogāstathaite khalu durnivārāḥ śvāsaśca kāsaśca vilambikā ca | [Su, Utt., 51 56.2]
{Su, Utt., 52}
athātaḥ kāsapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 2]
uktā ye hetavo nṝṇāṃ rogayoḥ śvāsahikkayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 3.1]
kāsasyāpi ca vijñeyāsta evotpattihetavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 3.2]
dhūmopaghātādrajasastathaiva vyāyāmarūkṣānnaniṣevaṇācca | [Su, Utt., 52 4.1]
vimārgagatvād api bhojanasya vegāvarodhāt kṣavathostathaiva | [Su, Utt., 52 4.2]
prāṇo hyudānānugataḥ praduṣṭaḥ saṃbhinnakāṃsyasvanatulyaghoṣaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 5.1]
nireti vaktrāt sahasā sadoṣaḥ kāsaḥ sa vidvadbhirudāhṛtastu | [Su, Utt., 52 5.2]
sa vātapittaprabhavaḥ kaphācca kṣatāttathānyaḥ kṣayajo 'paraśca | [Su, Utt., 52 6.1]
pañcaprakāraḥ kathito bhiṣagbhir vivardhito yakṣmavikārakṛt syāt | [Su, Utt., 52 6.2]
bhaviṣyatastasya tu kaṇṭhakaṇḍūrbhojyoparodho galatālulepaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 7.1]
svaśabdavaiṣamyamarocako 'gnisādaśca liṅgāni bhavantyamūni | [Su, Utt., 52 7.2]
hṛcchaṅkhamūrdhodarapārśvaśūlī kṣāmānanaḥ kṣīṇabalasvaraujāḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 8.1]
prasaktam antaḥkapham īraṇena kāsettu śuṣkaṃ svarabhedayuktaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 8.2]
urovidāhajvaravaktraśoṣairabhyarditastiktamukhastṛṣārtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 9.1]
pittena pītāni vamet kaṭūni kāset sa pāṇḍuḥ paridahyamānaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 9.2]
pralipyamānena mukhena sīdan śirorujārtaḥ kaphapūrṇadehaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 10.1]
abhaktaruggauravasādayuktaḥ kāseta nā sāndrakaphaṃ kaphena | [Su, Utt., 52 10.2]
vakṣo 'timātraṃ vihataṃ tu yasya vyāyāmabhārādhyayanābhighātaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 11.1]
viśliṣṭavakṣāḥ sa naraḥ saraktaṃ ṣṭhīvatyabhīkṣṇaṃ kṣatajaṃ tamāhuḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 11.2]
sa gātraśūlajvaradāhamohān prāṇakṣayaṃ copalabheta kāsī | [Su, Utt., 52 12.1]
śuṣyan viniṣṭhīvati durbalastu prakṣīṇamāṃso rudhiraṃ sapūyam | [Su, Utt., 52 12.2]
sasarvaliṅgaṃ bhṛśaduścikitsyaṃ cikitsitajñāḥ kṣayajaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 52 13.1]
vṛddhatvamāsādya bhavettu yo vai yāpyaṃ tamāhurbhiṣajastu kāsam | [Su, Utt., 52 13.2]
śṛṅgīvacākaṭphalakattṛṇābdadhānyābhayābhārgyamarāhvaviśvam | [Su, Utt., 52 14.1]
uṣṇāmbunā hiṅguyutaṃ tu pītvā baddhāsyamapyāśu jahāti kāsam | [Su, Utt., 52 14.2]
phalatrikavyoṣaviḍaṅgaśṛṅgīrāsnāvacāpadmakadevakāṣṭhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 15.1]
lehaḥ samaiḥ kṣaudrasitāghṛtāktaḥ kāsaṃ nihanyādacirādudīrṇam | [Su, Utt., 52 15.2]
pathyāṃ sitāmāmalakāni lājāṃ samāgadhīṃ cāpi vicūrṇya śuṇṭhīm | [Su, Utt., 52 16.1]
sarpirmadhubhyāṃ vilihīta kāsī sasaindhavāṃ voṣṇajalena kṛṣṇām | [Su, Utt., 52 16.2]
khādedguḍaṃ nāgarapippalībhyāṃ drākṣāṃ ca sarpirmadhunāvalihyāt | [Su, Utt., 52 17.1]
drākṣāṃ sitāṃ māgadhikāṃ ca tulyāṃ saśṛṅgaveraṃ madhukaṃ tugāṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 52 17.2]
lihyādghṛtakṣaudrayutāṃ samāṃśāṃ sitopalāṃ vā maricāṃśayuktām | [Su, Utt., 52 18.1]
dhātrīkaṇāviśvasitopalāśca saṃcūrṇya maṇḍena pibecca dadhnaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 18.2]
hareṇukāṃ māgadhikāṃ ca tulyāṃ dadhnā pibet kāsagadābhibhūtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 19.1]
ubhe haridre suradāruśuṇṭhīṃ gāyatrisāraṃ ca pibet samāṃśam | [Su, Utt., 52 19.2]
bastasya mūtreṇa sukhāmbunā vā dantīṃ dravantīṃ ca satilvakākhyām | [Su, Utt., 52 20.1]
bhṛṣṭāni sarpīṃṣyatha bādarāṇi khādet palāśāni sasaindhavāni | [Su, Utt., 52 20.2]
kolapramāṇaṃ prapibeddhi hiṅgu sauvīrakeṇāmlarasena vāpi | [Su, Utt., 52 21.1]
kṣaudreṇa lihyānmaricāni vāpi bhārgīvacāhiṅgukṛtā ca vartiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 21.2]
dhūme praśastā ghṛtasamprayuktā veṇutvagelālavaṇaiḥ kṛtā vā | [Su, Utt., 52 22.1]
musteṅgudītvaṅmadhukāhvamāṃsīmanaḥśilālaiś chagalāmbupiṣṭaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 22.2]
vidhāya vartīśca payo 'nupānaṃ dhūmaṃ pibedvātabalāsakāsī | [Su, Utt., 52 23.1]
pibecca sīdhuṃ maricānvitaṃ vā tenāśu kāsaṃ jayati prasahya | [Su, Utt., 52 23.2]
drākṣāmbumañjiṣṭhapurāhvayābhiḥ kṣīraṃ śṛtaṃ mākṣikasamprayuktam | [Su, Utt., 52 24.1]
nidigdhikānāgarapippalībhiḥ khādecca mudgānmadhunā susiddhān | [Su, Utt., 52 24.2]
utkārikāṃ sarpiṣi nāgarāḍhyāṃ paktvā samūlaistruṭikolapatraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 25.1]
ebhir niṣeveta kṛtāṃ ca peyāṃ tanvīṃ suśītāṃ madhunā vimiśrām | [Su, Utt., 52 25.2]
yat plīhni sarpirvihitaṃ ṣaḍaṅgaṃ tadvātakāsaṃ jayati prasahya | [Su, Utt., 52 26.1]
vidārigandhādikṛtaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā rasena vā vāsakajena pakvam | [Su, Utt., 52 26.2]
virecanaṃ snaihikamatra coktamāsthāpanaṃ cāpyanuvāsanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 52 27.1]
dhūmaṃ pibet snaihikamapramattaḥ pibet sukhoṣṇaṃ ghṛtam eva cātra | [Su, Utt., 52 27.2]
hitā yavāgvaśca raseṣu siddhāḥ payāṃsi lehāḥ saghṛtāstathaiva | [Su, Utt., 52 28.1]
pracchardanaṃ kāyaśirovirekāstathaiva dhūmāḥ kavalagrahāśca | [Su, Utt., 52 28.2]
uṣṇāśca lehāḥ kaṭukā nihanyuḥ kaphaṃ viśeṣeṇa viśoṣaṇaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 52 29.1]
kaṭutrikaṃ cāpi vadanti pathyaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṛmighnasvarase vipakvam | [Su, Utt., 52 29.2]
nirguṇḍipatrasvarase ca pakvaṃ sarpiḥ kaphotthaṃ vinihanti kāsam | [Su, Utt., 52 30.1]
pāṭhāviḍavyoṣaviḍaṅgasindhutrikaṇṭarāsnāhutabhugbalābhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 30.2]
śṛṅgīvacāmbhodharadevadārudurālabhābhārgyabhayāśaṭībhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 31.1]
samyagvipakvaṃ dviguṇena sarpirnidigdhikāyāḥ svarasena caitat | [Su, Utt., 52 31.2]
śvāsāgnisādasvarabhedabhinnānnihantyudīrṇānapi pañca kāsān | [Su, Utt., 52 32.1]
vidārigandhotpalasārivādīn niṣkvāthya vargaṃ madhuraṃ ca kṛtsnam | [Su, Utt., 52 32.2]
ghṛtaṃ pacedikṣurasāmbudugdhaiḥ kākolivarge ca saśarkaraṃ tat | [Su, Utt., 52 33.1]
prātaḥ pibet pittakṛte ca kāse ratiprasūte kṣataje ca kāse | [Su, Utt., 52 33.2]
kharjūrabhārgīmagadhāpriyālamadhūlikailāmalakaiḥ samāṃśaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 34.1]
cūrṇaṃ sitākṣaudraghṛtapragāḍhaṃ trīn hanti kāsānupayujyamānam | [Su, Utt., 52 34.2]
raktāharidrāñjanavahnipāṭhāmūrvopakulyā vilihet samāṃśāḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 35.1]
kṣaudreṇa kāse kṣataje kṣayotthe pibedghṛtaṃ cekṣurase vipakvam | [Su, Utt., 52 35.2]
cūrṇaṃ pibedāmalakasya vāpi kṣīreṇa pakvaṃ saghṛtaṃ hitāśī | [Su, Utt., 52 36.1]
cūrṇāni godhūmayavodbhavāni kākolivargaśca kṛtaḥ susūkṣmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 36.2]
kāseṣu peyastriṣu kāsavadbhiḥ kṣīreṇa sakṣaudraghṛtena vāpi | [Su, Utt., 52 37.1]
guḍodakaṃ vā kvathitaṃ pibeddhi kṣaudreṇa śītaṃ maricopadaṃśam | [Su, Utt., 52 37.2]
prasthatrayeṇāmalakīrasasya śuddhasya dattvārdhatulāṃ guḍasya | [Su, Utt., 52 38.1]
cūrṇīkṛtair granthikacavyajīravyoṣebhakṛṣṇāhapuṣājamodaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 38.2]
viḍaṅgasindhutriphalāyavānīpāṭhāgnidhānyaiśca picupramāṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 39.1]
dattvā trivṛccūrṇapalāni cāṣṭāvaṣṭau ca tailasya pacedyathāvat | [Su, Utt., 52 39.2]
taṃ bhakṣayedakṣaphalapramāṇaṃ yatheṣṭaceṣṭastrisugandhiyuktam | [Su, Utt., 52 40.1]
anena sarve grahaṇīvikārāḥ saśvāsakāsasvarabhedaśothāḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 40.2]
śāmyanti cāyaṃ ciramantaragnerhatasya puṃstvasya ca vṛddhihetuḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 41.1]
strīṇāṃ ca vandhyāmayanāśanaḥ syāt kalyāṇako nāma guḍaḥ pratītaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 41.2]
dvipañcamūlebhakaṇātmaguptābhārgīśaṭīpuṣkaramūlaviśvān | [Su, Utt., 52 42.1]
pāṭhāmṛtāgranthikaśaṅkhapuṣpīrāsnāgnyapāmārgabalāyavāsān | [Su, Utt., 52 42.2]
dvipālikān nyasya yavāḍhakaṃ ca harītakīnāṃ ca śataṃ gurūṇām | [Su, Utt., 52 43.1]
droṇe jalasyāḍhakasaṃyute ca kvāthe kṛte pūtacaturthabhāge | [Su, Utt., 52 43.2]
pacettulāṃ śuddhaguḍasya dattvā pṛthak ca tailāt kuḍavaṃ ghṛtācca | [Su, Utt., 52 44.1]
cūrṇaṃ ca tāvanmagadhodbhavāyā deyaṃ ca tasminmadhu siddhaśīte | [Su, Utt., 52 44.2]
rasāyanāt karṣamato vilihyāddve cābhaye nityamathāśu hanyāt | [Su, Utt., 52 45.1]
tadrājayakṣmagrahaṇīpradoṣaśophāgnimāndyasvarabhedakāsān | [Su, Utt., 52 45.2]
pāṇḍvāmayaśvāsaśirovikārān hṛdrogahikkāviṣamajvarāṃśca | [Su, Utt., 52 46.1]
medhābalotsāhamatipradaṃ ca cakāra caitadbhagavānagastyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 52 46.2]
kulīraśuktīcaṭakaiṇalāvānniṣkvāthya vargaṃ madhuraṃ ca kṛtsnam | [Su, Utt., 52 47.1]
pacedghṛtaṃ tattu niṣevyamāṇaṃ hanyāt kṣatotthaṃ kṣayajaṃ ca kāsam | [Su, Utt., 52 47.2]
śatāvarīnāgabalāvipakvaṃ ghṛtaṃ vidheyaṃ ca hitāya kāsinām | [Su, Utt., 52 47.3]
{Su, Utt., 53}
athātaḥ svarabhedapratiṣedham adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 2]
atyuccabhāṣaṇaviṣādhyayanātigītaśītādibhiḥ prakupitāḥ pavanādayastu | [Su, Utt., 53 3.1]
srotaḥsu te svaravaheṣu gatāḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ hanyuḥ svaraṃ bhavati cāpi hi ṣaḍvidhaḥ saḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 3.2]
vātena kṛṣṇanayanānanamūtravarcā bhinnaṃ śanair vadati gadgadavat svaraṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 53 4.1]
pittena pītavadanākṣipurīṣamūtro brūyādgalena paridāhasamanvitena | [Su, Utt., 53 4.2]
kṛcchrāt kaphena satataṃ kapharuddhakaṇṭho mandaṃ śanair vadati cāpi divā viśeṣaḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 5.1]
sarvātmake bhavati sarvavikārasaṃpadavyaktatā ca vacasastamasādhyamāhuḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 5.2]
dhūpyeta vāk kṣayakṛte kṣayamāpnuyācca vāgeṣa cāpi hatavāk parivarjanīyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 6.1]
antargalaṃ svaramalakṣyapadaṃ cireṇa medaścayādvadati digdhagalauṣṭhatāluḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 6.2]
kṣīṇasya vṛddhasya kṛśasya cāpi cirotthito yaśca sahopajātaḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 7.1]
medasvinaḥ sarvasamudbhavaśca svarāmayo yo na sa siddhimeti | [Su, Utt., 53 7.2]
snigdhān svarāturanarānapakṛṣṭadoṣān nyāyena tān vamanarecanabastibhiśca | [Su, Utt., 53 8.1]
nasyāvapīḍamukhadhāvanadhūmalehaiḥ sampādayecca vividhaiḥ kavalagrahaiśca | [Su, Utt., 53 8.2]
yaḥ śvāsakāsavidhirādita eva coktastaṃ cāpyaśeṣamavatārayituṃ yateta | [Su, Utt., 53 9.1]
vaiśeṣikaṃ ca vidhimūrdhvamato vadāmi taṃ vai svarāturahitaṃ nikhilaṃ nibodha | [Su, Utt., 53 9.2]
svaropaghāte 'nilaje bhuktopari ghṛtaṃ pibet | [Su, Utt., 53 10.1]
kāsamardakavārtākamārkavasvarase śṛtam | [Su, Utt., 53 10.2]
pītaṃ ghṛtaṃ hantyanilaṃ siddhamārtagale rase | [Su, Utt., 53 11.1]
yavakṣārājamodābhyāṃ citrakāmalakeṣu vā | [Su, Utt., 53 11.2]
devadārvagnikābhyāṃ vā siddham ājaṃ samākṣikam | [Su, Utt., 53 12.1]
sukhodakānupāno vā sasarpiṣko guḍaudanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 12.2]
kṣīrānupānaṃ pitte tu pibet sarpiratandritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 13.1]
aśnīyācca sasarpiṣkaṃ yaṣṭīmadhukapāyasam | [Su, Utt., 53 13.2]
lihyānmadhurakāṇāṃ vā cūrṇaṃ madhughṛtāplutam | [Su, Utt., 53 14.1]
śatāvarīcūrṇayogaṃ balācūrṇamathāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 53 14.2]
pibet kaṭūni mūtreṇa kaphaje svarasaṃkṣaye | [Su, Utt., 53 15.1]
lihyādvā madhutailābhyāṃ bhuktvā khādet kaṭūni vā | [Su, Utt., 53 15.2]
svaropaghāte medoje kaphavadvidhiriṣyate | [Su, Utt., 53 16.1]
sarvaje kṣayaje cāpi pratyākhyāyācaret kriyām | [Su, Utt., 53 16.2]
śarkarāmadhumiśrāṇi śṛtāni madhuraiḥ saha | [Su, Utt., 53 17.1]
pibet payāṃsi yasyoccair vadato 'bhihataḥ svaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 53 17.2]
{Su, Utt., 54}
athātaḥ kṛmirogapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 54 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 54 2.1]

duṣṭaṃ tu bhuktaṃ kaphamārutābhyāṃ pravartate nordhvamadhaśca yasya | [Su, Utt., 56 9.1]
vilambikāṃ tāṃ bhṛśaduścikitsyāmācakṣate śāstravidaḥ purāṇāḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 9.2]
yatrasthamāmaṃ virujet tam eva deśaṃ viśeṣeṇa vikārajātaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 10.1]
doṣeṇa yenāvatataṃ svaliṅgaistaṃ lakṣayedāmasamudbhavaiśca | [Su, Utt., 56 10.2]
yaḥ śyāvadantauṣṭhanakho 'lpasaṃjñaśchardyardito 'bhyantarayātanetraḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 11.1]
kṣāmasvaraḥ sarvavimuktasandhiryāyānnaraḥ so 'punarāgamāya | [Su, Utt., 56 11.2]
sādhyāsu pārṣṇyor dahanaṃ praśastam agnipratāpo vamanaṃ ca tīkṣṇam | [Su, Utt., 56 12.1]
pakve tato 'nne tu vilaṅghanaṃ syāt saṃpācanaṃ cāpi virecanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 56 12.2]
viśuddhadehasya hi sadya eva mūrcchātisārādirupaiti śāntim | [Su, Utt., 56 13.1]
āsthāpanaṃ cāpi vadanti pathyaṃ sarvāsu yogānaparānnibodha | [Su, Utt., 56 13.2]
pathyāvacāhiṅgukaliṅgagṛñjasauvarcalaiḥ sātiviṣaiśca cūrṇam | [Su, Utt., 56 14.1]
sukhāmbupītaṃ vinihantyajīrṇaṃ śūlaṃ visūcīmaruciṃ ca sadyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 14.2]
kṣārāgadaṃ vā lavaṇaṃ viṣaṃ vā guḍapragāḍhānatha sarṣapān vā | [Su, Utt., 56 15.1]
amlena vā saindhavahiṅguyuktau sabījapūrṇau saghṛtau trivargau | [Su, Utt., 56 15.2]
kaṭutrikaṃ vā lavaṇairupetaṃ pibet snuhīkṣīravimiśritaṃ tu | [Su, Utt., 56 16.1]
kalyāṇakaṃ vā lavaṇaṃ pibettu yaduktam ādāvanilāmayeṣu | [Su, Utt., 56 16.2]
kṛṣṇājamodakṣavakāṇi vāpi tulyau pibedvā magadhānikumbhau | [Su, Utt., 56 17.1]
dantīyutaṃ vā magadhodbhavānāṃ kalkaṃ pibet koṣavatīrasena | [Su, Utt., 56 17.2]
uṣṇābhir adbhir magadhodbhavānāṃ kalkaṃ pibennāgarakalkayuktam | [Su, Utt., 56 18.1]
vyoṣaṃ karañjasya phalaṃ haridre mūlaṃ samaṃ cāpyatha mātuluṅgyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 18.2]
chāyāviśuṣkā guṭikāḥ kṛtāstā hanyurvisūcīṃ nayanāñjanena | [Su, Utt., 56 19.1]
suvāmitaṃ sādhuvirecitaṃ vā sulaṅghitaṃ vā manujaṃ viditvā | [Su, Utt., 56 19.2]
peyādibhir dīpanapācanīyaiḥ samyakkṣudhārtaṃ samupakrameta | [Su, Utt., 56 20.1]
āmaṃ śakṛdvā nicitaṃ krameṇa bhūyo vibaddhaṃ viguṇānilena | [Su, Utt., 56 20.2]
pravartamānaṃ na yathāsvamenaṃ vikāramānāhamudāharanti | [Su, Utt., 56 21.1]
tasmin bhavantyāmasamudbhave tu tṛṣṇāpratiśyāyaśirovidāhāḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 21.2]
āmāśaye śūlamatho gurutvaṃ hṛllāsa udgāravighātanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 56 22.1]
stambhaḥ kaṭīpṛṣṭhapurīṣamūtre śūlo 'tha mūrcchā sa śakṛdvamecca | [Su, Utt., 56 22.2]
śvāsaśca pakvāśayaje bhavanti liṅgāni cātrālasakodbhavāni | [Su, Utt., 56 23.1]
āmodbhave vāntam upakrameta saṃsargabhaktakramadīpanīyaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 23.2]
athetaraṃ yo na śakṛdvamettamāmaṃ jayet svedanapācanaiśca | [Su, Utt., 56 24.1]
visūcikāyāṃ parikīrtitāni dravyāṇi vairecanikāni yāni | [Su, Utt., 56 24.2]
tānyeva vartīr viraced vicūrṇya mahiṣyajāvībhagavāṃ tu mūtraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 56 25.1]
svinnasya pāyau viniveśya tāśca cūrṇāni caiṣāṃ pradhamettu nāḍyā | [Su, Utt., 56 25.2]
mūtreṣu saṃsādhya yathāvidhānaṃ dravyāṇi yānyūrdhvamadhaśca yānti | [Su, Utt., 56 26.1]
kvāthena tenāśu nirūhayecca mūtrārdhayuktena samākṣikeṇa | [Su, Utt., 56 26.2]
tribhaṇḍiyuktaṃ lavaṇaprakuñcaṃ dattvā viriktakramamācarecca | [Su, Utt., 56 27.1]
eṣveva tailena ca sādhitena prāptaṃ yadi syādanuvāsayecca | [Su, Utt., 56 27.2]
{Su, Utt., 57}
athāto 'rocakapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 57 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 57 2]
doṣaiḥ pṛthak saha ca cittaviparyayācca bhaktāyaneṣu hṛdi cāvatate pragāḍham | [Su, Utt., 57 3.1]
nānne rucirbhavati taṃ bhiṣajo vikāraṃ bhaktopaghātamiha pañcavidhaṃ vadanti | [Su, Utt., 57 3.2]
hṛcchūlapīḍanayutaṃ virasānanatvaṃ vātātmake bhavati liṅgamarocake tu | [Su, Utt., 57 4.1]
hṛddāhacoṣabahutā mukhatiktatā ca mūrcchā satṛḍ bhavati pittakṛte tathaiva | [Su, Utt., 57 4.2]
kaṇḍūgurutvakaphasaṃsravasādatandrāḥ śleṣmātmake madhuramāsyamarocake tu | [Su, Utt., 57 5.1]
sarvātmake pavanapittakaphā bahūni rūpāṇyathāsya hṛdaye samudīrayanti | [Su, Utt., 57 5.2]
saṃrāgaśokabhayaviplutacetasastu cintākṛto bhavati so 'śucidarśanācca | [Su, Utt., 57 6.1]
vāte vacāmbuvamanaṃ kṛtavān pibecca snehaiḥ surābhirathavoṣṇajalena cūrṇam | [Su, Utt., 57 6.2]
kṛṣṇāviḍaṅgayavabhasmahareṇubhārgīrāsnailahiṅgulavaṇottamanāgarāṇām | [Su, Utt., 57 7.1]
pitte guḍāmbumadhurair vamanaṃ praśastaṃ snehaḥ sasaindhavasitāmadhusarpiriṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 57 7.2]
nimbāmbuvāmitavataḥ kaphaje 'nupānaṃ rājadrumāmbu madhunā tu sadīpyakaṃ syāt | [Su, Utt., 57 8.1]
cūrṇaṃ yaduktamathavānilaje tadeva sarvaiśca sarvakṛtamevam upakrameta | [Su, Utt., 57 8.2]
drākṣāpaṭolaviḍavetrakarīranimbamūrvābhayākṣabadarāmalakendravṛkṣaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 57 9.1]
bījaiḥ karañjanṛpavṛkṣabhavaiśca piṣṭair lehaṃ pacet surabhimūtrayutaṃ yathāvat | [Su, Utt., 57 9.2]
mustāṃ vacāṃ trikaṭukaṃ rajanīdvayaṃ ca bhārgīṃ ca kuṣṭhamatha nirdahanīṃ ca piṣṭvā | [Su, Utt., 57 10.1]
mūtre 'vije dviradamūtrayute pacedvā pāṭhāṃ tugāmativiṣāṃ rajanīṃ ca mukhyām | [Su, Utt., 57 10.2]
maṇḍūkimarkamamṛtāṃ ca salāṅgalākhyāṃ mūtre pacettu mahiṣasya vidhānavidvā | [Su, Utt., 57 11.1]
etānna santi caturo lihatastu lehān gulmāruciśvasanakaṇṭhahṛdāmayāśca | [Su, Utt., 57 11.2]
sātmyān svadeśaracitān vividhāṃśca bhakṣyān pānāni mūlaphalaṣāḍavarāgayogān | [Su, Utt., 57 12.1]
adyādrasāṃśca vividhān vividhaiḥ prakārair bhuñjīta cāpi laghurūkṣamanaḥsukhāni | [Su, Utt., 57 12.2]
āsthāpanaṃ vidhivadatra virecanaṃ ca kuryānmṛdūni śirasaśca virecanāni | [Su, Utt., 57 13.1]
trīṇyūṣaṇāni rajanītriphalāyutāni cūrṇīkṛtāni yavaśūkavimiśritāni | [Su, Utt., 57 13.2]
kṣaudrāyutāni vitarenmukhabodhanārthamanyāni tiktakaṭukāni ca bheṣajāni | [Su, Utt., 57 14.1]
mustādirājataruvargadaśāṅgasiddhaiḥ kvāthair jayenmadhuyutair vividhaiśca lehaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 57 14.2]
mūtrāsavair guḍakṛtaiśca tathā tvariṣṭaiḥ kṣārāsavaiśca madhumādhavatulyagandhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 57 15.1]
syādeṣa eva kaphavātahate vidhiśca śāntiṃ gate hutabhuji praśamāya tasya | [Su, Utt., 57 15.2]
icchābhighātabhayaśokahate 'ntaragnau bhāvān bhavāya vitaret khalu śakyarūpān | [Su, Utt., 57 16.1]
artheṣu cāpyapaciteṣu punarbhavāya paurāṇikaiḥ śrutiśatairanumānayettam | [Su, Utt., 57 16.2]
dainyaṃ gate manasi bodhanamatra śastaṃ yadyat priyaṃ tadupasevyamarocake tu | [Su, Utt., 57 17.1]
{Su, Utt., 58}
athāto mūtrāghātapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 2]
vātakuṇḍalikāṣṭhīlā vātavastistathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 58 3.1]
mūtrātītaḥ sajaṭharo mūtrotsaṅgaḥ kṣayastathā | [Su, Utt., 58 3.2]
mūtragranthirmūtraśukramuṣṇavātastathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 58 4.1]
mūtraukasādau dvau cāpi rogā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 4.2]
raukṣyādvegavighātādvā vāyur antaram āśritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 5.1]
mūtraṃ carati saṃgṛhya viguṇaḥ kuṇḍalīkṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 5.2]
sṛjedalpālpamathavā sarujaskaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 6.1]
vātakuṇḍalikāṃ taṃ tu vyādhiṃ vidyāt sudāruṇam | [Su, Utt., 58 6.2]
śakṛnmārgasya basteśca vāyur antaramāśritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 7.1]
aṣṭhīlāvadghanaṃ granthiṃ karotyacalamunnatam | [Su, Utt., 58 7.2]
viṇmūtrānilasaṅgaśca tatrādhmānaṃ ca jāyate | [Su, Utt., 58 8.1]
vedanā ca parā bastau vātāṣṭhīleti tāṃ viduḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 8.2]
vegaṃ vidhārayedyastu mūtrasyākuśalo naraḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 9.1]
niruṇaddhi mukhaṃ tasya basterbastigato 'nilaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 9.2]
mūtrasaṅgo bhavettena bastikukṣinipīḍitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 10.1]
vātavastiḥ sa vijñeyo vyādhiḥ kṛcchraprasādhanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 10.2]
vegaṃ saṃdhārya mūtrasya yo bhūyaḥ sraṣṭumicchati | [Su, Utt., 58 11.1]
tasya nābhyeti yadi vā kathaṃcit sampravartate | [Su, Utt., 58 11.2]
pravāhato mandarujamalpamalpaṃ punaḥ punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 12.1]
mūtrātītaṃ tu taṃ vidyānmūtravegavighātajam | [Su, Utt., 58 12.2]
mūtrasya vihate vege tadudāvartahetunā | [Su, Utt., 58 13.1]
apānaḥ kupito vāyurudaraṃ pūrayedbhṛśam | [Su, Utt., 58 13.2]
nābheradhastādādhmānaṃ janayettīvravedanam | [Su, Utt., 58 14.1]
taṃ mūtrajaṭharaṃ vidyād adhaḥsrotonirodhanam | [Su, Utt., 58 14.2]
bastau vāpyathavā nāle maṇau vā yasya dehinaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 15.1]
mūtraṃ pravṛttaṃ sajjeta saraktaṃ vā pravāhataḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 15.2]
sravecchanairalpamalpaṃ sarujaṃ vātha nīrujam | [Su, Utt., 58 16.1]
viguṇānilajo vyādhiḥ sa mūtrotsaṅgasaṃjñitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 16.2]
rūkṣasya klāntadehasya bastisthau pittamārutau | [Su, Utt., 58 17.1]
sadāhavedanaṃ kṛcchraṃ kuryātāṃ mūtrasaṃkṣayam | [Su, Utt., 58 17.2]
abhyantare bastimukhe vṛtto 'lpaḥ sthira eva ca | [Su, Utt., 58 18.1]
vedanāvānati sadā mūtramārganirodhanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 18.2]
jāyate sahasā yasya granthiraśmarilakṣaṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 19.1]
sa mūtragranthirityevam ucyate vedanādibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 19.2]
pratyupasthitamūtrastu maithunaṃ yo 'bhinandati | [Su, Utt., 58 20.1]
tasya mūtrayutaṃ retaḥ sahasā sampravartate | [Su, Utt., 58 20.2]
purastādvāpi mūtrasya paścādvāpi kadācana | [Su, Utt., 58 21.1]
bhasmodakapratīkāśaṃ mūtraśukraṃ taducyate | [Su, Utt., 58 21.2]
vyāyāmādhvātapaiḥ pittaṃ bastiṃ prāpyānilāvṛtam | [Su, Utt., 58 22.1]
bastiṃ meḍhraṃ gudaṃ caiva pradahan srāvayedadhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 22.2]
mūtraṃ hāridramathavā saraktaṃ raktam eva vā | [Su, Utt., 58 23.1]
kṛcchrāt pravartate jantoruṣṇavātaṃ vadanti tam | [Su, Utt., 58 23.2]
viśadaṃ pītakaṃ mūtraṃ sadāhaṃ bahalaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 58 24.1]
śuṣkaṃ bhavati yaccāpi rocanācūrṇasannibham | [Su, Utt., 58 24.2]
mūtraukasādaṃ taṃ vidyādrogaṃ pittakṛtaṃ budhaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 25.1]
picchilaṃ saṃhataṃ śvetaṃ tathā kṛcchrapravartanam | [Su, Utt., 58 25.2]
śuṣkaṃ bhavati yaccāpi śaṅkhacūrṇaprapāṇḍuram | [Su, Utt., 58 26.1]
mūtraukasādaṃ taṃ vidyādāmayaṃ dvādaśaṃ kaphāt | [Su, Utt., 58 26.2]
kaṣāyakalkasarpīṃṣi bhakṣyān lehān payāṃsi ca | [Su, Utt., 58 27.1]
kṣāramadyāsavasvedān bastīṃścottarasaṃjñitān | [Su, Utt., 58 27.2]
vidadhyānmatimāṃstatra vidhiṃ cāśmarināśanam | [Su, Utt., 58 28.1]
mūtrodāvartayogāṃśca kārtsnyenātra prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 58 28.2]
kalkamervārubījānāmakṣamātraṃ sasaindhavam | [Su, Utt., 58 29.1]
dhānyāmlayuktaṃ pītvaiva mūtrakṛcchrāt pramucyate | [Su, Utt., 58 29.2]
surāṃ sauvarcalavatīṃ mūtrakṛcchrī pibennaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 30.1]
madhu māṃsopadaṃśaṃ vā pibedvāpyatha gauḍikam | [Su, Utt., 58 30.2]
pibet kuṅkumakarṣaṃ vā madhūdakasamāyutam | [Su, Utt., 58 31.1]
rātriparyuṣitaṃ prātastathā sukhamavāpnuyāt | [Su, Utt., 58 31.2]
dāḍimāmlāṃ yutāṃ mukhyāmelājīrakanāgaraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 32.1]
pītvā surāṃ salavaṇāṃ mūtrakṛcchrāt pramucyate | [Su, Utt., 58 32.2]
pṛthakparṇyādivargasya mūlaṃ gokṣurakasya ca | [Su, Utt., 58 33.1]
ardhaprasthena toyasya pacet kṣīracaturguṇam | [Su, Utt., 58 33.2]
kṣīrāvaśiṣṭaṃ tacchītaṃ sitākṣaudrayutaṃ pibet | [Su, Utt., 58 34.1]
naro mārutapittotthamūtrāghātanivāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 58 34.2]
niṣpīḍya vāsasā samyagvarco rāsabhavājinoḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 35.1]
rasasya kuḍavaṃ tasya pibenmūtrarujāpaham | [Su, Utt., 58 35.2]
mustābhayādevadārumūrvāṇāṃ madhukasya ca | [Su, Utt., 58 36.1]
pibedakṣasamaṃ kalkaṃ mūtradoṣanivāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 58 36.2]
abhayāmalakākṣāṇāṃ kalkaṃ badarasaṃmitam | [Su, Utt., 58 37.1]
ambhasālavaṇopetaṃ pibenmūtrarujāpaham | [Su, Utt., 58 37.2]
udumbarasamaṃ kalkaṃ drākṣāyā jalasaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 58 38.1]
pibet paryuṣitaṃ rātrau śītaṃ mūtrarujāpaham | [Su, Utt., 58 38.2]
nidigdhikāyāḥ svarasaṃ pibet kuḍavasaṃmitam | [Su, Utt., 58 39.1]
mūtradoṣaharaṃ kalyamathavā kṣaudrasaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 58 39.2]
prapīḍyāmalakānāṃ tu rasaṃ kuḍavasaṃmitam | [Su, Utt., 58 40.1]
pītvāgadī bhavejjanturmūtradoṣarujāturaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 40.2]
dhātrīphalarasenaivaṃ sūkṣmailāṃ vā pibennaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 41.1]
piṣṭvāthavā suśītena śālitaṇḍulavāriṇā | [Su, Utt., 58 41.2]
tālasya taruṇaṃ mūlaṃ trapusasya rasaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 58 42.1]
śvetaṃ karkaṭakaṃ caiva prātastu payasā pibet | [Su, Utt., 58 42.2]
śṛtaṃ vā madhuraiḥ kṣīraṃ sarpirmiśraṃ pibennaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 43.1]
mūtradoṣaviśuddhyarthaṃ tathaivāśmarināśanam | [Su, Utt., 58 43.2]
balāśvadaṃṣṭrākrauñcāsthikokilākṣakataṇḍulān | [Su, Utt., 58 44.1]
śataparvakamūlaṃ ca devadāru sacitrakam | [Su, Utt., 58 44.2]
akṣabījaṃ ca surayā kalkīkṛtya pibennaraḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 45.1]
mūtradoṣaviśuddhyarthaṃ tathaivāśmarināśanam | [Su, Utt., 58 45.2]
pāṭalākṣāramāhṛtya saptakṛtvaḥ parisrutam | [Su, Utt., 58 46.1]
pibenmūtravikāraghnaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ tailamātrayā | [Su, Utt., 58 46.2]
nalāśmabhedadarbhekṣutrapusairvārubījakān | [Su, Utt., 58 47.1]
kṣīre pariśṛtān tatra pibet sarpiḥsamāyutān | [Su, Utt., 58 47.2]
pāṭalyā yāvaśūkācca pāribhadrāttilād api | [Su, Utt., 58 48.1]
kṣārodakena matimān tvageloṣaṇacūrṇakam | [Su, Utt., 58 48.2]
pibedguḍena miśraṃ vā lihyāllehān pṛthak pṛthak | [Su, Utt., 58 49.1]
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi mūtradoṣe kramaṃ hitam | [Su, Utt., 58 49.2]
snehasvedopapannānāṃ hitaṃ teṣu virecanam | [Su, Utt., 58 50.1]
tataḥ saṃśuddhadehānāṃ hitāścottarabastayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 50.2]
strīṇāmatiprasaṅgena śoṇitaṃ yasya dṛśyate | [Su, Utt., 58 51.1]
maithunoparamastasya bṛṃhaṇaśca vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 51.2]
tāmracūḍavasā tailaṃ hitaṃ cottarabastiṣu | [Su, Utt., 58 52.1]
vidhānaṃ tasya pūrvaṃ hi vyāsataḥ parikīrtitam | [Su, Utt., 58 52.2]
kṣaudrārdhapātraṃ dattvā ca pātraṃ tu kṣīrasarpiṣaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 53.1]
śarkarāyāśca cūrṇaṃ ca drākṣācūrṇaṃ ca tatsamam | [Su, Utt., 58 53.2]
svayaṃguptāphalaṃ caiva tathaivekṣurakasya ca | [Su, Utt., 58 54.1]
pippalīcūrṇasaṃyuktamardhabhāgaṃ prakalpayet | [Su, Utt., 58 54.2]
tadaikadhyaṃ samānīya khajenābhipramanthayet | [Su, Utt., 58 55.1]
tataḥ pāṇitalaṃ cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā kṣīraṃ tataḥ pibet | [Su, Utt., 58 55.2]
etat sarpiḥ prayuñjānaḥ śuddhadeho naraḥ sadā | [Su, Utt., 58 56.1]
mūtradoṣāñjayet sarvānanyayogaiḥ sudurjayān | [Su, Utt., 58 56.2]
jayecchoṇitadoṣāṃśca vandhyā garbhaṃ labheta ca | [Su, Utt., 58 57.1]
nārī caitat prayuñjānā yonidoṣāt pramucyate | [Su, Utt., 58 57.2]
balā kolāsthi madhukaṃ śvadaṃṣṭrātha śatāvarī | [Su, Utt., 58 58.1]
mṛṇālaṃ ca kaseruśca bījānīkṣurakasya ca | [Su, Utt., 58 58.2]
sahasravīryāṃśumatī payasyā saha kālayā | [Su, Utt., 58 59.1]
śṛgālavinnātibalā bṛṃhaṇīyo gaṇastathā | [Su, Utt., 58 59.2]
etāni samabhāgāni matimān saha sādhayet | [Su, Utt., 58 60.1]
caturguṇena payasā guḍasya tulayā saha | [Su, Utt., 58 60.2]
droṇāvaśiṣṭaṃ tat pūtaṃ pacettena ghṛtāḍhakam | [Su, Utt., 58 61.1]
tat siddhaṃ kalaśe sthāpyaṃ kṣaudraprasthena saṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 58 61.2]
sarpiretat prayuñjāno mūtradoṣāt pramucyate | [Su, Utt., 58 62.1]
tugākṣīryāśca cūrṇāni śarkarāyāstathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 58 62.2]
kṣaudreṇa tulyānyāloḍya praśaste 'hani lehayet | [Su, Utt., 58 63.1]
tasya khādedyathāśakti mātrāṃ kṣīraṃ tataḥ pibet | [Su, Utt., 58 63.2]
śukradoṣāñjayenmartyaḥ prāśya samyak suyantritaḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 64.1]
vyavāyakṣīṇaretāstu sadyaḥ saṃlabhate sukham | [Su, Utt., 58 64.2]
ojasvī balavānmartyaḥ pibanneva ca hṛṣyati | [Su, Utt., 58 65.1]
citrakaḥ sārivā caiva balā kālānusārivā | [Su, Utt., 58 65.2]
drākṣā viśālā pippalyastathā citraphalā bhavet | [Su, Utt., 58 66.1]
tathaiva madhukaṃ pathyāṃ dadyādāmalakāni ca | [Su, Utt., 58 66.2]
ghṛtāḍhakaṃ pacedebhiḥ kalkaiḥ karṣasamanvitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 58 67.1]
kṣīradroṇe jaladroṇe tatsiddhamavatārayet | [Su, Utt., 58 67.2]
śītaṃ parisrutaṃ caiva śarkarāprasthasaṃyutam | [Su, Utt., 58 68.1]
tugākṣīryāśca tat sarvaṃ matimān parimiśrayet | [Su, Utt., 58 68.2]
tato mitaṃ pibetkāle yathādoṣaṃ yathābalam | [Su, Utt., 58 69.1]
vātaretāḥ śleṣmaretāḥ pittaretāstu yo bhavet | [Su, Utt., 58 69.2]
raktaretā granthiretāḥ pibedicchannarogatām | [Su, Utt., 58 70.1]
jīvanīyaṃ ca vṛṣyaṃ ca sarpiretadbalāvaham | [Su, Utt., 58 70.2]
prajñāhitaṃ ca dhanyaṃ ca sarvarogāpahaṃ śivam | [Su, Utt., 58 71.1]
sarpiretat prayuñjānā strī garbhaṃ labhate 'cirāt | [Su, Utt., 58 71.2]
asṛgdoṣāñjayeccāpi yonidoṣāṃśca saṃhatān | [Su, Utt., 58 72.1]
mūtradoṣeṣu sarveṣu kuryādetaccikitsitam | [Su, Utt., 58 72.2]
{Su, Utt., 59}
athāto mūtrakṛcchrapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 2]
vātena pittena kaphena sarvaistathābhighātaiḥ śakṛdaśmarībhyām | [Su, Utt., 59 3.1]
tathāparaḥ śarkarayā sukaṣṭo mūtropaghātaḥ kathito 'ṣṭamastu | [Su, Utt., 59 3.2]
alpamalpaṃ samutpīḍya muṣkamehanabastibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 4.1]
phaladbhiriva kṛcchreṇa vātāghātena mehati | [Su, Utt., 59 4.2]
hāridramuṣṇaṃ raktaṃ vā muṣkamehanabastibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 5.1]
agninā dahyamānābhaiḥ pittāghātena mehati | [Su, Utt., 59 5.2]
snigdhaṃ śuklamanuṣṇaṃ ca muṣkamehanabastibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 6.1]
saṃhṛṣṭaromā gurubhiḥ śleṣmāghātena mehati | [Su, Utt., 59 6.2]
dāhaśītarujāviṣṭo nānāvarṇaṃ muhurmuhuḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 7.1]
tāmyamānastu kṛcchreṇa sannipātena mehati | [Su, Utt., 59 7.2]
mūtravāhiṣu śalyena kṣateṣvabhihateṣu ca | [Su, Utt., 59 8.1]
srotaḥsu mūtrāghātastu jāyate bhṛśavedanaḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 8.2]
vātabastestu tulyāni tasya liṅgāni lakṣayet | [Su, Utt., 59 9.1]
śakṛtastu pratīghātādvāyurviguṇatāṃ gataḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 9.2]
ādhmānaṃ ca saśūlaṃ ca mūtrasaṅgaṃ karoti hi | [Su, Utt., 59 10.1]
aśmarīhetukaḥ pūrvaṃ mūtrāghāta udāhṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 10.2]
aśmarī śarkarā caiva tulye saṃbhavalakṣaṇaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 11.1]
śarkarāyā viśeṣaṃ tu śṛṇu kīrtayato mama | [Su, Utt., 59 11.2]
pacyamānasya pittena bhidyamānasya vāyunā | [Su, Utt., 59 12.1]
śleṣmaṇo 'vayavā bhinnāḥ śarkarā iti saṃjñitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 12.2]
hṛtpīḍā vepathuḥ śūlaṃ kukṣau vahniḥ sudurbalaḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 13.1]
tābhir bhavati mūrcchā ca mūtrāghātaśca dāruṇaḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 13.2]
mūtraveganirastāsu tāsu śāmyati vedanā | [Su, Utt., 59 14.1]
yāvadanyā punarnaiti guḍikā srotaso mukham | [Su, Utt., 59 14.2]
śarkarāsaṃbhavasyaitanmūtrāghātasya lakṣaṇam | [Su, Utt., 59 15.1]
cikitsitamathaiteṣāmaṣṭānām api vakṣyate | [Su, Utt., 59 15.2]
aśmarīṃ ca samāśritya yaduktaṃ prasamīkṣya tat | [Su, Utt., 59 16.1]
yathādoṣaṃ prayuñjīta snehādim api ca kramam | [Su, Utt., 59 16.2]
śvadaṃṣṭrāśmabhidau kumbhīṃ hapuṣāṃ kaṇṭakārikām | [Su, Utt., 59 17.1]
balāṃ śatāvarīṃ rāsnāṃ varuṇaṃ girikarṇikām | [Su, Utt., 59 17.2]
tathā vidārigandhādiṃ saṃhṛtya traivṛtaṃ pacet | [Su, Utt., 59 18.1]
tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā tat peyaṃ tena vāpyanuvāsanam | [Su, Utt., 59 18.2]
dadyāduttarabastiṃ ca vātakṛcchropaśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 59 19.1]
śvadaṃṣṭrāsvarase tailaṃ saguḍakṣīranāgaram | [Su, Utt., 59 19.2]
paktvā tat pūrvavadyojyaṃ tatrānilarujāpaham | [Su, Utt., 59 20.1]
tṛṇotpalādikākolīnyagrodhādigaṇaiḥ kṛtam | [Su, Utt., 59 20.2]
pītaṃ ghṛtaṃ pittakṛcchraṃ nāśayet kṣīram eva vā | [Su, Utt., 59 21.1]
dadyāduttarabastiṃ ca pittakṛcchropaśāntaye | [Su, Utt., 59 21.2]
ebhireva kṛtaḥ snehastrividheṣvapi bastiṣu | [Su, Utt., 59 22.1]
hitaṃ virecanaṃ cekṣukṣīradrākṣārasair yutam | [Su, Utt., 59 22.2]
surasoṣakamustādau varuṇādau ca yat kṛtam | [Su, Utt., 59 23.1]
tailaṃ tathā yavāgvādi kaphāghāte praśasyate | [Su, Utt., 59 23.2]
yathādoṣocchrayaṃ kuryādetāneva ca sarvaje | [Su, Utt., 59 24.1]
phalguvṛścīradarbhāśmasāracūrṇaṃ ca vāriṇā | [Su, Utt., 59 24.2]
surekṣurasadarbhāmbupītaṃ kṛcchrarujāpaham | [Su, Utt., 59 25.1]
tathābhighātaje kuryāt sadyovraṇacikitsitam | [Su, Utt., 59 25.2]
mūtrakṛcchre śakṛjjāte kāryā vātaharī kriyā | [Su, Utt., 59 26.1]
svedāvagāhāvabhyaṅgabasticūrṇakriyāstathā | [Su, Utt., 59 26.2]
ye tvanye tu tathā kṛcchre tayoḥ proktaḥ kriyāvidhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 59 27.1]
{Su, Utt., 60}
athāto 'mānuṣopasargapratiṣedham adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 2.1]
niśācarebhyo rakṣyastu nityam eva kṣatāturaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 3.1]
iti yat prāgabhihitaṃ vistarastasya vakṣyate | [Su, Utt., 60 3.2]
guhyānāgatavijñānam anavasthāsahiṣṇutā | [Su, Utt., 60 4.1]
kriyā vāmānuṣī yasmin sagrahaḥ parikīrtyate | [Su, Utt., 60 4.2]
aśuciṃ bhinnamaryādaṃ kṣataṃ vā yadi vākṣatam | [Su, Utt., 60 5.1]
hiṃsyurhiṃsāvihārārthaṃ satkārārthamathāpi vā | [Su, Utt., 60 5.2]
asaṃkhyeyā grahagaṇā grahādhipatayastu ye | [Su, Utt., 60 6.1]
vyajyante vividhākārā bhidyante te tathāṣṭadhā | [Su, Utt., 60 6.2]
devāstathā śatrugaṇāśca teṣāṃ gandharvayakṣāḥ pitaro bhujaṅgāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 7.1]
rakṣāṃsi yā cāpi piśācajātireṣo 'ṣṭako devagaṇo grahākhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 7.2]
saṃtuṣṭaḥ śucirapi ceṣṭagandhamālyo nistandrī hyavitathasaṃskṛtaprabhāṣī | [Su, Utt., 60 8.1]
tejasvī sthiranayano varapradātā brahmaṇyo bhavati naraḥ sa devajuṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 8.2]
saṃsvedī dvijagurudevadoṣavaktā jihmākṣo vigatabhayo vimārgadṛṣṭiḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 9.1]
saṃtuṣṭo bhavati na cānnapānajātair duṣṭātmā bhavati ca devaśatrujuṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 9.2]
hṛṣṭātmā pulinavanāntaropasevī svācāraḥ priyaparigītagandhamālyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 10.1]
nṛtyan vai prahasati cāru cālpaśabdaṃ gandharvagrahaparipīḍito manuṣyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 10.2]
tāmrākṣaḥ priyatanuraktavastradhārī gambhīro drutamatiralpavāk sahiṣṇuḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 11.1]
tejasvī vadati ca kiṃ dadāmi kasmai yo yakṣagrahaparipīḍito manuṣyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 11.2]
pretebhyo visṛjati saṃstareṣu piṇḍān śāntātmā jalam api cāpasavyavastraḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 12.1]
māṃsepsus tilaguḍapāyasābhikāmas tadbhukto bhavati pitṛgrahābhibhūtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 12.2]
bhūmau yaḥ prasarati sarpavat kadācit sṛkkiṇyau vilikhati jihvayā tathaiva | [Su, Utt., 60 13.1]
nidrālurguḍamadhudugdhapāyasepsurvijñeyo bhavati bhujaṅgamena juṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 13.2]
māṃsāsṛgvividhasurāvikāralipsur nirlajjo bhṛśamatiniṣṭhuro 'tiśūraḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 14.1]
krodhālurvipulabalo niśāvihārī śaucadviḍ bhavati ca rakṣasā gṛhītaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 14.2]
uddhastaḥ kṛśaparuṣaścirapralāpī durgandho bhṛśamaśucistathātilolaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 15.1]
bahvāśī vijanahimāmburātrisevī vyāvigno bhramati rudan piśācajuṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 15.2]
sthūlākṣastvaritagatiḥ svaphenalehī nidrāluḥ patati ca kampate ca yo 'ti | [Su, Utt., 60 16.1]
yaścādridviradanagādivicyutaḥ san saṃsṛṣṭo na bhavati vārddhakena juṣṭaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 16.2]
devagrahāḥ paurṇamāsyāmasurāḥ sandhyayorapi | [Su, Utt., 60 17.1]
gandharvāḥ prāyaśo 'ṣṭamyāṃ yakṣāśca pratipadyatha | [Su, Utt., 60 17.2]
kṛṣṇakṣaye ca pitaraḥ pañcamyām api coragāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 18.1]
rakṣāṃsi niśi paiśācāścaturdaśyāṃ viśanti ca | [Su, Utt., 60 18.2]
darpaṇādīn yathā chāyā śītoṣṇaṃ prāṇino yathā | [Su, Utt., 60 19.1]
svamaṇiṃ bhāskarasyosrā yathā dehaṃ ca dehadhṛk | [Su, Utt., 60 19.2]
viśanti ca na dṛśyante grahāstadvaccharīriṇam | [Su, Utt., 60 19.3]
tapāṃsi tīvrāṇi tathaiva dānaṃ vratāni dharmo niyamāśca satyam | [Su, Utt., 60 20.1]
guṇāstathāṣṭāvapi teṣu nityā vyastāḥ samastāśca yathāprabhāvam | [Su, Utt., 60 20.2]
na te manuṣyaiḥ saha saṃviśanti na vā manuṣyān kvacidāviśanti | [Su, Utt., 60 21.1]
ye tvāviśantīti vadanti mohātte bhūtavidyāviṣayādapohyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 21.2]
teṣāṃ grahāṇāṃ paricārakā ye koṭīsahasrāyutapadmasaṃkhyāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 22.1]
asṛgvasāmāṃsabhujaḥ subhīmā niśāvihārāśca tamāviśanti | [Su, Utt., 60 22.2]
niśācarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ hi ye devagaṇamāśritāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 23.1]
te tu tatsattvasaṃsargādvijñeyāstu tadañjanāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 23.2]
devagrahā iti punaḥ procyante 'śucayaśca ye | [Su, Utt., 60 24.1]
devavacca namasyante pratyarthyante ca devavat | [Su, Utt., 60 24.2]
svāmiśīlakriyācārāḥ krama eṣa surādiṣu | [Su, Utt., 60 25.1]
nirṛteryā duhitarastāsāṃ sa prasavaḥ smṛtaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 25.2]
satyatvādapavṛtteṣu vṛttisteṣāṃ gaṇaiḥ kṛtā | [Su, Utt., 60 26.1]
hiṃsāvihārā ye kecid devabhāvam upāśritāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 26.2]
bhūtānīti kṛtā saṃjñā teṣāṃ saṃjñāpravaktṛbhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 27.1]
grahasaṃjñāni bhūtāni yasmādvettyanayā bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 60 27.2]
vidyayā bhūtavidyātvamata eva nirucyate | [Su, Utt., 60 28.1]
teṣāṃ śāntyarthamanvicchan vaidyastu susamāhitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 28.2]
japaiḥ saniyamair homairārabheta cikitsitum | [Su, Utt., 60 29.1]
raktāni gandhamālyāni bījāni madhusarpiṣī | [Su, Utt., 60 29.2]
bhakṣyāśca sarve sarveṣāṃ sāmānyo vidhirucyate | [Su, Utt., 60 30.1]
vastrāṇi gandhamālyāni māṃsāni rudhirāṇi ca | [Su, Utt., 60 30.2]
yāni yeṣāṃ yatheṣṭāni tāni tebhyaḥ pradāpayet | [Su, Utt., 60 31.1]
hiṃsanti manujān yeṣu prāyaśo divaseṣu tu | [Su, Utt., 60 31.2]
dineṣu teṣu deyāni tadbhūtavinivṛttaye | [Su, Utt., 60 32.1]
devagrahe devagṛhe hutvāgniṃ prāpayed balim | [Su, Utt., 60 32.2]
kuśasvastikapūpājyacchatrapāyasasaṃbhṛtam | [Su, Utt., 60 33.1]
asurāya yathākālaṃ vidadhyāccatvarādiṣu | [Su, Utt., 60 33.2]
gandharvasya gavāṃ madhye madyamāṃsāmbujāṅgalam | [Su, Utt., 60 34.1]
hṛdye veśmani yakṣasya kulmāṣāsṛksurādibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 34.2]
atimuktakakundābjaiḥ puṣpaiśca vitaredbalim | [Su, Utt., 60 35.1]
nadyāṃ pitṛgrahāyeṣṭaṃ kuśāstaraṇabhūṣitam | [Su, Utt., 60 35.2]
tatraivopahareccāpi nāgāya vividhaṃ balim | [Su, Utt., 60 36.1]
catuṣpathe rākṣasasya bhīmeṣu gahaneṣu vā | [Su, Utt., 60 36.2]
śūnyāgāre piśācasya tīvraṃ balimupāharet | [Su, Utt., 60 37.1]
pūrvamācaritair mantrair bhūtavidyānidarśitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 37.2]
na śakyā balibhir jetuṃ yogaistān samupācaret | [Su, Utt., 60 38.1]
ajarkṣacarmaromāṇi śalyakolūkayostathā | [Su, Utt., 60 38.2]
hiṅguṃ mūtraṃ ca bastasya dhūmamasya prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 60 39.1]
etena śāmyati kṣipraṃ balavān api yo grahaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 39.2]
gajāhvapippalīmūlavyoṣāmalakasarṣapān | [Su, Utt., 60 40.1]
godhānakulamārjārarṣyapittaprapeṣitān | [Su, Utt., 60 40.2]
nasyābhyañjanasekeṣu vidadhyādyogatattvavit | [Su, Utt., 60 41.1]
kharāśvāśvatarolūkakarabhaśvaśṛgālajam | [Su, Utt., 60 41.2]
purīṣaṃ gṛdhrakākānāṃ varāhasya ca peṣayet | [Su, Utt., 60 42.1]
bastamūtreṇa tatsiddhaṃ tailaṃ syāt pūrvavaddhitam | [Su, Utt., 60 42.2]
śirīṣabījaṃ laśunaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ siddhārthakaṃ vacām | [Su, Utt., 60 43.1]
mañjiṣṭhāṃ rajanīṃ kṛṣṇāṃ bastamūtreṇa peṣayet | [Su, Utt., 60 43.2]
vartyaśchāyāviśuṣkāstāḥ sapittā nayanāñjanam | [Su, Utt., 60 44.1]
naktamālaphalaṃ vyoṣaṃ mūlaṃ śyonākabilvayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 44.2]
haridre ca kṛtā vartyaḥ pūrvavannayanāñjanam | [Su, Utt., 60 45.1]
saindhavaṃ kaṭukāṃ hiṅguṃ vayaḥsthāṃ ca vacām api | [Su, Utt., 60 45.2]
bastamūtreṇa sampiṣṭaṃ matsyapittena pūrvavat | [Su, Utt., 60 45.3]
ye ye grahā na sidhyanti sarveṣāṃ nayanāñjanam | [Su, Utt., 60 46.1]
purāṇasarpirlaśunaṃ hiṅgu siddhārthakaṃ vacā | [Su, Utt., 60 46.2]
golomī cājalomī ca bhūtakeśī jaṭā tathā | [Su, Utt., 60 47.1]
kukkuṭā sarpagandhā ca tathā kāṇavikāṇike | [Su, Utt., 60 47.2]
vajraproktā vayaḥsthā ca śṛṅgī mohanavallikā | [Su, Utt., 60 48.1]
arkamūlaṃ trikaṭukaṃ latā srotojamañjanam | [Su, Utt., 60 48.2]
naipālī haritālaṃ ca rakṣoghnā ye ca kīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 49.1]
siṃhavyāghrarkṣamārjāradvīpivājigavāṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 60 49.2]
śvāvicchalyakagodhānāmuṣṭrasya nakulasya ca | [Su, Utt., 60 50.1]
viṭtvagromavasāmūtraraktapittanakhādayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 50.2]
asmin varge bhiṣak kuryāttailāni ca ghṛtāni ca | [Su, Utt., 60 51.1]
pānābhyañjananasyeṣu tāni yojyāni jānatā | [Su, Utt., 60 51.2]
avapīḍe 'ñjane caiva vidadhyād guṭikīkṛtam | [Su, Utt., 60 52.1]
vidadhīta parīṣeke kvathitaṃ cūrṇitaṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 60 52.2]

eṣa sarvavikārāṃstu mānasānaparājitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 53.2]
hanyādalpena kālena snehādirapi ca kramaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 54.1]
na cācaukṣaṃ prayuñjīta prayogaṃ devatāgrahe | [Su, Utt., 60 54.2]
ṛte piśācādanyatra pratikūlaṃ na cācaret | [Su, Utt., 60 55.1]
vaidyāturau nihanyuste dhruvaṃ kruddhā mahaujasaḥ | [Su, Utt., 60 55.2]
hitāhitīye yaccoktaṃ nityam eva samācaret | [Su, Utt., 60 56.1]
tataḥ prāpsyati siddhiṃ ca yaśaśca vipulaṃ bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 60 56.2]
{Su, Utt., 61}
athāto 'pasmārapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 2]
smṛtirbhūtārthavijñānam apaś ca parivarjane | [Su, Utt., 61 3.1]
apasmāra iti proktastato 'yaṃ vyādhirantakṛt | [Su, Utt., 61 3.2]
mithyātiyogendriyārthakarmaṇāmabhisevanāt | [Su, Utt., 61 4.1]
viruddhamalināhāravihārakupitair malaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 4.2]

dantān khādan vaman phenaṃ vivṛtākṣaḥ patet kṣitau | [Su, Utt., 61 9.2]

vātapittakaphair nṝṇāṃ caturthaḥ sannipātataḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 11.1]
vepamāno daśan dantān śvasan phenaṃ vamann api | [Su, Utt., 61 11.2]
yo brūyādvikṛtaṃ sattvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ māmanudhāvati | [Su, Utt., 61 12.1]
tato me cittanāśaḥ syāt so 'pasmāro 'nilātmakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 12.2]
tṛṭtāpasvedamūrcchārto dhunvannaṅgāni vihvalaḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 13.1]
yo brūyādvikṛtaṃ sattvaṃ pītaṃ māmanudhāvati | [Su, Utt., 61 13.2]
tato me cittanāśaḥ syāt sa pittabhava ucyate | [Su, Utt., 61 14.1]
śītahṛllāsanidrārtaḥ patan bhūmau vaman kapham | [Su, Utt., 61 14.2]
yo brūyādvikṛtaṃ sattvaṃ śuklaṃ māmanudhāvati | [Su, Utt., 61 15.1]
tato me cittanāśaḥ syāt so 'pasmāraḥ kaphātmakaḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 15.2]
hṛdi todastṛḍutkledastriṣvapyeteṣu saṃkhyayā | [Su, Utt., 61 16.1]
pralāpaḥ kūjanaṃ kleśaḥ pratyekaṃ tu bhavediha | [Su, Utt., 61 16.2]
sarvaliṅgasamavāyaḥ sarvadoṣaprakopaje | [Su, Utt., 61 17.1]
animittāgamādvyādher gamanād akṛte 'pi ca | [Su, Utt., 61 17.2]
āgamāccāpyapasmāraṃ vadantyanye na doṣajam | [Su, Utt., 61 18.1]
kramopayogāddoṣāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāttathaiva ca | [Su, Utt., 61 18.2]
āgamādvaiśvarūpyācca sa tu nirvarṇyate budhaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 19.1]
deve varṣatyapi yathā bhūmau bījāni kānicit | [Su, Utt., 61 19.2]
śaradi pratirohanti tathā vyādhisamudbhavaḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 20.1]
sthāyinaḥ kecidalpena kālenābhipravardhitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 20.2]

śigrukaṭvaṅgakiṇvāhinimbatvagrasasādhitam | [Su, Utt., 61 23.3]

godhānakulanāgānāṃ pṛṣatarkṣagavām api | [Su, Utt., 61 24.2]

tīkṣṇairubhayatobhāgaiḥ śiraścāpi viśodhayet | [Su, Utt., 61 25.2]

vātikaṃ bastibhiścāpi paittikaṃ tu virecanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 26.2]
kaphajaṃ vamanair dhīmānapasmāramupācaret | [Su, Utt., 61 27.1]
kulatthayavakolāni śaṇabījaṃ palaṅkaṣām | [Su, Utt., 61 27.2]

bastamūtrayutaṃ sarpiḥ pacettadvātike hitam | [Su, Utt., 61 28.2]
kākolyādipratīvāpaṃ siddhaṃ ca prathame gaṇe | [Su, Utt., 61 29.1]
payomadhusitāyuktaṃ ghṛtaṃ tat paittike hitam | [Su, Utt., 61 29.2]
kākolyādipratīvāpaṃ siddhaṃ ca prathame gaṇe | [Su, Utt., 61 30.1]
payomadhusitāyuktaṃ ghṛtaṃ tat paittike hitam | [Su, Utt., 61 30.2]
suradrumavacākuṣṭhasiddhārthavyoṣahiṅgubhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 31.1]
mañjiṣṭhārajanīyugmasamaṅgātriphalāmbudaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 31.2]
karañjabījaśairīṣagirikarṇīhutāśanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 32.1]
siddhaṃ siddhārthakaṃ nāma sarpirmūtracaturguṇam | [Su, Utt., 61 32.2]
kṛmikuṣṭhagaraśvāsabalāsaviṣamajvarān | [Su, Utt., 61 33.1]
sarvabhūtagrahonmādānapasmārāṃśca nāśayet | [Su, Utt., 61 33.2]

śampākaśreyasīsaptaparṇāpāmārgaphalgubhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 34.2]
śṛtaiḥ kalkaiśca bhūnimbapūtīkavyoṣacitrakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 35.1]
trivṛtpāṭhāniśāyugmasārivādvayapauṣkaraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 35.2]

sarpirebhiśca gokṣīradadhimūtraśakṛdrasaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 61 36.2]
sādhitaṃ pañcagavyākhyaṃ sarvāpasmārabhūtanut | [Su, Utt., 61 37.1]
cāturthakakṣayaśvāsānunmādāṃśca niyacchati | [Su, Utt., 61 37.2]

{Su, Utt., 62}
athāta unmādapratiṣedhamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 2.1]
madayantyuddhatā doṣā yasmādunmārgamāśritāḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 3.1]
mānaso 'yamato vyādhirunmāda iti kīrtitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 3.2]
ekaikaśaḥ samastaiśca doṣair atyarthamūrchitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 4.1]
mānasena ca duḥkhena sa pañcavidha ucyate | [Su, Utt., 62 4.2]
viṣādbhavati ṣaṣṭhaśca yathāsvaṃ tatra bheṣajam | [Su, Utt., 62 5.1]
sa cāpravṛddhastaruṇo madasaṃjñāṃ bibharti ca | [Su, Utt., 62 5.2]

yasya syādacireṇaiva unmādaṃ so 'dhigacchati | [Su, Utt., 62 7.2]
rūkṣacchaviḥ paruṣavāgdhamanītato vā śītāturaḥ kṛśatanuḥ sphuritāṅgasandhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 8.1]
āsphoṭayatyaṭati gāyati nṛtyaśīlo vikrośati bhramati cāpyanilaprakopāt | [Su, Utt., 62 8.2]
tṛṭsvedadāhabahulo bahubhug vinidraś chāyāhimānilajalāntavihārasevī | [Su, Utt., 62 9.1]
tīkṣṇo himāmbuni caye 'pi sa vahniśaṅkī pittāddivā nabhasi paśyati tārakāśca | [Su, Utt., 62 9.2]
chardyagnisādasadanārucikāsayukto yoṣidviviktaratiralpamatipracāraḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 10.1]
nidrāparo 'lpakathano 'lpabhuguṣṇasevī rātrau bhṛśaṃ bhavati cāpi kaphaprakopāt | [Su, Utt., 62 10.2]
sarvātmake pavanapittakaphā yathāsvaṃ saṃharṣitā iva ca liṅgamudīrayanti | [Su, Utt., 62 11.1]

citraṃ sa jalpati mano'nugataṃ visaṃjño gāyatyatho hasati roditi mūḍhasaṃjñaḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 13.1]
raktekṣaṇo hatabalendriyabhāḥ sudīnaḥ śyāvānano viṣakṛto 'tha bhavet parāsuḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 13.2]
snigdhaṃ svinnaṃ tu manujamunmādārtaṃ viśodhayet | [Su, Utt., 62 14.1]
tīkṣṇairubhayatobhāgaiḥ śirasaśca virecanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 14.2]
vividhairavapīḍaiśca sarṣapasnehasaṃyutaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 15.1]
yojayitvā tu taccūrṇaṃ ghrāṇe tasya prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 62 15.2]
satataṃ dhūpayeccainaṃ śvagomāṃsaiḥ supūtibhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 16.1]
sarṣapānāṃ ca tailena nasyābhyaṅgau hitau sadā | [Su, Utt., 62 16.2]
darśayedadbhutānyasya vadennāśaṃ priyasya vā | [Su, Utt., 62 17.1]
bhīmākārair narair nāgair dāntair vyālaiśca nirviṣaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 17.2]
bhīṣayet saṃyataṃ pāśaiḥ kaśābhir vātha tāḍayet | [Su, Utt., 62 18.1]

tryahāt tryahād yavāgūśca tarpaṇān vā pradāpayet | [Su, Utt., 62 20.2]
kevalānambuyuktān vā kulmāṣān vā bahuśrutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 21.1]
hṛdyaṃ yaddīpanīyaṃ ca tatpathyaṃ tasya bhojayet | [Su, Utt., 62 21.2]
viḍaṅgatriphalāmustamañjiṣṭhādāḍimotpalaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 22.1]
śyāmailavālukailābhiś candanāmaradārubhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 22.2]
barhiṣṭharajanīkuṣṭhaparṇinīsārivādvayaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 23.1]
hareṇukātrivṛddantīvacātālīsakeśaraiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 23.2]

gulmakāsajvaraśvāsakṣayonmādanivāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 62 24.2]

caturguṇena dugdhena mahākalyāṇam ucyate | [Su, Utt., 62 25.2]

vacājamodākākolīmedāmadhukapadmakaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 28.1]
saśarkaraṃ hitaṃ sarpiḥ pakvaṃ kṣīracaturguṇam | [Su, Utt., 62 28.2]
bālānāṃ grahajuṣṭānāṃ puṃsāṃ duṣṭālparetasām | [Su, Utt., 62 29.1]
