brahmīmaindrīṃ viḍaṅgāni vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu surāṃ jaṭām | [Su, Utt., 62 30.1]
viṣaghnīṃ laśunaṃ rāsnāṃ viśalyāṃ surasāṃ vacām | [Su, Utt., 62 30.2]
jyotiṣmatīṃ nāgaraṃ ca anantāmabhayāṃ tathā | [Su, Utt., 62 31.1]
saurāṣṭrīṃ ca samāṃśāni gajamūtreṇa peṣayet | [Su, Utt., 62 31.2]
chāyāviśuṣkās tadvartīr yojayed vidhikovidaḥ | [Su, Utt., 62 32.1]
avapīḍe 'ñjane 'bhyaṅge nasye dhūme pralepane | [Su, Utt., 62 32.2]
uro'pāṅgalalāṭeṣu sirāścāsya vimokṣayet | [Su, Utt., 62 33.1]
apasmārakriyāṃ cāpi grahoddiṣṭāṃ ca kārayet | [Su, Utt., 62 33.2]
śāntadoṣaṃ viśuddhaṃ ca snehabastibhirācaret | [Su, Utt., 62 34.1]
unmādeṣu ca sarveṣu kuryāccittaprasādanam | [Su, Utt., 62 34.2]
mṛdupūrvāṃ made 'pyevaṃ kriyāṃ mṛdvīṃ prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 62 34.3]
śokaśalyaṃ vyapanayedunmāde pañcame bhiṣak | [Su, Utt., 62 35.1]
viṣaje mṛdupūrvāṃ ca viṣaghnīṃ kārayet kriyām | [Su, Utt., 62 35.2]
{Su, Utt., 63}
athāto rasabhedavikalpamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 2.1]
doṣāṇāṃ pañcadaśadhā prasaro 'bhihitastu yaḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 3.1]
triṣaṣṭyā rasabhedānāṃ tatprayojanam ucyate | [Su, Utt., 63 3.2]
avidagdhā vidagdhāśca bhidyante te triṣaṣṭidhā | [Su, Utt., 63 4.1]
rasabhedatriṣaṣṭiṃ tu vīkṣya vīkṣyāvacārayet | [Su, Utt., 63 4.2]
ekaikenānugamanaṃ bhāgaśo yadudīritam | [Su, Utt., 63 5.1]
doṣāṇāṃ tatra matimān triṣaṣṭiṃ tu prayojayet | [Su, Utt., 63 5.2]
yathākramapravṛttānāṃ dvikeṣu madhuro rasaḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 6.1]
pañcānukramate yogānamlaścatura eva tu | [Su, Utt., 63 6.2]
trīṃścānugacchati raso lavaṇaḥ kaṭuko dvayam | [Su, Utt., 63 7.1]
tiktaḥ kaṣāyamanveti te dvikā daśa pañca ca | [Su, Utt., 63 7.2]
tadyathā madhurāmlaḥ madhuralavaṇaḥ madhurakaṭukaḥ madhuratiktaḥ madhurakaṣāyaḥ ete pañcānukrāntā madhureṇa amlalavaṇaḥ amlakaṭukaḥ amlatiktaḥ amlakaṣāyaḥ ete catvāro 'nukrāntā amlena lavaṇakaṭukaḥ lavaṇatiktaḥ lavaṇakaṣāyaḥ ete trayo 'nukrāntā lavaṇena kaṭutiktaḥ kaṭukaṣāyaḥ dvāvetāvanukrāntau kaṭukena tiktakaṣāyaḥ eka evānukrāntastiktena evamete pañcadaśa dvikasaṃyogā vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 8.1]
trikān vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 9.1]
ādau prayujyamānastu madhuro daśa gacchati | [Su, Utt., 63 9.2]
ṣaḍ amlo lavaṇastasmād ardhamekaṃ tathā kaṭuḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 9.3]
tadyathā madhurāmlalavaṇaḥ madhurāmlakaṭukaḥ madhurāmlatiktaḥ madhurāmlakaṣāyaḥ madhuralavaṇakaṭukaḥ madhuralavaṇatiktaḥ madhuralavaṇakaṣāyaḥ madhurakaṭukatiktaḥ madhurakaṭukaṣāyaḥ madhuratiktakaṣāyaḥ evameṣāṃ daśānāṃ trikasaṃyogānāmādau madhuraḥ prayujyate amlalavaṇakaṭukaḥ amlalavaṇatiktaḥ amlalavaṇakaṣāyaḥ amlakaṭutiktaḥ amlakaṭukaṣāyaḥ amlatiktakaṣāyaḥ evameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇām ādāvamlaḥ prayujyate lavaṇakaṭutiktaḥ lavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ lavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ evameṣāṃ trayāṇāmādau lavaṇaḥ prayujyate kaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ evamekasyādau kaṭukaḥ prayujyate evamete trikasaṃyogā viṃśatirvyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 10.1]
catuṣkān vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 11.1]
catuṣkarasasaṃyogānmadhuro daśa gacchati | [Su, Utt., 63 11.2]
caturo 'mlo 'nugacchecca lavaṇastvekam eva tu | [Su, Utt., 63 11.3]
madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukaḥ madhurāmlalavaṇatiktaḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṣāyaḥ madhurāmlakaṭukatiktaḥ madhurāmlakaṭukaṣāyaḥ madhurāmlatiktakaṣāyaḥ madhuralavaṇakaṭukatiktaḥ madhuralavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ madhuralavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ madhurakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ evameṣāṃ daśānāmādau madhuraḥ prayujyate amlalavaṇakaṭutiktaḥ amlalavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ amlalavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ amlakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ evameṣāṃ caturṇāmādāvamlo lavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ evamekasyādau lavaṇa evamete catuṣkarasasaṃyogāḥ pañcadaśa kīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 12.1]
pañcakān vakṣyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 13.1]
pañcakān pañca madhura ekamamlastu gacchati | [Su, Utt., 63 13.2]
madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktaḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭukaṣāyaḥ madhurāmlalavaṇatiktakaṣāyaḥ madhurāmlakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ madhuralavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ evameṣāṃ pañcānāmādau madhuraḥ prayujyate amlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ evamekasyādāvamla evamete ṣaṭ pañcakasaṃyogā vyākhyātāḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 14.1]
ṣaṭkamekaṃ vakṣyāma ekastu ṣaṭkasaṃyogaḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaḥ eṣa eka eva ṣaṭsaṃyogaḥ | [Su, Utt., 63 15.1]
ekaikaś ca ṣaḍ rasā bhavanti madhuraḥ amlaḥ lavaṇaḥ kaṭukaḥ tiktaḥ kaṣāyaḥ iti | [Su, Utt., 63 16.1]
bhavati cātra | [Su, Utt., 63 17.1]

tatrābhaktaṃ prāgbhaktamadhobhaktaṃ madhyebhaktam antarābhaktaṃ sabhaktaṃ sāmudgaṃ muhurmuhurgrāsaṃ grāsāntaraṃ ceti daśauṣadhakālāḥ | [Su, Utt., 64 65.2]

vīryādhikaṃ bhavati bheṣajamannahīnaṃ hanyāttathāmayamasaṃśayamāśu caiva | [Su, Utt., 64 67.1]

śīghraṃ vipākam upayāti balaṃ na hiṃsyādannāvṛtaṃ na ca muhur vadanānnireti | [Su, Utt., 64 69.1]
prāgbhaktasevitam athauṣadham etadeva dadyācca vṛddhaśiśubhīrukṛśāṅganābhyaḥ | [Su, Utt., 64 69.2]
adhobhaktaṃ nāma yadadho bhaktasyeti | [Su, Utt., 64 70.1]
madhyebhaktaṃ nāma yanmadhye bhaktasya pīyate | [Su, Utt., 64 71.1]
pītaṃ yadannam upayujya tadūrdhvakāye hanyādgadān bahuvidhāṃśca balaṃ dadāti | [Su, Utt., 64 72.1]
madhye tu pītam apahantyavisāribhāvād ye madhyadehamabhibhūya bhavanti rogāḥ | [Su, Utt., 64 72.2]
antarābhaktaṃ nāma yadantarā pīyate pūrvāparayor bhaktayoḥ | [Su, Utt., 64 73.1]
sabhaktaṃ nāma yat saha bhaktena | [Su, Utt., 64 74.1]
pathyaṃ sabhaktam abalābalayor hi nityaṃ taddveṣiṇām api tathā śiśuvṛddhayośca | [Su, Utt., 64 75.1]
hṛdyaṃ manobalakaraṃ tvatha dīpanaṃ ca pathyaṃ sadā bhavati cāntarabhaktakaṃ yat | [Su, Utt., 64 75.2]
sāmudgaṃ nāma yadbhaktasyādāvante ca pīyate | [Su, Utt., 64 76.1]
doṣe dvidhā pravisṛte tu samudgasaṃjñamādyantayor yadaśanasya niṣevyate tu | [Su, Utt., 64 77.1]

grāsaṃ tu yatpiṇḍavyāmiśram | [Su, Utt., 64 80.1]
grāsāntaraṃ tu yadgrāsāntareṣu | [Su, Utt., 64 81.1]

grāsāntareṣu vitaredvamanīyadhūmān śvāsādiṣu prathitadṛṣṭaguṇāṃśca lehān | [Su, Utt., 64 82.2]
evamete daśauṣadhakālāḥ | [Su, Utt., 64 83.1]
visṛṣṭe viṇmūtre viśadakaraṇe dehe ca sulaghau | [Su, Utt., 64 84.1]
viśuddhe codgāre hṛdi suvimale vāte ca sarati | [Su, Utt., 64 84.2]
tathānnaśraddhāyāṃ klamaparigame kukṣau ca śithile | [Su, Utt., 64 84.3]
pradeyastvāhāro bhavati bhiṣajāṃ kālaḥ sa tu mataḥ | [Su, Utt., 64 84.4]
{Su, Utt., 65}
athātastantrayuktimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 1.1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 2.1]
dvātriṃśattantrayuktayo bhavanti śāstre | [Su, Utt., 65 3.1]
tadyathā adhikaraṇaṃ yogaḥ padārthaḥ hetvarthaḥ uddeśaḥ nirdeśaḥ upadeśaḥ apadeśaḥ pradeśaḥ atideśaḥ apavarjaḥ vākyaśeṣaḥ arthāpattiḥ viparyayaḥ prasaṅgaḥ ekāntaḥ anekāntaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ nirṇayaḥ anumataṃ vidhānam anāgatāvekṣaṇam atikrāntāvekṣaṇaṃ saṃśayaḥ vyākhyānaṃ svasaṃjñā nirvacanaṃ nidarśanaṃ niyogaḥ vikalpaḥ samuccayaḥ ūhyam iti | [Su, Utt., 65 3.2]
atrāsāṃ tantrayuktīnāṃ kiṃ prayojanam ucyate vākyayojanamarthayojanaṃ ca | [Su, Utt., 65 4.1]
bhavanti cātra ślokāḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 5.1]
asadvādiprayuktānāṃ vākyānāṃ pratiṣedhanam | [Su, Utt., 65 5.2]
svavākyasiddhirapi ca kriyate tantrayuktitaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 5.3]
vyaktā noktāstu ye hyarthā līnā ye cāpyanirmalāḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 6.1]
leśoktā ye ca kecitsyusteṣāṃ cāpi prasādhanam | [Su, Utt., 65 6.2]
yathāmbujavanasyārkaḥ pradīpo veśmano yathā | [Su, Utt., 65 7.1]
prabodhasya prakāśārthaṃ tathā tantrasya yuktayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 7.2]
tatra yamarthamadhikṛtyocyate tadadhikaraṇaṃ yathā rasaṃ doṣaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 65 8.1]
yena vākyaṃ yujyate sa yogaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 9.1]
yathā tailaṃ pibeccāmṛtavallinimbahiṃsrābhayāvṛkṣakapippalībhiḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 9.2]
siddhaṃ balābhyāṃ ca sadevadāru hitāya nityaṃ galagaṇḍaroge | [Su, Utt., 65 9.3]
ityatra tailaṃ siddhaṃ pibediti prathamaṃ vaktavye tṛtīyapāde siddhamiti prayuktam evaṃ dūrasthānām api padānāmekīkaraṇaṃ yogaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 9.4]
yo 'rtho 'bhihitaḥ sūtre pade vā sa padārthaḥ padasya padayoḥ padānāṃ vārthaḥ padārtho 'parimitāśca padārthāḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 10.1]
yathā snehasvedāñjaneṣu nirdiṣṭeṣu dvayostrayāṇāṃ vārthānām upapattirdṛśyate tatra yo 'rthaḥ pūrvāparayogasiddho bhavati sa grahītavyo yathā devotpattimadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma ityukte saṃdihyate buddhiḥ katamasya vedasyotpattiṃ vakṣyatīti yataḥ ṛgvedādayastu vedāḥ vida vicāraṇe vidﾱ lābhe ityetayośca dhātvoranekārthayoḥ prayogāttatra pūrvāparayogam upalabhya pratipattirbhavati āyurvedotpattimayaṃ vivakṣuriti eṣa padārthaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 10.2]
yadanyaduktamanyārthasādhakaṃ bhavati sa hetvarthaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 11.1]
yathā mṛtpiṇḍo 'dbhiḥ praklidyate tathā māṣadugdhaprabhṛtibhir vraṇaḥ praklidyata iti | [Su, Utt., 65 11.2]
samāsavacanam uddeśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 12.1]
yathā śalyam iti | [Su, Utt., 65 12.2]
vistaravacanaṃ nirdeśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 13.1]
yathā śārīramāgantukaṃ ceti | [Su, Utt., 65 13.2]
evamityupadeśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 14.1]
yathā tathā na jāgṛyādrātrau divāsvapnaṃ ca varjayet iti | [Su, Utt., 65 14.2]
anena kāraṇenetyapadeśo yathāpadiśyate madhuraḥ śleṣmāṇamabhivardhayatīti | [Su, Utt., 65 15.1]
prakṛtasyātikrāntena sādhanaṃ pradeśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 16.1]
yathā devadattasyānena śalyamuddhṛtaṃ tathā yajñadattasyāpyayamuddhariṣyatīti | [Su, Utt., 65 16.2]
prakṛtasyānāgatasya sādhanamatideśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 17.1]
yathā yato 'sya vāyurūrdhvamuttiṣṭhate tenodāvartī syāditi | [Su, Utt., 65 17.2]
abhivyāpyāpakarṣaṇam apavargaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 18.1]
yathā asvedyā viṣopasṛṣṭāḥ anyatra kīṭaviṣāditi | [Su, Utt., 65 18.2]
yena padenānuktena vākyaṃ samāpyeta sa vākyaśeṣaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 19.1]
yathā śiraḥpāṇipādapārśvapṛṣṭhodarorasām ityukte puruṣagrahaṇaṃ vināpi gamyate puruṣasyeti | [Su, Utt., 65 19.2]
yadakīrtitamarthādāpadyate sārthāpattiḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 20.1]
yathā odanaṃ bhokṣye ityukte 'rthādāpannaṃ bhavati nāyaṃ pipāsuryavāgūm iti | [Su, Utt., 65 20.2]
yadyatrābhihitaṃ tasya prātilomyaṃ viparyayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 21.1]
yathā kṛśālpaprāṇabhīravo duścikitsyā ityukte viparītaṃ gṛhyate dṛḍhādayaḥ sucikitsyā iti | [Su, Utt., 65 21.2]
prakaraṇāntareṇa samāpanaṃ prasaṅgo yadvā prakaraṇāntarito yo 'rtho 'sakṛduktaḥ samāpyate sa prasaṅgaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 22.1]
yathā pañcamahābhūtaśarīrisamavāyaḥ puruṣastasmin kriyā so 'dhiṣṭhānamiti vedotpattāvabhidhāya bhūtacintāyāṃ punaruktaṃ yato 'bhihitaṃ pañcamahābhūtaśarīrisamavāyaḥ puruṣa iti sa khalveṣa karmapuruṣaścikitsādhikṛta iti | [Su, Utt., 65 22.2]
yadavadhāraṇenocyate sa ekāntaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 23.1]
yathā trivṛdvirecayati madanaphalaṃ vāmayati | [Su, Utt., 65 23.2]
kvacittathā kvacidanyatheti yaḥ so 'nekāntaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 24.1]
yathā kecidācāryā bruvate dravyaṃ pradhānaṃ kecidrasaṃ kecidvīryaṃ kecidvipākam iti | [Su, Utt., 65 24.2]
ākṣepapūrvakaḥ praśnaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 25.1]
yathā kathaṃ vātanimittāścatvāraḥ pramehā asādhyā bhavantīti | [Su, Utt., 65 25.2]
tasyottaraṃ nirṇayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 26.1]
yathā śarīraṃ prapīḍya paścādadho gatvā vasāmedomajjānuviddhaṃ mūtraṃ visṛjati vāta evamasādhyā vātajā iti | [Su, Utt., 65 26.2]
tathā coktam | [Su, Utt., 65 27.1]
kṛtsnaṃ śarīraṃ niṣpīḍya medomajjāvasāyutaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 27.2]
adhaḥ prakupyate vāyustenāsādhyāstu vātajāḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 27.3]
paramatam apratiṣiddham anumatam | [Su, Utt., 65 28.1]
yathā anyo brūyāt sapta rasā iti taccāpratiṣedhād anumanyate kathaṃcid iti | [Su, Utt., 65 28.2]
prakaraṇānupūrvyābhihitaṃ vidhānam | [Su, Utt., 65 29.1]
yathā sakthimarmāṇyekādaśa prakaraṇānupūrvyābhihitāni | [Su, Utt., 65 29.2]
evaṃ vakṣyatītyanāgatāvekṣaṇam | [Su, Utt., 65 30.1]
yathā ślokasthāne brūyāt cikitsiteṣu vakṣyāmīti | [Su, Utt., 65 30.2]
yatpūrvamuktaṃ tadatikrāntāvekṣaṇam | [Su, Utt., 65 31.1]
yathā cikitsiteṣu brūyāt ślokasthāne yadīritam iti | [Su, Utt., 65 31.2]
ubhayahetudarśanaṃ saṃśayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 32.1]
yathā talahṛdayābhighātaḥ prāṇaharaḥ pāṇipādacchedanamaprāṇaharam iti | [Su, Utt., 65 32.2]
tantre 'tiśayopavarṇanaṃ vyākhyānam | [Su, Utt., 65 33.1]
yathā iha pañcaviṃśatikaḥ puruṣo vyākhyāyate anyeṣvāyurvedatantreṣu bhūtādiprabhṛtyārabhya cintā | [Su, Utt., 65 33.2]
anyaśāstrāsāmānyā svasaṃjñā | [Su, Utt., 65 34.1]
yathā mithunamiti madhusarpiṣor grahaṇaṃ lokaprasiddham udāharaṇaṃ vā | [Su, Utt., 65 34.2]
niścitaṃ vacanaṃ nirvacanam | [Su, Utt., 65 35.1]
yathā āyurvidyate 'sminnanena vā āyurvindatītyāyurvedaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 35.2]
dṛṣṭāntavyaktirnidarśanam | [Su, Utt., 65 36.1]
yathā agnirvāyunā sahitaḥ kakṣe vṛddhiṃ gacchati tathā vātapittakaphaduṣṭo vraṇa iti | [Su, Utt., 65 36.2]
idam eva kartavyamiti niyogaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 37.1]
yathā pathyam eva bhoktavyam iti | [Su, Utt., 65 37.2]
idaṃ cedaṃ ceti samuccayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 38.1]
yathā māṃsavarge eṇahariṇādayo lāvatittirisāraṅgāśca pradhānānīti | [Su, Utt., 65 38.2]
idaṃ vedaṃ ceti vikalpaḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 39.1]
yathā rasaudanaḥ saghṛtā yavāgūrvā bhavatviti | [Su, Utt., 65 39.2]
yadanirdiṣṭaṃ buddhyāvagamyate tadūhyam | [Su, Utt., 65 40.1]
yathā abhihitam annapānavidhau caturvidhaṃ cānnam upadiśyate bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ lehyaṃ peyam iti evaṃ caturvidhe vaktavye dvividham abhihitam idam atrohyam annapāne viśiṣṭayor dvayor grahaṇe kṛte caturṇām api grahaṇaṃ bhavatīti caturvidhaścāhāraḥ praviralaḥ prāyeṇa dvividha eva ato dvitvaṃ prasiddham iti | [Su, Utt., 65 40.2]
kiṃcānyat annena bhakṣyam avaruddhaṃ ghanasādharmyāt peyena lehyaṃ dravasādharmyāt | [Su, Utt., 65 40.3]
bhavanti cātra | [Su, Utt., 65 41.1]
sāmānyadarśanenāsāṃ vyavasthā saṃpradarśitā | [Su, Utt., 65 41.2]
viśeṣastu yathāyogam upadhāryo vipaścitā | [Su, Utt., 65 41.3]
dvātriṃśadyuktayo hyetāstantrasāragaveṣaṇe | [Su, Utt., 65 42.1]
mayā samyagvinihitāḥ śabdārthanyāyasaṃyutāḥ | [Su, Utt., 65 42.2]
yo hyetā vidhivadvetti dīpībhūtāstu buddhimān | [Su, Utt., 65 43.1]
sa pūjārho bhiṣakśreṣṭha iti dhanvantarer matam | [Su, Utt., 65 43.2]
{Su, Utt., 66}
athāto doṣabhedavikalpamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 1]
yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 2]
aṣṭāṅgavedavidvāṃsaṃ divodāsaṃ mahaujasam | [Su, Utt., 66 3.1]
chinnaśāstrārthasaṃdehaṃ sūkṣmāgādhāgamodadhim | [Su, Utt., 66 3.2]
viśvāmitrasutaḥ śrīmān suśrutaḥ paripṛcchati | [Su, Utt., 66 4.1]
dviṣaṣṭir doṣabhedā ye purastāt parikīrtitāḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 4.2]
kati tatraikaśo jñeyā dviśo vāpyathavā triśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 5.1]
tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saṃśayacchinmahātapāḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 5.2]
prītātmā nṛpaśārdūlaḥ suśrutāyāha tattvataḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 6.1]
trayo doṣā dhātavaśca purīṣaṃ mūtram eva ca | [Su, Utt., 66 6.2]
dehaṃ saṃdhārayantyete hyavyāpannā rasair hitaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 7.1]
puruṣaḥ ṣoḍaśakalaḥ prāṇāścaikādaśaiva ye | [Su, Utt., 66 7.2]
rogāṇāṃ tu sahasraṃ yacchataṃ viṃśatireva ca | [Su, Utt., 66 8.1]
śataṃ ca pañca dravyāṇāṃ trisaptatyadhikottaram | [Su, Utt., 66 8.2]
vyāsataḥ kīrtitaṃ taddhi bhinnā doṣāstrayo guṇāḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 9.1]
dviṣaṣṭidhā bhavantyete bhūyiṣṭham iti niścayaḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 9.2]
traya eva pṛthak doṣā dviśo nava samādhikaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 10.1]
trayodaśādhikaikadvisamamadhyolbaṇais triśaḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 10.2]
pañcāśad evaṃ tu saha bhavanti kṣayam āgataiḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 11.1]
kṣīṇamadhyādhikakṣīṇakṣīṇavṛddhais tathāparaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 11.2]
dvādaśaivaṃ samākhyātāstrayo doṣā dviṣaṣṭidhā | [Su, Utt., 66 12.1]
miśrā dhātumalair doṣā yāntyasaṃkhyeyatāṃ punaḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 12.2]
tasmāt prasaṅgaṃ saṃyamya doṣabhedavikalpanaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 13.1]
rogaṃ viditvopacared rasabhedair yatheritaiḥ | [Su, Utt., 66 13.2]
bhiṣak kartātha karaṇaṃ rasā doṣāstu kāraṇam | [Su, Utt., 66 14.1]
kāryamārogyam evaikam anārogyam ato 'nyathā | [Su, Utt., 66 14.2]
adhyāyānāṃ tu ṣaṭṣaṣṭyā grathitārthapadakramam | [Su, Utt., 66 15.1]
evam etad aśeṣeṇa tantram uttaram ṛddhimat | [Su, Utt., 66 15.2]
spaṣṭagūḍhārthavijñānam agāḍhamandacetasām | [Su, Utt., 66 16.1]
yathāvidhi yathāpraśnaṃ bhavatāṃ parikīrtitam | [Su, Utt., 66 16.2]
sahottaraṃ tvetad adhītya sarvaṃ brāhmaṃ vidhānena yathoditena | [Su, Utt., 66 17.1]
na hīyate 'rthān manaso 'bhyupetād etadvaco brāhmam atīva satyam | [Su, Utt., 66 17.2]
